story:
We want to make a difference to people’s everyday lives, all over the world. With your help, we can make a big impact.

Ulu Brush is the revolutionary sonic toothbrush for complete oral care that lets you focus on all areas of your oral health and beauty.

  • 360° Sonic Brush
  • Near-infrared Healing Technology
  • Hands-free Blue Light Whitening
  • Orthodontic Accelerator (for invisalign & traditional braces)

The Ulu Brush is not only for adults. Brushing is not high on kids’ list of fun activities and study shows: 42% of children ages 2 to 11 develop cavities in their primary teeth. The ULU Brush for kids is the perfect solution.  It makes brushing fun and parents get the peace of mind that ALL their child’s teeth are cleaned uniformly.

 

360° SONIC BRUSHING - the new innovative way to clean all your teeth at the same time.  If you brush your teeth for 2 minutes, each tooth is getting less than 6 seconds of attention.  With the ULU, each tooth will receive the full 30 seconds.  It even has a built in timer so you know when you’re done. The brush heads are made of food-grade silicone specially designed for maximum cleaning power with up to 4 times more bristles and cleaning nodes than the others.

MASSAGING - The American Dental Association promotes massaging gums to help with blood flow.  Increased blood flow to gums has been shown to allow the tissue to repair itself more effectively and be less susceptible to the effects of gingivitis and periodontitis.  Massaging the gums also can loosens and remove debris from the periodontal pocket. Plaque and food particles are then easier to clear away.

 

WHITENING - The ULU delivers mega whitening power with it’s blue light technology.  Whiten on an everyday basis when combined with our specially formulated whitening toothpaste.  Swap the brushing head with the included whitening tray and use the whitening mode with whitening gel for ultra results.

ORTHODONTIC ACCELERATOR - the mode is only available with the ULU Brush Plus. It is a 10 minute mode with pulsating cycles of 3 second vibrations. Run it twice for the recommended 20 minutes a day. Studies shows to greatly alleviate the pain and discomfort associated with orthodontic treatment up to 70%. It uses gentle, precise micro-pulses that are transmitted through teeth to the surrounding bone to increase cellular activity to allow teeth to move quicker, which accelerates invisalign or traditional braces up to 50% faster.

 

POWER - No more stocking up on batteries. Pop the ULU back on it's charging base to keep the rechargeable battery always ready to go. The base also automatically triggers UV light to kill bacteria.



LIGHT TECHNOLOGY - The ULU features near-infrared light technology on brushing mode to promote tissue healing and reduce inflammation. The Blue light allows everyday whitening as well as quick targeted whitening bleaching sessions.

 


  • 1 x Bleach Tray
  • 1 x Brush Head
  • 1 x Toothpaste
  • Ulu Brush Module
  • Charger Base
  • USB Cable 

 

BRUSHING

  • Squeeze the Ulu Brush toothpaste onto both sides of the brush head.

  • Insert the brush head in your mouth and press the (I/O) button with Mode 1 for sonic brush and Mode 2 for sensitive brush. Move the Ulu Brush side-to-side for 30 seconds.

​

  • Rinse mouth and brush head. YOUR MOUTH IS NOW FRESH AND CLEAN!

 

​WHITENING

  • Apply a thin layer of the Ulu Brush advanced serum whitening gel into both sides of the whitening tray.

  • Insert the whitening tray in your mouth and continue with your daily routine for 5 minutes while hands-free whitening your teeth.

​

  • Remove the whitening tray from your mouth and rinse your mouth and tray to remove the remaining gel. YOU'RE READY TO SHOW OFF YOUR NEW, WHITER SMILE!

​


 

The next evolution in brushing teeth has arrived, featuring simultaneous full-mouth cleaning, teeth whitening technology, blue and near-infrared light, and more style than you can handle.

Our founder is developing and perfecting Ulu Brush™, finding ways to optimize the sonic brushing experience.

story:
Quick facts about Highku to get

you up to speed!

    

 

* If you have slightly smaller or bigger size than mentioned in size chart, you can freely choose XS or L size accordingly.


    

Get your Highku silver socks right before this Christmas!

You have made it thus far, here is some more detailed information about Highku!

Help us to boost your confidence, enhance your comfort and improve your feet health by delivering to you a simple yet very crucial part of clothing - socks. Maybe it's time to pay some attention to this just because for many of us our feet for a large portion of a day are in shoes and it may leave a long lasting effect to our health - and better it is a positive effect.

Certified factory craftsmen having decades of experience using latest industry knowledge, the best materials and the finest machinery here in Northern Europe we create world class silver socks.

We truly believe we can help you achieve a level of comfort that you simply forget about your socks. It is because Highku Socks take care of you so you do not have to worry about them. You  are only required to pay attention to your socks once - when you choose your Highku Sock. The rest is up to them.

We strive to make a meaningful difference in peoples lives starting from the very bottom with a very fundamental meaning.

We believe it is good to live in society that values feeling good and health care is a long term priority. Highku silver socks embodies the best of all you need on your feet.

The ultimate goal - your long term happy feet

Lets be clear about the funding here. We have spent more than a year in research and developing, testing and even more testing. That is why you are invited to participate at the very important moment - it is up to you to decide and to let Highku Silver Socks to the production. With your help we plan to raise USD 3,500 and we would like to be 100% transparent where your money ends up:

  • ~8% goes for Indiegogo, bank transfer and other type of fees;
  • ~15% goes for shipping costs;
  • ~77% goes for manufacturing and packaging the Highku silver socks.

We offer to you something to what we have dedicated 100% effort, time, energy and pretty much everything else what was needed. With that being said you might see why Highku Silver Socks embodies only the best you need.

It is up to you now to decide your long term treating attitude to your feet, to feel good about that and whether you want to make a difference.

A little science lesson!

According to The Institute for Preventive Foot Health:

  • The average foot contains 600 sweat glands per square centimeter – hundreds more than the armpits.
  • In one day, each foot can produce half a pint of sweat.
  • The main reason for bad feet odor is caused by natural bacteria on your feet or worst by fungus bacteria.
  • The two feet together have more than 250,000 sweat glands, and they release perspiration even during periods of non-vigorous activities
  • That said, odor is not caused by perspiration alone; it results from the acid byproducts of bacteria, as well as fungal growth (usually athlete’s foot fungus, tinea pedis), which are found in sweaty feet.

So the underlying reason for most cases of smelly feet is bacteria and moisture. When the bacteria rid themselves of wastes from breaking down oils and dead skin cells, bad smells can result.

Fungal infections of the feet like athlete's foot can lead to bad foot odor.

In so many cases our feet are in socks and in shoes large proportion or shorter but more active period of the day time.

Following this the choice of materials - bamboo and silver - becomes obvious

Silver has many unique qualities such as:

  • kills 99.9% of bacteria
  • antibacterial
  • antiseptic
  • hypoallergenic

Bamboo also has many great qualities as it is:

  • breathable
  • soft
  • eco-friendly

You can be sure that we have been into socks for quite a while and that is why with great pleasure we want to share with you our experience wearing Highku Socks.

And before that you might want to hear how was the tests made. Yes, we have tested Highku silver socks the hardcore way:

  • in the gym, office, running, dancing, hiking,... you name it;
  • of course from winter through summer;
  • men and women;
  • with washing and without washing.

So back to the points:

  1. Highku silver socks can keep you safe from odor and bad bacteria up to 7 days straight. Just because we are all unique in our own way, we had some who could wear one pair of Highku silver socks without washing for over a month and at the same time some hard case people, who managed to go for 2 days. Anyway it is up to each individual and chemistry so that is why we do recommend to change socks every day.
  2. Just because every foot is different in it's own way, for example foot may have some blisters, lump, pimple or something else like that, there is possibility that depreciation of the socks might not be even. It could appear and be more in previously mentioned areas.
  3. Only you can control overall logical things to do and good principles of using your footwear along with your Highku silver socks, like always wearing clean from dirt socks and footwear, make sure you cut and file your nails, take care of your feet skin, especially heel part skin so it's soft and see your doctor if you feel your feet might have some illness.

By supporting us you might reduce some unexpected events like skip the embarrassment of smelly feet. And even if your feet do not smell, they still deserve to be treated well.

Don't be shy and get in touch with us!

We - Highku - are happy to hear you out. Therefore don't be shy and tell us how you feel about our product, campaign in general and perhaps your personal experiences at info@highkusocks.com

90 days size guarantee

If your size is wrong please send them (unused and in original sealing) to us and right after receiving them, we will send you double the amount of new pairs of socks in the right size completely free of charge.

90 days quality guarantee

If your received any socks that arrived with any manufacturing faults, please send them (unused and in original sealing) to us. After receiving them, we will run an investigation and if the manufacturing fault has found to be the case we will send you double the amount of new pairs of socks completely free of charge.

Refunds guarantee

You may request a refund through Indiegogo within 10 days of making a contribution. (After that period, we will not be able to issue any refunds.)

International backers

We are shipping from Europe – Latvia and all international shipments are subject to taxes, customs, duties and administration fees which you are responsible for paying. Most countries will assess taxes/customs/duties and in certain countries the carrier might pre-pay the taxes/customs/duties and bill you afterwards. If you choose to refuse the delivery, your package will be abandoned. And once abandoned, we cannot ship another package to you or give a refund.

story:
Our Story

Chill Powder is the brainchild and proprietary Patent Pending intellectual property of Dr. Beth Fisher, Ph.D. (Indiana 1999), President of New View LLC (parent company to Chill Brands) a Nevada corporation. Dr. Beth and her woman-led team created odorless, tasteless healthy-living dietary supplement powders without utilizing any harsh solvents in the process.

These powders were created for Dr. Beth's patients, friends and family to use and are now commercially available through our strategic partners in Nevada and California as well as on dedicated websites, Amazon and select big box stores across the USA.

Dr. Beth (as she is known) spent a lifetime teaching special needs children, adults and those who teach those populations. Dr. Beth has expertise in cognitive disorders and the application of cannabinoids to physiological and cognitive maladies and is an expert in this field.

Dr. Beth is also a published author, radio show and podcast host, researcher, celebrity chef, and a fierce warrior for women's rights and in the fight to end cannabinoid deficiency subsequent to Prohibition in the United States.

  • Dr. Beth and her team are passionate about CBD and "LOC's" (Lessor Occurring Cannabinoids) and have a century of combined experience in the production and application of cannabinoids.
  • Chill Powder products are fabricated by her woman-owned and woman-run team.
  • All of our products are Vegan, Halal, Kosher, Sugar-Free, diabetic-friendly, odorless and tasteless unless we add natural flavorings.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Chill Powder has already lifted off the launchpad after years of preparation and now we need a small boost to achieve orbit. Once our products are available in single servings SKU's we will be able to place them in doctor's offices, health food stores, nutrition centers, Yoga studios and into big box stores. 
  • We Licensed our proprietary IP for the recreational cannabis market in Nevada in 2017.
  • Chill Powder then Licensed the state of California in 2018 to the largest purveyor of cannabis flower in that market.
  • 2019 saw New View LLC and Chill Powder fulfill almost 7.5 million dollars worth of contractual obligations and now it's time to bring everyone the benefits of the lessor occurring cannabinoids like CBD, CBG, CBN and over one hundred other cannabinoids which are currently being studied in the USA and abroad.
  • Our CBD line is ready to go and if this campaign is a success we will begin to release other cannabinoid iterations such as CBG as the science becomes available if we do not reach our goal we will widen distribution on our CBD line only for now.
  • There is nothing like it anywhere! There are a few other cannabinoid powders out there but they are isolates made with harsh chemicals or powders made with solvents we feel are unsafe and inappropriate. Chill Powder sources and uses only the purist USA oils STRIPPED OF ALL THC. Zero solvents or chemicals are used in the process. With Chill Powder products you get purity, potency, and peace of mind.

 

Purity, Potency, Professionalism

YOUR contribution could make a difference! Chill Powder products are gaining traction in a number of markets and once available in single-serving SKU's a number of new vendors will begin to aggressively market Chill Powder and products derived from the CP technology.

  • Although not sold for medical purposes we have customers around the country reporting humbling personal stories of breakthroughs with Crohn's, chronic pain, epilepsy and more...
  • In eighteen months we took Chill Powder from creation to market and a 7.5 mm dollar contract with the largest company of its type in CA.
  • This is NOT a job to us, it is our life's work and our calling.
  • Chill Powder makes a positive difference in the world and we only wish to continue.
  • Chill Powder has never been about money and every single cent Dr. Beth and her team have collected (after expenses) were put right back into the company and effort to bring the benefits of our products to a much wider audience.

 

Risks & Challenges

Education is the key. Chill Powder products create a whole new way to consume cannabinoids, without smoking. 

Elder populations are unlikely to engage in smoking if they have not done so previously so new methods of consuming cannabinoids and micro-dosing are essential in order to share in the benefits of CBD and other LOC's (lessor occurring cannabinoids) with elderly populations.

The legal landscape has changed dramatically subsequent to the passage of the 2018 USA Farm Bill that makes the sale of all hemp-derived products, such as CBD, CBG, etc legal but there remain legislative challenges, especially in smaller municipalities.

Challenges abound as there is confusion in the general populace as to cannabinoids and cannabis in general but with knowledge comes power....and Chill Powder wants to empower the world...with YOUR help!

  • Chill Powder's management team has over a century of combined experience in the medical field, education, and cannabis, with an unparalleled perspective on the legal and medical landscapes.
  • Chill Powder has strategic partnerships across the globe for solving these challenges.
  • Chill Powder is a breakthrough and cross-over product and a whole new market sector.
  • Chill Powder strives to make a positive difference in the marketplace, workplace and world.

 

If You Would Like To Help In Other Ways:

Some people just can't contribute money at this time, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • PLEASE tell your friends and family about Chill Powder!
  • Copy this link and share it with friends and family.
  • We would be grateful if you would SHARE this campaign with others on social media!
  • Any contributions in kind will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you all in advance!

We leave you with one thought: "Just Chill"

story:
XLOONG SMART SPORT GLASSES

XLOONG smart glasses is an innovative optical coating technologies, even under the glare of the outdoors, the motion data is still clearly appears in sight.

Without looking down at your phone and stopwatch, free hands.  This will be XLOONG smart glasses bring you a new sports experience. Near-eye motion data display, allowing you to control the state of movement at anytime.

In addition, it built-in precision GPS navigation chip, which support voice and text two input methods. At the same time support road books and maps navigation, enhance the reality of the navigation effect, like the permanent street signs placed in front of the road, travel no longer worry about lost direction.

1300W HD Camera

Video Camera

Near-eye motion data display

Without looking down at your phone and stopwatch

Bone conduction headset design

Significantly enhance speech recognition accurancy

1300W HD Camera

Bluetooth Phones

Optical display technology & smart power saving technology

XLOONG Glasses style

The Original

Golden Coated Lenses

Yellow Graced lenses

Black Sunglasses lenses

Packing List

story:
Have you ever wondered if the air quality is healthy enough to go for a run?  Do you worry about keeping yourself and your family safe when it comes to dangerous gasses like Carbon Monoxide. Well the engineers at SPEC Sensors have been working to get gas sensors into a package small enough to fit into your phone and even into your watch.  What this means is that you now can carry around an electronic nose capable of smelling the world and letting you know what is out there, what you can smell and what you cannot.

SPEC Sensors is working to build the first ever mobile phone capable of environmental air quality monitoring, and with your contribution, we can make this a reality.  With on board temperature and humidity readings, you can be carrying around your own personal weather station.

Working with the Moto Mods™ development kit, we will be building a modification capable of working with your Moto Z on or off the phone.  Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower.  They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t.  To learn more about Moto Mods™ visit www.motomods.com. 

Even without the Moto Z, with internal Bluetooth capabilities and a standalone Android app, this device will be able to work with any Android smart phone out there. For instance, now you can track your trips to work, or the store, and see which routes have the least pollution. Or for new families, you can set up the MobileAQ in the nursery and remotely monitor the temperature and air quality of a loved one from your mobile device.

Our technology will be monitoring the same pollutants that the EPA targets across the country; toxic pollutants such as carbon monoxide (CO), nitrogen dioxide (NO2), ozone (O3), and sulfur dioxide (SO2) that can all do real damage to your health. We have worked closely with air quality and IoT groups like the Array of Things team to deploy local air quality monitors, and with this project we hope to build the first hyper-local monitor, in your pocket.

Our prototype AirQ monitor includes three gas sensors CO, NO2/O3, and VOC (volatile organic compounds) in addition to temperature, humidity, and pressure. What we want to bring to the world is not just personal air quality information, but also a way to map our communities and highlight problems and sources of poor air quality.  We hope to accomplish this feat using smart sensing technology and crowd-sourced data to fill in the gaps of data that the few national and local monitoring stations have historically provided.

What we need from you is a contribution to help us meet our goal to turn this gas-sensing platform into a mobile air quality platform.  Our two major milestones are hardware and software prototype design.  We have already put a great deal of work into the monitor design, including production, electronics, and calibration.  Part of your contribution will be used for the hardware design of this Moto Mod™ and will be done in our production house, using the extensive expertise of our mechanical and electrical engineers and production team.  Our production facility can easily adapt to produce small batches of your prototype air monitor, and we are excited to offer this to you in several of our perks.

The software that we have developed so far is very useful for monitoring the levels of ozone and carbon monoxide, and for mapping the levels of these gases throughout your day.  For instance, the following highlights the performance of our compact low cost carbon monoxide sensor side by side with scientific equipment roughly the size of an old desktop computer, and about 1,000 times the cost.

Your contribution will help us monitor these gases through cloud computing and will help develop the technology to identify gasses much like one might identify a fingerprint.  With this in mind we hope to partner with technologies such as Array of Things and Weather Underground in the US, and with CleanSpace in the UK to keep you breathing healthy wherever you go.

We have elected to make this a non-flexible funding campaign, so what this means for our backers is that if we do not make our goal for funding, we will be returning that contribution to you.

Given the link between the quality of the air we breathe and human health, monitoring the presence of contaminants such as environmental gases, volatile organic compounds (VOCs), and aerosols can directly save millions of lives each year and reduce human suffering.  Fewer asthma attacks, lower potential for stroke and heart attack, and improved physical performance is important not only in athletes but in raising the quality of all lives.  The awareness created will change behavior leading to improved well-being for people everywhere.  We hope that by bringing novel methods for gas sensing together with air quality monitoring we can increase your awareness of these health risks.

We have worked with many great companies and programs to bring our sensors to the market for wearable and fixed gas alarms, and now were excited for the chance to work with Motorola and the Moto Z team to put these sensors directly into your phone.  Our team at SPEC Sensors (spec-sensors.com) is composed of experts in the gas sensor field.  Our founder and CTO has over 40 years in the gas sensor industry.  We have a production group, a marketing and sales group, but most importantly an R & D sensor design group.  Our science background includes PhDs in physics and chemistry as well as advanced degrees in electrical and mechanical engineering and mathematics.  This project’s prototype will be designed and manufactured through a combined effort of our electrical, mechanical, and metrology engineers, with additional support provided by our close engineering partner firms.

We are attempting to create the best electronic nose ever built into a mobile phone platform.  The problem is, this has never been done before.  We realize rather than air quality, some people might want to know if they have stinky feet, so we are making this a very versatile platform.  This means that we are jumping into a project that will be constantly evolving, and we are excited.  Therefore, here are our hurdles that we must overcome:

We are not software engineers; we are hardware and material engineers, we will be relying on your feedback and advice with the first prototypes to give you the best experience possible with this new technology.

Our first prototype has three gas sensors; think of this as the first RGB computer monitor on the market after the green monochrome monitor (yes, some of us are that old).  People were very excited to see in color until they discovered four-color monitors are much better than three colors.  While we have many different gas sensors available, we are starting with three because we want to get these prototypes into your hands as quickly as possible.  As we get closer and closer to our goal, we will unlock more and more sensors.  To start with, we will be monitoring the gasses of CO and the combined O3/NO2 levels along with volatile organic compounds (VOCs like formaldehyde).  You can expect sulfurs (the deadly SO2 and the stinky H2S) to be the next sensors on our list.

Finally, we expect this technology to take off (the wearable sensor market is expected to reach $25B by 2025), and so the data stream from the consumer market is going to grow exponentially.  We may ask you to participate in other crowd sourced programs, and some of these programs may require a subscription.  We hope to support your prototype for as long as your Moto Z ® phone may last, but keep in mind they tout an unbreakable screen, and we have only measured a 10-year life span on our sensors.

While you may not have the Moto Z or our Moto Z Mod, you can still help us reach our environmental and smell monitoring goals.  We have made some perks available for the Maker.  Perks that will help you build your own electric nose.  For our sensor development kits, we have provided open source libraries to incorporate these digital and analog sensors into the most common and versatile microcontroller platforms like the Arduino. 

Finally, if you know someone who is interested in air quality monitoring, or they just needs a new nose, send them our way.  Let them know we are passionate about a future where we can all take a healthy breath.

story:
Dear Backers

In 2014 Pal started out as a simple night-light project, 3 years later Pal is now a revolutionary night-light designed for kids of any age with special optimisation for many on the autistic spectrum.

When Steve created his new night-light design he decided to seek feedback which led him to Dr. Cheryl Rock. Steve learned of her expertise in the areas of Infant mental health and Special needs, Cheryl explained the many issues surrounding childcare which needed to be resolved and light pollution was at the top of her list.

Steve completely scrapped his concept and with Cheryl’s guidance immediately started working on a better design. With-in 3 months the initial concept was born and with Roland's marketing smarts, The night-buddy light became... Pal® the revolutionary light designed to help you sleep.

Meet Pal

 

 

 

Why Pal

 

 

Pal is a rest-assist device, perfect for children. It provides night-time comfort using calming lighting patterns. Pal uses a timer which allows you to choose from  15, 30 or 45 minute intervals, after the time has fully elapsed Pal will enter sleep mode and all light and/or sound will automatically go off putting the brain in the optimal state for rest, darkness.

In the event that a child wakes during the night, the motion distress detector in Pal reactivates the light patterns to help soothe you back to sleep.

 

Multi-Sensory technology and Pal.

 

 

Sensory rooms usually have soothing music, movement and so on, Pal essentially is giving you the multi-sensory experience, albeit on a smaller scale, but in one manageable child friendly device. This has been the basis of Pal's research.

Now one of the things about multi-sensory rooms is, especially where the light is concerned, they can have positive calming effects on the children, but obviously not every person has access to a multi- sensory room, so the next best thing is Pal.

 

Pal for Autism

Apart from the light patterns, Pal was designed with the highly tactile nature of many children with autism in mind. Normally, night-lights aren't intended to be touched but Pal is designed to be handled. The shape, texture and colors allow many children on the spectrum feel comfortable when holding Pal. 

We tailored the workings of Pal to match the needs of the autistic community, making a device which would grow with its user. Since no one outgrows autism, creating a device which can evolve in usage as the user’s needs change was the most logical course of action.

 

Pal's awesome features

 

1. Light Guard 

Provides a comforting non-intrusive light. It ensures no light will be emitted in the general direction of your child.

2. Rhythmic Patterning

Rhythmic Patterning uses light to create an ambiance in the room which is both soothing and calming. These soothing patterns are also designed to allow the brain to reach the optimal state of rest more quickly.

3. Audio Playback

You can add your child's favorite music, sounds and even record stories using your own voice.

4. Timer

The timer allows you to choose from  15, 30 or 45 minute intervals. After the time has fully elapsed Pal will enter sleep mode, light and/or sound will automatically go off.

5. Distress Detector

The Distress Detector monitors and recognizes the change in audio levels in the room and automatically reactivates to help soothe your child back to sleep.

6. Light & Sound

You have the option to display light, hear sound or both, whichever your child finds most calming.

7. Torch

Pal can be used as a torchlight when in motion. This feature is handy for trips to the bathroom or during power outages or blackouts.

8. Activity Monitor

The built-in motion sensor will monitor your child's sleep activity and send data to your phone via the dedicated mobile app, perfect for when the baby sitter's on duty.

9. Memory

Pal has built-in memory that will allow you to store music, audio books and any recordings you make for your child.

10. WiFi

Connect Pal to your phone wirelessly using your home's wifi. Any data you want to send to Pal can be done from your mobile device. Additionally, this allows you to check in on your child wherever you are. Pal utilizes the latest wireless security standards, putting your family's privacy first.

11. Mobile App

Along with the ability to transfer audio to Pal, the mobile app can be used to review the data collected from the activity monitor and distress detector.

12. Built-in Battery

Pal has a built-in rechargeable battery that will give you anywhere between 3 to 5 days on a full charge depending on the options you set.

13. Toroid

Pal's toroid shape makes it easy for hands as young as 3 years old to have a solid grip. The circular shape also lends itself to the rhythmic, non-intrusive light patterns.

 

 

 

To create a master prototype for mass production is costly. Very costly. We decided to put the success of Pal directly into the hands of our customers via Indiegogo. Steve and Roland worked at a company which had a pretty good turn with crowdfunding and they felt that this would allow everyone to learn about Pal and to be a part of making it happen. Our goal is to show the world that you can make something that benefits as many members of the society as possible without having to compromise on design or functionality. Pal is designed to give light when it’s wanted and darkness when it’s needed. Additionally, parents can add their child’s favourite music and record themselves reading stories or personalized messages for their little one.

 

Our proof of concept. This is Pal in it's infancy.

 

Our first printed circuit board

 

Powered up and functional

 

Fitting with light defuser and case shape

 

 

 

 

 

The Breakdown

 

We are seeking help from you to the tune of $133,000.

It took us months of negotiations with vendors and manufacturers to get to that figure. Here's how that breaks down.

To create the master prototype used for mass production, we are going to need $80,000 US. That is going to be the most costly part of getting Pal in the hands of everyone who'd benefit from it. However, we aren't expecting something for nothing.

We want to be able to offer every single backer something. For those backing at the early bird price of $99 or for the $110 price, we will be sending you a unit. So the money you pledge will go towards paying for the master prototype as well as making sure you actually get to own Pal as soon as possible. Additionally for those who might not be able to support us at the full cost of the unit, we still want to be able to give you a discount code for the future purchase of Pal once it hits retail, and  as a special thank you to those backing at the $30 and $50 options we have special perks for you.

The remainder of the money we are seeking goes towards shipping logistics and insurance.

 

Challenges

We have been working on this project for the past 3 years and that includes meetings and discussions with shipping companies, production companies, prototyping specialists, accountants, lawyers, entrepreneurs and even government officials. We are taking this, our first independent project very seriously.

We already have the finer details accounted for and we are ready to get Pal to you.

Our biggest hurdle is getting the master prototype finished ahead of mass production. Having worked on a previous crowdfunding campaign, we are sure we will be able to reach enough persons who can see the benefit of owning and gifting Pal. That having been said, if we fail to reach our funding goal, we will try again with your feedback on why you think we failed.

 

Anything you can do to help, we appreciate!

We understand that many people might understand what Pal represents and want to support us but might not be able to. That's okay! Simply taking the time to share our campaign with anyone who you think might benefit from owning a Pal or might know someone who would will help us greatly so go ahead, tell your friends, family, colleagues, even your favourite barista :)

Many thanks, truly.

Thanks for reading (or scrolling) all the way down to this point. The team is humbled by you giving our project a once over. And if you decide to back us and share with your loved ones, we thank you even more. All the best for the holiday season and the New Year!

Thanks and respect,

Steve, Cheryl and Roland

story:
INTRODUCTION

MediBeat is a music player with a difference, enabling potentially millions of people around the world to benefit from the positive effects of music therapy. Improving and speeding up access, increasing scalability, providing personalisation and refinement based on real time bio-feedback through a clip-on heart rate module and connecting to the MediMusic service which is available 24/7, 365 days a year, whenever and wherever required.

The device is driven by AI and Machine Learning and connects through the Internet of Things (IoT) to select and swap out musical tracks to the tune of your own heartbeat, to achieve maximum benefit.

MEDIMUSIC SERVICE

MediMusic’s service is manged through a cloud-hosted platform for flexibility and scalability and is under-pinned by evidence-based science.

Collaborative working is at our core, working with health service providers, such as NHS Teaching Hospital Trusts in the UK and equivalent in the USA, to trial our products and service in real world situations.  From these we gain valuable insight to continually improve our service offering. 

Proven results from clinical trials also provide assurance to our customers.  

MEDIBEAT DEVICE

Any attempt to reduce stress or anxiety through relaxation requires minimum distraction. 

There is a growing momentum in the tech world to create simple products that encourage users to break away from using overly connected and increasingly complex mobile devices, which cause interruption and require endless scrolling, with clicking distractions - this is known as Calm Tech.

 

CLIP ON MODULES

A clip on module comes as standard with MediBeat, that monitors heart rate and heart rate variability.  The latter is an indicator of stress level.

Future modules might measure oxygen levels, skin conductivity or hormone blood measurements and provide additional data insight to the Digital Drip, to continue to improve predictions and decision-making and personalise and improve music dispensed.  As such, we will also gain a more granular understanding of the effect of music upon specific illnesses.

ADVANTAGES OF MEDIBEAT

Besides the prevalence of multiple apps. on one device, there are other reasons why MediBeat suits our vision more than using a smartphone.

THE STORY SO FAR

MediMusic and MediBeat are the culmination of a 7-year journey, to develop a healthtech device to advance how music therapy is provided and scaled, as need increases around the globe.

A number of academic trials are now running or scheduled within the UK and USA.  These will evaluate the effects of music on; pain, anxiety and cognitive function.  We even have one trial underway to assess the benefit of music therapy on 40 staff working in critical care, to assess the benefits of music therapy on those who, for a prolonged period of time, have worked through the difficulties and trauma of the COVID pandemic.

A 22% reduction is a statistically significant change!

A smartphone app. was developed for these closed trials which, based on trial findings, identified the need to create a device that was more bespoke and is where the idea for MediBeat originated.

 

MEDIBEAT DEVICE

With an emphasis on collaboration, we started the process to create MediBeat.  Early work involved the development of a heart rate monitor.  This stage of the process involved testing to ensure that it would work effectively with different headphones.

Later, when the need was identified for a more bespoke device, and after testing, a decision was made to incorporate the heart rate monitor in a separate module (Bio-feedback module).  

As we take the next steps towards production, we will continue to work in collaboration and will partner with the Aura Innovation Centre, a subsidiary of the University of Hull.

Advances in 3D printing, enable MediMusic to manufacture MediBeat and the Bio-feedback module initially in the UK.  

 

Our intention is to continue to create products which connect through the Internet of Things, integrate data from different devices and apply analytics to share information with applications designed to support specific health needs.

Each product will be; compact, lightweight, easy to use and available 24/7, 365 days a year, wherever and whenever required.

 

PHYSIOLOGICAL EFFECTS - THE SCIENCE

Music has a physiological effect by downregulating the activity of the hypothalamus pituitary- adrenal (HPA) axis, which leads to a reduction in the body’s response to stress.  Music also activates the parasympathetic nervous system, leading to decreased blood pressure, heart rate and cortisol production. In addition to the physiological effects, music also has a psychological role, by eliminating fear and anxiety. 

 

Research Findings

 

The Importance of Reducing Cortisol

Music and Relaxation

 

Music and Pain

Dopamine Improves Musical Pleasure & Mood

“A new study published in the prestigious Proceedings of the National Academy of Science, reveals a causal link between the neurotransmitter dopamine and the reward responses to music.”

“These results shed new light on the neurobiology and neurochemistry underpinning reward responses to music, which has both theoretical implications for models of reward-system function, as well as potential for application of music to disorders of reward and motivation.”

Dopamine Regulates the Reward Experiences Elicited by Music Laura Ferreri, Ernest Mas-Herrero, Robert J. Zatorre, Pablo Ripollés, Alba Gomez-Andres, Helena Alicart, Guillem Olivé, Josep Marco-Pallarés, Rosa M. Antonijoan, Marta Valle, Jordi Riba, and Antoni Rodriguez-Fornells

Hospital of McGill University, Montreal Neurological Institute, University of Barcelona                         & de Sant Pau of Barcelona

 

Effects of Music Interventions on Stress

“Two multilevel meta-analyses were performed to assess the strength of the effects of music interventions on both physiological and psychological stress-related outcomes”.  “Stress is believed to be one of the major factors negatively affecting our health. High stress levels have shown to be strongly associated with many physical and emotional problems, such as cardiovascular disease, chronic pain, anxiety disorders, depression, burnout, and addictions”

“Results showed that music interventions had an overall significant effect on stress reduction in both physiological and psychological outcomes”

Effects of Music Interventions on Stress-related Outcomes  Martina de Witte , Anouk Spruit ,Susan van Hooren ,Xavier Moonen ,Geert-Jan Stams - Health Psychology Review

Improving Sleep Quality

“Primary insomnia is one of the most common issues for adults.”

“All intervention arms were statistically more effective than the usual care, with patients ranking listening to music as the best means of intervention”.  “For overall sleep quality, only music-associated relaxation was statistically more effective than the patients' usual care, in terms of sleep onset latency, music-associated relaxation and listening to music had significant advantage, listening to music and music with exercise displayed a tendency to improve sleep efficiency.”

Can Music Improve Sleep Quality in Adults with Primary Insomnia Fan Feng , Yingshi Zhang, Jun Hou , Jiayi Cai, Qiyu Jiang , Xiaojuan Li , QingchunZhao ,Bo-An Li - International Journal of Nursing 


COMPANY PROFILE

MediMusic is a ‘HealthTech’ company specializing in research and development into next generation ‘Music Therapy’ product and service solutions.

Our mission empowers us “to pioneer AI technology-based Music Therapy that is tailored to each person, is scalable across multiple users and locations, meets existing needs and improves well-being and quality of life.”

Personal health care is our passion and is becoming ever-more personalised. In the not-too-distant future we expect that patients will have greater control of their healthcare and data, which will be central to our innovations. 

Research and Development (R&D), clinical trials and collaborations are at the heart of MediMusic’s work and provide evidence-based assurance to customers.

Management Team

Scientific Advisors

PROJECT TIMELINE

MEDIA COVERAGE

Some great publicity........

 

WHY ARE WE CROWDFUNDING?

We are seeking to develop MediBeat to reach people with dementias, anxiety, stress and pain, particularly those who do not have or are unable to use smartphones, a laptop or PC.  All that is required is a Spotify account that people may already have or can easily be set up.  We should still stress that MediBeat is available to all!

The time is now right to seek funding to develop MediBeat through a crowdfunding campaign, to bring in contributions to turn our vision into a reality.  

By crowdfunding, we also hope to build our community of like-minded people.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Manufacturing

There are 3 specific manufacturing stages to come together, the casing, electronics and heart rate monitor.  MediMusic’s Chief Technical Officer will maintain oversight of the manufacturing process and have responsibility for product testing at prototype stage.

Fulfilment  

Depending on the number of backers to MediMusic’s campaign, which at campaign launch would not be known, there could be some delays to shipping due to the sheer number of fulfilment orders, if numbers significantly surpass expectations.  Also, due to any logistical issues outside of MediMusic’s control.  A proven logistics company will have responsibility for getting products to backers.  Regular updates will be posted to the campaign site to provide transparency.

EVIDENCE-BASED RESEARCH

With over 25,000 research papers available in the PubMed Library that validate the positive benefits of music to health, we thought that we would share some with you...

story:
Help us making Aurelia Chiara happy:

she has to give so much to the world, we want to make possible her chance with the Dolphin Therapy


Aurelia Chiara was born in 2009 with a strong Amyosthenia.

Like even our oldest son Jonathan she depends on a lot of dependence and medical assistance.

Aurelia Chiara has to give a lot to the world and we want to make her happiness possible, encouraging her continuing positive movements.

She learned to crawl and to say "Mama" , very enthusiastic she began exploring her surrounding and she loves to stay with children and animals.

We strongly need to make possible a Dolphin Therapy to her in summer 2015, for we´ve seen so much enormous progress with Jonathan, her brother, triggered by this special Therapy. 

We can´t bear the cost of this therapy ourselves, the expenses are round about 10.000 Euro (including flight and escort). We need the financial support of every single person, with every single Euro. Please help us!

story:
WE BUILT ROLLYCAT TO HAVE FUN IN A NEW WAY

We can tell from our experience that there is nothing a cat owner wouldn't do for their pets to keep them happy. RollyCat is a smart and innovative cat toy:


When you're not around, RollyCat will start playing with your cat automatically.

RollyCat gives valuable information about your cat's health. It's monitoring your cats’s daily activity, by tracking their play time.

Thanks to smartphone control playing is fun for both you and your cat. RollyCat is acting like real prey, learning to react to your cats unique play styles. 


"A cat toy with a soul" - John Catpenter, New York Cat"
Wow, I'm amazed, it's such a relief to our community" - Marcus Catford,  CEO at Hunt Your Own Food Inc.


THE PERFECT TOY FOR ANY CAT

RollyCat offers countless possibilities, by mimicking the movement of real prey and learning to react to your cats unique play styles


RollyCat understands the psychology behind cats' hunting behaviours and encourages cat's natural instincts to chase and catch prey. 

Cats like to sneak up on prey and and then pounce. RollyCat reacts to being hunted by trying to escape. It's a safe way to make sure your cat stays on top of it's game. Its varying difficulty levels will stimulate and challenge your cat, even as their skills improve.

AUTOMATIC PLAY MODE

RollyCat will start playing with your cat automatically when you're not around



Just set RollyCat free on the floor when you leave and have your cat go after it. 

It will react to cat’s movements by trying to escape and hide - just like real prey. Only smart toys provide the mental and physical stimulation needed for cats.

Solitary cats often invent ways to occupy their minds, like tearing up cloth scraps, unrolling tissue all over the house, picking at cardboard boxes, you name it.
Often times cat's left home alone have nothing else to do, besides eating. Lack of proper stimulation is the most common cause of mental and physical problems for cats. 


MANUAL PLAY MODE

RollyCat is fun for both you and your cat. By using your smartphone as a controller your cat will never find out who's really controlling the ball.



Ready for some high-tech cat entertainment? Watch your cat trying to outsmart RollyCat (or is it the other way around?). Watching your kitty play can give you an insight into the mysterious and rich personality of cats. 

HEALTH AND FITNESS TRACKER

RollyCat monitors your cat’s everyday activity, awarding health and happiness points for the playing time. 


Everyone knows it's important for a cat to be active to stay healthy but with today’s busy lifestyle it can be difficult to find enough time for play. 

Right now, there's no easy way to make sure if your cat gets enough exercise. What is he doing when no one is at home? This is where RollyCat can help. 

Built-in sensors measure how much and at what intensity your cat played during the day. So you'll know if your cat needs a little extra exercise.
Its mobile app monitors different health trends providing insights into your cats behaviour and health converting the activity to happiness points.

TESTING ROLLYCAT AT OUR OFFICE

We guarantee you hours of fun just like we had when watching our cat testers rolling on the floor with RollyCat.

RollyCat has an attachable tail which can be swapped out for different feathers or even for a piece of your cats favourite wrapping paper.









The mobile app will let you know if your cat needs a little extra exercise
Our integrated health monitoring helps you compare activity levels based on your cat’s breed and age; helping you to keep your kitty sharp and in shape. 




  • 4 day battery life
  • iOS and Android compatible
  • Downloadable games and movement patterns
  • Attachable chasing feathers
  • Wireless charging plate



Setup:

  1. Download the mobile app (Android & iOS)
  2. Connect RollyCat to your mobile device
  3. Create a personal profile for your cat
  4. Play with your cat using your smartphone
  5. RollyCat will learn which movement patterns are most exciting to your cat
  6. RollyCat is now ready to play with your cat even when you're not around

RollyCat can connect to

  • Any mobile device
  • Apple watch

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

We already have the technology and several working prototypes. While our team has been working on the idea non-stop we're still a small group of people and can't do everything by ourselves. We're looking for your support to fund creating the plastic moulds to start mass production and help to finish the mobile app.


We’re a small team of developers and hardware enthusiasts from Wazombi Labs (www.wazombi.com). On Monday March 7th, we start our crowdfunding campaign to bring you the world’s first smartphone-controlled cat toy and fitness tracker - RollyCat 

We've done it before.
We have successfully participated in accelerator programs for hardware startups (HAX, Garage48). We have run a successful crowdfunding campaign before (Smart Shades) and delivered in less than a year. 
While we work long hours on challenging hardware projects, our cats are often home alone – bored and patiently waiting for someone to play with them.
Our wish was to give something back to our cats.
For the last year we’ve been working extra hours to build a smart cat-toy , which would be intelligent enough to play with our cats and track their activity when nobody else is at home.
Our project began to capture the imagination of cat owners around us – and soon others wanted to have a RollyCat!
We’ve made many friends along our journey, carefully listening to their feedback – and are finally ready to release the RollyCat, for everyone!
Each RollyCat is made with love and care; a gift from us to our cat companions.

Thank you for your support and enjoy the roll! Purrrrfect! 



We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. We have hired a company with a history of building and manufacturing Bluetooth gadgets. 
We know how to handle the operations from prototyping to shipping and distribution. We have partners in San Francisco and Tartu who we trust and who can help us deliver the product we are all going to love.
During our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our partners in Shenzen to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might sometimes result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, but we have experience in different cycles of development and we prioritize high quality end-products. Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on at each stage so there will be no surprises.



There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can become part of the project, and help us turn this health toy into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends.

Click on the Facebook, Twitter sharing buttons to let the world know about the coming revolution in cat toys and fitness!


  1. PRODUCT FEATURES
  2. TECHNICAL SPECS
  3. SAFETY & CERTIFICATIONS
  4. CUSTOMER SUPPORT

My cat really doesn't like to play

...”She doesn't really like to play with toys,” “She liked to play when she was a kitten, but now that she’s older, she just prefers to eat and sleep.” But this isn't exactly true because a cat's mental health depends on the amount of exercise and hunting activities. This doesn't necessarily mean  the play will be fun for the human, but indoor cats really need stimulation every day. 

But is it the right toy for my cat?

There are tons of different cat toys on the market. But how do you know your cat's toy preference? Is your cat a birder, a mouser, or a bugger. What does your kitty like to do with the toys when you are not around? Does your cat prefer toys that mimic birds, mice or catching bugs? Rollycat can do it all in one, it will learn from the playing pattern and adjust the movements to your cats preferences as to what stimulates them to interact the most. It's like Christmas for your kitty.

How does the automatic mode work?

Just choose ‘automatic’ play mode and leave the ball on the floor when you leave the house. RollyCat now knows that you’re away and your cat needs company. So it will automatically start moving every now-and-then. It will learn from the previous playing sessions and will adjust it's movement accordingly.


--------------

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. We have hired a company with a history of building and manufacturing Bluetooth gadgets. 
We know how to handle the operations from prototyping to shipping and distribution. We have partners in San Francisco and Tartu who we trust and who can help us deliver the product we are all going to love.
During our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our partners in Shenzen to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might sometimes result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, but we have experience in different cycles of development and we prioritize high quality end-products. Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on at each stage so there will be no surprises. 
There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can become part of the project, and help us turn this health toy into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Click on the Facebook, Twitter sharing buttons to let the world know about the coming revolution in cat toys and fitness!






PRODUCT FEATURES
TECHNICAL SPECS
SAFETY & CERTIFICATIONS
CUSTOMER SUPPORT


My cat really doesn't like to play
...”She doesn't really like to play with toys,” “She liked to play when she was a kitten, but now that she’s older, she just prefers to eat and sleep.” But this isn't exactly true because a cat's mental health depends on the amount of exercise and hunting activities. This doesn't necessarily mean  the play will be fun for the human, but indoor cats really need stimulation every day. 
But is it the right toy for my cat?
There are tons of different cat toys on the market. But how do you know your cat's toy preference? Is your cat a birder, a mouser, or a bugger. What does your kitty like to do with the toys when you are not around? Does your cat prefer toys that mimic birds, mice or catching bugs? Rollycat can do it all in one, it will learn from the playing pattern and adjust the movements to your cats preferences as to what stimulates them to interact the most. It's like Christmas for your kitty.
How does the automatic mode work?
Just choose ‘automatic’ play mode and leave the ball on the floor when you leave the house. RollyCat now knows that you’re away and your cat needs company. So it will automatically start moving every now-and-then. It will learn from the previous playing sessions and will adjust it's movement accordingly.
--------------

story:
No Magic Bullets

The natural health industry is plagued with false claims from “experts”, fad fixes, and shaming tactics that deflate, rather than motivate, support, and inspire people. From a consumer standpoint, discerning between sound advice and snake oil is daunting.

In order to quiet the noise and make it easier to access legitimate natural health solutions, I am launching The Natural Health Project. This project will build a community hub of curated, vetted, and heavily researched information on natural healing that will be free and accessible to all. The most immediate goal of this project is to fund the first year of development, and I am asking for your support by making a donation of any size.

A Life’s Pursuit

The Natural Health Project is a culmination of my life’s work and passion. I have worked for years in the natural health community, collaborated with some of the industry’s biggest names, attended natural health retreats as far as Ecuador, and led large-scale web development projects. Through it all, my north star has been a drive to help the thousands of people plagued with chronic illness and other health maladies. Put simply, The Natural Health Project is my way of giving back.I believe so deeply in the positive impact this project can make that I am taking a sabbatical from my career to focus exclusively on its success. Not only do I want to inspire others, I want to build a healthier and happier world for my five young children.

A Community Pillar

The Natural Health Project will deliver content from professional researchers, writers, content creators, and natural health enthusiasts through a newsletter and website. On these platforms the public will find:

  • Inspiration: success stories and interviews with those that have healed naturally to inspire hope

  • Guidance: access to a community of natural health advocates

  • Incentives: giveaways for health supporting foods, products, and services

  • Resources: a curated selection of media, articles, and books that encourage a positive mindset for adults, as well as age-appropriate resources for younger generations

  • Community: details on where to find natural healing retreats, local yoga classes, community gardens, massage services, vegan potlucks, and more

A Little Goes a Long Way

Your investment of any size will significantly impact this project’s success. All funds raised will support the first year of development and growth by covering the following expenses:

  • Website hosting: $1,188 ($99/month)

  • Domain name: $15

  • Website security certificate: $50

  • Development work: $52,000 ($1,000/week)

  • Content/research/editing: $52,000 ($1,000/week)

  • Marketing & promotion: $13,000 ($250/week)

  • Legal services: $10,000

  • Payment fees: $5,000

Rewards for Backers

We know it’s possible to do well by doing good. With this in mind, we want to help advance your business goals by offering you the services and recognition opportunities described below. (Please note, we will review web links and business profiles to confirm that they are appropriate for this project.)

  • $5 to $24: your name or business name permanently displayed on the contributors page

  • $25 to $249: your name or business name, with your website link, permanently displayed on the contributors page

  • $250 to $3,499: your business profile permanently listed in our directory, and displayed with prominence (contextually and/or locally)

  • $3,500 to $6,999: an entire page devoted to your business, with weekly news/research/event content added by us

  • $7,000+: a full website developed by us, including (2) two years of hosting, maintenance, updates, and promotion

Spread the Word

If you can’t contribute today, that's okay! We need ambassadors who believe in this project to share it through their social media networks (#NaturalHealthProject). Thank you in advance for helping us build a community centered on good health, positivity, and natural healing!

story:
Presenting the first evidence-based complete probiotics formula: Thrive by MDBiotics

Our gastrointestinal system harbors 100 trillion microbial cells, which influence our overall health including the nutrition, metabolism, physiology, and immune function of our body. Some of these bacteria are good and some are not. The good bacteria keep the bad bacteria in check. This overall bacterial population has a symbiotic (mutually beneficial) relationship with our body. Research is increasingly showing that this symbiotic relationship is critical for overall health and wellness and its disruption contributes to progression of a number of diseases. Bacterial imbalance in the gut is proving to be a common pathway for progression of many conditions, including age-related reduction in metabolism, memory loss, dementia, heart disease, gastrointestinal disease, kidney disease, obesity and weight gain. Gut bacterial imbalance and protein fermentation by gut bacteria generates a myriad of toxic metabolites called endotoxins, including p-cresol and indoxyl sulfate. An unhealthy gut bacterial imbalance allows transfer of these toxins to all over the body, which contributes to inflammation, aging, and progression of disease.

Not all probiotics are created equal. MDBiotic’s probiotics (friendly bacteria) re-establishes intestinal symbiosis and neutralizes bacterial endotoxins. Studies behind Thrive by MDBiotics’ formula prove that probiotics have therapeutic roles in maintaining a metabolically-balanced gut microbiota and promoting a healthy body and brain.

 

Think of Thrive as the multivitamin of probiotics, except it is based on data.

After 7 years of research and studying various strains of probiotics, we have come up with a complete proprietary formula that contains 9 specific strains of probiotics that have been shown to aid multiple conditions and in keeping a healthy body and mind. The specific strains and dosage of live probiotics in Thrive has been proven to re-establish this symbiosis and improve metabolism and weight, improve multiple conditions such as blood glucose in diabetes, improve blood pressure, improve migraine headaches, improve gastrointestinal pain, improve uremia in kidney disease, improve memory in Alzheimer’s patients, improve mood and reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression.

Thrive is not just for those who are striving to become healthier. Thrive plays a protective role and should be part of a healthy lifestyle.

 

How is Thrive by MDBiotics different?

There are hundreds of strains (different types) of probiotics. Some are more effective than others and some are not only ineffective, but can lead to undesired side effects, such as weight gain. Thrive by MDBiotics is the first evidence-based probiotics formula on the market. This means MDBiotics’ formula is the result of hundreds of peer-reviewed publications and thousands of data points. See our bibliography at the bottom of the page. MDBiotics’ proprietary formula contains live cultures and 9 specific clinically tested strains of probiotics that have been shown to promote overall health, increase metabolism, stabilize blood glucose, improve blood pressure, improve migraine headaches, improve gastrointestinal pain, improve uremia in kidney disease, play a protective role in memory loss, improve memory in Alzheimer’s patients, improve mood and reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression. Think of this formula as the “multi-vitamin” of probiotics.

 

The science: What is the gut microbiome?

The human gut harbors a complex community of 100 trillion microbial cells that constitute the gut microbiota. The combined microbial genome of the gut microbiota is known as the gut microbiome. In general, the adult gut is dominated by two bacterial phyla, Firmicutes and Bacteroidetes; other phyla, including Actinobacteria, Proteobacteria, Verrucomicrobia, Cyanobacteria, Fusobacteria, Spirochaetes, and others, are present in smaller proportions. Each species of bacteria colonizes a specific niche, leading to different bacterial composition along the intestinal tract. Gut microbiota performs a multitude of functions and can be considered a metabolically active “organ” in itself. Under physiologic conditions, it participates in certain complementary metabolic activities that have not been fully evolved in the human host, such as breakdown of indigestible plant polysaccharides, synthesis of certain vitamins, biotransformation of conjugated bile acids, and degradation of dietary oxalates. Importantly, postnatal colonization of the intestine educates our immune system and reduces allergic responses to food and environmental antigens.

 

Metabolism and Weight loss

Recent research findings suggest that our gut microbiota might be involved in the development of obesity and related disorders, such as insulin resistance. Weight gain is associated with an increase in the capacity of the microbiota to extract nutrients from the diet and in inducing metabolic changes in the host, such as increased fatty acid oxidation in muscle and increased triglyceride storage in the liver. Restoring a healthy gut with specific probiotics has been shown to lead the body towards healthier weights. Most probiotics formulas do not consider the weight loss or weight gain effect of their strains. Our team has done a lot of research into coming up with a formula that is holistic and considers all factors including weight loss. Probiotics have also been shown to possess antioxidant and free radical scavenging abilities, both of which are known for anti-aging properties and contribute to a healthier body.

Heart Health

The association between bacteria and atherosclerosis- clogging of arteries that lead to heart disease, has been known for more than two decades. Recently, focus has shifted from bacteria to its product, endotoxin, for its role in the development of atherosclerosis. Endotoxin is a key factor in initiation and progression of atherosclerosis through injuring the cells lining our arteries. Furthermore, vascular smooth muscle cells, one population of cells lining our arteries, exhibit profound responsiveness to even very low levels of endotoxin. Elevated endotoxin level is a strong risk factor for the development of atherosclerosis in the general population. Elevated plasma level of endotoxins is noted in patients with unstable angina, a dangerous heart condition that could lead to heart attack and is related to increased stiffness of aorta and plaque formation in the arteries supplying blood to the brain.  Specific probiotic strains in THRIVE have been shown to counteract buildup of endotoxins and reverse their toxicity.

Kidney Health

The gastrointestinal system is at the interphase between the blood and the potentially toxic contents of the gut. Histologic changes in the intestines at the molecular level, with inflammatory cells, are noted in chronic kidney disease. Uremia (build up of toxins in the blood) increases intestinal permeability, allowing movement of bacteria and endotoxins across the intestinal wall into the blood and the entire body.  Factors that promote intestinal dysbiosis  (imbalance) also contribute to the leaky gut in kidney disease. Gut microbiome dysbiosis is linked to micro-inflammation in patients with kidney disease. Specific probiotic strains in THRIVE have been shown to improve buildup of toxins (uremia) and counteract the toxicity.

Memory, Dementia and Alzheimer’s disease.

Dementia is a syndrome that affects memory and other cognitive functions to the extent that it interferes with daily function. There are many conditions that can cause dementia, including Alzheimer’s disease and Parkinson’s disease. New research indicates that gastrointestinal tract microbiota (see definition above) are directly linked to memory functioning through triggering metabolic diseases and low-grade inflammation progress.

Alzheimer's disease is associated with severe cognitive impairments as well as some metabolic defects. Studies including a double-blind, and controlled clinical trial which was conducted among Alzheimer’s disease patients to assess the effects of probiotic supplementation on cognitive function and metabolic status have proven the connection between a healthy gastrointestinal system and the brain. After 12 weeks, the probiotic supplemented group showed a significant (more than 25%) improvement in memory.

Improving Mood, Anxiety, Depression and Migraine Headaches

Multiple randomized controlled trials have linked specific strains of probiotics in Thrive’s formula to improving mood, anxiety, depression and reducing severity of migraine headaches.

People suffering from depression experience significant mood, anxiety, and cognitive symptoms. Currently, most antidepressants work by altering neurotransmitter activity in the brain to improve these symptoms. However, in the last decade, research has revealed an extensive bidirectional communication network between the gastrointestinal tract and the central nervous system, referred to as the "gut-brain axis." Advances in this field have linked psychiatric disorders to changes in the microbiota. There is mounting evidence that the intestinal microbiota influences and modulates emotional behavior. This communication network between the gastrointestinal system and brain goes both directions and occurs via the autonomic nervous system, the enteric nervous system (nerve cells outside the lumen of the intestines), the neuroendocrine system, and the immune system. Several studies have looked at isolated nutrients and their impact on mental health. Central to this research are probiotics, defined as live microorganisms that, when ingested in adequate amounts, exert a health benefit on the host. Probiotics are transient entities that colonize the GI tract and influence various pathways. It has been well established that probiotics have therapeutic effects on many GI disorders such as inflammatory bowl disease; however, with the emergence of the gut–brain axis, it has been discovered that their therapeutic effects extend beyond the gut and into the central nervous system. There is robust evidence of this in multiple studies that have demonstrated probiotics’ ability to change behavior and improve the mood, anxiety and cognition of humans. Multiple studies have also shown that the specific strains of probiotics in Thrive have beneficial effects on the frequency and severity of migraine headache attacks.

Probiotics have also been shown to possess both antioxidant and free radical scavenging abilities, increase production of gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA), and improve absorption of other nutrients, all of which have been implicated in the pathophysiology of stress, anxiety and depression.

Dose and Directions

Thrive’s dosing is data-driven. The twice-daily dose of 5 billion SPECIFIC probiotics in this formula has been shown to be the most effective compared to other doses. Our doctors recommend you take one capsule once daily before bed for one week, and twice daily after that. The best times to take Thrive are after breakfast and before bed.

Storage & Expiration

Thrive’s cutting-edge live-culture formulation means it can be stored at room temperature safely for up to 2 years.

Facilities and Quality of Production

Thrive by MDBiotics is completely made in the U.S.A. with the highest quality ingredients and is manufactured in FDA-approved facilities. Furthermore, the production is GMP certified, TGA certified (Australia), Health Canada Registered, Organic Certified, Kosher Certified and QAI Certified. The facility has the capability to produce over 20,000,000 capsules per day. Production and on-time delivery will not be a problem! 

Thrive is vegetarian, lactose-free, gluten-free and organic.

Thrive's proprietary blend includes the 9 specific probiotic strains below at proprietary combination doses totaling 5 BILLION colony forming units. Thrive's proprietary capsule coating ensures optimal delivery to the intestines.

S. thermophiles 

L. acidophilus

B. longum

L. casei

L. plantarum 299v

L. bulgaricus

L. bifidum

L. reuteri

L. gasseri

PERKS - You will get our deepest gratitude and the below pre-order discounts. The world will love you for helping launch a high-impact wellness product!

We are not venture capitalists! We are a group of doctors and scientists who care about the wellness of people around us. We need funds to start and keep production going and in exchange for your help in launching production, we are offering deep discounts on the $70 MSRP per bottle. The perks are simple: The more you get, the more you save! To show you our deepest appreciation, ALL perks come with a 20% discount on ALL future purchases post-launch. You will receive a lifetime 20% discount coupon with your delivery of product.

The Impact

We are a group of award-winning physicians and scientists and we have made prevention our mission. Through this crowdfunding campaign, you have a chance to be a part of a healthcare innovation that could be a game changer, improving quality of life for millions of people!

Risks & Challenges

Let's be honest: Our team is made up of a bunch of obsessive-compulsive, award-winning doctors and scientists. We have come up with a product after considering thousands of data points! We have made a promise to ourselves to never compromise our reputation and quality of work. We have vetted multiple production facilities throughout the U.S. and identified the best one, which has the capability to produce over 20,000,000 capsules per day. Production and on-time delivery will not be a problem! Help us meet the campaign goal and we promise to deliver! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spreading the word can go a long way! Our founders have dedicated their lives to people and their health. Help us meet our goal and change lives by bringing this wonderful product to all those who will live healthier, better lives by sharing our campaign!

*The statements made on this page have not been validated by the FDA.
