This is our second campaign on IndieGoGo.

We've been fortunate to have the continuing support of our investors and the backers from our first successful campaign back in June of 2015. Unfortunately, we've had to work our way through several challenges over the past three years. Those challenges have prevented us from being able to ship the perks that our backers purchased during that campaign and we need your help to finally deliver those perks as well as the perks any new contributors select in this new campaign.

The issues we've persisted through, include:

1) Our contract manufacturer, Econis Labs outside of Atlanta, GA was acquired by a larger company that refused our business. Econis never shipped the units they were contracted to deliver in the Fall of 2016. Sun LifeLight had to purchase the additional material for a 100 unit build, find a new surface mount electronics contract manufacturer and raise the capital necessary to do so.

2) We took the opportunity during this new build, to improve the design including adding a touch screen display and a new power supply that increases the effective light output capacity.

3) Our original electronics distributor was unable to deliver the components we need for this new 100 unit build which allowed us the chance to work with Arrow Electronics and we couldn't be more satisfied with the partnership we're building!

We are again, humbly asking for your help as we revolutionize the lighting industry by building smart, personal sunlight delivery systems specifically designed to be used at work, school or home by anyone that wants to operate at their peak!  

Our talented team, coming from diverse backgrounds including telecommunications infrastructure equipment manufactures, semiconductor manufacturers and the medical professions have come together to make this happen. With our vast experience in designing and building high volume, complex software and hardware systems along with the clinical expertise in the use of products similar to the LifeLight Touch and your support, creates a unique opportunity for us to deliver this life changing solution for all that happen to spend most of their workday indoors.

Gary Grimard

Founder & CEO: More than 25 Years of technology leadership experience including business development, sales, marketing, product innovation and start-up methodology. Gary’s experience includes ownership of a technology sales firm he led to over $225M in annual sales. His efforts with Sun Lifelight are centered around the product architecture, leading the development and manufacturing resources along with fundraising, marketing, orchestrating the go-to-market strategy and building the team.

Alison Todd LICSW / ABD

Co-Founder & Product Advocate: Having over 20 years of experience as a Clinical Psychologist and behavioral health leader in Boston area hospitals, Alison focuses primarily on evaluation, research and advocacy within the client base to help evangelize the product and expand its success.

Our Extended Team (with thanks and gratitude)

My Point Exactly (Video Production and Sales): Keith O’Brien

Fikst Product Development (Mechanical Engineering):  Doug Sabin, Paul Sabin and Adrianne Jalbert

Arrow Electronics (Electronic Components and Lighting Design):  Jack Keegan, Ashley Livengood and Peter Clerico

Design Turn (Industrial Design): Matt Kressy

TMA (Software Application Development): Gian Le Kong, Hong Tran and the team

Dai Ma (Electronic Assembly)

Bluefish Digital (Marketing and Social Media Initiatives): Jeffrey Hodnett and Jeremy France

Connor Hayden (Photography)

Chris Clifford  (Sales Adviser)

Rex Trailer Studios (Video Productions) Mike Bavaro and Jillian Trailer-Rollock

Ed Lombardo (Software Lead)

Andrew Beaulieu (Hardware Lead)

Duane Dreger (Patent Counsel Cesari and McKenna, LLP)

Rick Kinney (Corporate Counsel  Lynch, Brewer, Hoffman & Fink, LLP)

Lisa Millette (Wicked Smart Marketing, Web Development)

We are thrilled with the results of our development efforts and pre-production build. With those units, we've been able to optimize our design with the help of our enterprise partners and are eager to make the leap into volume manufacturing!

With the support of our IndieGoGo backers, we will be able to bring this vision to a production reality satisfying the needs of so many that have been looking for our solution.

The backing we are seeking is to complete the production design modifications build the printed circuit boards for the ongoing 100 unit build and transition into volume production. Those efforts will be accelerated as we approach our fundraising goal. With the expectation of a 4 week turnaround on the printed circuit board fabrication and an additional 4 weeks for final assembly, the 90 day expectation to deliver on the rewards that our backers have purchased, is a realistic one.

Although there are always "bumps in the road", our team has been through them before and we'll always find a way to overcome them. Communication is key and our backers can rest assured that the transparency with which we operate will be refreshing and comforting as we navigate to that bright sun at the end of the rainbow!
story_txt:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3cFYSa-2Jq4
Thank you for your interest!
About 5 years ago, we set off on a mission to bring the healthful benefits of the sun inside to help employers and employees alike, create healthy, exciting, energetic and productive work environments!
We’ve all heard how the sun is critical to our overall well-being…and how today’s society spends less and less time out in it. The lack of sunlight has had a profound effect on our healthfulness. “Reduced energy, performance, slowed metabolism, insomnia and even depression are part of a growing list of issues associated with this migration indoors. Wouldn’t it be great if you could improve your health and wellness naturally by simply bringing the sun to work with you?! Our young company allows you to do exactly that.
Summarily:
We build smart, personal lighting systems that pack the colored light spectrum of a bright, sunlit sky into a sophisticated and sexy desk lamp, used as you would an ordinary one, but that actually delivers the energizing benefits of the sun, indoors, where you need it most!
Our journey began with a love for the outdoors and the constant desire to be in the sun. 
Many of us continue to struggle through the gloomy winter months! We drew inspiration from these long dark days to ensure that although the harsh weather will inevitably return, thanks to the LifeLight Touch, many of us will be basking in the healthful benefits of the sun no matter what the weather, season or time of day.

After months of research and development with an exceptionally talented team of technologists and medical professionals, we were able to deliver the LifeLight Touch to an amazing collection of enterprise clients.
Those partners including TJX, BAE, Barclays, Digital Credit Union (DCU) and Todd & Weld, to name a few, provided valuable feedback that allowed us to optimize the production design. 
Now we need your help to make the LifeLight Touch a production reality!
Through your support and backing of this IndieGoGo campaign, not only will you receive the first and only natural, energy boosting, personal, sunlight delivery system, but your support will help Sun LifeLight make this life changing system available to all that spend so much of their day indoors, no matter where they live!
The system is purpose built for use by computer using office professionals, students and home based workers that spend most of their workday indoors. With this simple yet sophisticated and patent protected system, those that don't receive the energizing benefits of being in the sun while at work, can still gain those natural, energy amplifying, mood enhancing and productivity boosting attributes at or around their computer workstations!
Corporations and individuals alike, benefit by virtually transporting their workstations to sun drenched destinations!

Computer-using office professionals, students and home based workers do not receive enough sunlight during the workday to maintain a healthy existence. As a result, It's virtually impossible for anyone that works indoors to operate at their peak. Depression, obesity, and type 2 diabetes are at epidemic proportions and have all been shown to have links to sunlight deprivation. The resulting absenteeism, presenteeism and a general malaise in the workplace, as productivity demands continue to increase, has proven costly for employers and individuals alike.


Please, find the following report from Thomas Jefferson University Department of Neurology, that succinctly explains how humans are "wired" to benefit from the sun. 
The founders of the world renowned LEED Building Standard have developed the WELL Building Standard that focuses on the human centric side of interior spaces. Their standard speaks plainly about the need for "Circadian Lighting" as a cornerstone to improve employee health and wellness. The LifeLight Touch delivers more than the amount detailed in this lighting category. The simple solution: Bring the effective, soft, “sky blue” color of a bright sunny day to every workstation...The result, a happier, healthier and more productive workforce and or individual, within days.

A recent report by Shadab Rahman, PhD. from Brigham & Women's hospital Boston, MA shows how Sun LifeLight’s technology is at the forefront of this healthful, productivity boosting revolution.

System Overview
Used as you would an ordinary desk lamp, this unique system allows users to interactively decide exactly how much sun they feel they need on a daily basis. The LifeLight Touch (available now) allows a user to adjust the brightness and duration of light through a learning integrated touch screen. Simply adjust the levels with a swipe of your finger, position the light to shine down into your eyes from above (typically from behind and above a workstation display as pictured below) and out of your field of view. Start enjoying the energizing benefits of use within a few days. The LifeLight Learn (available soon) combined with the Sun Seeker App (available soon) uses a mobile application to control and monitor the light wirelessly, while the system actually gets smarter over time. Using its sophisticated algorithm, the app recommends the appropriate amount of sunlight each and every day based on a variety of inputs including weather, sleep quality, personal schedules and even favorite athletic team schedules.
LifeLight Touch...Stylish and Elegant Simplicity



High tech brushed aluminum desk lamp
Color selected LEDs
Controlled using simple swipes of a finger on a glass touchscreen panel built into the base
Infinitely adjust the brightness of the soft, sky blue light
Adjust the timer for up to 8 hours of use with a simple swipe of the finger
Uniquely flexible positioning system allows any user to direct the effective light into the eyes from above to eliminate glare, the way nature intended

SunSeeker App...Sophisticated Utility

SunSeeker App Available Soon 

Personalized Control and Monitoring Mobile App
Bluetooth connection to the LifeLight Learn
Provides individually Customized, daily recommended sunlight levels for maximum benefit
Built with proprietary algorithm using Multiple Internet of Things (IoT) inputs such as:
 Weather
 Personal schedule
Athletic team schedules
Wearable device data such as sleep quality, etc.


Interactive algorithm learns each users optimum sunlight levels for peak performance




The Only Effective Colored Wavelength -The LifeLight Touch (available now) delivers the only therapeutically effective wavelength of light ~480nm (sky blue). It therefore operates at far less intensity while being more effective than any other solution. 

Connected and Responsive App -The LifeLight Learn (available soon) is the first app controlled, “Internet of things” (IoT) connected lighting product that leverages a multitude of external sensor based inputs. No other product has the ability to automatically incorporate outside variables and user dynamics that directly impact the amount of sunlight that is most effective for each individual user. 

Customized Sunlight Algorithm -By learning each user’s personal preferences the Sun Seeker app (available soon) algorithmically calculates the optimum amount of sunlight each and every day. 

Reduces Light Pollution –In an office environment filled with competing visual stimuli (monitors, overhead lighting, etc.) the LifeLight Touch only adds the specific wavelength of light required and reduces visual stress. 

Ergonomic Design -Unlike other bulky and disruptive light therapy products it’s unique compact and flexible form factor was developed to direct the light down into the eye and out of the field of view, the way nature intended. Position the LifeLight Touch to shine down from above your computer display and you'll receive all of the effective light energy without even noticing the LifeLight Touch is there!


Top 50 Finalist out of over 1,900 global applicants in Sir Richard Branson's Extreme Tech Challenge late 2014 into early 2015. Presented at the Monster Products Pavilion at the 2015 Consumer Electronics Show (CES2015).

/http://www.extremetechchallenge.com/2015-top-10/
Finalist in STAPLES (Fall 2014) Crowd2Shelf Contest out of close to 1,000 global applicants.

story:
Short Summary

Acid attacks are increasing.i'm a doctor and seeing the terrible suffering innocent people are going through after being acid attacked, i decided to develop a revolutionary makeup foundation that stops acid from burning through to the skin if someone was acid attacked. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Initial testing has been done and to get the makeup on the market for sale it has to undergo further testing as per UK regulations. what i need is to raise the money to complete the additional testing and once the product has been approved it can be dispatched.

We have different perks. you can buy a manual about acid attacks and this tells you how to try and minimize an acid attack and what to do it you we unfortunate enough to be attacked. 

The second perk is a research opportunity anyone who wants to do medicine or wants to do dermatology or Plastic Surgery can get involved and fund raise for us we will provide a research protocol and have full support completing the project and getting published as the primary author. 

The third perk are preorders for the makeup itself. once it has passed all stages of testing it will be authorized by the UK regulatory agency and  be dispatched.

The Impact

This will change millions of lives. Finally you can take control and protect yourself. You can avoid pain and suffering people are going through after being mutilated with acid.

Risks & Challenges

The challenge is the UK regulatory body and the risk is the time taken to get the delivery of the product . 

Other Ways You Can Help

You don't have to contribute financially you can just share the word. Empower yourself and not just other girls and women in your life but other men. This affects everyone. A person who is unstable enough to throw acid will not discriminate. This is a human issue.

story:
Short Summary

 

  • RT Supplement Inhalers are the first ever inhalers with dietary supplements in them.  The same kind of supplements used to make your workouts efficient are now found in an efficient, healthy, breathable form.
  • This is truly a revolutionary product.  Absolutely nothing like this in the market.  It changes how we consume dietary supplements.
  • Patented.
  • Inhaling these supplements is safe, easy and efficient as well--more of the actual dosage enters the body without being destroyed by stomach acid.

 

What is the Funding for?

  • $160,000 goes for launching the product to basic scale
  • Funding is required for the labeling, branding, manufacturing to scale, warehousing and distribution.
  • Feel free to contact us for details.
  • Yeah spread the word, "there is a new way to consume supplements"
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools if you want to.

Patented.

story:
Bring FITCHAIN to life so you can GET PAID for getting fit!

 

 

Millions of smartphone users around the world already generate massive amounts of health data on a daily basis, this includes you. How much is YOUR data worth?

 

 

That’s why Fitchain wants you to get paid for the health data you generate. It’s your data.
No need for third parties to take your data and sell it for profit. At the same time (As a bonus) you will be selling your data directly to medical health research and helping them to possibly save lives!

 

 

Becoming a 'Fitchainean'

 

 

By using the power of the blockchain, which removes the need for middlemen, whenever you generate your health data such as tracking your steps, jogging, cycling, fitness, dieting, you will be able to sell it directly to medical research. 


Medical research will then pay you directly into your wallet where you can use your tokens to buy items on the Fitchain marketplace.

The Fitchain Marketplace

 

 

The Fitchain Marketplace is your online portal, a one stop shop for all of your health needs and desires!

We have spoken with multiple health brands providing products including healthy food and drink, active wear, fitness equipment, wearables as well as services providers such as gyms, apps and healthy meal preps.


Brands are ready to be a part of our new token economy for health, so that together, we can remove ALL of the obstacles to achieving your health goals. 

What health products and services would you spend your data earnings on?
We would love to know which brands would you like to see on the Fitchain Marketplace.
 


 

The impact of your contributions


So, how are your contributions going to bring Fitchain to ‘life’ exactly? First of all, the gifts assigned to the perks you purchase will be sent out with a big thank-you for becoming part of our journey. (Don’t forget to tag us on social media with your new Fitchainean tee!). 
 


 

Now for our hopes and plans, below we have laid out our milestones along with our calculated costs for each.

£35,000

We will then create the 2x prototypes to present and test with early adopters ‘Fitchaineans’ and VIP Fitchaineans, plus 10 researchers.  Contributing to assisting us to tailor the platform through your insights and feedback. 

£150,000

Having surpassed the initial milestone, Fitchain will develop a fully functioning and operational Beta version of the platform, to go to market and test with our goal of 5,000 Fitchaineans and medical researchers.  

£250,000

NOW '$h*t' STARTS TO GET REAL! With this amount of momentum, Fitchain will be able to launch in the real world and Fitchaineans everywhere will be able to start earning money for their data. There will be the very first National ‘Fitchain festival’ bringing together researchers, brands and you, Fitchaineans.

Our challenge


Our main challenge, like most start ups, is funding. We wanted to offer this opportunity to real people, like yourselves who will actually benefit from this technology, to be a part of our story.

To be here with us from the beginning and watch as we grow and say “I was a part of that”. 

We have taken the strategic decision to build our company via crowdfunding. We are going directly to you, real people, to bring it to life and help us in our vision of creating better healthier lifestyles by re-incentivising and literally changing the game for health, for everyone. 

It has been a long 4 years to get Fitchain to this point with great reviews and some pivots along the way, it is now up to you to be a part of our journey. If you like the idea and think it is a real game changer then;

Copy and paste this image and share, share, share the '$h*t' out of it!!!
 


 

If you're unable to contribute via our indiegogo campaign then there is so much more you can do to help bring Fitchain to life, and all it will cost is a few moments and a couple taps on your screen. 

Follow us on instagram, youtube, linkedin as well as facebook by searching @Fitchain. 
Join in on the journey by liking, commenting and sharing our content.

You can also go to www.joinfitchain.com to sign up and stay updated for all Fitchain announcements. 
 

The first Fitchainean story & team
story_txt: Bring FITCHAIN to life so you can GET PAID for getting fit!  Millions of smartphone users around the world already generate massive amounts of health data on a daily basis, this includes you. How much is YOUR data worth?  That’s why Fitchain wants you to get paid for the health data you generate. It’s your data.No need for third parties to take your data and sell it for profit. At the same time (As a bonus) you will be selling your data directly to medical health research and helping them to possibly save lives!  Becoming a 'Fitchainean'  By using the power of the blockchain, which removes the need for middlemen, whenever you generate your health data such as tracking your steps, jogging, cycling, fitness, dieting, you will be able to sell it directly to medical research. Medical research will then pay you directly into your wallet where you can use your tokens to buy items on the Fitchain marketplace.The Fitchain Marketplace  The Fitchain Marketplace is your online portal, a one stop shop for all of your health needs and desires!We have spoken with multiple health brands providing products including healthy food and drink, active wear, fitness equipment, wearables as well as services providers such as gyms, apps and healthy meal preps.Brands are ready to be a part of our new token economy for health, so that together, we can remove ALL of the obstacles to achieving your health goals. What health products and services would you spend your data earnings on?We would love to know which brands would you like to see on the Fitchain Marketplace.  The impact of your contributionsSo, how are your contributions going to bring Fitchain to ‘life’ exactly? First of all, the gifts assigned to the perks you purchase will be sent out with a big thank-you for becoming part of our journey. (Don’t forget to tag us on social media with your new Fitchainean tee!).   Now for our hopes and plans, below we have laid out our milestones along with our calculated costs for each.£35,000We will then create the 2x prototypes to present and test with early adopters ‘Fitchaineans’ and VIP Fitchaineans, plus 10 researchers.  Contributing to assisting us to tailor the platform through your insights and feedback. £150,000Having surpassed the initial milestone, Fitchain will develop a fully functioning and operational Beta version of the platform, to go to market and test with our goal of 5,000 Fitchaineans and medical researchers.  £250,000NOW '$h*t' STARTS TO GET REAL! With this amount of momentum, Fitchain will be able to launch in the real world and Fitchaineans everywhere will be able to start earning money for their data. There will be the very first National ‘Fitchain festival’ bringing together researchers, brands and you, Fitchaineans.Our challengeOur main challenge, like most start ups, is funding. We wanted to offer this opportunity to real people, like yourselves who will actually benefit from this technology, to be a part of our story.To be here with us from the beginning and watch as we grow and say “I was a part of that”. We have taken the strategic decision to build our company via crowdfunding. We are going directly to you, real people, to bring it to life and help us in our vision of creating better healthier lifestyles by re-incentivising and literally changing the game for health, for everyone. It has been a long 4 years to get Fitchain to this point with great reviews and some pivots along the way, it is now up to you to be a part of our journey. If you like the idea and think it is a real game changer then;Copy and paste this image and share, share, share the '$h*t' out of it!!!  If you're unable to contribute via our indiegogo campaign then there is so much more you can do to help bring Fitchain to life, and all it will cost is a few moments and a couple taps on your screen. Follow us on instagram, youtube, linkedin as well as facebook by searching @Fitchain. Join in on the journey by liking, commenting and sharing our content.You can also go to www.joinfitchain.com to sign up and stay updated for all Fitchain announcements.  The first Fitchainean story & team

story:
Lets talk about air quality.

You probably haven't given it much thought. Most people think "I'm breathing it every day so it cant be that bad".

Did you know that over 90% of countries around the world suffer from pollution levels considered unsafe under normal living conditions?

Also, last year it was estimated that nearly 7 million people died from a pollution-related illness.

To top it off, they say the average American in a medium-sized city inhales as much as 200 cigarettes worth of smoke per year.

All the previous attempts at solving this issue have failed, until now. 

Introducing the new...

Breazy Mask - Breathe Easy, in a Breeze

With the patented technology on the Breazy mask, you can protect yourself and your loved ones from even the harshest conditions all while keeping your cool. This is done with the help of the exhaust valve.

An active carbon filter inside the valve allows you to let out hot air and moisture while breathing in cool and clean air. Our masks are N95 certified which means they block at least 95% of pollutants.

They're also dust proof, anti fog and anti odor. Finally, our mask features an adjustable nose clip and elastic bands for a tight but comfortable seal.

Not only will you breathe better, you'll feel better.

Due to the current circumstances, we're offering expedited shipping for free.

Get them now before they're gone!

Visit breazymask.com for more information.

For wholesale inquiries - breazymask@gmail.com

story:
Introduction

My name is Thomas Zudrell from Germany and I work as Health-Coach specialising on Backpain Selfhelp. Teaching the DORN Method, a holistic manual therapy and true selfhelp method, since more than 15 years all over the world is a real passion and mission for me.

Sharing knowlege to help people is very fulfilling and also quite challenging at times because the world is full of mistrust and Ego focused.

Teaching Backpain selfhelp is great but realizing that most do not want to spend time and energy for their own health and prefer to give away the responsibility to others challenged me to develop something that motivates people to focus more on themselves as long as it is fast, effective and affordable. The result was the Spynamics Sacro Aligner helping people since 2008. The new product, the Spynamics Spine Aligner, will make this mission complete, allow many to become more independant from medications and therapies since Backpain is among the biggest health problems in the world.

Some of my partners in the development of my selfhelp tools, Dr. Jason Mallia from Sydney Australia (https://www.integratedhealth.com.au/) and Dr. Wayne Sibson from Perth Australia (https://www.spinefitosteopathy.com.au/index.asp help me as Medical advisors and researchers and ecouraged me all the way having themselves great results testing the tools with their patients.

I am calling on the crowdfunding community because I need your help to make these effective and easy to use Selfhelp Tools available to the many backpain sufferers around the world. The already established and successful Spynamics Sacro Aligner needs some small changes that require quite expensive mold adjustments and the NEW Spynamics Spine Aligner is basically ready developed but not yet produced and the necessary final stage is the most expensive to do (i.e. producing the mold, testing and production of the products)

Once finished there will be 3 options: The Spynamics Set (Sacro Aligner and Spine Aligner), or only the Sacro Aligner or only the new Spine Aligner.

What We Need & What You Get

To make the new Selfhelp tool available I would need around 25.000€ in order to have the products produced and ready for shipment.

The costs for the necessary production of the molds (15.000€ already), minimum stock for the warehouse (minimum 6000€), production of brochures, website and advertisement expenses may exceed the planed funds however private or bank loans can then do the rest if necessary.

Supporters of this campaign will get the products (the complete selfhelp set of Sacro Aligner and Spine Aligner with a retail value of 100€), sent to them anywhere in the world for only 60€ here on Indiegogo, guaranteed!

The Impact

Supporting this campaign will allow you to experience the incredible changes these products can make to your health.

A good part of the profits made with them will help to make the DORN Method available to the many Backpain sufferers worldwide and will be invested to improve web appearances, Information materials and a selfhelp exercise app free for all.

When I developed the successful Spynamics Sacro Aligner in 2007 I had no supporters at all and realized the whole project with a private loan. In 2008 the product achieved a gold medal award at the IENA the oldest fair for inventions in the world in Nuremberg, Germany.

Without advertisement efforts or any marketing experience I was able to sell several thousand of the product in countless countries on all continents.

Now with all the Internet possibilities, your help and social networks I see no reason why this new project should not be successful.

Risks & Challenges

Informing people about the posibility to help themselves when experiencing Backpain is the biggest challenge because backpain is a huge money maker for many making a living with it and some may not like simple solutions.

I established a network of thousands of Dorn Method practitioners around the world and I plan and try to motivate these friends supporting this mission.

Other Ways You Can Help

Many of my DORN Method Students and also backpain sufferers that I do not know live in countries that are still in development like India and if you cannot support this campaign financially you may be able to help by sharing the information about it also using all the Indiegogo share tools! The planed selfhelp app and other Information will also benefit you once it is ready.

About the products

The Spynamics Sacro Aligner / Spine Aligner - Back Pain Solutions

(The names comes from: Sp(inal) (D)ynamics Sacrum (Spine) Alignment)

The effective Back Pain Self Therapy tool was invented by the international Dorn Method Instructor and Health-Coach Thomas Zudrell, following the principles of the Dorn Method, a Holistic Manual Therapy and true Self Help Method, and Science from Osteopathy and Physical Therapy with advice from Dr Wayne Sibson,  B.Sc.(Clin.Sc.), MH.Sc. (Osteo), Perth Australia who states:

" The Spynamics Sacro Aligner represents the first self help tool that actually simulates and replaces the hands of the therapist. It serves its goal to encourage and improve sacroiliac joint alignment by bringing the sacral base back into the ilia to decrease the strain on the sacroiliac ligaments. The Spynamics Sacro Aligner has helped improve my clinical outcomes with my patients and I recommend it to all my chronic low back pain sufferers".

Through applied physical laws, adjusted to the respective Anatomy and Physiology, long term results can be achieved in a simple and effective way.

The Design follows the natural shape of the human sacrum and spinal column and when used properly can help to regain improved lumbopelvic and spinal alignment, muscle relaxation and improved nerve function.

This versatile device is a fantastic therapy aid that all medical professionals and body workers should recommend to their patients.

The Spynamics Selfhelp products:

1. Safe to use

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner is a self help tool. It is very safe and there is basically no danger when the tool is used as prescribed, careful and with caution but with self responsibility. The body's structure is guided into a self regulating order through one's own movements and best on a daily exercise routine

2. Effective

The Spynamics Sacro Aligner and Spine Aligner is very effective because it does not manipulate the body system but allows natural self regulation of the structure. With very little time and effort but with the necessary self discipline in daily exercise it helps to re-gain Structural Balance and achieves Relaxation very fast.

3. Affordable

The Spynamics Sacro Aligner and Spine Aligner is an affordable self help tool. It cost less than a therapy session but can be used for many years. Instead of spending on countless therapies, gadgets, expensive ergonomical furnitures, medication etc. you only have a one time small investment for a selfhelp tool that you can bring along anywhere.

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner is designed to fit everybody from a body height of 140cm and above. It is a Self Help Tool for people with Back Pain, Migraine, Muscular Tension, Spinal Dics Problems, Sciatica, Scoliosis and many other conditions. The tool supports the structure and induces a gentle stretching and fascia self massage. The tool can be used in lying, sitting and standing positions depending on the individual situation.

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner helps to re-align the ISJ (Ilio-Sacral-Joint) and the joints (facet) of the spine towards the natural position and to relax the deep buttocks muscles, the muscles of the pelvic girdle and the spine which decreases the pressure onto the complex nervous system in this area and possibly can ease the pain associated with it.

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner allows an effective Self-Help and Self Therapy with only a few minutes regular and daily use and normally achieves an improvement of the pain situation in a short time.

Tests / Research:

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner was tested in Germany and Australia on several volunteering patients.

Tested patients had back pain in different intensity and were diagnosed to have different conditions including: Low Back Pain Syndrom, Sciatica, Scoliosis, Herniated Discs, Migraines, Hip Pain, Arm Pains, Fibromyalgia, Muscular Tensions, Neck Pain, Shoulder Pain a.o.

The test-patients used the Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner according to the instructions two times a day for approximately 5 minutes in lying position.

About 80% of the test-patients showed a significant reduction of their pain-feelings after just 3 days, independent to the individual back pain condition of the patient at the beginning of the test period.

Approximately 90% of patients reported a pain reduction of minimum 80% at the end of the testing period (8 weeks).

Structural and functional changes could be found during manual assessments throughout the testing period.

Tests conducted by: Thomas Zudrell MD(AM), in Germany
Dr Wayne Sibson Osteopath), B.Sc.(Clin.Sc.) MH.Sc.(Osteo), in Australia and others

Restrictions:

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner is not a medical tool or substitute for professional medical advice. It is advised to consult your doctor before using this device. The use of this device is at the owners risk.

Caution: Do not use this tool in cases of recent accidents, severe osteoporosis, high fever, acute stroke, acute heart trouble cerebral hemorrhage, cerebral aneurysm, brain and spine tumors. If you suffer from any other serious health condition check with your physician or a professional health care provider first before using this tool!

Beside the above there are no known contra indications for the Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner but individual reactions may occur and are in the full self-responsibility of the user.

Caution: During the first few days using this tool the body may show some adjustment reactions which can occasionally be a little unpleasant. This is usually a healing reaction and should be gone latest after one week. If you are not sure about these reactions please consult your doctor first before you continue the exercises.

More Product Informations:

The Spynamics Sacro and Spine Aligner is made in Germany as a quality product from a very specific PUR Integral Foam Material. It is porous on the inside and has a very durable skin on the outside. It is soft yet exactly hard enough for its purpose! It is extremely light weight and flexible.

» We choose this special material after experimenting with many different materials because it was closest to the original: The Hands of a Therapist!

The shape was developed by professionals taken into account the protection of the strong and flexible yet very delicate human structural system. The Spynamics Sacro Aligner looks simple but has a lot of knowhow and science behind its development that guarantees a high quality product to high german standards.

story:
Traveler...Take Your Workout With You

Frequent travelers sacrifice a good workout. FitTraveler is the ultimate portable fitness system that goes with you. Invented by a frequent trucker who needed to keep in shape on the road. 

Your GYM Anywhere

FitTraveler stores flat and sets up in seconds. Designed to give you a full body workout. 

Made in the USA

What We Need & What You Get

FitTraveler is ready to kickoff its first production run. With your support we will be able to start production and send you one of the very first units. 

 

 

ABOUT THE COMPANY

Fit Traveler Fitness LLC is a company founded in 2017 in Knoxville Tennessee after much deliberation to which direction the owner’s life and career might go.

Fit Traveler, the sole brain child of Mr. Sanchez was developed and designed years earlier but withheld from personal and public view due to personal circumstances. Now, with much anticipation, and development, Fit Traveler Fitness LLC proudly presents its first of many patent pending devices.

Starting with the Fit Traveler device itself, all of these devices have travelers, truckers, tiny home, or small space users in mind.

All devices are currently being shown or used at private venues and travel centers to prove the usefulness, practicality, and desirability as well as function and design. Some of the companies interests include, sustainability. Aluminum and plastics parts acquired from reputable sources, as well as facilities that use ethical and conscious business practices are being sought after in order to make the least impact on the environment.

The owner is also an astronomer who visually studies deep sky objects and participates in near Earth asteroid studies. The companies vision is to help people get fit, where they are regardless of their financial or physical situation. While another vision of the company Is to provide a product or products that are built to last. While no device is indestructible, with proper care, and periodic replacement of inexpensive resistance bands, these devices should last a lifetime. 

 

 

Looking for more information? Check the project FAQ

Let us know if you think this campaign contains prohibited content.

Select a perk

Super Early Bird

$99 USD $299 (66% OFF)

story:
Short Summary

im 48 yo and still love to skate and want to share that with the wider comnity

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • I need $1000 to get the venue I need
  • the funds will go to the land load ansd I have enough to pay other half

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Our story

Inova Software was founded in 2010 by Gilles Toulemonde, David Carteret and Fritz Eisenhart by merging Inova and Vertical*i. The merger combined Vertical*i’s business development and alliance management expertise with Inova’s experience in strategic innovation software. The newly merged company turned its focus to creating a software that would help life sciences companies find external innovations.

Since then, we’ve worked exclusively in the life sciences, learning the pains and challenges of this industry inside and out. We’re constantly developing new partnerships and new features to help biopharma companies work together better.

For example, we have a strategic partnership with the Biotechnology Innovation Organization, organizer of the largest biopharma partnering event of the year. Thanks to this partnership, our CRM is prepopulated with company and contact information from BIO partnering meetings. The two systems are synchronized in real-time, providing our users with always up to date information and helping them find the right partners.

 

Our team

Our team is made up of 70 people hailing from over 25 different countries. With a small, but diverse team, we are flexible, agile and innovative. Inova can be found all over the world, with our headquarters in Lyon and offices in New York and Tokyo.

 

 

Our values

It all starts with hiring passionate, talented and diverse people who work well together.
We take pride in our accomplishments, but we believe in a solid work/life balance.
We work hard, then go home on time so that we can ride our bikes, head to the mountains or enjoy a restaurant or two in Lyon, New York or Tokyo.

story:
Everybody Forgets Sometimes

It's going to happen. You're going to forget to take your pills one day.

PillCall is a cap to go on your existing medicine bottle, with one goal: to make forgetting a thing of the past. Once set up, every time you take the cap off the bottle, it sends a signal through your wifi network to the server, and nothing happens. But when you forget, you don't take the cap off the bottle, it doesn't send a signal, and the server sends you a text to remind you. It can also send texts to your family if they help take care of you.

PillCall also helps you avoid double doses. We've all been there. You have the bottle in your hand, but you can't remember if you actually took your pill or not. If the cap sends the message twice, then the server texts you. Finally someone can answer that age-old question, "did I take my pill already?"

Maybe it's your teenager, or a nosy houseguest, or a roommate, but some of us have trouble with people "borrowing" pills. Once they take one look at that telltale cap, now you can avoid those awkward situations where the pills come up short and all you have are suspicions.

About PillCall

PillCall is a new company, but draws on decades of experience. I'm excited to tell you about us.

  • I'm Matt Channon, 42, Founder of PillCall. I'm a serial entrepreneur with a Master's from Georgia Tech and extensive expertise in both hardware and software. I've built electronics factories and I've built apps.
  • This isn't my first rodeo with a clever invention, but it is the first one I feel is special in terms of how much difference it'll make in everyday people's lives. People who would have gotten sick or died by forgetting their pills or forgetting they already took their pills, won't now.
  • Maybe you've been fortunate enough to never have yourself or a loved one been in a situation where a forgotten pill or double dosing meant a day ruined, but it sucks, knowing there's nothing you can do to ease their pain other than helping them wait it out. 

What do you get the person who has everything? They don't have one of these.

What We Need & What You Get

We've already designed and built prototypes, so we don't need to raise millions to make our first one. Here's more detail:

  • Once it ships, PillCall is going to cost $49 + $19/month monitoring fee. If you fund us, you pay less than half that to start. In fact, the $199 perk pays for itself in less than a year!
  • Five colors, two shapes available.
  • Free shipping, free replacement hardware exchange when your bottle size changes or the battery gets old.
  • Monitoring fee will never go up.
  • If we get enough volume we'll acquire a space and upgrade our equipment to include a couple of pick-and-place machines to knock the circuit boards out faster, and spin casters to knock out our plastic pieces. 
  • Assembled in the USA, Ships from USA. Free shipping to US, $10 shipping to Rest of World.

The Impact

Even if you just use it for doggie vitamins, think of the lives this product will save.

  • Pill bottles kill more Americans than cars and firearms combined. 130 Americans die every day from opioid overdoses. While some of these are intentional, how many are simply acts of confusion or forgetfulness? Even if you're young, fit, and invincible, equipping your opioid pills with PillCall, alerting loved ones to a possible double dose could save your life.
  • For your older loved ones who live alone, think about falls.  A fall can leave them alone and on the floor for days until someone comes by to check on them. If they're incapacitated, they won't take their medication on time, meaning you get warned by default in a fraction of the time, and all without nagging your older loved ones when things are going fine.
  • The Internet of Things (IoT) has brought all kinds of solutions looking for a problem. By supporting PillCall, you can bring our optical pairing technology into the broader market, making IoT something everyday people can figure out.

Risks & Challenges

There's always a measure of risk with any campaign, but we've derisked the product as much as possible. We've already assembled prototypes and gotten it to work.  Now our biggest challenges will be scaling and shipping on time. We believe in underpromising and overdelivering, because we want to dominate the 2 billion pill cap per year market.

  • Even though the components don't make up much of the cost, this little piece of technology is still a radio, and radio is heavily regulated in nearly every country. For every model we produce, we need to spend thousands on FCC certifications, to make sure it plays nice with other radio devices. While presales should take care of the financials, this will add a few months to everybody's delivery time. We have a provider picked out and they have a solid track record.
  • The world is undergoing a capacitor shortage, and this means certain chip capacitors are facing months-long delays.  We only use about 6 per unit, and we're designing to use less-common, more-available capacitor values, to sail through this shortage and get you your pill caps on time.
  • Overwhelming demand would be a great problem to have, because that means our products will be making a difference in a large number of people's lives. Our circuit boards fly airfreight from China, along with many of the circuit components, but we're doing assembly in the US (outside California where we can afford the talent and space).

Your Relatives Need This

Maybe you've been blessed with perfect health, but as your family's tech expert, imagine being their health hero as well.

  • Vrrp Vrrp! Make some noise about this, because too many suffer in silence when they miss their medication.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools. You could save a Grandma's life, and you could save your friends' Grandmas' lives.

We're very excited to bring this to you. Save the Grandmas!

story:
What do you know about the mask you wear every day?

You may think that your mask is “effective enough” or that there is no mask that can do any better. It still has a massive potential away from the most common masks. Even filterable masks, as it turns out, present real and undeniable dangers, leaving virus stuck, where they then remain dangerous.

There is a better way, though. Active defense of mask to inactive pathogens than make it more safety.

 

Introducing: KSAMASK

The ideal mask MUST be safety from pathogens and reusable for many times. 

A mask unlike any other, KSAMASK features photocatalytic through titanium dioxide (TiO2) and silver ions (Ag+). The TiO2 particles using in nanotechnology are a giant step ahead of the basic filters that you will find on other masks. TiO2 make the safety.

Disposable masks, made out of meltblown cloth, which is a form of plastic, represent a heavy burden to our landfills and oceans, which were already struggling to keep up with our modern lifestyles. The KSAMASK was design for long time wearing.

 

KSAMASK coating TiO2 and Silver ion into mask fiber, make it acting as air purify and resistant to washing for long time wearing. 

Once again, it empowering you to live a greener lifestyle and still keep yourself safe.

 

 

 

 

Air Purified Fiber  

KSAMASK are not ordinary filterable masks. It uses a photocatalyst-like method to make masks, like the air purifier by photocatalytic TiO2.

Consequently, metallic nanoparticles (TiO2 & Ag+) have been proposed as alternatives due to their broad range antiviral activities, persistence and effective at much lower dosage. We developed a coating titanium dioxide & silver ion nanoparticle, which can decompose organic compounds including pathogens on the surface upon exposure to light, UV-C, damaging the viral membrane.

Through this theory, the fiber applying the US patent #9,522,384. The fiber was testing with pathogens in our laboratory. And sent to famous laboratories, such as US MICROBBAC lab*, Taiwan SGS* and Taiwan medical centers* for virucidal suspension tests. The data strongly giving evidences that it helps to inhibitor the pathogens. Now we are try to make the first generation of active mask to face the public.

 

 

The below are related info in nature papers.

Titanium dioxide (TiO2) mechanism in nature's article: link

Siver ion (Ag+) mechanism in nature’s article: link

.

The structure of mask:

 

 

Up to 180 times washing cycle

How to keep the mask for long time usage. The key elements are Titanium Dioxide (TiO2). If the TiO2 nanoparticles still strongly binding on the fiber after washing, it was believed that its effects. The test at different washing cycles, from 10 to 300 times. The best performance is 180 cycles, the TiO2 of fiber still accounts for 90.4% and means it can be worn for 180 days.　

*Washing condition: wash by water 25°C without detergents.

 

 

 

Cost performance vs. other masks

To this groundbreaking mask, which you can use for a half-year, cleaning it every day instead of throwing it out the way that you would a disposable mask. Adding up the costs of a disposable mask, which runs anywhere from $0.26 for a cheap one to $3.50 for an N95, you see that you would spend either $46 or $640 – meaning that $39 for two KSAMASKs is a tremendous discount. Affordable price with good safety.

 

 

 

Other Certifications

In addition to certification through MICROBAC, we have conducted extensive tests and obtained out ISO 9001 registration. The masks are also patent pending in the US, the EU, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, and Malaysia.

We continue to abide by the strictest production standards, remaining in constant communication with the regulatory organizations in every country where we intend to distribute KSAMASK. In addition, we are staying on top of all the latest scientific developments to ensure that our mask is cutting-edge.

 

 

Multi-Powered for True Safety

The fiber that we have innovated for KSAMASK is a practical tool right now. The mask was manufacturing by famous mask factory in Taiwan. The mask will fit comfortably on your face and then keep you covered. We have registered the materials with the FDA under #3,010,700.940, verifying no skin or oral irritation. We have complied fully with international standards, accruing more than twenty years of experience in mask manufacturing.

 

 

 

Promotion Price

 

What Comes Next

 

Now, we are looking to raise the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute KSAMASK on a large scale. Our goal through this campaign is $3,000, which will cover all the costs we are facing as we bring our innovative mask to people all around the world. The more that we raise today, the smoother the next several months will go for us. We cannot stand by on this: every day that we waste, people are getting sick, and pollution is increasing.

Make your contribution and do your part today!

To say thanks to everyone who supports this campaign and reserves a KSAMASK, we are offering some exclusive rewards, including early access to KSAMASK.

Act now!

 

 

Social Media

Our performance on social media was poor, but thanks to Gadget Flow for introducing us to it. 

 

 

 

Daily usage scenarios

 

KSAMASK is designed for exceptional air purification.

 

 

 

 

Sizes & colors

 

 

 

The mask in not designed for medical purposes, strong recommend for other activities.

 

 

Inside Story

In early 2020, we were studying the disinfection machine between hydrogen peroxide and virus. After the outbreak, what can we do in this epidemic? Wearing a mask is the easiest way to prevent diseases. And tons of used disposable masks (all made of plastic) being inappropriately thrown onto land and eventually floating in the ocean. We decide to do something on mask. The ideal mask must be reusable, reduce the use of masks, not cause environmental pollution, and have a good protective effect on viruses. After several brainstorming sessions, the idea is coming from the photocatalyst used in air purifiers. Can it be transplanted into a mask? After several tests and material adjustments. Samples tested from human, bacteria and virus. We think the tests are given us confidences. The gold sample was finally made in August and we start in Indiegogo.

 

 

Who We Are

As a team, we are looking to the future every day. Our team members include:

 

 

* Mr. Ice Lo, Technical Manager

He studied medical biotechnology in Taiwan, focusing on the relationship between bacteria/viruses and people. He previously studied the effects of hypochlorous acid and hydrogen peroxide as disinfectants for homes, offices, and schools.

 

* Mr. Steven Lin, Production Manager

For more than 30 years, he has worked in factory manufacturing and management. He is an expert at quality control.

 

* Mr. Charles Wu, Quality Manager

He has researched and tested masks. Familiar with mask design and production, he is eager to replace the disposal masks and N95 masks that have become popular.

 

 

RD & Manufacturers 

 

Risks and Challenges

 

Because of the extensive research and development work that we have already put into KSAMASK, we do not foresee any major logistical difficulties ahead of us. If any major difficulties do arise and turn out to be so daunting that they cause a delay in our timeline, we will be sure to keep all of our contributors in the loop. You can count on us to remain transparent and send out notifications every step of the way.

 

 

One More Way to Help

 

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for KSAMASK by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Go ahead and spread the word that KSAMASK has arrived and that there is a smarter, more cost-effective, and safer mask coming to our homes, offices, and schools.

 

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

story:
Story

 

The world around us is changing and we need to adapt. Nudge is right there when you need it the most, ready to use as an opener, grabber, prodder, puller, even a stylus for phones tablets and touch screens. Nudge is the hygenic way to carry out everyday tasks without touching surfaces directly.

Nudge isnt just for the now, its for the future. A purchase that will last a lifetime. 

Nudge has never been so relevant. It's the only hygiene tool made from solid Pure Copper which is naturally antimicrobial. Nudge is the must-have EDC (everyday carry) item with its functional, yet sleek non-invasive design.

Perfect for high germ areas such as ATM's, card reader machines, public  transport, elevators, public restrooms, handles and so many more things  we encounter daily. 

Dont touch. Just Nudge...

 

Use at the checkouts and card reader machines

 

Why nudge?

Are you, like so many others, suffering from social and health anxiety when out and about? Life has to carry on. Nudge can help in more ways than one. 

Yes, Its a germy world we live in. We touch an astonishing amount of items and surfaces throughout the course of a normal day. Many of which have been touched by hundreds if not thousands of people before you. Doors, ATM machines, elevators, card readers, you get the idea. Use Nudge to reduce the physical contact and spread while performing everyday tasks.

 

Why make the nudge from Pure Copper?

Since ancient Egyptian times copper has been known to have inherent antimicrobial properties. In 2008, the EPA officially recognized copper as the first effective metallic antimicrobial agent (http://www.epa.gov/pesticides/factsheets/copper...). They recognized its ability to kill 99·9% of pathogenic bacteria within 2 h.

Extensive laboratory testing has proven that antimicrobial copper alloys  continuously kill bacteria, never wear out, and are safe to use. Scientific proof and validation can be found here https://www.copperalloystewardship.com/antimicr...

The findings from these studies are all freely available. We are making no additional claims, only stating factual information. 

Definition of antimicrobial: Antimicrobial: An ―antimicrobial substance (chemical or physical) can prevent microbial growth either by some -static action or by the outright killing of microbes.

To be very clear 

we are making no specific claims that Nudge can cure, treat or prevent any illness or condition. It is a useful aid to avoid hand contact of everyday surfaces. Always practice good social hygiene and wash your hands when you get home.

 

 

Everyday uses

Nudge can be used on everyday items instead of touching them with your bare hands such as door handles, lightswitches, door bells, elevator buttons, ATM machines, bank card readers, drawers, pullcords, trains/buses, toilet cubiles, toilet flush, keyboards, phone/tablet stylus, bag carryer, communal fridge/microwave, parking meters, soap dispensers and many many more.

Avoid touching these with your bare hands. Dont touch. Just NUDGE...

 

Make Nudge part of your everyday..

 

Nudge even works as a bottle opener.!

 

Scope of delivery

Each individual nudge order will receive 

1 x solid Copper nudge + 1 x FREE nudge branded retractable key reel. Multiple item orders for example, order 10 will receive 10 x solid Copper nudges + 10 x FREE retractable key reels.

 

Everyone needs a nudge.. 

Prototypes/development

Design sketches

 

Final design

After finalising the design, we made several different sizes to see which worked best for most people. We then had a small batch of 20 nudges made to hand out to people for feedback. We concluded that the optimal thickness was 5mm. We tried 3mm which was too thin and 6.35mm (1/4") which just made it a little too bulky. 5mm was perfect. 

Material: 5mm thick solid Copper

Size: 95mm x 33mm

Weight: 50 grams (1.75 oz)

comes with FREE nudge retractable key reel 

 

Finished product

 

About us

The team behind nudge, Exel innovations are UK based industrial designers and world class engineers. We own a UK factory producing CNC and robotic machinery and are  well positioned to manufacture and supply high quality innovative  products such as nudge.

Production

Using state of the art CNC waterjet and CNC fiber laser machines the Nudge is cut from a single piece of solid Copper. Its given a deburring and semi-gloss finish by a unique process of rumble polishing before being CNC engraved with the logo and quality checked/packed for despatch.

Shipping

We have tried hard to keep our shipping and fulfillment costs to a minimum. You can quickly work out worldwide shipping using the the table below.

All orders are from stock and ship out right away.
story_txt: Story The world around us is changing and we need to adapt. Nudge is right there when you need it the most, ready to use as an opener, grabber, prodder, puller, even a stylus for phones tablets and touch screens. Nudge is the hygenic way to carry out everyday tasks without touching surfaces directly.Nudge isnt just for the now, its for the future. A purchase that will last a lifetime. Nudge has never been so relevant. It's the only hygiene tool made from solid Pure Copper which is naturally antimicrobial. Nudge is the must-have EDC (everyday carry) item with its functional, yet sleek non-invasive design.Perfect for high germ areas such as ATM's, card reader machines, public  transport, elevators, public restrooms, handles and so many more things  we encounter daily. Dont touch. Just Nudge... Use at the checkouts and card reader machines Why nudge?Are you, like so many others, suffering from social and health anxiety when out and about? Life has to carry on. Nudge can help in more ways than one. Yes, Its a germy world we live in. We touch an astonishing amount of items and surfaces throughout the course of a normal day. Many of which have been touched by hundreds if not thousands of people before you. Doors, ATM machines, elevators, card readers, you get the idea. Use Nudge to reduce the physical contact and spread while performing everyday tasks. Why make the nudge from Pure Copper?Since ancient Egyptian times copper has been known to have inherent antimicrobial properties. In 2008, the EPA officially recognized copper as the first effective metallic antimicrobial agent (http://www.epa.gov/pesticides/factsheets/copper...). They recognized its ability to kill 99·9% of pathogenic bacteria within 2 h.Extensive laboratory testing has proven that antimicrobial copper alloys  continuously kill bacteria, never wear out, and are safe to use. Scientific proof and validation can be found here https://www.copperalloystewardship.com/antimicr...The findings from these studies are all freely available. We are making no additional claims, only stating factual information. Definition of antimicrobial: Antimicrobial: An ―antimicrobial substance (chemical or physical) can prevent microbial growth either by some -static action or by the outright killing of microbes.To be very clear we are making no specific claims that Nudge can cure, treat or prevent any illness or condition. It is a useful aid to avoid hand contact of everyday surfaces. Always practice good social hygiene and wash your hands when you get home.  Everyday usesNudge can be used on everyday items instead of touching them with your bare hands such as door handles, lightswitches, door bells, elevator buttons, ATM machines, bank card readers, drawers, pullcords, trains/buses, toilet cubiles, toilet flush, keyboards, phone/tablet stylus, bag carryer, communal fridge/microwave, parking meters, soap dispensers and many many more.Avoid touching these with your bare hands. Dont touch. Just NUDGE... Make Nudge part of your everyday.. Nudge even works as a bottle opener.! Scope of deliveryEach individual nudge order will receive 1 x solid Copper nudge + 1 x FREE nudge branded retractable key reel. Multiple item orders for example, order 10 will receive 10 x solid Copper nudges + 10 x FREE retractable key reels. Everyone needs a nudge.. Prototypes/developmentDesign sketches Final designAfter finalising the design, we made several different sizes to see which worked best for most people. We then had a small batch of 20 nudges made to hand out to people for feedback. We concluded that the optimal thickness was 5mm. We tried 3mm which was too thin and 6.35mm (1/4") which just made it a little too bulky. 5mm was perfect. Material: 5mm thick solid CopperSize: 95mm x 33mmWeight: 50 grams (1.75 oz)comes with FREE nudge retractable key reel  Finished product  About usThe team behind nudge, Exel innovations are UK based industrial designers and world class engineers. We own a UK factory producing CNC and robotic machinery and are  well positioned to manufacture and supply high quality innovative  products such as nudge.ProductionUsing state of the art CNC waterjet and CNC fiber laser machines the Nudge is cut from a single piece of solid Copper. Its given a deburring and semi-gloss finish by a unique process of rumble polishing before being CNC engraved with the logo and quality checked/packed for despatch.ShippingWe have tried hard to keep our shipping and fulfillment costs to a minimum. You can quickly work out worldwide shipping using the the table below.All orders are from stock and ship out right away.

story:
Version francophone :

Amis supporters, amis citoyens, amis sportifs, amis de tous bords... Nous avons besoin de vous! Le plus vieux club de D1 de basket belge les Voo Wolves Verviers-Pepinster ont besoin de vous ! Le 30 juin 2015 est notre date butoir. Nous ne devons rien lâcher ! La D1 de Basket de Verviers-Pepinster doit vivre et Verviers-Pepinster vivra ! Votre soutien, c'est maintenant grâce au Crowfunding mais également toutes les actions que nous avons mises en place (www.wearepepinster.be). 

D'avance MERCI pour vos don. Long life to the Wolves !

          

---------
English Version :

Basketball Fans, citizens, sportsmen ans women, friends from everywhere... We need you! The oldest B-Ball Team in the belgian championship needs you ! June the 30th 2015 could be the final curtain. But we won't give up untill the end ! The B-Ball Team Verviers-Pepinster has to live ! And Verviers-Pepinster will do so ! We need you NOW through this Crowdfunding and the other actions we put in place. (www. wearepepinster.be)

Thank you for your help ! Long life to the Wolves !

         

(Explanation below)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version francophone :

#We Are Pepinster

Fervents supporters du Club de Basketball de Division 1 Belge de Verviers-Pepinster, nous venons de créer l'association "We Are Pepinster" dernièrement, association dont le seul et unique but est de rassembler en masse nos supporters mais aussi tous les citoyens de notre belle région à une cause commune et importante à nos yeux: la survie et la pérennité de notre Club pour les saisons à venir.

Le plus vieux Club de D1 de basketball belge

Ce Club cher à nos yeux a débuté son histoire au sein de l'élite nationale il y a de ça 30 longues années. Beaucoup d'entre nous, d'entre vous auront assisté, vibré, participé, voire même joué aux rencontres sportives de cette équipe.

UNIQUE équipe de Wallonie à perdurer aussi longtemps au sein de l'élite, unique club issu d'un petit village de province de Liège et l'un des, si pas LE PLUS VIEUX, matricule de basket de Belgique. 

Un club qui a vu passé en son sein bon nombre d'anciennes gloires du basketball belge, bon nombre d'excellentes recrues Américaine, Serbe, Croate et bien d'autres... 

Un club qui durant des décennies aura formé tant de jeunes talents au travers de cette opportunité, ce pont qu'était l'équipe première de D1. Également un club qui aura vécu bon nombre de folles victoires en championnat Belge comme en coupe d'Europe, et qui comme tout autre club aura également vécu des périodes plus sombres et difficiles en s'efforçant de les surmonter avec l'aide de tous...

30-06-2015 : Game Over ?

Il se pourrait bien que ce soit la fin d'une belle histoire. Malgré la superbe saison 2014-2015 qu'il nous a offert, notre club doit assurer à la fédération que le budget de la saison à venir sera en équilibre... Sans quoi, nous serons contraints d'assister à la fin de cette ère... 

Ne rien lâcher !

Impuissance??? Voudriez-vous vraiment le croire??? Oseriez-vous seulement y croire??? Nous, fervents supporters, nous ne le pouvons et nous ne laisserons pas cette douce et lente agonie arriver sans déployer l'ensemble de nos forces!!!

La D1 de Basket de Verviers-Pepinster doit vivre!
Et Verviers-Pepinster vivra!

Votre soutien, c'est maintenant !

Grâce à nous tous, supporters, sympathisants, citoyens, joueurs du club ou joueurs tout court, coaches, sportifs de tous horizons, commerçants qui de près ou de loin veulent encore pouvoir assister à la vie de ce club, NOUS POUVONS Y ARRIVER !

Pour ce faire, l'association "We Are Pepinster", en accord avec les dirigeants du Club, lance diverses actions qui ont pour but de pérenniser le Club. (L'ensemble des actions sont accessibles via notre site internet www.wearepepinster.be).

Le Crowdfunding

L'une d'entre elles se trouve être le crowdfunding (participation citoyenne). Le principe est des plus simples: par le biais d'un versement sur ce site, vous participerez , moyennant des contreparties en fonction du montant que vous déciderez de verser, au bien-être et à la pérennité du Club.

Chacun étant libre de l'apport qu'il décidera de fournir, tout versement sera le bienvenu et nous espérons pouvoir, via nos contreparties, vous apporter quelques moments de joie et de bonne humeur lors du futur championnat à venir.

D'avance MERCI pour vos don. Long life to the Wolves !

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

English Version :

#We Are Pepinster

As devoted fans of the 1st Belgian Division Basketball team from Verviers-Pepinster we’ve established lately the association named « We Are Pepinster ». This association has been created for the one and only purpose : Gathering all the fans from everywhere as well as all the citizens from our great region in order to serve a common cause, highly important to our hearts: the survival and continuation of our basketball team for the many more seasons to come.

The Oldest B-Ball Team in the belgian championship

For the record, this team of our hearts started its adventure in the Elite league of Belgium 30 years ago. 30 years during which many of us, many of you have been assisting, thrilled,  taking part and even for some have been playing these games. 

THE ONLY B-BALL TEAM in Wallonia (south part of Belgium) that remained in this league for so long and coming out of a small village (10,000 inhabitants).

THE OLDEST Basketball team of our basketball national federation. The club had its 75th anniversary last season.

Throughout the years the club has seen some of the greatest Belgian players
playing for it as well as many young talented Americans, Croatians, Serbians,
etc… A basketball club which also gave some of the best trainings to our young fellows. 

This team gave us some great victories and battles on the ground in the belgian championship but in the european championship also.

06-30-2015 : Game Over ?

This team, our team is facing new difficulties. Once again, despite giving us one of its best  result out of the last 10 years, our club needs now to get the budget set up for the following championship. Without this one, our club would be resigned to stop all of this and slip into this slow but surely hurtful end of an era… With us witnessing it helpless…

Never give up !

Helpless???Would you even consider it???Would you even dare thinking like this???

We, biggest fans of all, can’t and won’t let this happen without giving our best effort!!!

The B-Ball Team Verviers-Pepinster has to live! 
And Verviers-Pepinster will do so!!!

We Need You NOW !

Thanks to all of us, fans, friends, citizens, players from this club and others, coaches, sportsmen from all kinds, shopkeepers, relatives and more who still want to watch this club battling for the win. WE CAN DO IT !

In order to achieve this, our association “We Are Pepinster”, with the approval from the club’s shareholders, is launching several actions which will giving us the
opportunity to ensure not just the following championship participation but
most of the following ones to come (All of these actions are explained on our
website www.wearepepinster.be).

The Crowdfunding

One of these actions as you may now get it is going to be this crowdfunding. The principle is pretty simple: Through a donation based on the budget you’d agree to give us, you would then help our basketball team to earn the balance needed to pursue its activities. These donations may also give you the opportunity to get some counterparts, depending on the fixed conditions.

Each and everyone is free to decide the amount of its donation as for us any kind of those would be welcome and meaningful for all of us. We are hoping as well that through our counterparts to give you some great cheerfulness moments within our next championship.

We would also appreciate it if you would take some more of your time to spread this crowdfunding  project among your contacts and this way help to reach some more people.

Thank you for your Help ! Long life to the Wolves !

#We Are Pepinster.

story:
Who we are

We are a team of two, a graduate and an undergraduate student of KIIT University, Bhubaneswar. Having stayed in hostels, we know how hard it can be to get healthy, home-cooked food at reasonable price. We end up eating junk food and packaged instant noodles for days at end. 

The TiffinWala, which roughly translates to "The Tiffin Guy", is our initiative to provide nutritious, organic and home-cooked meals to everybody on subscription basis, for as low as $1 a meal.

We could have easily taken up a 9-5 job. But, we are doing this because we want to make a difference. Read the rest of the story, and if you think it will make a difference, kindly contribute. Even $1 will go a long way.  

What We Need 

  • $100,000 to rent/build a kitchen, get a delivery van, build an online platform, pay salaries and market our product. 
  • Tie-up with local farmers and fund them to grow organic spices and vegetables. 

Perks

If you live in Bhubaneswar, Odisha
  • For a contribution of $100,  you will get 5 week subscription of 70 meals.
  • For a contribution of $200, you will get 12 week subscription of 168 meals.
If you're outside the US: 
We don't see ourselves expanding to cities outside India anytime soon. However,
  • We can ship you an assortment of organic spices that we will procure for the meal service.
The Impact

We used to hear from our grandparents how they cooked food at home for the family. Fresh and organic vegetables were sourced from the backyard everyday to prepare food. It was not only a balanced diet but also not contaminated with pesticides, fertilizers and other synthetic chemicals.

But people seem to have forgotten that trend. We aspire to renew that trend and provide affordable home cooked meals to:

1. Students

2. Professionals

3. Daily wage earners

4. Everybody else

We will be sourcing spices from local community members and organic vegetables from local farmers. Not only will it generate jobs, it will also encourage farmers to stop using chemicals and go organic. 

The Challenge

Its pretty difficult to source organic spices and vegetables in Odisha. Importing is expensive and the produce won't be fresh. 
To overcome this, we aim to create a local community of farmers to encourage them to go organic by providing them consultancy, organic manure and other infrastructure. 

Feed Someone in Need

  • If you contribute $100, we will donate 20 free meals to orphanages and homeless children in the city. 
  • If you contribute $200, we will donate 50 free meals to the needy.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, help us get the word out. 

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family and ask them to share it with theirs.

story:
People make mistakes, and no life, no matter how well-lived, is ever going to be exactly what you expect or want it to be. It can be better: if you let go and surrender your wants and your expectations, life can be perfect.

Yoga helps us to get in touch with the present moment in order to more readily accept the things that we cannot change. With a firm knowledge of yoga and its benefits, I have worked hard to developer a top-quality yoga mat that I believe will revolutionize the practice.
 

 

A quality yoga mat can make a difference during any yoga session. This is a point that is especially true when it comes to being one with the planets. The Suryanamaskara yoga mat series will be exciting for people to look into as they are aiming to find only the best possible mats for their yoga activities.

Made with a micro-fiber surface that grips more and not less when it gets wet, this yoga mat uses advanced technology to make its use more convenient. The bottom is made from 100% natural rubber, preventing all slips, and at 3 mm thick, it balances comfort with mobility.

  • 100% natural rubber bottom so your mat never slips
  • 3 mm thickness for the perfect balance between comfort and portability
  • Comes with a carrying strap
  • Super vibrant, no-fade print
  • The SURYANAMASKARA yoga mats are designed to work in yoga studios and on the street.

My yoga mat comes with a carrying strap, and the super vibrant, no-fade print will keep you smiling through your practice tomorrow, next week, and for a long time to come. When it comes to yoga mats, SURYANAMASKARA stands for quality.

While it is true that there are already companies producing yoga mats, I believe that my yoga mat is one of a kind. It represents the ideal crossroads of mobility and comfort. Durable, beautiful, and made with your actual practice in mind, this yoga mat will make even the most grueling practice seem relaxing and the lightest practice seem even lighter. 

 

I am turning to you,  Indiegogo, for help raising $10000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing SURYANAMASKARA yoga mats on a wide scale. I want to bring my yoga mats to yogis around the world and encourage other people to take up the practice for their own benefit and for the benefit of everyone around them. As a thank-you to contributors, only for indiegogo,  discounts on my yoga mats.

 

There are risks inherent to any new business, and I am ready to face them all. Given my long experience with yoga, I believe that I am solidly qualified to serve the yoga community in this capacity. I am proud of what I have developed, and I am confident that yogis will appreciate this yoga mat.

I appreciate all contributions, and I thank you for your time.
