Super vibrant, no-fade print
The SURYANAMASKARA yoga mats are designed to work in yoga studios and on the street.
My yoga mat comes with a carrying strap, and the super vibrant, no-fade print will keep you smiling through your practice tomorrow, next week, and for a long time to come. When it comes to yoga mats, SURYANAMASKARA stands for quality.While it is true that there are already companies producing yoga mats, I believe that my yoga mat is one of a kind. It represents the ideal crossroads of mobility and comfort. Durable, beautiful, and made with your actual practice in mind, this yoga mat will make even the most grueling practice seem relaxing and the lightest practice seem even lighter.  I am turning to you,  Indiegogo, for help raising $10000. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing SURYANAMASKARA yoga mats on a wide scale. I want to bring my yoga mats to yogis around the world and encourage other people to take up the practice for their own benefit and for the benefit of everyone around them. As a thank-you to contributors, only for indiegogo,  discounts on my yoga mats. There are risks inherent to any new business, and I am ready to face them all. Given my long experience with yoga, I believe that I am solidly qualified to serve the yoga community in this capacity. I am proud of what I have developed, and I am confident that yogis will appreciate this yoga mat.I appreciate all contributions, and I thank you for your time.

story:
Are you looking to clean up your front end?

Other than wheels, your Cockpit is one of the first places wind interacts with on your bike.  It's simply an overlooked part that can offer you the benefit of free speed.   Join Culprit by pre-ordering our new Covert Op cockpit components and improve the overall look of your bike in the process and get the added benefit of free speed!

 

Looking to Hide your Di2 Junction box?  Look at these Before and After Images of what this stem alone can do to help.

 

How does this work?  By hiding the junction box in the front of the bar bore allowing access to the function button from outside

How about mechanical shifting with cables?  The Covert Op cockpit can really clean up the front of the bike and help improve the airflow as well as make the bike look sleeker with cleaner lines.

Running full housing on a Tri bike or Road bike and want NO visible cables from the front. Covert Op stem can hide your cables and shifts smoothly even with mechanical TT shifters bending into the stem and directly into your frame.

 

Want to run an inner brake cable only on the front brake with less for the wind to see? The stem has a cable stop included that allows you to run bare cable to the front brake making the front of the bike as clean as possible.

How much faster does changing the stem make my bike you ask?

Lets see what the wind tunnel results show of the Culprit Aero stem versus a standard stem.

The Covert Op Aero Stem saves a rider 3 watts on average over a typical alloy stem.

What about an aero road bar and  culprit stem versus a round bar and basic stem.

The difference is staggering

Aero road bars can increase a cyclist’s efficiency in a considerable way. Utilizing the Culprit Covert Opt Aero Stem and an  aero drop bar a rider can become 5 watts more efficient
from 0 to 10 degrees compared to a standard alloy stem. The integration of shift/brake cables and wires clean up the front of the bike offering a more aero front end and save rider 17 seconds of a 20 minute time trial at 30mph.

So what bikes was the Covert Op  stem designed for?

Stem Assembly- Any home mechanic can change it.

Made by an athlete for the athlete, we also designed a clip on aerobar to go with our aero stem.

Made with 4 parts rather than 2, the design is easier to assemble once and change fit and comfort without completely removing the bar bore clamps  The range of fit is wide in comparison with others on the market and it makes travel and mid-ride fit possible like never before.

 

 

Video of ease of installation coming soon.

 

The Fit of our bars is equal or better to the market leader Profile Design.  Based on the combination of our stem and clip on aerobars you get 2448 positions per stem length X 4 stems equaling near 10,000 positions.

Clip on as stand alone is 1632 combos, not including extension width change and the ease of assembly and travel.

 

Aerobar Assembly Video

 

Culprit P.E.R.K. Saddle/Tool Bag

We also designed a unique tool bag that can fit under your saddle pulled in tightly to the rails or in your back packet with all the tools you need for your ride. Making grabbing and going easier than ever before.

The bag was designed to carry the items listed below as well as 

2 Co2 cartridges, Spare Tube(s) for Road or Mtn

Mini pump fits through the outside spot

Who we are.

 

Culprit Bicycles is a 100% family owned business. After 4 years of selling direct to consumer bikes we have decided to make a full switch to components.  Our previous experience was working for OEM factories consulting and offering design help.  We currently hold 4 patents and have won 2 IF Design awards. This experience has paved the way for new unique designs with premium manufacturers waiting on stand by to start production of these designs.

But we NEED your help!The tooling cost of this project is large as we wish to meet the demands of you the riders by offering more stem lengths. This comes at a heavy cost for molds.  With your help, you will be able to help this 3 year project come true and help this family business to grow and expand.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking to fund 80 K USD in order to fund the tooling costs of the 4 stem sizes and aerobar parts. This money will also be used towards covering some of the MOQ requirements of our alloy suppliers.  
  • By being a Culprit backer you are getting the chance to support a small family owned business to launch a new and radical design like nothing currently in the market.
  • Your support gets you from 35% discount and upwards. Rewards below

Early Bird Special Gets the best deal on the stem.  Limited to 250 backers at this price.

    Pre order price. Unlimited number

    • Pre Order Price unlimited number
    • Pre order price. Unlimited number

    Pre order price. Unlimited number

    Project Timeline

     

     

     

     

    The Impact

    By  supporting this campaign you help us open the tooling and offer to the world a unique and competitive product to compete against the Big player from a small family owned brand. The impact to you is you get a more aero set up and the impact to Culprit is the product reaches the market. Please do help.

    Risks & Challenges

    Every campaign has its own inherent risks involved.  We foresee there may be some delays and set backs due to safety testing. As a very unique and different approach to aerobars, we will need to do very thorough testing of the design both by machine testing and riding testing to ensure that the product is safe to ride and will not put our loyal customers at risk.  In the event of any such delays we will be prompt to update our backers and let them know what that would mean for delivery and what we are doing to improve the product design.

     

     

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please help us to share this campaign.  Even if your not backing us doesn't mean you can't help support us by sharing our design with others. The more awareness we get the better chance we have of funding and delivering to all our backers. So please kindly remember to share our campaign.

story:
Operation without a surgical needle... 

I do not like needles. After surgery remains unsightly scars. So I was thinking of how you can quickly and painlessly to sew the wound. The whole system consists of the PLA plastic, which is environmentally friendly. The system is quickly attached, glue to the skin. It is painless and does not leave scars after surgical sutures.

story:
"...all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy."
- Paul Walker

Introducing H.O.M.E

- Driven by Medaino Healthcare

H.O.M.E (Hands On Monitoring Equipment) measures the body's vitals signs painlessly and precisely.  Functionality of the device includes the measurement of your:

Heart Rate

Blood Pressure

Electrocardiogram (ECG)

Blood Oxygen Content

Haemoglobin Content

Respiratory Rate

Body Temperature

This all-rounder device stores and analyzes the health data of each user (H.O.M.E features 8 separate user profiles). The user is alerted to any lifestyle adjustments  that are required in order to maintain a healthy, vibrant life.

Medaino Healthcare was formed in 2014. It's vision is to provide people with mobile, intelligent data that enables them to live a healthy, vibrant life. 

 

Medaino is featured in:

                                     

 

Globally, billions of people fall prey to serious illnesses that could have been avoided if they had corrected their lifestyles on time.

 

Imagine if you had a professional nurse with you all day, every day. His or her job would be to track your body's health indicators and advise you about your physical condition. In other words, what you should or shouldn't eat, and what you should or should not do in order to remain healthy. 

 

This nurse would most likely save your life in one way or another.

What would you need to pay this person? Exactly.

 

H.O.M.E does exactly this for a fraction of a nurse's monthly salary check. As a regular middle-class citizen, you will now be empowered to avoid the devastating effects of "common" chronic diseases and disorders like cardio-vascular disease, hypertension, low-blood pressure, hemoglobin deficits, sugar diabetes, etc.

 

H.O.M.E will prompt you to seek professional treatment and lead you to an early diagnosis. 

 

 

The configuration of Medaino's Hands On Monitoring Equipment:

 

 

 

 

 

 

How it works

 

H.O.M.E is powered by visible infrared and near-infrared spectroscopy technology. The blood flow pattern from the body is extracted from the photoplethysmograph.

 

 

The Medaino H.O.M.E  syncs wirelessly with the Medaino iOS and Android mobile apps. The app stores, analyzes and displays the body's vital data in real-time.

 


 

Feature & Specifications

 

 

H.O.M.E is a user-friendly device with a simple interface.

 

 

H.O.M.E is beta tested with 500+ users

 

A 3-year Research and Development investment, and numerous prototypes later, the H.O.M.E  is nearing market-ready status. Your backing contribution will be invested into acquiring and securing the production tooling necessary to manufacture the product. Medaino's team has already completed the design for manufacturing and all that remains outstanding is the production run necessary to get the product into your hands.

 

 

Since we started prototyping, we have iterated, redesigned and tested over and over again. We now have a device of which we are truly proud. By using 3-D printing technology, we have built a new prototype just about every week during the testing phase of the product.

What we now hold in our hands is the world’s most versatile home health-tracking device.

 

 
 
 

Physical Specifications

 

 

The Medaino H.O.M.E. is not just the most intelligent monitoring device available. It is robust and tough as well - tough enough to endure the mishaps of the average household. It is also ergonomically designed for the easy use of the whole family.

The H.O.M.E’s high-quality electronics are durable, energy efficient and designed with surface-mount components in mind. All parts are carefully chosen to be optimized for mass production.

 

 

 

Recharge Once Every 3 Months

 

The H.O.M.E. runs on a 1100 mAh rechargeable LiPo Battery, and operates at a highly efficient rate of energy consumption. Battery life is estimated to be in the region of 3 months before recharging is necessary.

 

 

A Versatile In-Home Health-Tracking Device

 

The H.O.M.E. syncs with your smartphone via WiFi & Bluetooth (BLE), and automatically adjusts to the current time zone. It updates automatically, and is equipped with a powerful micro-controller that operates an intricate & robust circuit.

 

RoadMap

 

 

To reduce incumbent risks, we have conducted the necessary due-diligence in selecting a manufacturing partner. We will be working with an Italian producer with an impressive operation that ships literally millions of complicated space grade devices on an annual basis.

In short, we are giving our best to provide the world with the best.

 

The Medaino Team

 

Medaino's team is comprised by experts in medical signals, embedded electronics engineering, and consumer product development and manufacturing. The core team consist of post-graduates from Stanford, IIT, and NSIT. Doctors on-board have over 30 years of experience in Medical Science. Our manufacturing director has over 25 years of experience and has shipped millions of units for leading technology companies. 

 

FAQ

 

When will I receive my H.O.M.E device?

First delivery of the H.O.M.E. is currently scheduled for the end of April 2017. Continuous status updates regarding product development and production schedule will be provided.

What is the warranty?  

H.O.M.E. comes with a 1-year limited warranty. We ensure that every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. All devices purchased via crowdfunding platforms come with a lifetime warranty. 

Why Order Now?

We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Backers who pre-order first through this campaign will receive their H.O.M.E. from our very first production batches that have been fully tested and prepared for mass production. We are offering sizable discounts on all pre-orders of H.O.M.E’s in return for your support. You will never find H.O.M.E. at these low prices again!

Why do I have to wait longer than usual?

Basically, you're not just pre-ordering the device; you're enabling us to build it. We need to reach our minimum production order before production can commence. This device is the first of its kind, and we believe that you'll be glad that you waited. We will send updates while we work to produce the first batch.

What is the accuracy of the Device?

Every H.O.M.E. device is manufactured at an ISO 13485 certified manufacturing facility. Our robust quality management system ensures we react quickly to any customer feedback. 

Are clinical trials done for the device?

During the alpha & beta testing of the device, the device was clinically tested on 500+ patients. 

What will happen if my device is not connected with any WiFi or Bluetooth?

Data will be saved on the device & will be sent on to the server once it is connected to WiFi or BLE. The H.O.M.E device can store up to 30 days of complete family data.

Will there be the ability to do software updates to H.O.M.E?

Automatic software updates are pushed directly to your device. You will not be required to do anything to update your H.O.M.E. 

Can I pair multiple devices?  

You can pair each H.O.M.E. with one smartphone at a time. The Core Network connection between H.O.M.E. and smartphone, once connected, always remains connected and available for use. Disconnect and re-connection is a simple and easy process.

How many users can use this device?

H.O.M.E. is a family device & designed for the whole family. At any given point of time, up to 8 users can use this device with a separate profile for each user. 

How to set up multi-user profiles in the device? 

The device enables you to pick the profile from its linked mobile application. It will not allow you to set more then 8 profiles at any point of time.

Where can I learn more about Medaino?

We’re glad you asked! Learn more about our products at: www.medaino.com. If you have any questions you can also email us at info@medaino.com

My transaction got failed, but I need to book the device.

Write to us if your transition failed due to any reason at info@medaino.com, we will provide you support in rectifying the issue & pre-booking the device. 

Any other way to Help?

Of Course:

  • Spread the word and make some noise about the campaign; ask others to help us.
  • Share our Facebook & Twitter posts. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share the campaign & earn the credits.

story:
Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™

 

Overview

The Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ is a one-of-a-kind product created to help CPAP users around the world keep their CPAP supplies clean, in a convenient and healthy way.  Unlike other CPAP supplies cleaners, Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ uses water and a gentle detergent to ensure a safe and effective clean.  Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ is also much safer for your health than other products that use ionized air (ozone) for cleaning.  Ozone is a known free-radical, cancer-causing agent. 

 

Short Summary

Hi, I’m Dr. Raj Kakar, inventor of the Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™, and I am a Sleep Health specialist based in Dallas, TX.  I see patients every day who are diagnosed with obstructive sleep apnea and who use CPAP treatment.  Having seen thousands of patients over the years, one of the biggest challenges our patients have had was finding a convenient way to keep their CPAP supplies clean on a regular basis.  

Many people simply don’t clean them as often as they should, which increases the risk of infections.  The Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ fits neatly underneath your bathroom sink and connects easily to your plumbing.  That means no more unsightly equipment next to your bed for cleaning your CPAP!    Plus, the Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ cleans your hose, mask, and water chamber all at one time!  Just set it and go!  (Small pre-measured detergent packets make it even more convenient.) When you return, your PAP supplies are nice and freshly clean! Other CPAP cleaners use ionized air (aka ozone) to make cleaning convenient, but these devices may significantly increase the risk of cancer development.  Ozone is harmful to our health and to our environment. The Ultimate CPAP Cleaner™ uses ONLY real soap and water, so you get a better, safer clean!

That’s why I developed the idea of the Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™, to conveniently and safely clean CPAP supplies for healthy sleep. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for $150,000 in funding for product development, engineering, testing, and start-up costs.  These funds will help us bring the concept to reality.  As we make progress, we may seek further funding if needed for further product development, marketing, and sales.  If we do not reach our goal, the funds will still be used for product development, engineering, and testing. 

The retail price for the Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ will be $299.  But for our campaign supporters, we will offer discounted pricing.  In fact, if you donate $25, you will get a voucher for 5% off the product when it comes to market.  If you donate between $50, you will get a voucher for 10% off the product when ready for market.  If you donate $100, you will get a voucher for 25% off the product.  If you donate $150, you will get a voucher for 40% off the product.  If you donate $200, you will get a voucher for 60% off the product.  For all donations of $300, you will qualify for one free product device and you will be one of the first people on the planet to get the Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™!  Plus, for donations of $300 or more, we will give you free shipping.  For donations of $600, you will qualify for two free product devices, free shipping, and 6 months’ supply of free gentle detergent tablets!  For donations of $1,000, you will qualify for three free product devices, free shipping, and one year’s supply of free gentle detergent tablets. 

 

The Impact

One of the biggest challenges people with sleep apnea face is finding a convenient way to keep their CPAP supplies clean on a regular basis.  Handwashing CPAP supplies at least 1-2 times per week can be an inconvenient and time-consuming task.  Many people don’t clean them as often as they should, which increases the risk of infections and health problems.  Other CPAP cleaners on the market use ionized air (ozone), but these devices may significantly increase the risk of cancer development.  Plus, ozone is harmful to our environment. 

So I developed the idea of the Ultimate CPAP Cleaner ™ to conveniently clean CPAP supplies for healthy sleep.  By contributing to our campaign, you will help millions of CPAP users around the world save time cleaning their CPAP supplies and ensure that they keep their CPAP treatment sanitary and reduce the risk of infection.  Plus, you will actually benefit our world’s environment by helping people move away from current products that use ionized air (ozone) for cleaning.  Ozone is a known free-radical, cancer-causing agent.  Ozone is harmful not only to our environment, but also to our health.  Less ozone in the air is better for everyone and our planet! 

I have developed other successful products on the market.  One product, called the Ultimate Pillow ™, has helped many people get a better’s night’s sleep by promoting comfortable support.  The Ultimate Pillow ™ helps people to get the ideal head and neck support to ensure optimal spine alignment for an improved quality sleep.  It is also a one-of-a-kind product that provides the right amount of support for both back and side sleepers.  Sales of Ultimate Pillow ™ are taking off, and we plan to roll out other sizes and models to meet the needs of various types of sleepers (with a special line designed for women).  Our company has a proven track record for success. 

 

Risk & Challenges

The biggest challenges that we face in developing our product are funding, development, and manufacturing.  Funding is our first and biggest challenge.  But with the help of crowdfunding, we should be able to overcome this obstacle.  Once we have the funding, development will be the next biggest hurdle.  We will need to find good contacts in engineering and development that can create the product we have imagined.  Some issues related to development may be limitation on the size of the product, because we want to keep the product small enough to be placed underneath your bathroom sink.  But we will consult with several groups of engineers and designers to achieve the goals we have set.  Once we have developed the prototype, then manufacturing should be the easiest of our challenges.  We will just have to find the best manufacturer for our type of product.  I am a big believer in if you can dream it, you can achieve it! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to contributing to our campaign, there are other ways you can help.  Please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!  Also, remember you can use the Indiegogo share tools to pass the message along!    We truly appreciate your help in supporting our campaign to make this dream a reality, and to help people around the world live happier, healthier lives!

story:
Short Summary

For more than 2 years, my colleagues and I have studied insomnia. Why do we fall asleep at different times? What happens in the first seconds of sleep? We are the first ones to decide to approach this issue scientifically and here are our results. Here is the solution – “Dream pillow”. With our development you can guarantee to fall asleep within 3-8 minutes. This is possible thanks to 24 sensors installed into the pillow, a wave generator, a frequency amplifier and a processor that controls everything. You just need to click on "Start" and the rhythms of "Dream pillow" will synchronise with your mind to the world of dreams! 

The updated line of Dream Pillow is the culmination of years of re-design and testing. We are on Indiegogo to raise funds for ordering new inventory and building a team to take this unique product from its clinical origins to a pillow which is both effective and extremely comfortable.

We hope you’ll give it a try by supporting the campaign and joining our Dream Pillow community!

 
 
Regardless of race, age and sex, our brain works in certain rhythms. "Dream pillow" with the help of 24 sensors and detectors reproduces the rhythms for relaxation of mind and immersion in sleep. We literally make our brain relax and properly synchronise with the delta and theta waves. Just pressing "Start" regardless of fatigue, stress at work, quarrel with your beloved or change regime, you fall asleep to a good and tight dream in 3-8 minutes. 
 
 
One of the best things in "Dream pillow" is, of course, ease of use. You just need to press the button and select the mode. Next, the processor will do everything for you. There were certainly ideas to score with gadgets like many others, but we refused it. The only thing that we added to our development past the main one is a vibro alarm clock. It will not allow you to sleep more than 8 hours, slowly and pleasantly increasing the rhythm frequency, you will pleasantly wake up with a smile.
The main thing is to fall asleep, witch "Dream pillow" perfectly copes with. And no matter where you decide to fall asleep, in a car, on a mountain or a hotel, "Dream pillow" will provide a full and healthy sleep.
 
 
Our engineers installed 24 sensors and 8 sensors that generate theta, delta waves, and, depending on the mode you choose, reproduce binaural beats. "Dream pillow" works in 3 modes:

1. The first mode - synchronises your brain to the purity of 4-8 Hz, relaxing it.
2. The second mode -synchronises your brain to a purity of 1-4 Hz, immersing in sleep.
3. The third mixed cycle - synchronises your brain to purity from 15 and lowers to 3-4 Hz, for a deep sleep.
 
 
 

With "Dream pillow" you will like to live!

story:
Company Overview:

Nxtbed was founded with a disruptive spirit and a visionary objective: to truly place the customer first by creating personalized mattresses that embrace the unique sleep needs of each individual.   Our goal is to improve your overall quality of sleep, resulting in better daily performance and long-term health. 

Every Nxtbed is custom built from the ground up for each individual client.  We start by analyzing your body dimensions, which can be done in the comfort of your own home via smartphone, tablet, or Microsoft Kinect.  This analysis includes measurements of your height, weight, shoulder and hip dimensions, and sleeping position.   Using a proprietary algorithm inspired by our scientific approach, Nxtbed utilizes multiple segments and layers of differing densities throughout your mattress to help you achieve spinal alignment and therefore optimal sleep.  The result is a perfect, custom fit mattress for you and your partner based on your respective body profiles.

    .  

Over time our bodies will change, and as our lives and circumstances fluctuate, so too will our sleeping habits.   These changes may be a pregnancy, an athletic injury, or even a medical condition that necessitates a change in your mattress.   The segments and layers within your Nxtbed mattress can be seamlessly changed in and out based on your new body profile or circumstance, all within the comfort of your home.   Every Nxtbed comes with a Lifetime Warranty, so these modifications come at no cost to you.

 .    

Every Nxtbed product is made and manufactured in Connecticut with the help of our partners at KTT Enterprises, LLC and Talalay Global Inc.   All Nxtbed products are hypoallergenic, antimicrobial, and environmentally friendly.   

Our Mission

Nxtbed is seeking to raise capital through this crowd-funding campaign. The money raised will serve a dual purpose:

Half of the total funds raised will go towards further production and development of Nxtbed products. We plan on using campaign contributions to grow our business, and to develop innovative sleep technologies such as our proprietary sleep monitoring system and body profiling process. We’ll also use these contributions to increase brand awareness and further our marketing efforts.

 The other half of the funds raised will go to our partners at the Connecticut Chapter of the Alzheimer’s Association. This is a cause near to the heart of the Nxtbed team, and those afflicted with Alzheimer’s disease have personally impacted each of us in some way. We are proud to partner with our friends at the Alzheimer’s Association as we aid them in finding a cure for this disease. 

Impact of Poor Sleep

The evidence is clear; sleep deficiency and poor quality sleep can lead to long-term health problems. Studies show that sleep deficiency alters activity in the brain. This leads to poor decision-making, slow reaction time, difficulty solving problems, and trouble controlling emotions.

In addition to the cognitive issues we encounter resulting from poor quality sleep, we also put ourselves at further risk of heart disease, kidney disease, high blood pressure, diabetes, and stroke.

Challenges

One of the biggest challenges we will encounter in this campaign is helping people understand the role that quality sleep plays in their daily lives, whether it’s in the boardroom or on the athletic field. After several nights of disruptive sleep, the impact on your daily performance will be significant.

While we normally relate the benefits of quality sleep to young professionals and adults, the truth is that it begins at a much younger age. Deep sleep supports healthy growth and development, boosting muscle mass, helping to repair cells, and improving memory in children and teens.

We know that you need to be at your sharpest each and every day, which is why we’ve enlisted the experts to ensure you get the quality of sleep that you deserve.

Our founder, Bob Zukowski, has over 15 years of experience in the mattress industry, including work with all of the major bedding brands. Bob is an expert when it comes to sleep; his goal with NxtBed is to deliver an optimal level of sleep for peak performance, all while creating long-lasting relationships with all of our customers.

Our Partners in Quality

Talalay Global, Inc. 

Nxtbed is partnered with two of the finest companies in the industry.  Talalay Global manufactures the best Talalay latex foam in the world right in Shelton, Connecticut.  Talalay Global, formally Latex International, has be producing Talalay latex foam in Connecticut since 1975.  Watch the following video which aired on the Fox Business Network show Manufacturing Marvels.

 

KTT Enterprises, LLC

KTT Enterprises is owned and operated by Nancy and Dick Coffey and located in Hamden, Connecticut.  Dick has been in the latex foam business most of his adult life.  His father, Bill Coffey, was one of the two founders of Latex International.  KTT Enterprises provides cutting and fabrication services for Nxtbed products and has been our partner for the last eight years.

   

 

Our Team

   

Bob Zukowski

                                                                                     Jason Paz

 .

Mark Scheets

 

 Aaron Zukowski

Other Ways You Can Help

The Scent Guru

Ruth Sutcliffe, founder of The Scent Guru Group, LLC, is the creator of the Essential Awakenings Smell and Memory Kit and is a 30-year veteran of the flavor and fragrance industry.  She served as Senior Marketing Director and Fragrance Designer for Coty, focusing on fragrance development for lifestyle and celebrity brands.

Researchers have found that “olfactory memory” stimulates significantly more brain activity – primarily in the area known as the “limbic system” -- than memories triggered by visual or auditory stimuli.  With this in mind, the simple and basic everyday smells in the Essential Awakenings kit can be used as an aid by families, volunteers and program directors at senior centers – and even by speech pathologists -- to help retrieve smell memories and inspire conversation.

The kits offerer are: 

The Premier Edition contains the smells of Jasmine, Cinnamon, Chocolate, Pineapple, Mint and Grass

The Second Edition contains the smells of Apples, Lilac, Vanilla, Lavender, Pine and Popcorn

  Jasmine, Mint, Apple, Vanilla, Lavender and Lilac.  Visit The Scent Guru Group's website at: http://www.scentgurugroup.com/ to learn more.

CT Alzheimer's Association

Senator Richard Blumenthal Honors Bob Zukowski of Nxtbed for Supporting the CT Alzheimer's Association.

 

 

 

If you would like to support the Connecticut Alzheimer's Association in other ways, there are events scheduled throughout the year.  The Alzheimer's Association Walk to End Alzheimer's® is one of many ways you can help eliminate Alzheimers.

Thank you for your support.

Bob Zukowski

 Aaron Zukowski

The Scent Guru

The Second Edition contains the smells of Apples, Lilac, Vanilla, Lavender, Pine and Popcorn
  Jasmine, Mint, Apple, Vanilla, Lavender and Lilac.  Visit The Scent Guru Group's website at: http://www.scentgurugroup.com/ to learn more.

Thank you for your support.

story:
No more wasting time and money on ineffective massagers! IASO Ultra is your own personal pain relief device with futuristic technology to help damaged tissue recovery and improve blood flow, thus treating your pain effectively.

IASO Ultra combines low level laser technology, blue LED therapy, heat therapy and vibration massage to create a unique synergy to treat various pains in various areas of the body.

 

 

 

 

Living in a time where social distancing is required, a visit to the doctor’s office may not be the most ideal choice. Contactless treatments are encouraged; however, pain care and management isn’t simply a one-time annual check-up. Pain treatment takes multiple visits to the chiropractor, physical therapists and massage therapists.

 

 

With IASO Ultra, you will be able to receive medical level treatment in the comfort of your home with a small, compact yet mighty gadget that works wonders. 

 

 

Also known as low-level laser technology, cold laser therapy stimulates the regeneration of tissues by increasing blood flow to the applied area and thus  contributes to effective pain relief with no side effects.

With a trifecta of pain relief wavelengths of 650nm, 830nm and 910nm, this specific therapy works to reach into the deepest areas of the damaged tissues to promote relief.

 

 

Often used to treat sun damage and various skin conditions, blue LED therapy helps with blood flow improvement in superficial areas. The LED wavelength of 453nm and the triple wavelengths of the cold laser therapy work together for even a quicker pain relief--especially in tackling larger areas and deeper pains.

 

 

Along with the laser and LED therapy, heat activates in IASO Ultra to add on to the improvement of blood circulation . Heat therapy can relax and soothe muscles while healing damaged tissues.

 

 

For a comprehensive massage experience, vibrations and rhythmic vibrations complete the full package. Vibration adds the final touch in the therapy to enhance the process of helping the expansion of blood vessels for an overall speedy recovery. 

 

 

These four features work together to create the most advanced therapy and pain relief experience that no other pain management device can offer. Not only that, IASO Ultra carries these sleek features as well.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The device weighs only 220 grams, or roughly half a pound and is only 3.4 x 6 x 1 inch size. Considering the jam packed technology, IASO Ultra is truly light and compact, yet mighty. 

 

IASO Ultra is wearable with its wearable band. Experience a hands-free contactless therapy--something that no other personal cold laser device can deliver. Plus with its light weight, you can wear it around anywhere for quick on-the-go relief!

 

IASO Ultra was specifically designed to treat larger surface areas that generally require more attention, such as the shoulder, lower back and thigh area.

 

IASO Ultra is on par to medical grade therapy. Cold laser is globally used for pain relief by chiropractors and physicians. You would have easy access to your very own personal medical level pain management therapy for an affordable price.

 

Whenever you feel tension or pain, pop out your IASO Ultra and attach it on to wherever your body is calling. 

 

The long lasting battery can be charged via a charging cable or the charging cradle.

 

 

 

 

 

Treat the pains from bad posture, repeated use of joints, and various sport activities at the comfort of your own home with medical grade laser therapy--especially during this time of uncertainty. 

 

 

 

 

 

We released IASO back in 2019 as a cold laser therapy device that is small, compact yet mighty. The concept of a portable pain management device that carries technology that major hospitals use was extremely futuristic, and the public absolutely loved it.

 

 

IASO was also featured in...

 

 

But our customers wanted more..

 

 

That’s why you asked and we listened!

 

IASO Ultra has been upgraded to tackle deeper pains that the small IASO couldn’t do. To help the recovery, we added blue LED therapy, heat therapy and advanced vibration pulses to fuse a comprehensive therapy package that no one else has ever released before. 

 

The original IASO was able to treat various types of pain, but it was designed to treat the smaller areas and targeted superficial tissues. IASO Ultra can penetrate into the deeper tissues, being able to treat larger surface areas, such as the waist, back, stomach and shoulders. 

 

 

 

 

 

Cold laser therapy is considered one of the most innovative and latest technologies that deliver effective treatment for pain. It is a low intensity laser therapy that stimulates healing of the body tissues. It is called “cold” laser technology because it uses low levels of lights that do not heat the body tissue or cause any damage.

The red light in cold laser therapy encourages the mitochondria to produce

And these are all important factors for your body to heal faster. The mitochondria is triggered during the therapy for a quicker and more effective recovery process.

 

Doctors, chiropractors, physiotherapists, and sports professionals utilize cold laser therapy to treat these conditions:

The cold laser therapy in IASO Ultra is also emitted in three very specific therapeutic wavelengths of 650nm, 830nm and 910nm, so there is no need for drugs and there are no adverse side effects either.

 

Cold laser therapy is also known to treat other various conditions as well, such as:

 

 

 

 

 

 

Absolutely Anyone. And Everyone. Whether you enjoy playing sports, or you are suffering from bad posture after a long day at work, or you’re simply wanting a mild massage before bed, IASO Ultra can be applied to many different scenarios.

 

Whether you’re working from home or you’re coming home from a stressful day, recharge and repair your pain with IASO Ultra.

 

 

Struggling from the ‘office chair poor posture’? Don’t worry--IASO Ultra has got your back.

 


Worked out the muscles too much today? Relax those muscles with this post-workout massage/therapy.

 

 

 

IASO Ultra offers three different modes that users can easily change from with the click of a button. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WellsCare has received many different certificates and awards for IASO. There are currently registered patents in six different countries, including the United States, and seven different unique registered patents in South Korea. IASO has also had the honor of being awarded with the Good Design Award in South Korea as well. 

*These certifications currently apply to IASO and not IASO Ultra*

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The story of IASO began when the CEO--Sung-Won Lee worked in a company that manufactured professional medical equipment. The technology in these equipment was low-level laser technology, a therapy thoroughly used by doctors for effective pain management.

Lee began to brainstorm ideas on pain management devices when his wife, a working mother of three children, began experiencing pain from an overwhelming amount of  work and responsibilities as a mother, and couldn’t even find adequate time to visit a doctor. After sufficient research, Lee was able to invent IASO*--a wearable and portable laser therapy product. (*IASO is the Greek Goddess of healing or recuperation from illness.)

His wife used IASO and felt pain relief almost immediately, able to conduct her normal daily routines simultaneously while using the cold laser therapy device. Lee knew instantly that IASO would be a great gadget in the market because it could be used anywhere, anytime for effective pain relief. 

The small yet mighty device launched into the market and experienced commercial success. Receiving love calls from third party platforms such as b8ta and Best Buy, the public absolutely adored it.

Two years later, WellsCare is back with an upgraded product--IASO Ultra-- that tackles deeper pain reats the larger areas of pain that the smaller IASO could not reach. Our goal is to introduce innovation in the field of pain management and relief, and we will strive our very best to achieve that goal with every single product.

story:
Dear friends...

On April 16th, 2002 I am lacing up my sneakers and running the Boston Marathon to raise money for the American Cancer Society as part our family team fundraising for the Relay For Life where I participate with my family team in St. Albans, Vermont. I am taking on this challenge of my life in honor of my friends Susan Silodor, Marietta Stevens, and Bev Gross of Cheyenne Wyoming. Each one of these special people has survived cancer because of their positive attitude and the breakthroughs in cancer research funded by American Cancer Society. This is my third Boston and it will be the most memorable because of the courage and strength of these special survivors behind me. I qualified with the Hartford Marathon in October of 2000, with a 3:40 marathon qualifier time. This will be my 15th marathon since 1989.

Now, your part is easy. All you need to do is commit to sponsoring me. My part is a little tougher, I've committed to raising $2,620 for the American Cancer Society by completing the 26.2 miles-- no matter how long it takes. Please donate as generously as you can by sending in your check payable to the American Cancer Society to the address below. Just in case you need a little extra motivation to sponsor me, here are a few reasons.

story:
Tired of Braces? Try our Dental Aligners from Germany!

Say goodbye to metal wires and difficult maintenance, there is now an easier way to straighten your teeth! 

Orthodontists can now offer you an alternative from Germany. Our treatment system is currently used by over 2,000+ doctors treating more than 30,000+ cases, and now these "invisible aligners" will be made available in Hong Kong and with the aim of expanding to other Asian markets in the near future.

Modern Clear 德國隱形牙套 - 最簡單快速的牙齒矯正，令你綻放出最美麗的笑容.

相比傳統鐵線箍牙, Modern Clear 隱形牙箍在外觀, 保養,  舒適度及治療速度都較優勝. 無論是擁擠 (Crowding), 前牙間隙 (Diastema), 或是各種的咬合問題 (Malocclusion)，這些普遍牙齒病例都可透過我們的 Modern Clear 系統療程迅速修正.

由物料, 生產以至編制治療計劃也是德國的牙醫及專業技術人員一手包辦, 精準的 3D 模擬結果配合優質的隱形牙套, Modern Clear 系統在市場上是獨一無二的.  

 

Clear Aligners. Clear Advantages.

  • German engineered (material, planning & production)
  • More comfortable & less pain
  • Easy maintenance - brush & floss as usual.
  • No metal wires - your friends will hardly notice!
  • Fastest possible treatment - our treatment time averages at 6 months
  • You get a FREE treatment plan (a 3D simulation) after initial consultation
  • We include a FREE whitening treatment
  • A retainer is included in the treatment package, you don't have to pay extra for it
  • Less frequent visits at the clinic

 

我們的優勢:

  • 德國製造, 質素保證
  • 療程平均只需 6 個月, 全程由醫生主導和跟進
  • 美觀, 舒適, 不影響外表
  • 容易清潔打理
  • 附送Smile Center牙齒美白療程
  • 附送牙齒固定器

 

How does it work?

We have designed a hassle-free treatment process that is easier for both you and the dental practitioner. Compared to braces, you will have less frequent visits to your dentist/ specialist.

Step 1: Make an appointment with our partner clinics

Step 2: Wait for your FREE treatment plan, it will be a 3D simulation. Decide if you want the treatment or not.

Step 3: You will receive your set of aligners in a Modern Clear box. Start wearing your 1st aligner, keep you aligner on 21 hours a day, and change a new aligner every 2 weeks

Step 4: Smile with confidence! 

醫生主導, 流程簡單:

Step 1: 預約到診所做評估

Step 2: 與醫生檢視你的3D 治療模擬結果, 並決定是否進行療程

Step 3: 你會收到一盒Modern Clear牙套, 每天戴上牙套 21 小時, 並按指示每 2 週換上一副新的牙套

Step 4: 綻放你燦爛而自信的笑容

 

To Thank our Backers:

We will offer free consultation, whitening service, and treatment discount (up to HKD 2,000), depending on the amount you pledge. Donation of any size would help make a great impact, do check out our perks!

我們會有相應的優惠與服務報答大家 (只限於＄199 或以上的 pledger ), 包括免費牙齒評估, 牙齒美白服務, 以及各種療程優惠. 感謝支持!

 

 

Curious to know more?

Check out our website: https://modern-clear.de/en/modern-clear-orthodo...

 

Risks & Challenges:

Clear Aligner treatment is a preferred option in many cases. However due to its limitations, we sometimes recommend using other appliances depending on the complexity of your case. Regardless, you can still enjoy a free check-up at our partner clinics.

story:
Hey there!

What is "The Mechanical Hand"?
There are many ways to answer that question.
Some may call it a toy, others would classify it as a mechanical model of a human hand.
For us, it is something in between, and much more - The Mechanical Hand is inspiration, it´s movement, it´s fun for builders and hobbyists of almost any age.

With its gears, cranks and excentric levers it shows its mechanical sophisticated functions to everyone, who´s ready to be inspired by this really exceptional, innovative mechanical toy!

The story behind "The Mechanical Hand"

In 2012 we took part in the "EvD 'Make Your Laser Cut Toy' contest" on GRABCAD.
The contests target was to develop a toy made only from lasercut parts in order to eventually start an own business, or just a project from it.

We ended with a great second place with the best mechanical toy and as time passed by, we "fine-tuned" the whole mechanism.
And now, as many of you have waited for it - there is a final version, flawlessly working, ready to be cut and be shipped to you!


This is, where this funding comes into play. Our intention is to bring the mechanical hand to every "fan" of it, either in a digital, or, if you haven´t got access to a lasercutter, in a physical way by cutting the hand and sending it to you.

To make this project become reality, we have to expand our inventory regarding our
machinery and general structures for packaging, printing the postcards and even storage.

Perk overview

What you will get
All completely cut sets will be manufactured by ourselves and shipped with the washers to you(free shipping included).
In advance to the "classic" set, the "X-Mas" greeting set will contain a personalized card for the receiver! Shipping will be done in december, to ensure, that everyone gets his hand right in time for christmas!

If you decide to get the "DXF-Package", see the DXF-chapter below.

For all physical sets, an instructional video on how to assemble the hand correctly will be uploaded to our website: TheMechanicalHand.com .

-Be aware, that there are no spare parts in the kit. We can not supply any spare parts, if the hand is assembled in the wrong way.


Our MDF is green!
Well, that´s not exactly right. It is still brown, as every MDF is.
But: We obtain our MDF from FSC and PEFC-certified wholesalers.
It is also free from formaldehyde. Better for you, better for nature.

                                                                  


When you will get it
As soon as we hit our financial target, gears will be set into movement!
Machinery has to be ordered, and produced, which will take several weeks.
General utilities such as cardboxes, stickers, the postcards, MDF etc. have to be bought and prepared.
When everything is prepared, cutting will take us another ~4 weeks; during that, we´re shipping the first hands.
In fact, shipping will start in the second week of october, thus giving us plenty of time before christmas.

I have bought the DXF package - what now?
The DXF-Perk contains four files. A DXF that can be used on any laser cutting machine, that can cut MDF(CO₂ will be fine). Those are found e.g. in FabLabs, Makerspaces and so on. They will most likely also offer a 5mm MDF sheet, that you will need.
The three remaining files are drawings of the spacers and washers. Those have to be turned on a lathe out of aluminium or brass tubing. General turning tools and a lathe are required!


If you´ve been waiting for a real version of the mechanical hand - if you´re searching for a really exceptional, innovative, mechanical toy -

then go ahead and get your mechanical hand!

story: The 20 Countries Where People Get Kidnapped The Most The proportion of global kidnappings from Latin America has halved since 2005, but Mexico still leads the pack, according to Risk Map 2014, a new report from Control Risks. Asia and the Pacific had the most recorded kidnaps-for-ransom in 2013, up to 35% of global cases from 31% in 2012. Risks remain in Africa, especially in Nigeria where "the overwhelming majority of incidents taking place in the oil-producing Niger delta." "A large number of cases continued to be reported in the Middle East, fuelled by the unstable security environment created by the Syrian civil war," according to the report. "Kidnapping-for-ransom has become a common problem in Syria and Lebanon, with Lebanon ranking sixth in Control Risks’ global top ten in 2013." Here are the top 20 countries for kidnap-for-ransom in absolute terms for 2013 (as of September 30): 1. Mexico 2. India 3. Nigeria 4. Pakistan 5. Venezuela 6. Lebanon 7. Philippines 8. Afghanistan 9. Colombia 10. Iraq 11. Syria 12. Guatemala 13. Yemen 14. Libya 15. Egypt 16. Brazil 16. Kenya (tied) 18. Nepal 19. Malaysia 19. South Africa (tied) To contextualize, Control Risks said that the n  With over 875,000 children reported missing in the United States in just the last year, this low-cost device will help families concerned about the whereabouts of their children, teens, elderly parents (including Alzheimer's patients) by enabling them to keep tabs on their loved ones' locations at any given time. One of the many programming capabilities of this device will allow the family to set distance parameter guidelines, such that once the wearer of the device (for example, a young child) travels beyond a set distance from the "base" unit, the remote unit is automatically activated to alert the "home base" unit (a cell phone, PDA or computer) of the child's location, direction and speed of travel. This will be a great asset in assisting law enforcement agencies in recovering missing persons within minutes. Statistics from the FBI indicate that missing children who are murdered are usually killed within three hours of abduction. The RQM Technologies Personal Tracking Device (PTD) will save lives, by immediately alerting the "base" unit, aiding in timely tracking and rescue by law enforcement agencies. Another programming capability is the ability to download all medical information, contact information, emergency numbers, etc., in the event an individual is found incapacitated, allowing emergency teams to treat a patient effectively, while alerting the guardian of her child's, parent's, or pet's whereabouts. FIELD OF THE INVENTION The present invention relates to a footwear more particularly a foot wear with multi features. DETAIL DESCRIPTIONS OF THE INVENTION preferred embodiment of the present invention, it’s a multifunctional shoe. The main purpose of the invention is to save lives and help to minimize kidnapping. It utilizes on star tracking/or another type of tracking company to locate your loved one. In addition the War Sparrow shoe vacuum sucks around the victims feet tightly so that the attacker or the victim can’t take it off until police arrive, while in alert mode the shoes external shell is electrically charged with the voltage of police stun-gun so if the predator tries to take them off, he gets paralyzed by the voltage and the victim is given enough time to get away. In a second aspect of the present invention, War Sparrow has a beats/or another high quality electronic speaker system on one side in addition to the speaker system, the War Sparrow also has a touchscreen video player on the other side, it also acts as a GPS system utilizing the blue tooth tech located under the back sole. This small head set interacts with the pedestrian with a list of commands directing him/her to his/her selected location by voice recognition tech,blinkers are installed on the front and back of the shoe like a car to show the way. The War Sparrow will save lives using star tech or another type of tracking company, when the victim is attacked he/she presses a button located on either their wrist or manually on their shoe. It comes with an app download that allows you to locate your child/loved one with on-star satellite using your smart phone. You can also communicate with the victim with speaker system and listen to the victim surroundings There is also an alarm as loud as a fire truck that sounds as soon as the  button hit,also the War Sparrow alerts other shoes that are in the area and takes a sitting report and sends it to the police and family members with the  convenient app so no more flier's and relaying on people to report a sitting . The War Sparrow shoe is heat resistant, fire resistant, cut resistant, can be submerged in water with no damages to the electrical system. The War Sparrow is a solar powered device, also it uses the same usb port responsible for downloading the music to the shoe to energize the charge pack located in the sole. Solar is located on the front top and on the back of the shoe. There is a jamming device which would be embedded in the bottom of the shoe that would disable any electrical devices from working like a car/cell phone/walkie talkie or any electrical device. So that the kidnappers car and cellphone or anyone else's he tries to use does not work. In another aspect of the present invention there would be a wristband for control and operate the shoe in addition to the manual control panel located on the shoe. There would be a small hidden high definition camera also, on the front of the shoe. While a preferred embodiment of the present invention has been shown and described, it will be apparent shown and described, it will be apparent to those skilled in the art that many changes and modifications may be made without departing from the invention in its broader aspect.

story:
Hi, I’m JodiAnn Stevenson and I’m most HAPPY as a Mermaid

and I’m on a mission to bring Mermaid Tails into the world of Fitness in the U.S.!

You, I know (because you are reading this) are, AWESOME!

Positive Psychologists tell us that our brains and bodies work better when we’re HAPPY!  Neuroscientists tell us that doing exercise in new, novel ways is one of the best ways to make ourselves HAPPY! 

Last summer just before I completed my ACE group fitness certification and my AEA aquatics fitness professional certification, it dawned on me that the world of U.S. Fitness is perfectly ripe for a new, novel and exciting trend that has already started to develop in other parts of the world. 


So, my mission emerged:  To design a workout that people could do in a Mermaid tail that would be challenging and fun – and would, ultimately, be more than just donning a tail and splashing around aimlessly in the water (which, for the record, is also fun). 

Then, my mission began taking shape:  I developed The Mermaid Workout ™ and have started teaching it in one-on-one training sessions with clients, just to test it further and walk real participants through the process.  But, The Mermaid Workout ™ is definitely ready to be taught to whole groups of 10-15 participants at a time.  And in order to start offering The Mermaid Workout ™ to whole groups, I need a whole set of tails. 

The novelty of The Mermaid Workout ™ makes people HAPPY – even as it makes them fit or helps them stay fit! (remember that science-y part above?)

So, I am running this indiegogo campaign in order to fund my first set of tails to be used in The Mermaid Workout ™.  I have already found a reputable supplier of high quality tails from whom I will purchase these tails.  Once I have this set of tails, I will begin offering The Mermaid Workout in aquatic facilities, at least, throughout Michigan, particularly in my region of Mid-Michigan. 

I’m certain that offering these classes will quickly have a snowball effect.  The Mermaid Workout ™  is an awesome workout!  Participants feel powerful and stunning when they do it.  They feel “natural” and “graceful” and “beautiful” and “strong.”  These are actually words participants have used to describe the experience.  I have already developed a training module for other future Mermaid Fitness ™ instructors.  Within a year’s time, I anticipate the need to license at least a handful of other instructors to help me keep up with the demand of offering these classes.  I have also developed a couple of top secret products to make The Mermaid Workout ™ as effective and successful as possible.  These top secret products are currently being jumped through some legal hoops before they will be ready to launch and added to the Mermaid Fitness ™ experience but they are definitely on their way!

And we have bigger plans beyond that… but that’s the starting point… buying this first set of tails is essentially the start-up cost for what could ultimately become nothing short of a revolution in the world of fitness. 

Our perks and incentives range from a shout-out on our website to a demonstration of The Mermaid Workout for your gym (wherever you may be)!  In between those possibilities, there are totally Badass Mermaid T-shirts, posters, class packages, private instruction packages and even a mermaid-for-a-day class, makeover and photo shoot!  There is something for everyone, at any price range and any interest level. 

This is an all-or-nothing campaign.  If we don’t reach our entire goal, we will not be collecting any of the pledges we have raised and you will miss out on any of the awesome perks you were hoping for!  So, please help us spread the word of this campaign far and wide through all of your social networks!

Supporting Mermaid Fitness ™ and The Mermaid Workout ™ in this campaign is supporting a new and exciting development in fitness – and in the world of Mermaids! The world of fitness needs ever more novel and enjoyable ways for people to find their version of healthy and happy.  Mermaid Fitness ™ will be nothing short of a revolution in fitness, once we get this ball rolling. 

Thank you for reading and considering contributing to this campaign! Please don’t forget to share our campaign far and wide – who knows how many Merpeeps will come out of the lakes, rivers and oceans to contribute and get involved in this fitness revolution!? Now, go on with your Badass Awesome self!

story:
Owning and operating an aircraft is an expensive and time consuming endeavor. The aviation industry is highly regulated and there are safety concerns that must be considered every step of the way.

Airbly, Inc. is a technology company aiming to simplify aircraft ownership and make flying safer. We accomplish this through enhanced positional and environmental reporting combined with intuitive web and smartphone applications. We are bringing modern monitoring technology to the general aviation aircraft cockpit.  

The Canairy™ Cockpit Monitor

Airbly, Inc. has developed the Canairy™ Cockpit Monitor which is an affordable, passive, personal electronic device that is mounted on top of the instrument panel of an aircraft. There is no supplemental type certificate (STC) required and it does not need to be installed by a certified mechanic which provides a significant savings in installation costs. The device silently monitors several aspects of the aircraft environment, including:

  • Location and movement 
  • Cabin pressure, temperature, humidity, and carbon monoxide levels
  • Engine and air time 
  • Stress on the air-frame 

Communications

The Canairy™ Cockpit Monitor periodically sends this information over a low orbit satellite relay to our cloud based server environment. The data is then processed and made available to the users on the ground through intuitive web and smartphone applications. 

Software

Through these applications we offer services to aid in the ownership and management of aircraft, such as: 

  • Real time location tracking 
  • Cabin environmental reports 
  • Automatic log books 
  • Maintenance tracking 
  • Resource scheduling 
  • Alerts and notifications
  • Social media integration 
  • Accounting
  • Personal locator beacon

In addition to logging and reporting, the device also detects invisible and unsafe cockpit conditions such as high levels of carbon monoxide or dangerously low cabin pressures. If an unsafe condition is observed, the pilot and those on the ground are immediately alerted. 

The Canairy™ Cockpit Monitor brings peace of mind to owners and pilots alike. It aids in ensuring that scheduled maintenance occurs on time and the aircraft remains airworthy.  We also help manage aircraft scheduling and operational costs. An aircraft owner will always know where his/her aircraft is and has been. Plus with social media integration, we can fun at the same time.


Thank you

Thank you for taking the time to check our new aviation product.  Please contact us either through the comments or directly with any questions or suggestions.

story:
Risks and Challenges

   With every project, there are many risks and challenges.  We are still working with engineering for the final internal prototype (timeline is 8 weeks).  Some minor changes could develop during review, however, our engineer is very confident it will perform as needed. We expect that once final prototype is done there may need to be some design adjustments so our tooling is efficient. This may change the design ever so slightly however the look, feel, and functionality will be the same. We need $30,000 to finish this phase of the project and the other $30,000 will be spent on the tooling, that will make the actual product. (And we can send all the perks!)

  There are always challenges with manufacturing. We have price quotes for our tooling and they can begin manufacturing just as soon as we have final engineering complete. There could always be unexpected costs, manufacture production delays and tooling delays.  

We will do our absolute best to keep all of our supporters up to date and hopefully be able to ship out sooner than our timeline suggests! Our company's goal is to stay out of debt and not have to get a bank loan. This way we can spend all capital on creating a superior product and getting it into the hands of every parent, caregiver, and child. So if you like our product, please support us and spread the "BUZZ"!

story:
What is it?
From the white-hot beaches of Miami, FL, we present to you the one and only Cocosol Tanning Oil. Now you can get that amazing golden color (just like us locals) while nursing your body with skin-loving ingredients without any of the harsh chemicals found in other commercial products!

Cocosol is dedicated to making natural, chemical-free tanning oil perfectly suited the gorgeous beach babes in all of us! We use only natural ingredients that benefit your skin while enhancing your natural radience. Your skin and your mirror will thank you for it! Cocosol products will leave your skin beautifully hydrated, nourished & glowing. 

  • Cocosol  contains  only wholesome, natural ingredients that deliver skin-loving nutrients. A unique blend of cacao bean powder, coconut oil, coffee bean extracts and essential oils provide an amazing aromatic bronzer that will nourish your skin and leave you with a beautiful golden glow. Instant.Sun. Goddess. 
  • Moisture, Moisture, Moisture! Cocosol contains coconut oil, a natural source of saturated fats that are medium chain fatty acids or triglycerides. When applied on the skin, they keep it smooth to the touch, retain the skin's the moisture content while adding additional moisture and protecting the skin with a natural spf of 4. This makes it the perfect agent for tanning because it allows maximum tan with needed protection. 
  •  Cocosol is extremely safe to use on acne prone skin because it protects from acne-causing bacteria. Cocosol contains capric, caprylic, and lauric acids which have strong disinfectant and antimicrobial properties. The ingredients in Cocosol help to protect the skin from microbial infections that can get into open wounds or even enter the body through the pores. 
  • Cocosol's blend also contains vitamin-E which is essential for healthy skin growth, repair of wear and stretch marks on the skin, and keeping skin smooth and protecting against cracking. Above all, Cocosol helps prevent premature aging and wrinkling of the skin because of it's amazing antioxidants which reverses the negative effects of sun damage while protecting you from any further damage!



We've all been using commercial tanning oils for as long as I can remember, WHATS THE BIG DEAL?

Oh the Sun! We all love it. We love the sun kissed glow that makes you turn heads. Pair that with beachy wavy hair, and smooth skin and you got a combination that is sure to be a jaw dropper. This comes at a price however, store bought products contain a plethora of harsh chemicals that your skin absorbs in the heat. Some examples include: 
  1. Oxybenzone: is linked to hormone disruption and cell damage that may lead to skin cancer.
  2. Retinyl palmitate: has now been proven to be a carcinogen.
  3. Octyl-methoxycinnamate: causes oxidation damage of the skin, which ages your face.
  4. Butyl-Methdiebenzoylmethane: releases free radicals into the body.
  5. Benzophenone 2 (BP2): decreases the function of the thyroid, in a population that is already seriously suffering from hypothyroidism (under active).
By contributing to our campaign you will be helping to spread the word about the importance of natural skin care products, fund our web and label campaign development.


What We Need & What You Get

  • The overall costs of our campaign is $3,000. The website development and the label design and printing is $1,500. The other $1,500 would go towards marketing expenses and product development.
  • With a contribution of $16.99, you would be purchasing a Cocosol Tanning Oil! 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, everyone who donated would get a total refund.

Benzophenone 2 (BP2): decreases the function of the thyroid, in a population that is already seriously suffering from hypothyroidism (under active).


By contributing to our campaign you will be helping to spread the word about the importance of natural skin care products, fund our web and label campaign development.

  What We Need & What You Get
  The overall costs of our campaign is $3,000. The website development and the label design and printing is $1,500. The other $1,500 would go towards marketing expenses and product development. With a contribution of $16.99, you would be purchasing a Cocosol Tanning Oil!  If we don't reach our entire goal, everyone who donated would get a total refund.

story:
RTKWARE is a friendly and affordable positioning system based on Real Time Kinematics. It is able to achieve centimeter accuracy for real time tracking applications.

Welcome to the precision 

The standard GPS devices found in our phones or cars work with precision of meters, This is normally acceptable if we use them for standard navigation, but not enough if we want to jump to other applications.

Several methods have been developed in the last years in order to increase the precision from meters to centimeters or even millimeters. One of these methods is called RTK (Real Time Kinematic), and it is based on combining the signals of two GPS devices at same time.

RTKWARE is designed for:

  • Makers
  • App developers
  • GIS Software users
  • Drone users (Open Pilot)
  • Precision Agriculture Farmers
  • RTK Researchers


What is UBR1?

The RTKWARE module UBR1 is a low cost multi-constellation receiver with integrated antenna and built-in 3km-range RF modem. 

.

It has been designed for the user, and includes elements as charger manager, USB interface, rechargeable battery, and enclosure among others. It is friendly, wearable, and ready to use.  

You will need nothing else than your laptop to start testing your applications based on RTK technology, forget about the hardware issues and focus on developing your project.

--> Download UBR1 Datasheet


Application examples

#1 Player monitoring 

A football player wears the UBR1 device in the arm. The GPS data is received and sent to a laptop. The data is processed in real time by the open source RTK software Rtklib. As mentioned, in an RTK system, two devices are needed to compute the precision solution, so the software is configured to get the second signal from a real time reference station from an internet server. 


As you can see in the video, the player position is clearly defined and is obtained in real time. With this data, the number of parameters that can be calculated is huge:


  • Total distance
  • Velocity (average / max)
  • Acceleration (average / max)
  • Detect patterns (fatigue, overeffort...)

Think how valuable this data can be for any professional athlete or coach.


#2 Vehicle Monitoring

In that case, two UBR1 has been used. One in a static known postition and the other placed in a car, Similarly to the previous test, both signals are processed by the rtklib software. 


Once again, a lot of applications can derive from here: 

  • Parking control
  • Unmanned vehicles
  • Access control
  • Fleet management
  • Navigation
  • System synchronization

--> Visit the test area at www.rtkware.com for more details

 

What is the difference between the RTKWARE UBR1 and other low cost RTK devices?

The RTK world has been reserved until now to very expensive professional equipment (thousands dollars). It is mainly due to the fact that many different electronic areas are involved in a RTK design: radio stages, GNSS stages, computing, powering among others... and they have to be perfectly adjusted to achieve good precision. 

In order to make it affordable, there has been a relevant response from the low cost market. We have recently seen alternatives that solves the problem partially, but they can be frustrating if you don´t have solid electronic knowledge. Generally speaking, you still have to connect several boards with cables, charge the bateries by your own and putting everything in an enclosure with glue... 

Aware of this, RTKWARE gathers all the elements to avoid you have to deal with cables and can focus with your application: 




Features

  • Multi-constellation receiver
  • 500mW Medium Power UHF Radio Modem (free band 915MHz US, 868MHz EU) with 3km range.
  • USB interface (Charge and 2 Data channels)
  • Lithium polymer 3.7 rechargeable battery
  • Enclosure
  • Protective silicon cover (yellow)


                                        


Spend your time wisely!

 

How Does it Work?

A standard positioning device (phones, car...) receives the signal from the American global positioning system (GPS) constellation. The signals are treated by an algorithm with support of an installed map, computing a position solution with accuracy of meters. Adding some other correction technics and reception of signals from other global satellites systems as GLONASS (Russia), GALILEO (Europe) or Beidou (China), the accuracy cannot be better than 1m in best cases.



The RTK methods use the reception of two near devices, one is moving (ROVER) and another remains static with a known position (BASE). The fact of knowing the position is key to estimate the error due to the atmospheric effects that disturb the electromagnetic path down from satellite to receiver. This estimated error from the BASE will be used in the ROVER (who share the same atmospheric error since both are close) to remove the errors and increase the accuracy in 100 times.

It is easy to observe that at some point, both groups of signals will have to be "cooked" together, requiring one of them is transported via UHF, WIFI, GPRS or other communication system.

The RTKWare module UBR1 is a multi-constellation receiver with integrated antenna and a UHF modem. It can work as a ROVER or BASE, by simply switching a selector. The GNSS signals can be received from satellites and sent transparently to the process point in order you can have both signals in a USB port to feed your RTK software in a laptop or on-board processor (via TTL port).

The hardware architecture is 100% open., having USB full access to all the configuration parameters of the used chips: modem and GPS receiver. Change and play with different receiver GNSS strings, modes, change protocols (NMEA/BINR/RTCM)... and send  the data via radio afterwards!.  It is fully compatible with RTKLIB, the popular open source RTK software.


The UBR1 is a powerful evaluation GNSS board


 



... and RTK for all

The UBR1 and UD1 are the result of two years of passionate electronic work with the objective of bringing the RTK to experimenters and developers that want to focus in applications and cannot expend thousand of dollars. This campaign can be the key for a big change in the application development world, but we can´t do it on our own. The high precision app ideas can become real... imagine: survey, parking, drones, autoguidance, sports.... A big amount of applications born worldwide from makers and experimenters without limits.

 
Budget and Timeline
RTKWARE products are the result of two years of unpaid and altruistic work. A personal effort in which the expenses in prototyping, software, and instrumental equipment have been assumed to create three versions of the UBR1 and UD1: v0.1, v0.2 and v0.3 (3pcs each), achieving stability with the latest v0.3. 
The devices UBR1 and UD1 have been tested in real conditions, as you can see in the videos.
In order to achieve a competitive final price, we need to launch a medium series production of at least 150 units. The amount you join is distributed as follows:



Looking at the figure, the benefits (green) will go entirely to create the stock of product and set up the online shop at www.rtkware.com after the crowdfunding campaign ends. If the campaign is not successfully completed, your contributions will be refunded. 
Some other production data:
  • Production start: End of Indiegogo campaign
  • Production duration: 7-9 weeks.
  • Estimated product delivering: July-August 2015
  • PCB fabrication: OSHPARK USA
  • Electronic components: DIGIKEY USA/ FARNELL USA / RSONLINE SPAIN. TOPSOURCE CHINA.
  • Enclosures: TAKACHI JAPAN
  • Assembly and test: PROFIANTS HUNGARY

 

Team

Rtkware is founded by Edu López, an experienced telecom engineer from Valencia (Spain). He graduated from Polytecnic University of Valencia, and is specialized in electronics. He also earned a Master in Microlectronic (Supélec, Gif sur Yvette, France).
With a focus on hardware design and microcontrollers, his career has been connected to the Wireless Sensor Networks, Global Navigation Satellite Systems, and Internet of Things for over ten years. Working on definition and development of mixed analog/digital hardware systems and low power radio protocols based on the standard 802.15.4.

Rewards

The RTKWARE products are manufactured with the best electronic components, bought from the most relevant distributors that follow strict high-quality standards. Regarding the manufacturing process for PCB fabrication and assembly, our providers are also a reference in their respective market areas. For these reasons, the RTKWARE prices will have to increase a 30% after the campaign, BUT, for the time being, during the campaign, we will do an extra effort so you find the product more attractive and thus we can achieve the objective of setting up the RTKWARE project


UBR1

Indicated for the case where you have internet access in your ROVER. You will need access to a reference station near you via Internet (<30Km).

The processing RTK software is running in the ROVER (laptop or on-board processor), 

 

The UBR1 receives the GNSS RAW data and send it via USB. The signal from a near station is received through your internet connection.


UBR1 + UD1

Pack indicated for the scenario in which you want to monitor a ROVER position remotely from a control center with Internet. It is using one UBR1 module and one UD1 (USB Dongle). You will also need a reference station near you (<30Km).



The processing RTK software is running in your control center (computer with internet access). It will work with the UD1 data that comes from the moving UBR1 via Radio, taking the BASE signal from an NTRIP server. 



UBR1 + UBR1

Pack for the scenario in which you don´t have internet access or the reference station is too far (>30km)



The moving UBR1 receives the satellite signals and sends them to the other UBR1. The last bridges these incoming signals and those generated by itself through the USB (2 channels).


All the rewards are available in OEM version or with enclosure:



THANKS!

Don´t forget to visit www.rtkware.com to read application notes, datasheets and other interesting stuff that will give you a more detailed view of the products.


If you still have questions, or just want to say hi, drop us a line at info@rtkware.com


The RTKWARE team: E. López and Petazetas, having a hard brainstorming meeting…

RTK WE ARE!
