story:
Focus, Energy, and a Better Memory are Just A Pill Away!!!

At FreeMind Nootropics we make health supplements using all natural FDA approved ingredients that have been scientifically tested and shown to significantly improve the function of your brain.

  • We created these products because we believe that optimizing the health of your brain is the most important foundation for living a happy and healthy lifestyle.
  • Just imagine how much easier your day will be when you're brain is operating at its best.  We've all been "in the zone", now its possible to feel like that all day!
  • We have had great success so far, but we need your help to get our first large batch produced.  In exchange for your help, we would like to offer you these amazing products at a HUGE DISCOUNT!

We use only the highest quality natural ingredients which have all been proven to be safe and effective!!

What the people who have used FreeMind™ have to say:

-"FreeMind helps to provide me with the focus and energy that I need throughout the day, every day. The first day I started taking FreeMind I immediately noticed a difference in my athletic performance, mental clarity, and ability to focus."

-"For me this product is an important part of my health routine."

-"I’ve had significant improvement in my memory and focus... Powerful Product!"

-"From day one, after taking it in the morning, I felt as if my thoughts became more clear and fluid. "

-"What I found through using this product was 1) I wish I would have had access to a product like this during my collegiate career and 2) I feel less stressed and more focused throughout my day"

Now, we know what you're thinking, "this sounds great, but where does all the money go?"

  • We need $15,000 to get the first batch of product produced and packaged. (This is the minimum order size)
  • The other $5,000 (or what is left after indiegogo gets their part) will go towards advertising and getting the word out about these game changing products!

Here is what you get out of it...

  • In return for your early support, you'll be one the first to get FreeMind™, you will get it at a huge discount, and depending on the "perk" you choose, you could also get lifetime discounts on all FreeMind Nootropics products.
  • Some more great news, if for some reason we don't reach our goal (unlikely), you will get your money back.  We will not keep any of the money unless we hit our goal.  Thats a win for all of us!!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about the campaign. Tell all of your friends family and random strangers to help support this campaign so we can make this product available to everyone!
  • USE THE Indiegogo SHARE TOOLS!

Here is our Production Timeline

  • Aug 1st-31st: Raise The Money!
  • Sept 1st-30th: Contact the Manufacturer and have them order all of the ingredients.
  • Oct 1st-31st: Have the Manufacturer make the products, bottle them, and label them.
  • Nov 1st-30th: Mail out the Products to all of our supporters :-)

    • Frequently Asked Questions

    We know you must have a few questions, and did our best to answer the most popular ones here. Take a look at this section, and if you still have anything you’d like to know about our product or campaign, feel free to email us at info@freemindnootropics.com.

    -Does it work?

    Absolutely! Not only have all of our ingredients been shown to be effective in clinical trails, but we take these products daily and love them (so we know you will too!)

    -How do I use FreeMind™?

    To help support enhanced cognitive performance, take a serving of 2 capsules in the morning or early afternoon preferably on an empty stomach or with a light meal. If 2 capsules aren’t enough, you may increase this initial dose to a maximum of 3 capsules daily.  For enhanced athletic performance take 1-2 capsules 30-60 mins before physical activity. Do not exceed 4 capsules within a 24 hour period unless otherwise directed by a heath care practitioner.

    -Is FreeMind™ safe?

    Our products have no known side effects.  All of our ingredients have received the designation GRAS (Generally Regarded As Safe) by the FDA.

    -Is is safe to take FreeMind™ with other medication?

    We recommend talking to your doctor before taking FreeMind™ if you are taking any medication just to be safe.

    -Is it safe for pregnant women?

    Current research is inconclusive on the effects of nootropics on pregnancy. We always like to play it safe and do not market our product to anyone who is pregnant.

    -What about kids?

    We don't recommend or market our product to children under the age of 18.

    -Can I use FreeMind™ with coffee or energy drinks?

    Using our products with coffee and energy drinks is perfectly safe.  We frequently take our products with coffee.  The only reason we don't recommend taking them with energy drinks is that we don't necessarily endorse the use of energy drinks haha

    -Where is FreeMind™ manufactured?

    FreeMind™ is manufactured and bottled right here in the USA – in an FDA-registered facility.

story:
This is an all or nothing campaign. If the campaign does not reach it's goal you will be refunded the full amount by Indiegogo.

All funds from contributions from the campaign will to go toward taking the Almond into production. 

If you like the almond, please consider becoming a funder or sharing on social media (even a dollar goes a long way to show you "like" us). 



I really like fitness trackers. Ok, I like the idea of them. I'm not a huge fan of their design. Plus, there's more to life than being a hanger for lean muscle. 

There's an emotional element to wellness that isn't addressed.


The Almond Wellness Token takes in both physical and emotional dimensions to wellness, and it does so in a discrete, and comforting token.

Fitness data is tracked as all fitness trackers do, with motion sensors. This allows the Almond to track workouts, steps taken and sleep patterns. All you have to do is keep it in your pocket, wear it on the included band, or hang it from your neck. It'll track away.

The real magic happens on the underside of the Almond. 

Here is where you'll find sensors for heart rate and skin resistance. 

These two sensors allow the Almond to gather data on your emotional state.

This data is used by looking for heart rate variability and galvanic skin response, similar to a polygraph. Instead of analyzing whether you are lying or not however, the Almond is looking for patterns of calm vs arousal.


The Almond has three modes:

Wake,

Stress/Calm, and

Sleep.

The stress mode is most effective when the Almond is held in your hand. The smooth, textured weight of the Almond is comforting while the data on your emotional state is used to vibrate the Almond in specific patterns depending on level of stress.  

Use this mode when under stress to create a biofeedback loop to help guide you toward calm. 

As you hold the Almond in Stress Mode, you focus on bringing on the calming pattern, creating a feedback loop between your level of emotional stress and the Almond's vibration pattern.

This could be used during times of meditation or relaxation as well. Here, the Almond will give you tactile feedback on the quality of calm and stillness. 

You can also use this mode to gamify and track your meditation sessions. 

Using the Almond mobile app you can then view these insights as well as insights on physical wellness.  


Open and Connected

With the Almond's open API you can connect the Almond to other apps like:  

·  MyFitnessPal,  

·  Coach.me,  

·  MapMyFitness,  

·  Strava,  

·  Withings, and  

·  IFTTT.

Some examples of what you can do when you connect the Almond to other apps.

Have Coach.me reminders sent to your Almond for a gentle nudge to achieve your goals throughout the day.  

Have your calendar events sync to the Almond and have a tactile reminder before an event.

Develop apps and games which respond to biological cues during game play.

Connecting the Almond with IFTTT is particularly exciting. This allows you to connect your biological cues in a myriad of ways. Have your smart lights react to your emotional state, or dim and shift in hue as bedtime approaches. Create a meditation playlist that spools up automatically. Dim your lights as bedtime approaches.

Create something of your own as well.

The Options

Choose from 3 color options - Pearl, Slate, and Sable - and for a limited run, the Wood Edition, made from real wood.

All Almonds have a semi-gloss finish, are water proof and sync and charge wirelessly. Each Almond weighs approximately 41g.

Due to the nature of the materials used on the shell, do not anticipate a completely uniform color or texture. These materials were chosen for that very reason, to give a quality to each Almond that engages the sense of touch.

Yep, wireless charging and syncing.

Every almond comes with a wireless charging pad, and syncs over Bluetooth Low Energy. This means no carrying a cable to sync, and the ability to snag insights at any time.

Being wireless also lets us create a waterproof Almond.

Built on top of a proven platform.

MetaWear is a proven and working platform for developing wearables. We will be working closely with them when our campaign is successful to take the Almond all the way!


Don't just be fit. BE WELL, with Almond. The premier wellness token.


This is an all or nothing campaign. If the campaign does not reach it's goal you will be refunded the full amount by Indiegogo.

All funds from contributions from the campaign will to go toward taking the Almond into production. 

If you like the almond, please consider becoming a funder or sharing on social media (even a dollar goes a long way to show you "like" us). 


Timeline

The campaign's goal is to fund the first round of development and production.

After the 30 days are up things get cracking

Feb - May

Test and develop the Almond.

Develop the app

May - Aug

Production of the Almond and shipping to you.


Challenges

Manufacturing and shipping a product is always tricky. The full funding goal was chosen to allow the Almond production to be undertaken by an experienced team based on minimum orders needed, but delays may still occur. While the Almond is built on a solid platform, sensors for heart rate and skin resistance need to be sourced and integrated.


About Bryan Mock

Bryan Mock is trained as an architect but is always thinking about how improvements could be made to the items and materials interacted with in the daily world. He enjoys products which have a message to tell beyond their basic use and labeling.

Plus, there's more to life than being a hanger for lean muscle.

an emotional element to wellness that isn't addressed.
The Almond Wellness Token
takes in both physical and emotional dimensions to wellness, and it does so in a discrete, and comforting token.Fitness data is
tracked as all fitness trackers do, with motion sensors. This allows
the Almond to track workouts, steps taken and sleep patterns. All you have to
do is keep it in your pocket, wear it on the included band, or hang it from
your neck. It'll track away.
The real magic happens on the underside of the Almond. 
Here is where you'll find sensors for heart rate and skin resistance. These two sensors allow the Almond to gather data on your emotional state.This data is used by looking for heart rate variability and galvanic skin response, similar to a polygraph. story:
NoMoFlow Technology  - Summary

A toilet overflow is like a hard drive crash - you've either had one or will have one.  Are you prepared for it?

Ever walk into your bathroom and find 2 inches of water on the floor?  Or heard a spilling sound and investigated only to find the toilet overflowing?  Well, millions of us have experienced just that horror.  Some people catch the overflow quickly while others experience catastrophic damage to their home or commercial building.

NoMoFlow Technology has developed a simple to install valve that will limit the volume of water from overflows of toilets and other appliances with the intention to prevent the disaster that so many of us have experienced.  There are 350 million toilets in the US that need this valve.  It can also be used on millions of dishwashers, water coolers, coffee machines, and other appliances connected to a water supply in the US. - or anywhere in the world.   No home or building should be without this amazing device!

"I wish I had this valve installed two years ago when my toilet overflowed.  The fans were drying out the house for a month while I lived with my dog and cat in the upstairs living room.  Then it was construction for 6 weeks.  Arrrggggggg..  Sure - the insurance company paid for almost all of the loss, but no way they could make up for the inconvenience.  And my fear... every time I leave the house, not knowing what I will find when I return home."  Chris, Redondo Beach, CA

The NoMoFlow valve works as a secondary controlling valve.  If the water flow is stopped by the primary control valve, as it would in a normal toilet flush for example, the valve resets and waits for the next usage.  If the water flow exceeds the set volume that would represent an abnormal flow, it activates and stops the water flow.  It's that simple!


Water is one of the most destructive forces on the planet.  It created the Grand Canyon and even geological relics we can see on Mars!  It is also the last commodity in our home that is not protected with a shut off valve.  We protect our homes with circuit breakers to protect against electrical shock.  Our electric outlets are required to have GFCI and AFCI shut-off protection.   All electrical appliances come equipped with fuses that stop the flow of electricity in the event of a failure.  Natural gas pipes have emergency shut-off valves and earthquake detection shut-off valves.  Isn’t it time we installed a valve to stop excess water flow?  NoMoFlow Technology has stepped up to the plate and has delivered such an item.
"The plastic piece that connects the hose to the bottom of the toilet tank broke.  We did not discover it till the whole side of the house was flooded and the noise of a wall collapsing alerted us.  The water bill indicated almost  600 gallons in excess of normal for the period.  It took over 6 months to get the house back to a semblance of normal.  What I would have given for a 3 gallon spill....."  Tom, Palos Verdes, CA

Property and Casualty insurance companies spend upwards of $9 Billion dollars each year on homeowner claims for interior flooding.  That does not even address the horrors when homeowners discover the damage to flooring, sub flooring, walls, furniture and fixtures.  How inconvenient and expensive is it to be displaced from your home for several weeks as the house dries out and the repairs are made?  How much of the loss will your insurance policy pay – if it covers it at all?

"I own several multi-tenant residential building.  I would not hesitate to say YES if one of my tenants asked me if I would reimburse them for the cost of  installing a NoMoFlow valve on the toilets and dishwasher in their unit."  Drake, Redondo Beach, CA

Every home, apartment, condominium, hotel, commercial building and every building that contains an appliance that is connected to a water supply needs a NoMoFlow valve installed on each device to limit damage, liability, and financial loss.

"Unexpected repair expenses from toilet and dishwasher flooding are my largest unexpected expenses almost every year.  I've learned to budget for them.  Most times I cannot even expense them as I have to capitalize the cost.  Where have you been?"   Hank, Condominium Association Manager, Santa Monica, CA

The valve is easy for anyone with a wrench to install and it takes just minutes.  It is also adjustable and can be reset in the event of a double flush or an unwanted triggering of the valve.

I want my overflow device installed on every toilet and dishwasher in every home, condominium, rental unit and commercial property in the US - and then the rest of the world. 


Retail Price Target

We are targeting a suggested retail price of $59.99 to $75.99 for the valve.  Be sure to lock in your savings and place your order now before the price goes up. 


Made in USA!

We are committed to manufacturing the components and assembling the valves here in the good old US of A!


The Background

I’ve been thinking about this issue for quite a while.  Just recently a friend of mine had a toilet overflow in the middle of the night.  By the time the water was shut off and removed there was extensive damage to the entire section of the home that included the bathroom, 2 bedrooms and a den.  The damage was extensive, but the inconvenience and disruption was traumatic for the entire family. 

That was the mitigating factor that spurred me to action to put my idea into motion.  I had my doubts.  One day, when I doubted myself the most and was about to abandon the idea, my toilet overflowed.  You know, the one that had never overflowed as long as we’ve been here.  I caught it by the sound and before more than several gallons had flooded the floor.  Several dozen towels and a bucket and it was all cleaned up.  I was lucky.  The two or three gallons were not enough to cause any damage to the flooring or walls.  Imagine if I had not caught the flooding in time!  Then it happened again the next day - and then again a third time.  My toilet was talking to me.  I made up my mind to go ahead with the project.

"I own a construction company.  We build, repair, and renovate homes and commercial spaces.  I would include the installation of NoMoFlow Valves on every job whether the owner asked for it or not."  Alan, Pasadena, CA


Update 3/15/2015



The past week saw us improve the original design with a new (from the bottom of diagram) linear input flow  and turbine.  We also redesigned the reset and adjustment mechanism on the top of the valve.  Our current design will be about 1.8 inches wide and just under 3 inches long.  We will be able to adjust the flow from about 1 gallon to about 12 gallons. 


Where we are now:

After soliciting three patent searches for similar devices and finding none, I engaged an engineering and product development firm to design a valve and create a  prototype.  It took a bit longer than we expected, but they delivered.  With the prototype in hand I filed for a provisional patent.  Here are some of the drawings and the prototype is pictured above.  We made the prototype out of clear plastic so we can see the operation of the internal mechanisms.  The final product will not have the screws as in the prototype.



I've spent almost $40,000 of my own money to create a working prototype for proof of concept.  Now that we have proven the concept to be feasible it is necessary to develop the next generation prototype.  The objective is to reduce the size of the valve and the number of parts, and manufacture it with brass or other high quality plumbing materials.  This will enhance reliability, longevity, and reduce component manufacturing costs. 

I've made arrangements with the Aerospace and Mechanical Engineering department at the University of Southern California (USC) to adopt the engineering of the next stage as a Directed Research Project course for Graduate Students.  Three engineering graduate students have been selected to collaborate as a team and will be supported with the full force and brilliance of the University.  The goal is to have a second prototype produced and ready for full production by the end of June 2015.

We also have Robert Frinier as our manufacturing and logistics lead consultant and Tom Liesy as advisor on financial forecasts and planning. 


Risks and Challenges:

No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially one that will have such a huge impact on mankind. We have worked extremely hard to take this product to the next phase of it's evolution.  Here are the risks that we can identify as we take the NoMoFlow valve through development and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment:

Product Development:  We have created a proof of concept prototype - we need to improve it and make it more efficient to manufacture.  There is always risk that there will be snafus in the design process and that the design will have to be modified as we enter production.

Manufacturing:  Creating the tooling to manufacture a product of the size and complexity we expect is expensive and requires expert knowledge to get it right. A lead time of 30 to 60 days is typically required to create the machining and fabrications, and this is where delays could occur. To minimize that possibility we will work with tooling manufacturer partners with a track record for quality and service, and that have been certified for ISO 9000 or ISO 9001.

Product Adjustments:  As the valve gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor modifications to improve the final product performance. Production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our modifications and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These improvements will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer.

Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we work closely with the manufacturers and have input every step of the way.

Fulfilment:  We will be working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you, our valve customer.


What will the funds be used for?

The funds raised will be used to bring the valve to market, the largest of which will be legal counsel, patent application, testing and certification, tooling and molds, packaging, and the cost of the first order. 

Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make the valve storm America and serve humanity by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

For more information about me see my links under my Team profile.


Send us your water disaster story:

Submit the story of your disaster from water damage.  The top summaries published on the campaign will receive free NoMoFlow valves.  Please send text in email to NoMoFlow_Technology@icloud.com.  Photos are welcome.

story:
About Us

ReddBoa Inc. is a holistic, social enterprise model that offers an amalgamation of programs in Brazilian jiu jitsu, yoga, sustainable agriculture, and educational programming for all age groups.  These programs serve as a conduit for personal and social change by improving health and well-being and providing opportunities in youth and adult education and community building. ReddBoa's programs facilitate contemplation, discussion, and action both on the mat and in the community.  Through the combination of the practices of both jiu jitsu and yoga, ReddBoa builds and strengthens communities by creating strong youth-adult partnerships, a healthier population, and a more compassionate and supportive culture.  


The founders and owners, John H Redd and Pertula George-Redd are a dynamic team combining John's 35 years of martial arts training and Pertula's twelve years’ experience managing youth development and sustainable agriculture programs. Born and raised in St. Lucia, Pertula has spent the last 16 years in the US gleaning best practices in non-profit management and social enterprise.  She holds an MA in Sustainable International Development, a BA in International Studies and is a certified vinyasa and prenatal yoga instructor.  In addition to his martial arts training, BS in Psychology and professional certifications, John is also a talented corporate trainer with over 18 years of experience in the field of learning and development and curriculum design.  Together, they will employ their skills, expertise, and passion, to implement holistic programs that will help combat the social and economic ills plaguing St. Lucia.  



The Issues We're Seeking to Impact


The problem of crime in St. Lucia is a national and personal one.  After losing six family members to homicide we have committed ourselves to creating impactful, life-changing programs for youth and adults.  Each tragic time a cousin was beaten or stabbed to death, the anger, sadness and frustration grew.  These tragic and senseless killings caused tremendous pain and ignited the fervor to take a calculated stand against violence.  

Limited extracurricular and job opportunities for young people have directly contributed to the crime rate on the island. The youth unemployment rate is over 40% and one-third of the prisoners are between the age of 16 and 25.  It is estimated that youth crime and violence in St. Lucia generates approx. USD$3 million in lost benefits to society and approx. USD$7.7 million in lost benefits to private individuals annually.  

To address the problem of violence against women, ReddBoa trains women in the jiu jitsu tenants of self-defense: Prevention, Rapid Response Defenses, and Ambush Response Defenses. 

ReddBoa also offers trainings in leadership skills, team building, conflict resolution, job readiness as well as opportunities in youth mentoring and volunteerism.  Our programs give the most disenfranchised youth the opportunity to channel their energies in more productive ways.  Youth develop new skills through educational workshops and the physical and mental practice of BJJ and yoga.  

ReddBoa operates from best practices in positive youth development and evidence-based programs, giving youth the platform to be heard and to lead.


Health and Wellness: St. Lucia has the highest rate of diabetes and the second highest rate of hypertension in the world, per capita, as well as one of the highest rates of obesity in the Caribbean. Now is the time to introduce yoga and BJJ to help combat these negative health outcomes.   One of the contributors to poor health is diet.  St. Lucians would benefit from more organic food options.  ReddBoa provides organic gardening classes and workshops through our organic demonstration garden, promoting self-sufficiency, healthy eating, and education around sustainable farming practices.

The health benefits of yoga have been studied widely and are numerous.  Yoga helps lower blood pressure, blood sugar and bad cholesterol while boosting good cholesterol.  Yoga has been found to lower blood sugar in several ways--by lowering blood sugar levels, patients decrease the risk of diabetic complications such as heart attack, kidney failure, and blindness. Likewise, the dynamic practice of Jiu Jitsu is associated with many benefits including weight loss, improved health and increased physical and mental fitness.  BJJ cultivates an appreciation and appetite for hard work and perseverance.   BJJ promotes the concept that a smaller weaker person can successfully defend against a bigger stronger assailant by using leverage and proper techniques. 

Jeremy Lafreniere (owner Capital MMA and Elite Fitness), John Redd (co-founder ReddBoa), Royce Gracie (MMA Champion and Legend)  


Our Impact

Through your support, ReddBoa is poised to introduce a unique mix of fitness, enrichment, leadership, and advocacy training to the most underserved populations. Our social enterprise model allows us to reinvest our earnings back into the community by directly serving seniors and disenfranchised youth therefore making our programs accessible and available to all demographics. Your contributions will allow us to reach the most underserved youth and adults in St. Lucia.  

ReddBoa provides students with tools for a life-long practice of personal and community empowerment through educational workshops--covering topics of leadership, management, team building, interpersonal skills, presentation skills, public speaking, job readiness and more--community building activities such as developing community gardens and cultivating environmental stewardship through volunteer programs--and the physical and mental training of martial arts, yoga, and gardening, calming the mind, strengthening the body, and inspiring creativity. In an era where fast food and sedentary lifestyles are a threat to our well-being, learning how to stay disciplined and healthy is a martial art.  

As the former Executive Director of a fledgling non-profit organization, Pertula brought people of all backgrounds together to advance a common cause.  During her tenure as ED, Prince Charles of Whales who is an avid organic farmer, the former US Surgeon General Dr. Regina Benjamin, and other dignitaries visited the half-acre farm to learn more about the organization's mission and applauded Pertula for her work and accomplishments in the community.  In 2013, President Obama thanked Pertula for her contributions in his speech at her naturalization ceremony at the White House (minute 4:35). 

John holds a purple belt in BJJ and trains under the Royce Gracie lineage.  In his professional life, he has  won several employee performance awards for his dynamic facilitation and leadership skills.  Some of his accolades include facilitator of the year as well as multiple employee achievement awards.                                                       

 Anse-la-Raye Primary School “Sowing Seeds of Change”  youth trainees   

In 2005, Pertula partnered with Catalyst Organic Garden (COG) owners, Damian and Ratoya Adjodha, to pilot a youth and agriculture awareness day called (Eat In Act Out).  The event took place at COG in Anse-la Raye, as part of The Food Project’s international day outcry.  The intent of the day was to raise awareness around sustainable agriculture and healthy food access.  A small group of 13 students, from various secondary schools on the island, were invited to learn and participate in this day of action.  The day comprised of several educational activities which were centered around healthy eating habits and organic farming methodologies.  Eat In Act Out successfully engaged and inspired students to become more informed about our global food system, the clear differences between conventional vs sustainable organic agriculture and how those practices directly affect them as citizens of Southern nations. 

Catalyst Organic Gardens also successfully held a two week intensive training program called Sowing The Seeds of Change, where a cohort of youth were trained in sustainable organic agricultural techniques including: seedling production, crop planning, pest control, composting and weed management. The enthusiam and overall sense of accomplishment can still be felt as many of the former youth trainees still recall their days in training and some have gone on to become farmers and community organizers. ReddBoa will continue to form alliances with local community groups that are creating impact and changing lives.  

                                             

Catalyst Organic Gardens Day of Action participants in Anse la Raye, St. Lucia


Risks & Challenges

Lack of awareness of the benefits of BJJ and yoga: ReddBoa would be the first BJJ school on the island. Therefore, we plan on launching extensive marketing and educational campaigns to raise awareness of the benefits of BJJ and self-defense.  Likewise, yoga is fairly new on the island--there is only one official yoga studio.  Because of the cost and lack of understanding of yoga, the practice is only accessible to a small group of people. We will employ our motivational skills to recruit and retain students of all ages and backgrounds.  

As the premiere multi-discipline training center in St. Lucia, we will provide multiple opportunities and programs to keep people of all backgrounds and ages excited and engaged.  Our affiliation with Capital MMA and collaboration with Radiance Yoga, in Virginia, will bring diversity to the mat through student and instructor exchanges.  As part of our international guest instructor program we will host instructors from all over the world throughout the year.  Finally, we will have a diverse revenue stream to ensure that the social programs are supported financially.  Through our social enterprise model we will reinvest our profits in programs that benefit the community.  The following funding streams will help sustain the youth and community programs:

-Membership dues

-Workshop and seminar fees

-Tournaments

-Local, regional, and international retreats

-Grants

-Events and fundraisers

-Event hosting for outside groups (rental income)

Between 1965 and 2000, St. Lucia lost 71% of its tertiary educated workforce to developed countries (mainly the US). Pertula is one of the few in the 71% who will move back to St. Lucia.  Her decision is driven by her personal and professional commitment and passion to developing and implementing the most impactful youth and community programs to serve disenfranchised youth.  ReddBoa's Long Term Goal is to equip its graduates to manage and staff expansion sites in towns and villages across the country.


Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Graduation


How You Can Support ReddBoa's Launch

We need your help in order to purchase the land and construct the training facility:

  • 11,000 square feet of land USD$125,000
  • Design and Construction of the low-cost Facility USD$200,000
How your donations will be spent $USD:
  • Land: $125,000
  • Architectural Drawings: $5,000
  • Electric poles: $2,200
  • Shipping Containers: $15,730
  • Roofs: $22,000 
  • Foundations/floors: $28,500
  • Walls: $22,000
  • MEP, Finishing, interior fixtures, furnishings etc.: $24,570
  • Labor: $80,000
Total cost USD$325,000.


The land is located in the north of the island with easy access to public transportation.  We will be working with a local construction company (Tropic Builders) to design and build the green indoor and out door facility.  The facility will be built using locally sourced reclaimed and recycled materials such as used electricity poles and shipping containers.  




Another way you can support our launch is to participate in alternative vacation or spring break volunteer activities with ReddBoa.  We need volunteers in different capacities and phases of the project: construction, grand opening, workshop facilitation, class instruction, gardening and fundraising.  

Some cool perks to say thank you: TuliArt Artwork, ReddBoa t-shirts, yoga and jiu jitsu classes and vacation home accommodation.  As a donor and supporter you are invited and encouraged to visit St. Lucia and ReddBoa to experience, first-hand, the impact of your contributions--get a tour of the facility, meet our members/students, and attend classes. 

Click here to learn more about the talented artist behind TuilArt, Thato Mwosa. and view photos our our villa here.


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please get the word out.  Share on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and all other social media platforms.  Share with your family and friends via email! AND use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Come to St. Lucia and volunteer with ReddBoa as an alternative vacation or spring break activity--we need volunteers to help with construction and set-up, gardening, workshop facilitation, and class instruction.
  • WE CANNOT ACCOMPLISH THIS WITHOUT YOUR SUPPORT!! 
  • Thank you for making a contribution and sharing with your networks!!

Gracie Barra Praia - Rio de Janeiro, Brazil


A Special Thank You to the Following Sponsors:
  1. TuilArt, Thato Mosa 
  2. Capital MMA and Elite Fitness, Jeremy Lafreniere
  3. Radiance Yoga, Masuda Mohamadi
  4. MKG Designs, Architectural Services, Michael George
story_txt:
About Us


ReddBoa Inc. is a holistic, social enterprise model that offers an amalgamation of programs in Brazilian jiu jitsu, yoga, sustainable agriculture, and educational
programming for all age groups.  These programs serve as a conduit for personal and social change by improving health and well-being and providing opportunities in youth and adult education and community
building. ReddBoa's programs facilitate contemplation, discussion, and action both on the mat and in the community.  Through the combination of the practices of both jiu jitsu and yoga, ReddBoa builds and strengthens communities by creating strong youth-adult partnerships, a healthier population, and a more compassionate and supportive culture.  


The founders and owners, John H Redd and Pertula George-Redd are a dynamic team combining John's 35 years of martial arts training and Pertula's twelve years’ experience managing youth development and sustainable agriculture programs. Born and raised in St. Lucia, Pertula has spent the last 16 years in the US gleaning best practices in non-profit management and social enterprise.  She holds an MA in Sustainable International Development, a BA in International Studies and is a certified vinyasa and prenatal yoga instructor.  In addition to his martial arts training, BS in Psychology and professional certifications, John is also a talented corporate trainer with over 18 years of experience in the field of learning and development and curriculum design.  Together, they will employ their skills, expertise, and passion, to implement holistic programs that will help combat the social and economic ills plaguing St. Lucia.  





The Issues We're Seeking to Impact


The problem of crime in St. Lucia is a national and personal one.  After losing six family members to homicide we have committed ourselves to creating impactful, life-changing programs for youth and adults.  Each tragic time a cousin was beaten or stabbed to death, the anger, sadness and frustration grew.  These tragic and senseless killings caused tremendous pain and ignited the fervor to take a calculated stand against violence.  
Limited extracurricular and job opportunities for young people have directly contributed to the crime rate on the island. The youth unemployment rate is over 40% and one-third of the prisoners are between the age of 16 and 25.  It is estimated that youth crime and violence in St. Lucia generates approx. USD$3 million in lost benefits to society and approx. USD$7.7 million in lost benefits to private individuals annually.  
To address the problem of violence against women, ReddBoa trains women in the jiu jitsu tenants of
self-defense: Prevention, Rapid Response Defenses, and Ambush Response Defenses. 
ReddBoa also offers trainings in leadership skills, team building, conflict resolution, job readiness as well as opportunities in youth mentoring and volunteerism.  Our programs give the most disenfranchised youth the opportunity to channel their energies in more productive ways.  Youth develop new skills through educational workshops and the physical and mental practice of BJJ and yoga.

Jeremy Lafreniere (owner Capital MMA and Elite Fitness), John Redd (co-founder ReddBoa), Royce Gracie (MMA Champion and Legend)

story:
Mixer for producing Oxygen cocktails with direct introduction of oxygen at the liquid-mixing time

My interest for oxygen-enriched drinks woke up as far back as in the beginning of the 2000-th. A long period of time I made my experiments mixing liquids with oxygen. As a result, I invented a mixer for oxygen cocktails to be used everywhere: in bars, restaurants, sports complexes, outdoors and even at home.

Three years ago, I had to stop my work at the project because of shortage of money but now I have an opportunity to finish it and start a serial production of my oxygen mixer to sell it worldwide.

My wish is that as many as possible people could drink oxygen drinks. While working on my invention I noticed that many Americans took interest in it. Owing to the great popularity of “Oxygen Bars”, I am sure, oxygen cocktails would take a worthy place in the market.

We present a model of the oxygen mixer produced in form of the first artificial Earth satellite.

This model is very steady and looks up to date. 






The mixer model may be produced in different colors.


                                                                                   

OXYGEN COCKTAIL

Today the tempo of life in big cities is so intense that it gives fewer and fewer chances to feel healthy and to stay healthy as long as possible. We can make a long list of what we need to be healthy. And perhaps the first item will be oxygen. The precious source of priceless life is disappearing from big cities and leaving their inhabitants melancholic, exhausted and depressed.

The Oxygen cocktail enables the cities’ prisoners to take a refreshing portion of oxygen.

The Oxygen cocktail is about a thick delicious foam made of any sort of liquid basis (juice, milk, syrups) and thousands of fleeting but incredibly helpful and healthy molecules of oxygen. Tireless armies of tiny “oxygen workers” help the body to quickly and effectively get rid of the negative consequences of oxygen starvation and get the energy, the vitality and the good mood. One portion of an Oxygen cocktail can be a good equivalent of some hours’ of walk in the forest.

As the oxygen foam gets to the digestive tract, it starts its work and is sucked into the blood and lymph trying to pay attention to all the cells, detoxifying and deleting all the substances which the body doesn’t need any more. The foam improves the metabolism and the blood supply of the cells and brings the reflex actions into balance.

The Oxygen cocktail is everyone’s need. The life-bringing molecules are ready to give oxygen to everyone who needs it. And for little children, expectant mother and elderly people the oxygen cocktail is a must.

Children will especially like this foamy drink. The Oxygen cocktail will increase their energy which is essential for adequate growth, development and the immune system. This is especially important for those children who get frequently ill.      

Sportsmen and fitness freaks have a great necessity of the oxygen. Intensive muscles contraction demands high levels of oxygen. Additional portions of oxygen will optimize sports performance and lead to the soonest possible strength recovery after such efforts.

The Oxygen cocktail is a true friend helping you to lose weight and stay slim. The low value of fat in the drink reduces hunger because the light foam fills almost the entire stomach leaving no place for something sweet and excessive foodstuffs. Besides, the Oxygen cocktail activates the work of the liver cells and reduces fat. You’ll lose excess weight without any effort because your metabolism will be in perfect balance.

The Oxygen cocktail will also help those who can’t stop smoking. This drink cleans out the lungs.

The Oxygen cocktail is of great importance for expectant mothers. Pregnancy causes the volume of blood to increase. That’s why women need more oxygen to nourish the blood. Oxygen starvation that expectant mothers suffer from leads to the fetal hypoxia. That’s why the Oxygen cocktail will help women get rid of unpleasant effects of oxygen starvation.

 

It’s silly to think that intellectual work doesn’t hurt your health. Medical specialists call chronic fatigue syndrome the disease of the 21st century. Time doesn’t stop, it moves faster making life incredibly intense. In this situation sleep disorders and overfatigue is something we can’t afford. The Oxygen cocktail allows you to forget what headache, apathy, fatigue and irritation is. You will be able to work in the tempo that fits you best without worrying if your body is able to bear it.

The vital cocktail takes care of those who have heart diseases and cardiovascular, respiratory, nervous and digestive disorders. Such disorders have a negative effect on the supply of the body with energy. The Oxygen cocktail will allow you to get rid of these disorders.

Health problems one had being young and many years of work affect elderly people. And they often suffer from a lot of diseases, mainly from chronic oxygen starvation or so-called hypoxia. The brain and the heart muscle of elderly people are most sensible for the lack of oxygen. 7-8 minutes with no oxygen circulation in the blood are enough to make irreversible changes in the brain and it will be practically impossible to bring the body back to life. The Oxygen cocktail gives you the feeling of enlightenment or to be more exact the feeling of lightness and weightlessness. This is nothing else but the improvement of the brain functions. The Oxygen cocktail is a must if you have problems with bronchopulmonary, cardiovascular and respiratory systems and chronic diseases and fatigue.

Specialists recommend taking courses of Oxygen cocktail therapy (7-10 cocktails per course – 1-2 portions a day). You  will get the best healing and beneficial effect if you eat it slowly with a spoon or drink it with a straw within 5-10 minutes after it was made.

Fans of diets and fasting will naturally appreciate a diet called “oxygen slim”. You’ll only need to take 5 portions of cocktail on the daily basis instead of meals. Two days of this diet will clean your bowels and make room for useful bacteria and microorganisms.

Sportsmen and fitness freaks can drink this cocktail before their training sessions (this will significantly boost their performance) as well as after the sessions (to build up one’s strength).

The Oxygen cocktail industry pays back your investments very quickly. You make money out of thin air in the direct and the indirect meaning of this phrase!

The Oxygen cocktail can be made even at home. And you don’t need to spend much time and effort to do this.

         HOW TO MAKE OXYGEN COCKTAIL WITH       

                        AN OXYGEN MIXER

The Oxygen cocktail is a product used for diets and therapeutic nutrition. It’s not a medication.

The Oxygen cocktail consists only of natural ingredients which meet the top quality standards.

To make an Oxygen cocktail :

  1. It’s necessary to fill the liquid (juice, water, milk, fruit drink) with oxygen. For this you’ll need a source of oxygen such as an oxygen cylinder or a device, producing oxygen such as an oxygen concentrator.
  2. Mix the liquid with oxygen till you get a steady foam. This can be done with the help of an Oxygen Mixer
  3. As the base of the drink you can use juice, milk or any unaerated drink. You can add alcohol drinks as well. We don’t recommend using nectars. The most foamy juices are apple, cherry, grape juices and fruit drinks. You’d better use cold drinks. Warm liquid breaks up the oxygen and stops the fine foam from building up.
  4. The last element of the Oxygen cocktail is the foam-forming ingredient. You’ll need to solve 2 grams of such substance in 100 ml of juice and you’ll get 300-400 grams of the oxygen foam.


  • Take a 350-400 ml container and put 2 grams of the foam-forming ingredient inside.
  • Add 100 ml of cold juice or other liquid.
  • Link the mixer to the source of oxygen (oxygen concentrator). You shouldn’t add water to the humidifier of the concentrator!
  • Put the Oxygen Mixer in the off mode into the container with the drink for 3-5 seconds to fill the liquid with oxygen.
  • Turn on the mixer for 10-15 seconds to make the foamy drink.
  • Then turn off the mixer and the Oxygen cocktail is ready.

In bars and clubs Oxygen cocktail with alcohol are very popular. The most tasty cocktail is the one made on the base of aromatic wine. And those who take care of their health would be pleased to find out that oxygen reduces the harmful effect of the alcohol.

The foam we get while making Oxygen cocktail can’t be kept for a long time and should be drank right away.


How does the Oxygen cocktail work?

The Oxygen cocktail has a three-stage effect on the body:

Stage 1 “Sucking”

After the foam is delivered through the mouth and into the stomach and partly into the gut, the oxygen together with the fito elements and vitamins is sucked into the blood and circulates there in the dissolved form. This makes oxygen move quicker and more easily fill parts of the body and the tissues.

Stage 2 “How oxygen works”

The energy of oxygen is transformed into the energy of the biological processes, stimulates the microcirculation and the permeability of the cell’s membrane, stimulates the redox strengthening the energy sources of the body, widens its abilities and stimulates its immune system. In addition, the oxygenation of the body stimulates the metabolism in cells, harmonizes the metabolism and the reflex processes into harmony, activates the blood circulation, regulates the nutrition and the renewing of the tissues.

Stage 3 “How the fito-vitamin complex works”

Since the metabolism is activated, the digestion of vitamins and herbal substances of the cocktail is improved. That’s why their effect is strengthened (and can be even doubled).

In other words, the oxygen cocktail starts a chain reaction. And, as a result, the body turns from a dysfunctioning into a healthy one. Our productivity is improved, the sleep is optimized, the metabolism is activated and so on.

                         Risks and challenges

While manufacturing a product has become easier in today's well-connected world, it’s still quite a complex challenge. To best prepare for the challenges ahead, we've partnered with supply chain and manufacturing experts and have recruited advisers and board members, who can provide expert advice and help us tackle challenges in production, engineering and retail management.

We have developed our plan for manufacturing in Asia and for shipping to our backers around the world.

Although it's difficult to plan for every unforeseen circumstance, such as political or economic events that might delay production or delivery, we've created contingency plans should these type of problems arise. Nevertheless, we are certain to face unexpected challenges throughout this journey and will do our best to solve them quickly.


             

Thank you so much for checking out our project !!!

Remember if we don't reach our goal then we won't get funded, and no one will get    use Oxygen mixer. So please share with your friends and family!

FAQ

OXYGEN COCKTAIL
 Today the tempo of
life in big cities is so intense that it gives fewer
and fewer chances to feel healthy and to stay healthy as long as possible. We
can make a long list of what we need to be healthy. And perhaps the first item
will be oxygen. The precious source of priceless life is disappearing from big
cities and leaving their inhabitants melancholic, exhausted and depressed. 
The Oxygen cocktail enables the cities’ prisoners to take a refreshing portion of oxygen. 
The Oxygen cocktail is about a thick delicious foam made of any sort of liquid basis
(juice, milk, syrups) and thousands of fleeting but incredibly helpful and healthy
molecules of oxygen. Tireless armies of tiny “oxygen workers” help the body to quickly
and effectively get rid of the negative consequences of oxygen starvation and get
the energy, the vitality and the good mood. One portion of an Oxygen cocktail can be a good equivalent of some hours’ of
walk in the forest.


As the
oxygen foam gets to the digestive tract, it starts its work and is sucked into
the blood and lymph trying to pay attention to all the cells, detoxifying and
deleting all the substances which the body doesn’t need any more. The foam improves
the metabolism and the blood supply of the cells and brings the reflex actions
into balance.
The Oxygen cocktail is everyone’s need. The life-bringing molecules
are ready to give oxygen to everyone who needs it. And for little children,
expectant mother and elderly people the oxygen cocktail is a must.
Children
will especially like this foamy drink. The Oxygen cocktail will increase their energy which is essential
for adequate growth, development and the immune system. This is especially
important for those children who get frequently ill.       
Sportsmen
and fitness freaks have a great necessity of the oxygen. Intensive muscles contraction
demands high levels of oxygen. Additional portions of oxygen will optimize
sports performance and lead to the soonest possible strength recovery after
such efforts.

The Oxygen cocktail is a true friend helping you to lose
weight and stay slim. The low value of fat in the drink reduces hunger because
the light foam fills almost the entire stomach leaving no place for something
sweet and excessive foodstuffs. Besides, the Oxygen cocktail activates the work of the liver cells and
reduces fat. You’ll lose excess weight without any effort because your
metabolism will be in perfect balance.
The Oxygen cocktail will also help those who can’t stop smoking. This drink cleans out the
lungs.
The Oxygen cocktail is of great importance for expectant mothers. Pregnancy causes
the volume of blood to increase. That’s why women need more oxygen to nourish the
blood. Oxygen starvation that expectant mothers suffer from leads to the fetal
hypoxia. That’s why the Oxygen cocktail will help women get rid of
unpleasant effects of oxygen starvation.  It’s
silly to think that intellectual work doesn’t hurt your health. Medical
specialists call chronic fatigue syndrome the disease of the 21st
century. Time doesn’t stop, it moves faster making life incredibly intense. In
this situation sleep disorders and overfatigue is something we can’t afford.
The Oxygen cocktail allows
you to forget what headache, apathy, fatigue and irritation is. You will be
able to work in the tempo that fits you best without worrying if your body is
able to bear it.
The vital
cocktail takes care of those who have heart diseases and cardiovascular,
respiratory, nervous and digestive disorders. Such disorders have a negative
effect on the supply of the body with energy. The Oxygen cocktail will allow you to get rid of these
disorders.
Health
problems one had being young and many years of work affect elderly people. And
they often suffer from a lot of diseases, mainly from chronic oxygen starvation
or so-called hypoxia. The brain and the heart muscle of elderly people are most
sensible for the lack of oxygen. 7-8 minutes with no oxygen circulation in the
blood are enough to make irreversible changes in the brain and it will be
practically impossible to bring the body back to life. The Oxygen cocktail gives
you the feeling of enlightenment or to be more exact the feeling of lightness
and weightlessness. This is nothing else but the improvement of the brain
functions. The Oxygen cocktail is a must
if you have problems with bronchopulmonary, cardiovascular and respiratory
systems and chronic diseases and fatigue. 

Specialists
recommend taking courses of Oxygen cocktail therapy (7-10 cocktails per course – 1-2 portions a
day). You  will get the best healing and
beneficial effect if you eat it slowly with a spoon or drink it with a straw within
5-10 minutes after it was made.
Fans of
diets and fasting will naturally appreciate a diet called “oxygen slim”. You’ll
only need to take 5 portions of cocktail on the daily basis instead of meals.
Two days of this diet will clean your bowels and make room for useful bacteria
and microorganisms. 
Sportsmen
and fitness freaks can drink this cocktail before their training sessions (this
will significantly boost their performance) as well as after the sessions (to
build up one’s strength). 
The Oxygen cocktail industry pays back your investments very
quickly. You make money out of thin air in the direct and the indirect meaning
of this phrase!
The Oxygen cocktail can be made even at home. And you don’t
need to spend much time and effort to do this.
         HOW TO MAKE OXYGEN COCKTAIL WITH        
                        AN OXYGEN MIXER
The Oxygen cocktail is a product used for diets and therapeutic nutrition. It’s not a medication.
The Oxygen cocktail consists only of natural ingredients which meet the top quality
standards.
To make an Oxygen cocktail :
It’s necessary to fill the liquid (juice, water, milk, fruit drink) with oxygen. For this you’ll need a source of oxygen such as an oxygen cylinder or a device, producing oxygen such as an oxygen concentrator.
Mix the liquid with oxygen till you get a steady foam. This can be done with the help of an Oxygen Mixer
As the base of the drink you can use juice, milk or any unaerated drink. You can add alcohol drinks as well. We don’t recommend using nectars. The most foamy juices are apple, cherry, grape juices and fruit drinks. You’d better use cold drinks. Warm liquid breaks up the oxygen and stops the fine foam from building up. 

The last element of the Oxygen cocktail is the foam-forming ingredient. You’ll need to solve 2 grams of such substance in 100 ml of juice and you’ll get 300-400 grams of the oxygen foam.



 Take a 350-400 ml container
and put 2 grams of the foam-forming ingredient inside.

Add 100 ml of cold
juice or other liquid.

Link the mixer to the
source of oxygen (oxygen concentrator). You shouldn’t add
water to the humidifier of the concentrator!

Put the Oxygen Mixer
in the off mode into the container with the drink for 3-5 seconds to fill the
liquid with oxygen.

Turn on the mixer for
10-15 seconds to make the foamy drink.

Then turn off the
mixer and the Oxygen cocktail is ready.

In bars and
clubs Oxygen cocktail with alcohol are very popular. The most tasty cocktail
is the one made on the base of aromatic wine. And those who take care of their health
would be pleased to find out that oxygen reduces the harmful effect of the
alcohol.
The foam we get while
making Oxygen cocktail can’t be kept for a long time and should be drank right away. 

How does the Oxygen cocktail work?
The Oxygen cocktail has a three-stage effect on the body:
Stage 1 “Sucking”
After the foam is
delivered through the mouth and into the stomach and partly into the gut, the oxygen
together with the fito elements and vitamins is sucked into the blood and
circulates there in the dissolved form. This makes oxygen move quicker and more
easily fill parts of the body and the tissues. 
Stage 2 “How oxygen works”
The energy of oxygen
is transformed into the energy of the biological processes, stimulates the
microcirculation and the permeability of the cell’s membrane, stimulates the redox
strengthening the energy sources of the body, widens its abilities and
stimulates its immune system. In addition, the oxygenation of the body
stimulates the metabolism in cells, harmonizes the metabolism and the reflex
processes into harmony, activates the blood circulation, regulates the
nutrition and the renewing of the tissues.
Stage 3 “How the fito-vitamin complex works”
Since the metabolism
is activated, the digestion of vitamins and herbal substances of the cocktail
is improved. That’s why their effect is strengthened (and can be even doubled).
In other words, the
oxygen cocktail starts a chain reaction. And, as a result, the body turns from a dysfunctioning into a healthy one. Our
productivity is improved, the sleep is optimized, the metabolism is activated
and so on.                         Risks and challenges
While manufacturing a product has become easier in today's 
well-connected world, it’s still quite a complex challenge. To best 
prepare for the challenges ahead, we've partnered with supply chain and 
manufacturing experts and have recruited advisers and board members, who
 can provide expert advice and help us tackle challenges in production, 
engineering and retail management.
We have developed our plan for manufacturing in Asia and for shipping
 to our backers around the world. 
Although it's difficult to plan for every unforeseen circumstance, 
such as political or economic events that might delay production or 
delivery, we've created contingency plans should these type of problems 
arise. Nevertheless, we are certain to face unexpected challenges 
throughout this journey and will do our best to solve them quickly.               Thank you so much for checking out our project !!!Remember 
if we don't reach our goal then we won't get funded, and no one will get    use Oxygen mixer. So please share with your friends and family!FAQ

story:
Why do I want the shock effect.

Hi, my name is Juliana Limones. I just started in this network marketing business and I a super excited about it.

My passion has always been in nature, so I started being interested in why hemp is not used in our daily lives anymore when it was a plant that was widely used in our country and that can do SO MUCH for us. I came across CBD oil, I could not believe the testimonies I was hearing and reading about. After months of research and trying it myself, I became convince and clear on what I wanted to do and how I wanted to spend my time. Following my passion...

Your support will help me use my vehicle as a billboard for hemp derived CBD oil marketing. This is legal in all 52 states. I have joined the best distributor out there, our CBD oil is produced in the United States, it is FDA regulated and monitored, every batch is individually 3rd party tested to be compliant. I want to make a difference and an impact in the medical industry, I want to help educate people about the options they have before they rely on something that will only further damage their health and cost them their life savings, I want to create a lifestyle where I do what I love for a living.

What I Need & What You Get

I need $5000 for the product, design and complete wrap of my car. I know this business will take of immediately, but I want to start with a bold move to make an immediate impact.

You are going to love the perks! I am bringing you full spectrum CBD oil, at such discounted price that you will want to get some for your family and friends and furry friends as well!
We have the purest oil on the market, you can track EVERY batch we put out to it's very own 3rd party testing certificate of purity. No GMOs, pesticides or other ingredients (chemicals), just the whole goodness of this awesome plant.

If I don't reach my entire goal, the proceeds will still go to the marketing on my car, it just won't be the impactful wrap as the one you see here.

 

The Impact

I have made this a mission. Some of you know the benefits and the injustice that it was for some families when this was illegal and they desperately needed it. Some of you will find out after you start researching it and seeing and hearing the testimonies. Getting this information out every day will change lives.

This is a movement that it's for a good cause. Please be part of it and help me be bold with my statement, I'll take you along for the whole ride :)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help with being part of the crowdfunding, it's ok! You can help me by making some noise about my purpose and mission and SHARE the link to as many people as you can! remember not only are you sharing the link for them to support me, you are sharing it to put this liquid gold in their hands. The purest CBD oil at a price you will not see anywhere else, this is just a special price for the crowdfunding.

Please SHARE in all of your social media outlets.

story:
Summary

Ho'ola Mamma, Adrienne, is a Los Angeles based Ayurveda Health Counselor, yoga teacher, and Reiki healer. Amir, former professional football athlete and founder of YogiAthlete, has a passion for strength and conditioning and specializes in teaching yoga to athletes. Together, the yogi couple believes in practicing mindfulness and sustainability for our planet through yoga and plant-based, Ayurveda inspired foods. They are excited to celebrate this life with you.

This campaign helps Amir and Adrienne open a space that will serve as an everyday celebration to showcase their offerings and inspire movement through yoga, meditation, healing, plant-based eats, and soul-vibin’ music for their conscious community of athletes, yogis, and everyone in between looking to lead a more balanced way of life.

Contributors will help the couple to achieve their vision to make healthy, organic, plant-based foods, yoga, and Ayurvedic medicine accessible to all in a safe and sacred space.

What We Need & What You Get

Funding needed to bring this wellness event space and studio to life is approximately $95,000, which will go towards the studio's monthly rent, personnel (full-time and part-time staff), marketing, admin, insurance, and production of events.

We will be the first studio to fuse Ayurvedic medicine and workshop-based Ayurvedic education with yoga and plant-based food!

If we do not reach our entire goal, funds raised will go towards hosting quarterly Eat Move Meditate inspired events.

The Impact

Aside from the boom in the tech industry that tends to pull us away from our true selves, and the increase in gentrification that is reshaping our once familiar neighborhoods, we still have the power to gather as a community, build, grow, and rise together. This is our dream, to make yoga, meditation, and (really delicious) plant-based food accessible to communities that need it most. This wellness space is not only a studio, it is a way of life.

YogiAthlete and Ho'ola Mamma have successfully co-hosted wellness events together since December 2016. Their most recent event, 'Eat Move Meditate' welcomed a community of 200 attendees ranging in all ages, sizes, ethnicity, and experience, and featured brands such as Just Water, Southern Fried Vegan, Simply Wholesome, and Sun & Swell Foods.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Sending love to you all! Namaste.

story:
Since the horrifying terror attacks that took place early morning in Brussels, first responders have been working diligently to help the injured, and account for lives lost. According to the most recent reports, 31 people tragically lost their lives, and another 270 people were wounded in the explosions.

We would like to take a moment to thank everyone who has donated to and shared this campaign so far. Hundreds of kindhearted people from all over the world have contributed in the past days, and thousands more have shared the campaign with their family and friends. Your support is truly making a difference.

Please keep sharing and encouraging others to donate to this worthy cause. Together, we can make a significant impact.

Your funds donated to this campaign, including our fees, will be donated to the victims and families affected by the Brussels attacks.

Early in the morning of March 22nd, Brussels became the latest city to be rocked by an attack from the terrorist organization ISIS. Early reports say that dozens have been killed, and more injured.

story:
Short Summary


Am Mathew Yawe found in Uganda East Africa. Am the assistant district scout commissioner Training Mityana.

I have come up, campaigning for my dad. 

Leonard Mukasa, is our father whose kidneys proved nolonger working and since last year in October, has been on weekly dialysis treatment, where even blood transfusion takes place too!

However, this is too expensive to us, we can't afford weekly medical costs, which has led us selling off a number of properties including some of our land.

We are feeling so , so bad because if dad misses a week not taken for dailysis process, looses his life.

Humbly calling upon contributors, come up and rescue our dad, by paying hospital costs.

I request too, pass over this humble request message, to any body who can help us dear.

My email is; mathewyawe@gmail.com

Tel: 256772465207


What We Need & What You Get

His treatment per week to go for dailysis and blood transfusion  costs;  $180

per month costs $720

per year will cost $8640

However, if we dont get the entire goal, we shall be paying weekly whatever we get.


The Impact

We want to save our dads life, thats why we are campaigning and calling upon any body humbly help us.

Risks & Challenges

There is no way how we can over come this hurdle, apart from acquiring funds for hospital .


Other Ways You Can Help

You can donate as you wish.
