story:
Gaming, leveled up.

Hello!  We want to fundamentally improve gaming by offering a safe alternative to energy drinks that still supercharges your gaming.  The way we do it is by blending five brain-boosting ingredients (without caffeine!) called "nootropics" into a capsule you can take before you game!

 

What are Nootropics?

Nootropics are a wide range of cognition-boosting compounds that can benefit your brain. In our case, we have created a nootropic blend targeted specifically to improve the mental performance of gamers. 

 

How Athena Nootropics was born

Athena Nootropics was born out of a love of games and gamers.

When I owned a 24/7/365 PC Gaming Room, lots of my customers brought energy drinks from home or bought them from me.  The prices varied from $2.50 on the low end up to $5+ for a single large energy drink.  I noticed that my customers often drank two or even three energy drinks depending on how long they visited for and what time of day they visited.

I thought, "There has to be a cheaper, better, safer alternative."

What my search sparked in me was a realization that I could take advantage of cutting-edge scientific research to identify substances linked to cognitive enhancement.  Even better, I could tailor a blend specifically towards the needs of gamers everywhere.

After spending hundreds of hours reading experience reports and a couple years trying a (frankly absurd) number of different nootropics I was convinced that I was on the right path.  Aided by a good friend with a degree in medical biochemistry, we settled on five awesome ingredients for our gaming stack which we called: Athena's Blessing.

 

How Athena's Blessing works

Athena's Blessing targets the parts of the brain that are critical to playing your best game. Alpha-GPC and ALCAR boost your energy, L-Theanine, and NALT settle you into a flow state, and Bacopa Monnieri supercharges your memory!

Benefits of Athena's Blessing

Athena’s blessing contains 5 ingredients tailored to boost your focus, mental energy and memory, while simultaneously providing relaxation. Check out each ingredient’s Owl Graph to get to know what it does best.

What We Need

We need $35,000 to manufacture 1,500 bottles and build the foundation for a business that will put gamers first.

Production: $25,000 - $30,000

We reached out to manufacturers and got fairly consistent responses - order sizes are a minimum of 1,500 bottles, then scale up to 2,500 and 5,000. 

1,500 - 2,500 bottles of Athena's Blessing will cost between $25,000 and $30,000 to produce, not including shipping costs.

This also includes 3rd Party testing and compliance review.

Business Costs: $7,000

This is where we go from rushing your base to focusing on our own economy! By economy we mean:

- Improving our website and eCommerce experience with professional help. (Ballpark $2,000)

- Renting a small office/co-working-space to work full time on Athena Nootropics. (Ballpark $2,000)

- Renting space in a warehouse from which we can ship our goodies (Ballpark $3,000 for 4 months)

Marketing Costs: $17,000 - ????

- Produce, package and distribute samples (Stretch-goal here, ballpark $15,000)

- Partnering up with LAN Centers and eSports competitions to sponsor events. (Based on samples, but ballpark $2,000 in additional costs)

- And eventually investing in medical studies/human trials to drill down into what else we can do to improve your gaming experience.  ($$$? The great unknown!)

 

What You Get

XxPerk60noscopexX: All your perk are belong to us.

We're going to go all-out sourcing top quality ingredients in order to sell Athena's Blessing to you at a cost of around 1$ per day.  If you take a chance on us, you won't regret it!

In case that is not enough on its own, let's talk perks!

Athena's blessing is a medium to long-term investment in your own gaming abilities.  If you already drink coffee or energy drinks, then you may as well double down and enjoy the long-term benefits of Athena's Blessing!

Marble Inscription:  We intend to buy a massive slab of marble and then inscribe the names of all of our backers on it so that we can display it at our future offices.

Lifetime Discount:  It only seems appropriate that we reward you for backing us early by having your back for life.  So, for anyone backing us at the Soldier of Fortune level or above, we will be offering you a lifetime 10% off Athena's Blessing discount.

Bottles of Athena's Blessing: Each bottle comes with a one month supply of Athena's Blessing, enough to help you get the most out of your gaming.  No more losing your cool, much more in the zone flow.

Our Team

Athena Nootropics is founded on the belief that through science, human cognitive function can be improved safely and effectively in a manner that is both ethical and sustainable.

Timeline

The Impact

Call us crazy, but we think a safe, effective alternative to energy drinks should be affordable at a cost of around 1$ per serving.

An affordable alternative to energy drinks that makes cents!

By making performance enhanced gaming simple, safe and affordable, not to mention tolerance-free, we can offer a novel alternative to caffeinated beverages.  At the same time, Athena's Blessing is designed to work synergistically with caffeinated beverages so that you don't have to choose between the two. 

Instead, you can cut your costs drastically - if you eliminate a single energy drink per day in favor of Athena's Blessing, you would save a minimum of $30 a month, (assuming your beverage costs $2/serving).

 

Risks & Challenges

We believe that honesty is our most important currency, and thus we intend to be as transparent as possible with the risks currently facing us. 

What keeps Brendan up at night?

- Inventory-based business problems:  Producing more product than is being sold (sitting on unsold product).

 - Introductions to new markets beyond USA/CAN:  We would love to bring Athena's Blessing to people across the world, but we need to look before we leap, and make sure we are taking the best care of our current customers.

- Being poached/copied by a large supplement company who will undercut us:  The fact remains that by being entirely transparent, there is really nothing stopping one of the big players in the supplement industry from copying us.  We need your help and loyalty to win as the underdog!

- Finding an effective storage/work area in order to maximize effective shipping practices:  "I learned things I never knew I never knew," in this case, I am referring to centralized warehousing and shipping so that we can get our products to you on schedule.

- Developing e-commerce/web sales, packing/shipping infrastructure, expanding marketing/sponsorship opportunities, and other late-game business practices: We like Nootropics, but our first duty is to educate people before we try to sell them our products.  

What keeps Devan up at night?

- Acquiring a substandard ingredient that affects an entire batch of product, meaning delays as we source pure ingredients: We will be getting 3rd party testing done of all our ingredients, and on the off-chance one has problems we will have a backup ready to go.  Even with a backup ready to rumble, we will still need to have it tested, which could throw our timeline out of whack!

- Dealing with differences in health agencies in various regions and the differences in their labeling: Did you know names of products could be considered labeling claims?  Neither did we until a couple of months ago, and that's just here in the US of A!  We intend to tread very lightly in regards to compliance with all relevant authorities in order to minimize delays and maximize transparency.

- Variable shipping costs overseas:  As a Canadian, I know customs can delay deliveries, and we expect to learn the hard way that delivery time-frames for different countries will be less consistent that our customers may like.

- Production delays which affect the timing of monthly deliveries for subscription members. Since we will be contracting out our manufacturing (but still testing everything along the way), we have to accept that some things will be outside of our control.  We promise to do our best to overcome any obstacles we face, and will switch manufacturers if our customer's experience is being negatively impacted.

What keeps MoonJi up at night?

- Making sure the website/logo/label/Indiegogo art is cute, informative and on theme:  Building a brand as the only artist on the team is exhausting!

- Integrating sustainable business practices to lower our environmental footprint: No amount of enhancement is worth damaging the planet that we all share, and we are committed to doing everything in our power to be good stewards of our beautiful world.

- Lack of engagement on social media: This is a learning process for us, and we will be relying on feedback both positive and negative from our awesome customers to guide us.

Other Ways You Can Help

- Share the unique idea that is Athena’s Blessing with others who might be interested in trying Nootropics!  Seriously, this is the single most awesome thing you can do, and we love you for it.

- Connect us with business professionals in the aforementioned areas of risk!  We love advice, and as a startup, we can use as much as we can get!

- Bring awareness to streamers/pro teams interested in partnership opportunities. We strongly believe in our product, and if someone you know has an audience, we would love to get some Athena's Blessing into their hands!

- Educate yourself on what Nootropics are and how they may be beneficial to your daily routine, even if you have determined Athena’s Blessing is not for you!  Our whole goal is to help people game better, but the bigger picture is to help people find out what works best for them!

- Try using Athena’s Blessing for other mentally draining-tasks, even if you are not a gamer.  Let's be honest, the original Athena was a whole lot more into war and heroes and tasks than she was into gaming.

- Provide effective feedback on how to improve our product/appeal to a wider audience via our website.  We want to make and sell the best possible cognitive enhancement product for gamers.  As our customers, you are uniquely qualified to tell us how to do a better job, and we would seriously love to hear your feedback.

- Engage with us on social media to stay updated on news and promos.  That way we can reward you for being awesome!

- Getting in touch with media outlets to talk about the product. More coverage for us means more people that might benefit from Athena's Blessing actually finding out about it!

 

FAQ

Why are you crowdsourcing it?

We are crowdsourcing our Nootropic because we love the platform, and it gives us the ability to reach lots of interested people quickly.  If everyone is as excited about Nootropics for gamers as we are, then this is the perfect way to hit the ground running, and get our product into people’s hands as fast as possible.

Why do you publish the ingredients and dosage in your stack?

We believe in transparency, and a big part of that is knowing exactly what and how much of any ingredient is in our product.  We trust that by always being upfront with our customers we can preemptively answer questions or concerns they might have.

Is it safe?

Yes, Athena’s Blessing contains 4 ingredients that are GRAS (Generally Regarded As Safe) as well as one that has been used in Ayurvedic medicine since the 6th century and is very well tolerated when taken in the amount in our capsules (Bacopa Monnieri).  Athena's Blessing is produced in an FDA certified GMP (Good Manufacturing Processes) facility and our individual ingredients are tested for purity and the exclusion of heavy metals.  We also 3rd party test our ingredients before production as well as 3rd party test our finished products.

How many days in a row can I take it?

We suggest cycling off Athena’s blessing when not engaged in strenuous mental activity to make sure you get the most out of it. We don’t suggest any specific schedule as everybody is different and supplements work differently for different people.

What are the long-term effects?

A sweet K/D ratio and an improved memory!

Can I take it for x/y/z non-gaming task?

Yes! The ingredients in Athena’s Blessing have been proven to enhance cognitive ability regardless of the task at hand. We use it for work-related purposes, studying, reading long scientific papers.

How long does it last?

The half-life of each ingredient is measured at about 4 hours. We recommend taking two at the start of your day or gaming session and one as needed as the effects wear off. This will top you up and keep you motivated on your road to glory!

I don’t feel anything, why?

We recommend taking Athena’s Blessing on an empty stomach, before a meal, with your favorite source of low-dose caffeine (coffee, tea, latte, etc) in order to provide maximum effect. We also would like to remind our users that the individual ingredients are not active stimulants yet provide benefits through a more passive pathway. The feelings should be subtle. If you do not feel anything we recommend altering your ingestion routine or by moderately increasing the dosage.

Thanks again for checking out our campaign, you rock!  See you in-game!
story_txt:
Gaming, leveled up.
Hello!  We want to fundamentally improve gaming by offering a safe alternative to energy drinks that still supercharges your gaming.  The way we do it is by blending five brain-boosting ingredients (without caffeine!) called "nootropics" into a capsule you can take before you game!
 
What are Nootropics?
Nootropics are a wide range of cognition-boosting compounds that can benefit your brain. In our case, we have created a nootropic blend targeted specifically to improve the mental performance of gamers. 

 
How Athena Nootropics was born
Athena Nootropics was born out of a love of games and gamers.
When I owned a 24/7/365 PC Gaming Room, lots of my customers brought energy drinks from home or bought them from me.  The prices varied from $2.50 on the low end up to $5+ for a single large energy drink.  I noticed that my customers often drank two or even three energy drinks depending on how long they visited for and what time of day they visited.
I thought, "There has to be a cheaper, better, safer alternative."
What my search sparked in me was a realization that I could take advantage of cutting-edge scientific research to identify substances linked to cognitive enhancement.  Even better, I could tailor a blend specifically towards the needs of gamers everywhere.
After spending hundreds of hours reading experience reports and a couple years trying a (frankly absurd) number of different nootropics I was convinced that I was on the right path.  Aided by a good friend with a degree in medical biochemistry, we settled on five awesome ingredients for our gaming stack which we called: Athena's Blessing.
 

How Athena's Blessing works
Athena's Blessing targets the parts of the brain that are critical to playing your best game. Alpha-GPC and ALCAR boost your energy, L-Theanine, and NALT settle you into a flow state, and Bacopa Monnieri supercharges your memory!

Benefits of Athena's Blessing
Athena’s blessing contains 5 ingredients tailored to boost your focus, mental energy and memory, while simultaneously providing relaxation. Check out each ingredient’s Owl Graph to get to know what it does best.

What We Need
We need $35,000 to manufacture 1,500 bottles and build the foundation for a business that will put gamers first.
Production: $25,000 - $30,000
We reached out to manufacturers and got fairly consistent responses - order sizes are a minimum of 1,500 bottles, then scale up to 2,500 and 5,000. 
1,500 - 2,500 bottles of Athena's Blessing will cost between $25,000 and $30,000 to produce, not including shipping costs.
This also includes 3rd Party testing and compliance review.
Business Costs: $7,000
This is where we go from rushing your base to focusing on our own economy! By economy we mean:
- Improving our website and eCommerce experience with professional help. (Ballpark $2,000)
- Renting a small office/co-working-space to work full time on Athena Nootropics. (Ballpark $2,000)
- Renting space in a warehouse from which we can ship our goodies (Ballpark $3,000 for 4 months)
Marketing Costs: $17,000 - ????
- Produce, package and distribute samples (Stretch-goal here, ballpark $15,000)
- Partnering up with LAN Centers and eSports competitions to sponsor events. (Based on samples, but ballpark $2,000 in additional costs)
- And eventually investing in medical studies/human trials to drill down into what else we can do to improve your gaming experience.  ($$$? The great unknown!)
 
What You Get
XxPerk60noscopexX: All your perk are belong to us.
We're going to go all-out sourcing top quality ingredients in order to sell Athena's Blessing to you at a cost of around 1$ per day.  If you take a chance on us, you won't regret it!
In case that is not enough on its own, let's talk perks!
Athena's blessing is a medium to long-term investment in your own gaming abilities.  If you already drink coffee or energy drinks, then you may as well double down and enjoy the long-term benefits of Athena's Blessing!
Marble Inscription:  We intend to buy a massive slab of marble and then inscribe the names of all of our backers on it so that we can display it at our future offices.
Lifetime Discount:  It only seems appropriate that we reward you for backing us early by having your back for life.  So, for anyone backing us at the Soldier of Fortune level or above, we will be offering you a lifetime 10% off Athena's Blessing discount.
Bottles of Athena's Blessing: Each bottle comes with a one month supply of Athena's Blessing, enough to help you get the most out of your gaming.  No more losing your cool, much more in the zone flow.

Our Team
Athena Nootropics is founded on the belief that through science, human cognitive function can be improved safely and effectively in a manner that is both ethical and sustainable.


Timeline

The Impact
Call us crazy, but we think a safe, effective alternative to energy drinks should be affordable at a cost of around 1$ per serving.
An affordable alternative to energy drinks that makes cents!
By making performance enhanced gaming simple, safe and affordable, not to mention tolerance-free, we can offer a novel alternative to caffeinated beverages.  At the same time, Athena's Blessing is designed to work synergistically with caffeinated beverages so that you don't have to choose between the two. 
Instead, you can cut your costs drastically - if you eliminate a single energy drink per day in favor of Athena's Blessing, you would save a minimum of $30 a month, (assuming your beverage costs $2/serving).
 

Risks & Challenges
We believe that honesty is our most important currency, and thus we intend to be as transparent as possible with the risks currently facing us. 
What keeps Brendan up at night?
- Inventory-based business problems:  Producing more product than is being sold (sitting on unsold product).
 - Introductions to new markets beyond USA/CAN:  We would love to bring Athena's Blessing to people across the world, but we need to look before we leap, and make sure we are taking the best care of our current customers.
- Being poached/copied by a large supplement company who will undercut us:  The fact remains that by being entirely transparent, there is really nothing stopping one of the big players in the supplement industry from copying us.  We need your help and loyalty to win as the underdog!
- Finding an effective storage/work area in order to maximize effective shipping practices:  "I learned things I never knew I never knew," in this case, I am referring to centralized warehousing and shipping so that we can get our products to you on schedule.
- Developing e-commerce/web sales, packing/shipping infrastructure, expanding marketing/sponsorship opportunities, and other late-game business practices: We like Nootropics, but our first duty is to educate people before we try to sell them our products.  
What keeps Devan up at night?
- Acquiring a substandard ingredient that affects an entire batch of product, meaning delays as we source pure ingredients: We will be getting 3rd party testing done of all our ingredients, and on the off-chance one has problems we will have a backup ready to go.  Even with a backup ready to rumble, we will still need to have it tested, which could throw our timeline out of whack!
- Dealing with differences in health agencies in various regions and the differences in their labeling: Did you know names of products could be considered labeling claims?  Neither did we until a couple of months ago, and that's just here in the US of A!  We intend to tread very lightly in regards to compliance with all relevant authorities in order to minimize delays and maximize transparency.
- Variable shipping costs overseas:  As a Canadian, I know customs can delay deliveries, and we expect to learn the hard way that delivery time-frames for different countries will be less consistent that our customers may like.
- Production delays which affect the timing of monthly deliveries for subscription members. Since we will be contracting out our manufacturing (but still testing everything along the way), we have to accept that some things will be outside of our control.  We promise to do our best to overcome any obstacles we face, and will switch manufacturers if our customer's experience is being negatively impacted.
What keeps MoonJi up at night?
- Making sure the website/logo/label/Indiegogo art is cute, informative and on theme:  Building a brand as the only artist on the team is exhausting!
- Integrating sustainable business practices to lower our environmental footprint: No amount of enhancement is worth damaging the planet that we all share, and we are committed to doing everything in our power to be good stewards of our beautiful world.
- Lack of engagement on social media: This is a learning process for us, and we will be relying on feedback both positive and negative from our awesome customers to guide us.

Other Ways You Can Help
- Share the unique idea that is Athena’s Blessing with others who might be interested in trying Nootropics!  Seriously, this is the single most awesome thing you can do, and we love you for it.

- Educate yourself on what Nootropics are and how they may be beneficial to your daily routine, even if you have determined Athena’s Blessing is not for you!  Our whole goal is to help people game better, but the bigger picture is to help people find out what works best for them!
- Try using Athena’s Blessing for other mentally draining-tasks, even if you are not a gamer.  Let's be honest, the original Athena was a whole lot more into war and heroes and tasks than she was into gaming.

story:
How is the air quality in your daily life?

As global awareness of air quality is awakening, AQI (Air Quality Index) announced on the TV and Internet has become important information for everyone. Though some are still not aware of it, more and more people are having trouble with asthma or COPD due to poor air quality. Air pollution is linked with risks of heart and lung diseases, liver and brain damage, especially on new-born infants and the elderly. Nevertheless, the AQI info we rely on is an average number in a specific range of time, not timely nor statistically accurate. For better healthcare, ADDWII believes that a portable, instant air quality detector is getting more essential than ever before.

 

Not just a monitor, but a life companion.

Air quality is a matter of the entire life, and Mobile Nose is here to make your life healthier.

Not only can it  provide real-time, accurate air indicators, but also it can record the air quality statistics lifelong. It is extremely helpful for people with allergies, asthma or any lung diseases. You can take it with you indoors, outdoors, or on your way in the car.

 Mobile Nose - the All-round Air Quality Monitor

The super compact device detects immediate TVOC information as well as PM2.5, eCO2, temperature and humidity values.  What’s more, with the ADDWII app, you may track back to any point of time, and even share the data with nearby users on Air Map.

What we want to build is not only a portable monitor but also a living sphere for every user to find and share clean air.

 

 Personalization

The device and data are as personal as your phone. Our product emphasizes small-ranged, immediate indoor and outdoor air quality detection for individuals. 

 Mobility

Compared with fixed-point monitoring devices, Mobile Nose is highly convenient in carrying and moving, which only weighs 83.5 grams. 

 Lifetime Record

The Mobile Nose  preserves users’ air quality data in each second onto the cloud. What we can expect is that the user may refer to the data for better personal healthcare.

 Cloud Storage

You can enjoy unlimited space for data storage. The big data recorded by Mobile Nose can be used for medical purpose(only after your permission), or be shared immediately with nearby users. 

 Proactive Detection

With a number of patents around the world, the core technology “Micro Pump” unlocks the possibility to imitate the human nose during detection process.

 

The ADDWII app

First-hand Data Update

Mobile Nose updates TVOC values every minute, PM2.5、PM10 values every five minutes to ADDWII app. Live your healthy life without delay! 

Air Map- Discover Clean Air Together

This is where you share information with Mobile Nosers. Found some fresh air? Mark it on the map to let others know.

Besides Mobile Nose, data provided by the government and third-party associations is also integrated into the Air Map for comprehensive reference.

Personal Trail- A Little More about Your Daily Routes

Do you know the air quality along the way to work, school or your favorite shop?

With the cloud storage function enabled, the air quality can be recorded along with personal movement trajectory.

 

 

How to Setup

Mobile Nose works with the ADDWII app:

(1) Turn on the Mobile Nose to start.

(2) Create account: Choose "Setting">"Account Setting">"Create Account"  and enter your email. A password email will be sent in a few minutes, you can change your password.

(3) Pairing: Make sure Bluetooth of your phone is open. Open the menu and select "add device", you will find the name of your device, choose it to pair.

(4) Check data by swiping left and right, or swipe up to see past records.

 

 

Prototypes

Our motivation is to develop an alternative solution to replace the time-delayed AQI info, and create a space where people can share real-time information to each others. We knew from the very beginning that a product bearing such a solution must be simple, beautiful, and different from anything else on the market. Mobile Nose has gone through more than three times of modification and redesign.


 

 

 

Check back ADDWII.com for the Secret Perk link.
 
 

 

Tech Specs

 

 

Check back ADDWII.com for the Secret Perk link.

 

 

Timeline

Risks & Challenges

We will do our best to mitigate production risks and use well-established shipping companies.

If challenges occur, we will continue working hard to ensure that we deliver our backers high-quality products on time.

 

FAQs

ABOUT

1. What’s your privacy policy?
Your data is safely stored in our cloud servers. You have the right to decide whether or not to share it with anyone.

2. Can I travel with it?
Yes. Mobile Nose is compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry. It weighs only 83.5 grams.

3. How do I bring it with me?

We offer a hanging chain for each Mobile Nose. You can hang it on your bag, belt, or the baby cart.

4. Can I return or exchange the product after the purchase?
We don't do refunds. If you found defects in material and workmanship, please contact service@addwii.com or service@microjet.com.tw.  Please note that our return and exchange policy does not cover the damages caused by accident, misuse, abuse, product modification or neglect.

Please place the product in the original packaging with all the components that came with it and ship it back only after confirmation with us. We will place a new one to you. 

5. How many product colors I can choose from?

There are two colors: silver and gold.

6.When the APP and the device is not connected, how long will the data be captured into the mobile phone?

Off-line records can be up to 24 hours. After the connection, the data is sent back to the cloud. 

7.Does the product have an effective detection range?

The best detection range is within 2m of the center.

8.How long can the Mobile Nose be used after it is fully charged?

Around 14 hrs-15 hrs.

9. Can I use the ADDWII app without a device?

Yes. You can access to air quality data in Air Map even you don't have a Mobile Nose.

10. The data measured through Mobile Nose is different from the ones online. Why?

Mobile Nose detects air quality in real time. It may be different from the online info.

 

SHIPPING

1. How much is the shipping?
Shipping rates vary from $30 to $45, depending on the perk you choose.

2. Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Yes, depending on your location, you may have to pay VAT/GST.

 

Notes

International backers: Mobile Nose will be shipped to United States and Canada. Please note that you will be responsible for duties and taxes applicable to your region.

Support: If you have any questions, during or after the campaign has closed, you can reach us at service@addwii.com or service@microjet.com.tw

story:
What is Playa?

Playa is a new fitness app that will build video playlists for users based on their unique choices. The playlists consist of videos submitted to us by what we call Gurus. Gurus are personal trainers from all around the world that want a way to earn extra cash by uploading videos to the database. Gurus receive  50% of the revenue that Playa earns. 

 

How much will it cost for users?

$3/ week

 

What are the workout options? 

Users Choose:

Intensity Level

Location Of Workout

Gender Of Trainer

Type of Workout

Length Of Workout

The app then builds a workout playlist from the videos in our database based on these choices.

 

Where do the videos come from?

Personal Trainers from all over the world. We call them our Gurus. 

 

Can anyone submit a video and become a Guru?

The short answer is yes. Since there is no government regulation on personal trainers we decided not to cut qualified people out from submitting videos by choosing one personal training certification over others. 

 

How do you make sure the videos are safe? 

We have a 3 Step video vetting process. 

  1. Content Quality
  2. Safty 
  3. Guidelines

The first step it to make sure the videos are at the audio and visual quality we suggest. Next personal trainers with degrees in physiology review the footage to ensure no dangerous techniques are suggested to users. The final step is checking that all video requirements are met. 

The video requirements are as followed:

  • The Guru submitting the video must be in the video. (This is to make sure no content is being stolen.)
  • Step by Step instruction on how to do the suggested exercise is visually and audibly able to be understood. 
  • No inappropriate behavior or language is shown in the video. 
  • Video length. The videos while should be detailed should only be 30 - 60 seconds in length.

If all requirements are met, the video will be added to our database. 

 

Do the Gurus Earn Money?

Yes! Gurus receive 50% of the app's revenue. After the payment processing service takes their cut, the remaining $2.60 is split between the Gurus and  Playa. If we make $6,000 in a week, $3,000 of that goes to the Gurus. 

 

How is the money allocated to the individual Gurus?

The Guru's fund is split evenly by how many videos we have in the database. If the Gurus receive $3,000 over a week and we have 1,000 videos in the database, each video is worth $3. 

Example:

Guru 1 has 10 videos = $30 for the week

Guru 2 has 50 videos = $150 for the week

Guru 3 has 100 = $300 for the week

 

Why not use an investor? 

 

Economic Impact of the App.

Two locations, Fullerton, CA and Stratford, London, UK will be our headquarters for the app. We will be hiring various positions in both locations. Additional personal trainers to vet the videos, people to verify the visual and audio quality as well as ensure all requirements are met, programmers and other positions will be needed at both locations. At least 5 new hires in both locations within the first few months of the app launching. 

 

Why was Playa created?

The short answer:

The long story:



Thank you for your support!

Sincerely, 
The Playa Team

story:
The Axis Grip by Axis Athletics

The evolution of thick grip technology!

Axis Grips are an innovative and uniquely designed attachable grip. Built to wrap around any conventional weight training bar or handle. It can be attached and removed within seconds. Its function is to move the weight load from the center of the hand and move it to or beyond the fingertips. This offset of weight creates an unbalanced load in the hand. Forcing you to use your thumb and hand to clamp down onto the device. This is key to activating the thumb throughout your lift and exercise.

There will always be risks and challenges when developing new products or thought processes in an industry that has so many “experts”. The Axis team consists of humble individuals who know and believe in our hearts we have the beginnings of something great. Our ambition and determination will get us past the worst critics and our humility will make any backer proud of our company and culture.

Current thick grip solutions leave the thumb and fingers out of the equation. Convert any workout equipment to a thumb activating Axis Grip.

Current products barely scratch the surface.

As a team we looked at the slight benefits a thicker circumference bar provided its users. We were intrigued by what we saw…

Move the Axis to create rotation and torque.

Axis Grips help rehabilitation and prevention of injury by tapping into the neural myo connection used to protect your body and fire it symmetrically to strengthen those neglected weaker muscles.

More Strength. More Muscle Symmetry.

This campaign and our mission goes far beyond selling weight lifting equipment. This campaign is so important because this is the spark to ignite further research and development of the Axis thumb activation technology. The nervous system is a very complex and sophisticated system. The world at large has only scratched the surface of understanding the benefits to one’s own individual strength potential and overall health via the nervous system. Without the nervous system activating to its highest degree and functioning at its highest potential, imbalances and reduced muscle activation will be a constant battle for everyone, regardless if you’re healthy, injured or recovering from injury. Support our efforts to help millions get stronger and healthier.

Our perks allow you to get an Axis Grip set at a reduced cost-effective price. Be the first to say you supported and helped build a new evolution in strength training and rehabilitation. Something that can help a lot of people reduce a lot of pain.

 

This is only the tip of the iceberg of what this technology can become.

Please help us develop the awareness and resources to take this technology to the next level.

 

We believe it is important to provide education and materials to showcase our vision and benefits. Awareness for anything new is always a challenge. Promoting, liking, sharing, and commenting on our content will aid in our efforts to bring more awareness to people. With your support, we can maximize these channels for developing better resources and education. 

 

We need $18,000 for mold fees, our minimum manufacturing run, and to continue our research, education, and development efforts. Any dollar amounts beyond 18k will be going directly towards increasing the research studies and education. Research, fine wire EMG studies, and peer reviewed articles are all an expensive process to do correctly. Please support us so we can continue or efforts in those areas.

Origin story

Axis Athletics was formed in 2012 when two aspiring entrepreneurs Chris and Nick (Axis Athletics, LLC Co-Founders) had a question that no one could answer. “Why don’t we use our thumbs while we lift?" This simple yet unanswerable question sparked an idea that has fueled our teams desire to shed some light and educate everyone to the importance of utilizing your thumb in your workout or training regiments. The thumb is a trigger for the brain to activate more muscles to a higher degree. This activation is throughout the entire upper body and has the ability to create new muscle recruitment patterns, bring symmetry to muscle growth, and reduce joint inflammation and pain. This technology is utility patented and now being developed into products that are easy to use and beneficial to everyone. The vision doesn’t just begin or end at cool new fitness products either. With your help, either through supporting us by spreading the word or donating to our mission, our research and education of the nervous system will continue. We want to take this technology and company to the next level. We can only do that with your support!

story:
What is MūvWell?

 

MūvWell allows instructors to upload their classes and connect with people like you. You can take the class as is or tailor your classes for your own routine.

You and people like you created MūvWell. 

  • If you are someone who wants to get fit and healthy but time constraints are an issue, MūvWell is for you. 
  • If working out in public isn't for you, MūvWell is for you. 
  • If you are the creative type and want to experiment with your own fitness development, MūvWell is for you.
  • If you simply have unique needs, MūvWell is for you. 
  • If you are a fitness instructor looking for a more convenient platform to gain a larger audience for your business, MūvWell is for you too. 

 

Q & A

Who is Jordan?

MūvWell's founder, Jordan Oxford, is a yoga student and teacher who believes that there is a better way to share ideas in fitness classes and by personalizing exercises, people can have more success in improving their health. 

What has happened so far?

The groundwork has been laid and a plan is in place to develop an app to make this dream come alive. We've partnered with app developers and a fundraising-support company to come up with a plan for creating a successful startup. Major accomplishments include a clickable prototype, a professional product explainer video, a professional website, strategy for development completion, an early network of instructors eager to use the new platform, and much more. 

What are we trying to do?

The goal is to help anyone who wants to feel better in their body. The idea behind having a fitness platform you can personalize is so that no matter what works or doesn't work for you, MūvWell makes it easy to give your body just what it needs to be fit and healthy.  

We want to raise enough money to continue the work and execute the plan we've come up with. Our goal is to take the work we've done so far and to pay for the business services it will take to turn it into a viable formal business plan to present to our future investors.

What will it take to make this happen?

It will cost another 30k to build early content for product validation and to pay for business services to build a proper investor presentation. That second round of investment funding will raise the 150k it will take to fulfill our first-year business needs and see app development through to the launch of the app.

What is this campaign money for?

What's important now is to be able to pay for the remaining business services it will take to set this plan in motion. By succeeding in our 30k goal we'll be able to solidify a viable business plan and investor pitch deck for the next round of funding. If we are over-funded we can start immediately on our next development phase.

What can we offer in return?

In return for early support, we're offering tiers of incentives to give back as much as we can to early supporters. Early supporters will be remembered and bonus perks will continue to be offered to those who helped us out early on. 



How Does this App Differ from Others?

When we worked on MūvWell, we decided to make sure it had all the features we wished other apps, sites, and gizmos had.  We weren't out to outdo the rest, but that was a natural consequence of us being truly passionate about fitness.  Just look at our comparison chart to see the difference, whether you are an instructor or someone who wants to get fitter.  



The Journey So Far, and Where We're Going


In August 2017,  MūvWell reached out to Knuckleheads to explore what would be needed to create our platform app that fulfilled all the wishes that people needed.  Once partnered with them, MūvWell connected with the startup incubator Empyrean Trust to create a well-planned fundraising strategy and support network to move on to the development stage.  After months of research and planning, we launch now in January.



With your help, we can reach our $30,000 goal and you can reach your health and fitness goals for this year and beyond.  

Knuckleheads is a group of brilliant app developers in Portland committed to creating the best product possible.


 

MūvWell is fortunate enough to have yet another company support us called Empyrean Trust.  They are committed to getting us the funding needed beyond the scope of this campaign.



 

 


Thanks and Tag a Friend!

We appreciate you letting us share the MūvWell story and supporting us as we come toward the production phase of our journey.  We're even more excited that you have become a part of the story now.  Thank you for that.  But don't just stop there, share the MūvMent with your friends.  Invite them to become a part of the MūvWell community with you. 

Share this campaign by copying and pasting this link on your Facebook page: https://igg.me/at/muvwell

or go to www.facebook.com/muvwell.life and hit the share button.


Better Me, Better You, Better Mūv!

story:
In 2009, Rudolf Gotsmi, himself a passionate athlete as well as a trained fitness and soccer coach, commenced the development of a new training device that combines the advantages of earlier fitness equipment and at the same time provides new training dimensions. While most commercial fitness equipment is only designed for certain regions of the body or for an individual training goal - balance, stability, coordination or strength - the FitW is the optimum fitness device for all regions of the body and for all target groups. From the first idea for the FitW fitness cube to the development of prototypes and material tests, he has worked away meticulously for 7 years. In cooperation with proven fitness experts and top athletes - such as the world cup racing skier, Katharina Gallhuber or the downhill amateur champion, Rade Curcic -  the FitW has been optimized and was finally brought onto the market in September 2016.

The Fitness Cube is easy to transport and can be used anywhere. On top of this, it is also relatively inexpensive to purchase - but above all, it offers a variety of training possibilities, depending on the training goals and levels of its users.

The FitW is the health and fitness cube of a new generation. Whether as a healthy, portable alternative to the rigid office chair, targeted strength training for individual regions of the body or as a toy: The FitW is the versatile training device for improving personal fitness.

'A highly efficient exercise equipment"

FH-Prof . Ing. MMag. Dr. Anton Sabo, Head Biomedical, Health and Sports Engineering

 

The FitW effectively prevents the health-damaging effects caused by a typical lack of movement. Flexible inflation - from hard/very stable to very soft/challenging in terms of balance – and the cube shape with rounded edges permits more exercise options with the FitW than is the case with commercial fitness equipment and it is suitable for beginners and older persons, to whom round training devices offer too little stability.

 

Strengthening the muscles: Strengthening and sustainable stabilisation of calves, thighs, leg, sacrum, the back and spinal column, shoulders, muscle loops and belly, legs and buttocks

 

Coordination: Improvement of inter- and intra- muscular coordination, deep stabilisation (for example of the vertebral muscles) and increasing of the speed of action

 

Back training: Prevents injuries, keeps the spine mobile and provides for an upright posture which is crucial for a healthy working life. In this way, back complaints are also prevented, in the long term, during leisure time.

Preventative training and therapy: Rehabilitation of muscle strength and recovery of coordinative capabilities as well as injury prevention for both performance and amateur athletes.

In its current design, the FitW is also perfectly suited to playful learning in kindergarten and school because the numbers and colors help children to improve their cognitive skills. In addition to this, the different colors of the cube facilitate the instruction of more demanding exercises, especially in professional adult training. For example: “Cubing" (Balancing on the edge) between grey and red/five and six.

The shell of the FitW is made of very robust synthetic fibers, which render it also suitable for outdoor training. As an inflatable cube, the FitW weighs less than 1 kg and has dimensions of 45 x 45 x 45 centimeters.

In 2016, an important step was taken in the acquisition of FH-Prof. Ing. MMag. Dr. Anton Sabo from the Technikum Wien (Vienna Technical College); the college which first initiated sports equipment technology as a course of study. As a renowned specialist in the field of sports medicine, he has supported the FitW from the outset, both as an ambassador and as an independent expert. He also has created an expert report on the FitW.

“This is a system that is concerned on the one hand with the training of coordination skills and muscular stability, and on the other hand is not as unstable as a usual gymnastic ball. As a result of this, it can be used for older persons, who possess less of the stability required to be able to train on a ball."

 

The FitW box includes the following:

- Strong vinyl inner cube

- Durable synthetic fiber outer layer

- Air pump

- Carry bag

- Exercise chart

 

 

The FitW featured in the Austrian TV show '2 Minuten, 2 Millionen' which is a similar concept as 'Shark Tank'

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt: Short Summary Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:  Introduce yourself and your background. Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you. Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.  Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?   What We Need & What You Get Break it down for folks in more detail:  Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.  Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited! Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.    The Impact Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:  Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world. Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one). Make it real for people and build trust.    Risks & Challenges  People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.  Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles. Describe your plan for solving these challenges.    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

  • Robert and Stuart are CFO and CEO of Residential Physicians Association (RPAcares) PLLC. 
  • This Campaign is to forge a Mobile Health Clinic to provide service to anyone that is unable to receive medical care regardless of their circumstances.
  • Your contribution is monumental in aiding us to attain our 1st Mobile Health Clinic that will be available to anyone that requires our service in care.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We require at least $1 million; however, we are hoping with your help to receive the minimum of $300K. Your funds will be significant it helping us to raise the money necessary to realize this Medical HEALTH Clinic to help those in need that are unable to afford basic American quality care in medicine.
  • We have carefully chosen perks for you, hoping to, in the special way, thank you for your support. It took weeks to decide and finalize on perks that are special for you!
  • If by chance we don't exceed our goal, the funds will be used for our expanding practice that goes directly to people's homes, residents, trailers, nursing homes, residential communities. We only utilize providers that are MDs, NPs, and PAs, along with their MAs.
     

The Impact

The funds would determine the level of Mobile HEALTH Clinic we can procure. The more funds we receive, the better position we are to achieve many things for those we will service:

  • This project is invaluable because cost of medical service has skyrocketed. Countless Americans are uninsured and or are unable to afford the minimum in health care service. This Mobile Health Clinic will be available to anyone and everyone. We hope to realize that from Coast-to-Coast, USA Nationwide.
  • We have been able to accomplish considerable success providing service within 100 miles within the Metro-Detroit, MI area
  • We have been providing service since 1993. We are the trusted partner of Medicare, Medicaid, and private providers.

Risks & Challenges

If we are unable to exceed our goal and fail to reach the $1 million level it will postpone our ambitions to quickly bring the Mobile Health Clinic to realization. It is the REQUIRED service that countless Americans are depending on to live another day.

  • What qualifies RPAcares PLLC to overcome the hurdle of ANYONE unable to receive medical care is our commitment to the community. Our medical expertise and readiness to respond to what is required. To be able to within 15 - 30 mins shift the course to accommodate needs.
  • The plan is to, as soon as we are funded, procure the Mobile facility and turn it into the full-blown rolling clinic to provide service to those in need.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.

  • We know and understand that not everyone has money to give; nevertheless, you are tremendously helpful when you inform everyone about our platform and the difference we are attempting to make in our culture...society.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools! We are extremely thankful to you for visiting our CrowdFund Page and genuinely hope you will help us exceed our goal and at the minimum let everyone know that we are here to help.

And that's all there is to it. You support is profoundly appreciated. Gratitude!

story:
Who We Are

Hello! We are a group of undergraduate students at The Ohio State University from diverse backgrounds and disciplines seeking to help cancer patients, defend people from bacterial infections, and advance the field of synthetic biology. Our team is new to Ohio State and we offer a fantastic research opportunity to driven undergraduate students.

Our Project

This year, our team is focused on improving production of a potent antibiotic and chemotherapy alternative compound, cordycepin. The team is aiming to isolate the genetic pathway that produces cordycepin from the mushroom in which it naturally occurs and relocate it into an organism that can be grown more efficiently and cost-effectively. This is our main research objective. In terms of outreach, we intend to educate younger students about the emerging field of synthetic biology and dispel myths surrounding genetic engineering as well as teach about antibiotic resistance and the discovery process of new antibiotic compounds.

What is iGEM?

We are Ohio State's first iGEM team. iGEM is an international genetic engineering competition in which undergraduate students from around the world design and build novel organisms with applications in healthcare, environmental solutions, entrepreneurship, and more. In addition to research, iGEM includes volunteering, networking, and educating. Teams work throughout the year on fundraising and outreach. Over the summer and beginning of the next school year, undergraduate students actually execute their project designs, test the products, and work on iGEM requirements. At the end of October, the teams travel to Boston to present and compete at the Giant Jamboree.

What we Need

We have come to Indiegogo to ask for help in supporting our team! While our team and research have the potential to make a huge impact, there are many steps we need funding to complete. Here is an outline of our budget:

     Team Competition Registration: $4,500 (early registration fee)

     Individual Jamboree Registration: $695 x Jamboree Attendee

     Research Materials: Estimated <$1,000

     Hotel Rooms: About $100 per room per night (3 nights)

     Transportation: Round trip bus tickets = $131 per passenger

     Student Stipends: $1,500-$2,000 per student depending how many stay over the summer +           how much total money is raised

Indiegogo funding will go to the most time-sensitive expense--currently, this is team registration for iGEM. Registration will give us access to crucial research materials and team resources. Jamboree attendance is another major expense; however, this is the culmination of iGEM and allows students to present their research alongside their peers from around the world. It is a great way to get project feedback and publicity. 

Additional funding is being sought from our university and corporate donors. If you cannot contribute to our campaign but have connections to a company that supports student-led research and innovative healthcare, we would dearly appreciate you forwarding our project information to them. 

The Impact

The beauty of iGEM teams is that they give back in so many ways. While the most obvious benefit to funding our program is aiding the development of an innovative healthcare project, contributions will also help us educate younger students, tighten our campus community, and help budding scientists launch careers with humanitarian goals. 

Especially as this is the first year of iGEM at The Ohio State University, we are so appreciative of your efforts to help us get off the ground and into meaningful research. Our team is truly a group of students united by curiosity and compassion. We all want to make a difference, both in our professional fields and in people's personal lives. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you so much for your interest in our campaign! If you cannot contribute financially, we would still very much appreciate you using Indiegogo's share tools and being vocal about our project on social media. If you know of any companies that may be interested in helping our team, we offer advertising opportunities for corporate sponsors. Please send along our contact and/or project information!

story:
Short Summary

What if we had an automated, remote test for the novel coronavirus disease, COVD-19, based on user-reported symptoms and data?

Covid19orNo.com is a HIPAA-compliant website that tracks your symptoms and provides you with applicable guidance from the U.S. CDC and WHO websites based on your symptoms.

Covid19orNo.com also allows you to compare your symptoms, over time, to the symptoms experienced by actual COVID-19 patients.

And of particular interest to the CDC, covid19orno.com tracks symptoms and locations from anyone in the world.

At the moment, Covid19orNo.com does not diagnose the disease, it simply shares publicly available information in an interactive and easy to understand format. With funds from this campaign, we hope to use machine learning to uncover a reliable symptom pattern signature for identifying COVID-19 (Coronavirus 2019 disease). We are currently initiating a clinical literature review to build a data set to develop our algorithm.

Background

I caught a cold at the same time that the news began heavily focusing on coronavirus and COVID-19 began sweeping through the San Francisco Bay Area, where I live. I hid in my room and watched the world slowly come to a halt. My only source of comfort was reading medical papers about the onset and progression of COVID-19 symptoms.

By arming myself with knowledge, I felt less panicked. It inspired me to share my research with the rest of the world in an interactive and easy-to-understand format.

About Me

I've been dreaming about starting a website that empowers people to "own" their health for years. Before creating Covid19orNo.com, I founded a company called UserWise, a consultancy focused on reducing preventable medical error worldwide. At UserWise, we perform safety assessments to help medical product developers to comply with U.S. and international regulations.

Before UserWise, I was a Human Factors Engineer at Intuitive Surgical, where I worked on da Vinci surgical systems, instruments, and accessories including the da Vinci Xi Surgical Robotic System and da Vinci Sp Surgical Robotic System.

In 2012, I completed Abbott Laboratories' Professional Development Program, working in various supervisory, R&D, Quality and Regulatory functions in divisions including Abbott Vascular, Abbott Diagnostics, Abbott Diabetes Care, and Abbott Medical Optics.

I graduated in 2010 from UCLA with a B.S. in Mechanical Engineering and a technical breadth in Technology Management. I'm a Certified Professional Industrial Engineer, I hold two patents, and I've written and published three books.

What We Need & What You Get

So far I've invested approximately $10,000 of my own resources to develop and test the site. However, I am seeking an additional $10,000 to help make this project a success. Here's where the upcoming funding will go:

  • Promotion: $2,500
    • We plan to use ads to spread the word.
    • Our goal is to get at least 10,000 people to fill out the quiz.
  • Website Maintenance and Daily Fact Checking: $2,500
    • We make sure that the website is up to date daily; every day we ensure that the website matches the latest content on the CDC and WHO websites regarding COVID-19.
  • Clinical Data Analysis and reporting: $5,000
    • We are collecting known data on symptom onset to build a "COVID-19 positive" dataset
    • You will be the first to receive our 3-page synthesis of the medical literature regarding symptom progression!
  • (Future) U.S. FDA-testing and clearance
    • Pursuing FDA clearance costs $31 Million on average[1]. However, with my experience with software testing and FDA regulatory submissions, I believe I can significantly reduce costs. Also, a software-only platform is cheaper to develop and test than medical device hardware.
    • Safety is our top priority in developing this product. We will not be "cutting any corners" and software will be developed in a manner fully compliant with U.S. and international regulations.
  • If we don't reach our goal, we will develop this product as far as we can, and then we'll pursue other means of investment to plow forward.
  • Also, if we hit regulatory roadblocks and COVID-19 subsides in the meantime, we would pivot this technology to treat other conditions.

In summary, you'll get a 3-page synthesis of the medical literature regarding symptom progression and a website with the potential to increase public safety by:

  • Promoting understanding of COVID-19 symptoms among the public
  • Promoting awareness of what actions to take based on symptoms
  • Arming the public with knowledge about how the disease can appear over time
  • Tracking where COVID-19 is headed (geographically) [note: this is a future goal]
  • Potentially determining whether someone should get tested for COVID-19 in an automated fashion
  • Potentially diagnosing COVID-19 using machine learning

The Impact

Let's stop COVID-19 together! This website can truly make a difference!

Risks & Challenges

  • User-reported data is not as accurate as doctor-collected data. This effort will explore whether it is possible to collect reliable data on user-reported symptoms. The project may not be possible if we're unable to obtain reliable user-reported data. One way we'll combat this is by removing duplicate data based on IP address; if one person fills out the survey 100 times, then their data will be omitted from the analysis.
  • The current version of the survey may lack the level of specificity required to successfully identify unique patterns associated with COVID-19. The survey will be refined over time to become more specific where needed; for example, we may add "symptom end date" or the possibility to log a symptom multiple times. For now, the website is as simple as possible to promote as many people as possible to use it.
  • Since becoming a diagnostic platform requires rigorous testing and compliance, we may require millions of dollars in funding to achieve our dreams. We understand that it may not be possible to use the platform for diagnosis, and the pathway to doing that may be long. At a minimum, we do plan to publish the results of our clinical literature review and collected anonymous data to provide insights for future work in this area.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Can you help us to combat COVID-19? Please share our website and encourage others to take our simple, 7-question quiz! www.COVID19orNo.com

 

[1] "The report, which is available online as a PDF, states that the average cost to take a 510(k) product from concept to market is $31 million, and that roughly 77% of that amount is spent on tasks related to FDA regulation." Source: https://www.mddionline.com/how-much-does-510k-d...
