story:
Tramigo Heart has been one of the best kept secrets in Tramigo's history.
The project codename was Sampo, referring to the ancient Finnish mythology of a
sacred artifact which will bring fortune to its bearer.

Latest security and safety related events in Europe and globally made us realize we need to expedite our original release timelines and for that we need your help.

Our goal was not only to develop a technically brilliant safety device, tracker or locator, but something elegant, fun and even healthy.




We believe it's all about connections, to time, to a place, to a state, to a valuable asset or to each other - our loved ones.

Tramigo has been a pioneer in the GPS business since 2002. Years of
experience in vehicle tracking in tough markets and dangerous areas has
taught our team to focus on end-users' need for peace of mind and how
important user friendly and practical features are.

And, yes, we have had our failures on the way, but have learned and risen. We always wanted to develop the best and we have finally done it. Now we ask the world - do you want it?

Connect with us and let's make it alive!



Let us introduce you to haptic technology - touch your Tramigo Heart and make your friend feel it.

With the Heart button you can connect with your friends, send an SOS alarm, activate a motion alarm or a geofence, check the battery level or even configure your device to control 3rd party devices. The beauty lies in the haptic response:

- you can feel if your friend is lost
- you can feel when someone received your SOS alarm
- you can feel the battery level - no more blinking lights or slow app!


(Disclaimer: Your cat could also feel your call but still decide not to come...)



Our industrial design, hardware and software design are from Finland.
Tramigo has been developing various GPS devices for over a decade and
we have global support to help you in all your needs.

Our industrial design was driven by the following key points:
* Easy to personalize - the whole front side is available for your own art
* Simple - only one button, feel the response, can also be easily attached
* Waterproof and durable - no electronic connectors or lights

For base color, we decided to start first with snow white aka innocent white.
Depending on your feedback, we'll be adding more colors!


And here's the summary of our top-notch features so you can focus on
things which are important to you without having to worry about the technology.


Hardware features:
#gps #agps #glonass #gsm #gprs #bluetooth #accelerometer #cloud #tld 
#waterproof #shockproof #longbatterylife #diameter48mm #thickness15mm
#wirelesscharging #singlebuttoninterface #easytoattach #easytopersonalize


Wireless Charging gives you the easiest way to recharge the battery and Heart Bluetooth Beacon can be used to locate Hearts for example indoors. You can have Beacons in different rooms to pinpoint the short-range locations. Excellent way to expand the location info indoors and also the battery life!



We believe remote love can work - especially when you are connecting to your
Heart via Tramigo Cloud. We have developed our Cloud based system since 2014 
and it is already in use with existing Tramigo car security and fleet management devices.

To start using the device couldn't be easier - simply put your device on
the wireless charging pad (yes, it's 2015 and even Deloreans were supposed
to fly, who would charge a device anymore with a wire..?) and feel it wake up.


Software features:                                                                                              #realtimetracking #locationondemand #motionalarm #geofence #lowpoweralarm #sosalarm #fallalarm #pairing #grouping #sharing #emailalarms #smsalarms #encryption #historytrail #statistics #tld #otaupdate 


Each Heart comes with a Magic Cloud Code printed on it. 

1. Use the code to pair your phone app or web account with your device.
2. Share the access to your friends.

We take security and privacy seriously and give you the option to use the device
fully anonymously or register through our browser/app interface. From UI you can
see the latest status of the device, choose the profile you want to use and
change the settings to personalize the device for your optimal use cases.



We are a multinational company with our headquarters and home in Finland. Our sales, support and R&D offices are located in our main markets. We are pioneers and brand builders, a team of highly innovative and persistent entrepreneurs aiming to change the tracking industry and create the first global consumer brand in the tracking product and telematics business. Now we have used our long history to create the best product in personal tracking market, it's called Tramigo Heart.

We wanted to expedite the project from the original Q3/2016 launch and here's the updated timeline:

2014 April, first PCB prototype revision
2014 July, Tramigo Cloud development started
2015 January, fourth PCB prototype revision
2015 March, Tramigo Cloud Beta
2015 May, PCB production version
2015 August, Tramigo Cloud up and running
2015 September, Final casing design

2015 December, Mold production for casing  

2016 February 14th, official launch
2016 February 22nd - 25th, first live presentations at MWC Barcelona 2016
2016 March, early bird shipping
2016 April, EU shipping
2016 May, US shipping
2016 June, Global shipping



Trivia
1) Why do you give specifically a 9 month free data period?
- Well, we thought of natural cycle of love.. and 9 months.. and then the costs which will come.

2) Why is the campaign ending on the 14.1?
- We wanted it to end a month before Valentine's (All Hearts) day which would be the official release day.

3) What was the budget for this IndieGoGo campaign?
- 0 USD. Well, there was eventually some trademark, model design and patenting costs. Some travels also but mostly time - and we enjoyed every second!

4) Why did you not apply for more patents?
- We love sharing ideas and we would be just flattered for any copies. :)


FAQ

1) Why IndieGoGo campaign?

- Our original plan was to release the Heart in late 2016, but due to the recent safety and security related events in Europe we decided to expedite our timetable, and that's why we need your help.

- We also wanted to show the world what we can deliver and ask the world - do you want this?

2) What is the data cost after the 9 month period?
- Only 4,95 USD/month for EU&US version and for Global version only 9,95 USD/month. No contracts, you can buy prepaid as much as you need via Tramigo Cloud portal.

3) If I buy EU&US version and travel to other countries will my Heart work there as well?
- Yes, but you need to buy the additional Global roaming prepaid package for 9,95 USD/month before being able to use the Heart outside your zone.

4) Which countries are covered with the Global plan?
- Currently in addition to EU & US, the plan includes Argentina, Australia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Brazil, Canada, Chile, China, Columbia, Costa Rica, Dominican republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Faroe Islands, Georgia, Gibraltar, Greenland, Guatemala, Honduras, India, Israel, Kazakhstan, Korean Republic, Malaysia, Mexico, Nepal, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Peru, Philippines, Puerto Rico, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Taiwan, Tajikistan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, Uruguay, Uzbekistan.

We can add countries depending on the requests we receive.

5) Can I see the location of my Tramigo Heart on a map?
- Yes, you can use your phone app or browser to see the history and latest locations of your device and request for an update. You can also turn on live-tracking and you will constantly receive real-time updates when your Heart is moving.

6) Is Tramigo Heart easy to use?
- It is so easy to use that even your kid or pet can use it! If you want, you can deactivate the Heart button and use it as a passive tracker which is small, cool, waterproof and has remarkably long battery life or you can use the Heart button to trigger motion alarm, geofence, SOS or connect it with other Hearts.

7) What is your reference for "Market Leader"?
- We compare to the trackers in this link:
http://gps-tracker-review.toptenreviews.com/

8) What is the warranty for Tramigo Heart?
- We offer one year warranty.

9) What is Tramigo Heart Beacon?
- Tramigo Heart beacon is an accessory which you can use to add indoor locating capabilities for the unit. You can put beacons in different rooms to get detailed information where your Heart is. It is also beneficial in business use for example in offices or warehouses when you want to log incoming/outgoing persons or packages.

_____________________________________________________________________________


From the bottom of Your Heart, how do You feel? Have we done a good job? If so, please support the project and let the actions follow Your Heart!
story_txt:
Tramigo Heart has been one of the best kept secrets in Tramigo's history. The project codename was Sampo, referring to the ancient Finnish mythology of a sacred artifact which will bring fortune to its bearer.
Latest security and safety related events in Europe and globally made us
 realize we need to expedite our original release timelines and for that
 we need your help.
Our goal was not only to develop a technically brilliant safety device, tracker or locator, but something elegant, fun and even healthy.


We believe it's all about connections, to time, to a place, to a state, to a valuable asset or to each other - our loved ones.
Tramigo has been a pioneer in the GPS business since 2002. Years of
experience in vehicle tracking in tough markets and dangerous areas has
taught our team to focus on end-users' need for peace of mind and how
important user friendly and practical features are. 
And, yes, we have had our failures on the way, but have learned and risen. We always wanted to develop the best and we have finally done it. Now we ask the world - do you want it?
Connect with us and let's make it alive!





Let us introduce you to haptic technology - touch your Tramigo Heart and make your friend feel it.
With the Heart button you can connect with your friends, send an SOS alarm, activate a motion alarm or a geofence, check the battery level or even configure your device to control 3rd party devices. The beauty lies in the haptic response: 
- you can feel if your friend is lost- you can feel when someone received your SOS alarm- you can feel the battery level - no more blinking lights or slow app!





(Disclaimer: Your cat could also feel your call but still decide not to come...)

Our industrial design, hardware and software design are from Finland.Tramigo has been developing various GPS devices for over a decade andwe have global support to help you in all your needs.
Our industrial design was driven by the following key points:* Easy to personalize - the whole front side is available for your own art* Simple - only one button, feel the response, can also be easily attached* Waterproof and durable - no electronic connectors or lights
For base color, we decided to start first with snow white aka innocent white.Depending on your feedback, we'll be adding more colors!

And here's the summary of our top-notch features so you can focus onthings which are important to you without having to worry about the technology.Hardware features:#gps #agps #glonass #gsm #gprs #bluetooth #accelerometer #cloud #tld  #waterproof #shockproof #longbatterylife #diameter48mm #thickness15mm#wirelesscharging #singlebuttoninterface #easytoattach #easytopersonalizeWireless Charging gives you the easiest way to recharge the battery and Heart Bluetooth Beacon can be used to locate Hearts for example indoors. You can have Beacons in different rooms to pinpoint the short-range locations. Excellent way to expand the location info indoors and also the battery life!We believe remote love can work - especially when you are connecting to yourHeart via Tramigo Cloud. We have developed our Cloud based system since 2014 and it is already in use with existing Tramigo car security and fleet management devices.To start using the device couldn't be easier - simply put your device onthe wireless charging pad (yes, it's 2015 and even Deloreans were supposedto fly, who would charge a device anymore with a wire..?) and feel it wake up.Software features:                                                                                              #realtimetracking #locationondemand #motionalarm #geofence #lowpoweralarm #sosalarm #fallalarm #pairing #grouping #sharing #emailalarms #smsalarms #encryption #historytrail #statistics #tld #otaupdate 



Each Heart comes with a Magic Cloud Code printed on it. 
1. Use the code to pair your phone app or web account with your device.2. Share the access to your friends.
We take security and privacy seriously and give you the option to use the devicefully anonymously or register through our browser/app interface. From UI you cansee the latest status of the device, choose the profile you want to use andchange the settings to personalize the device for your optimal use cases.



We are a multinational company with our headquarters and home in Finland. Our sales, support and R&D offices are located in our main markets. We are pioneers and brand builders, a team of highly innovative and persistent entrepreneurs aiming to change the tracking industry and create the first global consumer brand in the tracking product and telematics business. Now we have used our long history to create the best product in personal tracking market, it's called Tramigo Heart.








We wanted to expedite the project from the original Q3/2016 launch and here's the updated timeline:

2014 April, first PCB prototype revision2014 July, Tramigo Cloud development started2015 January, fourth PCB prototype revision2015 March, Tramigo Cloud Beta2015 May, PCB production version2015 August, Tramigo Cloud up and running2015 September, Final casing design2015 December, Mold production for casing  2016 February 14th, official launch2016 February 22nd - 25th, first live presentations at MWC Barcelona 20162016 March, early bird shipping2016 April, EU shipping2016 May, US shipping2016 June, Global shipping







Trivia1) Why do you give specifically a 9 month free data period?- Well, we thought of natural cycle of love.. and 9 months.. and then the costs which will come.
2) Why is the campaign ending on the 14.1?- We wanted it to end a month before Valentine's (All Hearts) day which would be the official release day.
3) What was the budget for this IndieGoGo campaign?- 0 USD. Well, there was eventually some trademark, model design and patenting costs. Some travels also but mostly time - and we enjoyed every second!
4) Why did you not apply for more patents?- We love sharing ideas and we would be just flattered for any copies. :)
FAQ1) Why IndieGoGo campaign?- Our original plan was to release the Heart in late 2016, but 
due to the recent safety and security related events in Europe we 
decided to expedite our timetable, and that's why we need your help.

- We also wanted to show the world what we can deliver and ask the world - do you want this?
2) What is the data cost after the 9 month period?- Only 4,95 USD/month for EU&US version and for Global version only 9,95 USD/month. No contracts, you can buy prepaid as much as you need via Tramigo Cloud portal.3) If I buy EU&US version and travel to other countries will my Heart work there as well?- Yes, but you need to buy the additional Global roaming prepaid package for 9,95 USD/month before being able to use the Heart outside your zone.4) Which countries are covered with the Global plan?- Currently in addition to EU & US, the plan includes Argentina, Australia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Brazil, Canada, Chile, China, Columbia, Costa Rica, Dominican republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Faroe Islands, Georgia, Gibraltar, Greenland, Guatemala, Honduras, India, Israel, Kazakhstan, Korean Republic, Malaysia, Mexico, Nepal, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Peru, Philippines, Puerto Rico, Russia, Saudi Arabia, Serbia, Singapore, Taiwan, Tajikistan, Thailand, Turkey, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates, Uruguay, Uzbekistan.We can add countries depending on the requests we receive.5) Can I see the location of my Tramigo Heart on a map?- Yes, you can use your phone app or browser to see the history and latest locations of your device and request for an update. You can also turn on live-tracking and you will constantly receive real-time updates when your Heart is moving.6) Is Tramigo Heart easy to use?- It is so easy to use that even your kid or pet can use it! If you want, you can deactivate the Heart button and use it as a passive tracker which is small, cool, waterproof and has remarkably long battery life or you can use the Heart button to trigger motion alarm, geofence, SOS or connect it with other Hearts.7) What is your reference for "Market Leader"?- We compare to the trackers in this link:http://gps-tracker-review.toptenreviews.com/8) What is the warranty for Tramigo Heart?- We offer one year warranty.9) What is Tramigo Heart Beacon?- Tramigo Heart beacon is an accessory which you can use to add indoor locating capabilities for the unit. You can put beacons in different rooms to get detailed information where your Heart is. It is also beneficial in business use for example in offices or warehouses when you want to log incoming/outgoing persons or packages. _____________________________________________________________________________From the bottom of Your Heart, how do You feel? Have we done a good job? If so, please support the project and let the actions follow Your Heart!

story:
The mission of our technology is to show evidence to individual about his/her mental and somatic health by using modern scientific knowledge and digital technologies for accurately translating biological signals of health status to human friendly output. We consider that everybody should know about his/her health to track, to file, to compare or to share this info.

With this campaign we want to launch a world's first mobile applications that will help people to detect a risk of haemorrhage and chronic pain severity almost on the go. We will provide tools to monitor conditions over time and see the changes. And this is only the beginning!

                    





"This biobehavioral protocol enables measurement of chronic pain suffering and protection in three dimensions: physical, emotional, and cognitive." (Physiology & Behavior 152 203–216. (doi:10.1016/j.physbeh.2015.09.029))

"This study showed that genetic predispositions regarding coagulation are modifiable, which could promote advanced protection against haemorrhages in varieties of traumas and injuries, especially in individuals with coagulation deficits."(Scientific Reports 5 10703. (doi:10.1038/srep10703))


The chronic pain is deeply personal suffering. How do people describe it? The pain is stronger, weaker, worse. But how much? To what extent is it worse, stronger or weaker? And this is all we can get from an individual who can tell us about his or her condition assessing the pain internally by own subjective scale. But what if he or she cannot? Then nobody knows how good or bad he or she feels... Scientists say that there is no evidence that any subjective scale developed by medical and healthcare community can reliably measure pain in individual.

We create a tool which will assist people to objectively assess chronic pain severity. No words needed, just measurement. For you or for those you care after.

You will learn how helpful medications or exercises are and can share this information with your doctor to find better personal solution.

This technology have been successfully used in Workers' compensation legal cases.



We all know that blood is essential for any mammal on our planet. And it is normal for the body to resist to blood loss. However statistical data say that our bodies do not always effectively resist to blood loss due to some negative events, processes and conditions:

It is not so quick and easy to find out if you or your nearest are at risk. If you have no information then you cannot prepare. We will change this.

Our study shows that even genetically determined predisposition to haemorrhage can be modified by conditioning mechanisms. And you will have the opportunity to cope with it by a physical training before the challenge.

We will create a simple mobile app that will let anyone to detect a risk of over-bleeding in minutes, anywhere. It is a replacement for invasive testing (no more visits to doctor and blood analyses). 


Q: How does this work?

To obtain indexes you should follow the below protocol:

  1. Attach finger to phone camera and start recording
  2. Take a lying position following instruction from the device
  3. Relax and keep lying for 4 minutes
  4. Stand up following instruction from the device, keep standing for 4 minutes
  5. The recording stops automatically after collecting all necessary data
  6. The device sends the data to processing center and receives results to display

When the person stands up there is a deep drop in arterial pressure, and we measure the organism’s ability to restore pressure to the normal level by using different physiological mechanisms. Impairments in these mechanisms are related to impairments in health. This response was scientifically proved to predict most chronic diseases like the development of chronic pain.

Q: Why do you launch two mobile apps?

Technically it is possible to create one mobile app for all indexes. However, we are on the start point. Several simpler apps help us to be more flexible in the R&D and better fit with user requirements.

Q: Can I try it right now?

Yes! We have a demo mobile apps already available for iOS and Android. You can easily find it at the app stores by keyword Salutex. However, it only includes overall health indexes.

Q: Does anybody already use this technology?

Yes. This technology have been successfully used for US Worker's compensation legal cases. Nobody else can give such an objective and complex metric for an individual health status.

Q: Why is the subscription model?

Because we do not use your phone for data precessing. The algorithms are not simple and require some processing power. There is a cost for processing data for every measurement.

Q: Do I need to type some additional data like my gender?

We never ask for personal information like your income, gender, age, diagnoses, phone number, etc. We never ask you to type what you eat or how much is your weight. We never ask your chest size, skin color or how much you move or drink. Most demographic variables, life style and behavioral activities influence on your body signals and our apps detects and translates them in health status numbers you obtain.

We develop a truly disruptive technology and we need your help to get it out of the lab and bring to people. We strive to let people use products based on latest scientific findings. What else these findings for!

We are small but passionate team, we can do a lot with your help!


We consider that everybody is dreaming about different possible future realities. We develop an instrument you can use to create a kind of future realities you would be happy to live. 

We want everyone to live to their fullest!

Join us and we will create a better, healthier World!

story:
EAGLEYE PUTTER

   Machined out of a solid billet of 303 stainless steel, the EAGLEYE putter is a precise, no nonsense, no compromise piece of equipment. It is perimeter weighted for a high moment of inertia (MOI) to resist twisting. 

  In the "Tournament Play" position, it is designed to meet all R&A and USGA regulations for tournament play.         


   

                                 Play Front                                                               Play Rear

 In the "Practice Round" position, a reversible stainless steel panel includes a mirror surface that enables the golfer to see exactly what the putter face sees, resulting in unprecedented putt alignment accuracy.     

 

     

                       Practice Front                                                         Practice Rear

Conversion from "PRACTICE" to "PLAY" literally takes seconds, with no tedious adjustments involved. Material is neither added or removed, assuring a seamless conversion from mode to mode. Putter feel, head weight and balance remain unchanged. Of the hundreds of putter training aids available, EAGLEYE offers the simplest, most precise option in the industry…you train and play with the SAME club.  It is unrivaled for providing the information needed to accurately and consistently align your putter face. Club alignment is no longer guesswork, it's now…DEAD-ON accurate. You see EXACTLY what the putter sees.    

                               

                                       Golfer's View (Practice Round CAD Drawing)

   Whether you are a seasoned golfer looking to make a significant improvement in your putting game, or if you are new to golf and interested in a huge head start, EAGLEYE may well be the Game Changer you have been looking for.

  Not only will you be among the first to play this remarkable putter, you will be part of golf history. YOU will have helped bring to the game perhaps the most significant equipment improvement since metal drivers.

  The EAGLEYE putter is so elegant, so simple and so obviously effective, that more extensive explanation is unnecessary. This confidence is backed by our 60 day no hassle, full refund guarantee*. 

Thanks so much for helping us bring this truly exciting piece of equipment to the game of golf!

We welcome any questions or thoughts you might have.

info@eagleyegolf.com 

EAGLEYE Golf

1.800.332.4644

* If for ANY REASON you are not completely satisfied with your EAGLEYE putter, simply return the (new condition) putter to us within 60 days for a 100% refund.

EAGLEYE Tips to maximize the unique features of your EAGLEYE putter:

Use your EAGLEYE putter ANYTIME you want to see EXACTLY where the putter is aiming.

Practice developing increasingly accurate aim and stroke with or without a ball.

On the practice green, select and view targets as required by the break.

Learn to use EAGLEYE during actual practice rounds to see and align to virtually any target.

Gradually move toward eliminating alignment errors from your putting game.

Again, and in short, use your EAGLEYE putter ANYTIME you want to see EXACTLY where the putter is aiming.

EAGLEYE Specifications (Patent Pending)

Material:                       Milled 303 Stainless Steel

Base Weight:               370 grams

Loft:                                3°

Heel/Toe Weights:    (2ea.) Base, +10g, +20g (included)

Wrench:                         Stainless Steel (included)

Shaft:                              DBL Bend, 34", 35", 36" length (specify)

Lie:                                   72°

Hand:                               L/R (specify)

Head Cover:                   BLK Faux Leather, w/Magnetic Closure (included)


     

                             Head Cover                                              Weights & Wrench 

  

Contributions to EAGLEYE will be used to:

--Complete final tooling
--Purchase materials and components
--Manufacture perks and initial inventory
--Set-up fulfilment facility
--Set-up administrative systems
--Develop marketing materials
--Fund start-up overhead (staff, facility, etc.)

story:
Get Lean is a Thermogenic Fat Burning Supplement Stack designed to help you lose weight without feeling hungry. It combines Fat Metabolizers, Stress Metabolizers and Appetite Suppressants that work together to burn your fat, conserve your muscle and squash your hunger. The stack is a well-researched blend of 19 all-natural ingredients. After successfully using these same ingredients to shed my unwanted weight, I knew I had to share this powerful stack with everyone. I formed Voss Nutraceuticals to deliver these same proven organic ingredients into a single, high-quality supplement stack that’s simple, effective and affordable. 



Its the synergistic combination of ingredients in Get Lean that make it so powerful. How do I know this? Because they worked for me. On April 18th, of this year, I weighed in at over 244lbs. I began taking the stack of ingredients in Get Lean using separate over-the-counter supplements. In order to do this,  I had to take 17 different supplements and over 25 pills a day. It was expensive and not very simple. For disclosure, I am 46 years old and a busy father with four young children. I do not have much time to exercise if at all. During this process, I did not increase my exercise or purposely starve myself. I just made healthier food choices and ate less because I found that I was no longer hungry. Weighing myself daily using a WiThings WiFi Scale, my weight, lean mass and fat mass were recorded electronically. Over a six-week period I dropped over 35lbs. More importantly, when I did the statistical analysis from my data, not only did I drop 15% of my total body weight, but I lost 35% of my total fat mass as opposed to only 9% of my total lean body mass. The results spoke for themselves. The combination of ingredients in Get Lean work; even better than I could have imagined. I plan on continuing to drop more weight and hopefully finding some time to work out at the gym to add back a bit of muscle. Best of all, with Get Lean, I know I will reach my goals.



Its important because there are millions of us out there struggling with weight. We are stressed out, hungry and maybe feeling a little hopeless. I want you to know that you don’t have to feel that way! I believe that the toughest hurdle in weight loss for most people is controlling hunger. When you’re not hungry, you’re not over-eating or eating at the wrong times. When you’re not hungry, you’re making healthier food choices and eating intuitively rather than impulsively! When you’re not hungry, you’re not as likely to fail at reaching your goal! 

Get Lean has a potent combination of two very effective, all-natural appetite suppressants. But controlling hunger is not enough. You have to keep your metabolism up while you are dieting. Reduced calorie diets can slow your metabolism and kill your weight loss progress. There are 15 different Thermogenic Fat Metabolizing ingredients in Get Lean that will keep your metabolism revved while you lose weight. But you'll also need to control your stress if you want to lose weight effectively! Get Lean’s five all-natural ingredients aimed at fighting stress are proven to reduce the amount of Cortisol in the body. Cortisol can keep you from losing weight because it slows your metabolism and stimulates the body to store fat. Get Lean’s Stress Metabolizers help eliminate Cortisol in the body to keep your body in fat burning mode. In fact, every organic ingredient in Get Lean is targeted at eliminating the roadblocks that can keep you from reaching your weight loss goals. They squash your hunger, fight your stress and stimulate your metabolism to burn  fat. Its a simple solution to a complex problem.



Indiegogo, we need your help to bring this simple, affordable and effective weight-loss stack to anyone that wants to shed unwanted weight without feeling hungry. We are looking to raise $15,000 to launch our product in a little over eight weeks after funding closes. The money will be used to:

  • Contract with an FDA-Approved, NSF certified, CGMP Manufacturer to produce the product at-scale for lower overall production costs.
  • Source the purest, highest quality, organic ingredients from around the world.
  • Test and verify the formula’s composition for quality and purity for GMP Compliance from a certified laboratory. 
  • Submit and receive approval on the Supplement Facts panel.
  • Cover the costs for Blending, Encapsulating, Bottling, the Bottle and all of its accessories (Desiccant Pack for freshness, Cotton Stuffer, Lid, Heat Induction Seal under the Cap, and Tamper Proof Neck Band Seal), Labeling, and Bulk Shipment.
  • Deliver Get Lean to our early backers in a timely and efficient time frame of 8 weeks once we have received our funding.

We appreciate your support! As an early supporter, you will receive a discount code at launch good for 25% off your first purchase and free shipping through our website!

You should support this campaign because the supplement stack works. More importantly, it is being produced and delivered at a far lower cost than recreating the stack on your own by purchasing separate supplements. When the stack was originally tested, we used over 17 different supplements purchased online or through local health food shops to simulatethe stack found in Get Lean. At an average cost of around $21 each, our cost was over $350 for the stack. It was expensive and not very simple. We are bringing Get Lean to market at a suggested retail price of $44.95. More importantly, Get Lean simplifies the number of different supplements and reduces the total number of pills necessary to recreate this stack. 



We have researched and identified one of the top CGMP Supplement Manufacturers in the country. We have researched all of the ingredients in the stack. We have identified our ingredient sources. Every ingredient in Get Lean will be certified organic. Each and every ingredient in Get Lean is safe and does not appear on any banned substances lists published by professional or collegiate sports organizations. The product is the highest quality, custom crafted, supplement stack that will be available. So in a nutshell, you are supporting a Signature Thermogenic Fat Burning Stack that is safe, effective, and best of all simple.

We need your help in making Get Lean a reality. Your support will help get a valuable resource into the hands of people who desperately need the help and support in achieving their goals. Your support, whether financially or just by spreading the word is greatly appreciated. So please, spread the word and support Get Lean.


The risks involved in this project surround funding. We need to place a substantial minimum order with our CGMP Supplement Manufacturer that is substantial. They were chosen based on a long list of critical factors. One advantage of our chosen Manufacturer was a short lead time to delivery of the product. We felt this was an added benefit to our backers, ensuring they would receive their perks in a timely manner. But in order to be fair and to make sure we can cover the substantial minimum order, we have chosen a Fixed Campaign. Therefore, if we do not raise enough to meet our target funds, all monies will be returned. If this were to occur, our launch date would be pushed back until alternative funding sources were secured. 

We strongly believe that Get Lean will be the highest quality, custom crafted supplement stack available in the market. We are working hard to ensure its success. Your financial support is vital. So is sharing our our story. Please share this campaign and help us spread the word. The more people who hear about us, the more likely we are to meet our funding goals.   


If you like what you see, but just can't contribute at this time, we understand. But you can still help us by spreading the word. We need your help to do this! Please share our campaign with friends, family, co-workers or anyone you feel might have interest or benefit. Share this on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, or Instagram. Use the Indiegogo share tools or just email someone that might be interested. We are so grateful for your support! We appreciate you taking the time to look at our Indiegogo campaign. Please visit us at our website and get on our email list for further updates on Get Lean and future exciting products. Again, we truly appreciate your support!



Can I just recreate this stack on my own?

Absolutely. You can go out and buy all of the ingredients in this stack through separate supplements and you will get results. The main benefit to GET LEAN is that the total number of capsules you would need to swallow is far fewer and the total out of pocket cost for the stack is much, much less. In addition to the dramatic cost savings and simplicity of a single supplement, you'll get the added benefit of knowing that GET LEAN has only the highest quality combination of organic ingredients. That is a key focus in our custom blend. When you buy multiple supplements separately from different manufacturers, you increase the chances that one or more of the purchased supplements contains lower quality ingredients. I'm referencing the the incident from February of this year where it was discovered that many popular herbal supplements at Target, Walmart and Walgreens stores weren't what their labels claimed, according to DNA testing that had found numerous store brand supplements to be fake or highly adulterated and contaminated. GET LEAN's ingredients are guaranteed 100% pure, organic and unadulterated. With GET LEAN, you can be confident in what you are putting into your body.

How much did you exercise while you were taking the ingredients in GET LEAN?

Honestly, not very much. I am not a hardcore gym rat or exercise fanatic. I'm a 46 year old regular guy with children ages 7, 12, 13 and 14. I work as a Sales Executive in the steel industry and my job and family keep me very busy.  I am not left with much time to exercise, if at all. I belong to a gym, but I am embarrassed to say that I haven't been there in months. I have a stationary bicycle that I ride on average 4 hours a week. That was the extent of my exercise during my six week weight loss program. No more and no less than prior to beginning the process.

Your total weight, BMI and body fat percentage isn't that impressive, why should I trust someone that isn't in top shape about a weight loss product?

There are many, many reasons why you should. First, I'm just an average guy. If you're an average guy or girl looking for a weight loss supplement, you should look to someone similar to yourself who has achieved their weight loss goals in order to be successful yourself. If you look to bodybuilders or fitness trainers, you will probably struggle more to succeed. Bodybuilders and fitness trainers sometimes workout for 14 or more hours a week. Its their job. Unless you can do the same, you will probably have trouble duplicating their success. I'm 46, have kids, a job and lead a busy life. After years of research, trials, struggles, and great expense, I discovered a stack that really works in spite of all that. If you're like me and you struggle to find the time to exercise regularly, sometimes don't eat the healthiest diet because your always hungry or deal with stress in your daily life, Get Lean is a winning solution. It will help you lose weight without being hungry and you won't have to turn yourself into a gym rat to see results. 

Second, I would be highly skeptical of weight loss supplements with pitch men or women who are just too physically perfect. They are likely paid models or professional trainers who put weight on by abandoning their normal routine and then lost it all by returning to their normal routine of intense exercise and strict diet. Most of us just can't do that with our hectic lives. This is a recipe for failure and often creates frustration and feelings of hopelessness. Get Lean works for average people who lead normal lives. No matter how busy, how stressed or how many times they have struggled in the past. All that is required is to take Get Lean regularly and have the desire to lose weight.

Lastly, weight loss is a process. Yes, I am proud of the fact that I lost 35lbs. But I also know that I want to drop even more weight. My goal is to get my total body fat down to approximately 15lbs, which would put me around 190lbs and under 8% body fat. I know I can get there with the help of Get Lean, but I also know that it will take more time to do so. Your body goes through weight loss plateaus and losing too much weight too fast isn't always that good for you. The easiest weight to lose is always the weight that was most recently gained because you body still sees that weight as being "abnormal". My "normal" weight for most of my late thirties and early forties was around 220lbs and I have typically gained weight and then lost it again plateauing around the 220lbs area. With Get Lean, I greatly surpassed my goals and lost 11lbs more than my "normal" weight, but that first 24lbs was the quickest to come off. Losing an additional 19lbs or so beyond the 209lbs mark might take me a little bit longer, but I know I will get there if I stick to using Get Lean stack and adjusting my diet/ exercise whenever I hit a plateau. And by sticking with the program and taking time for my body to adjust, I will trigger my body to set a new lower "normal" weight. It has worked for em and I know it will work for you too! 

How long will I have to wait to receive my bottle(s) of GET LEAN?

We anticipate being able to deliver the product within 8 weeks after successful funding. That is 8 weeks from the time we are funded until the time it arrives at your doorstep. Our Current Good Manufacturing Processor (CGMP) has assured us of this timeline. We will do everything we can to ensure that you receive your product as expediently as possible and will keep you informed of all developments in an effort to be completely transparent throughout this process. Our hope is that we can deliver GET LEAN to our backers earlier than our stated goal and will work toward making that happen.

What makes GET LEAN any different than the host of other weight loss supplements already available in the market today?

GET LEAN is different from the host of other weight loss supplements currently available because of its unique, custom crafted blend of 19 all-natural, organic ingredients. You probably recognize or have tried some of the ingredients in GET LEAN, but I would bet that there are more than a few that you haven't. More importantly, I know you haven't tried this potent combination. Yes, you might be able to find a supplement that has one, two, three or more of the ingredients in GET LEAN, but you won't find any out there with GET LEAN's potent, carefully designed combination. Each ingredient was carefully researched and selected to give you and your body, the best possible chance of succeeding at your weight loss goals. GET LEAN's ingredients squash your hunger, rid your body of fat-storing cortisol, and supercharge your metabolism to burn off its fat stores. GET LEAN's unique blend of lesser known, but highly effective ingredients like Carralluma Fimbriata, Evodiamine, and Ashwagandha sets it heads and shoulders above the multitude of other weight loss supplements available in the market today.

GET LEAN is different from the host of other weight loss supplements currently available because of its unique, custom crafted blend of 19 all-natural, organic ingredients. You probably recognize or have tried some of the ingredients in GET LEAN, but I would bet that there are more than a few that you haven't. More importantly, I know you haven't tried this potent combination. Yes, you might be able to find a supplement that has one, two, three or more of the ingredients in GET LEAN, but you won't find any out there with GET LEAN's potent, carefully designed combination. Each ingredient was carefully researched and selected to give you and your body, the best possible chance of succeeding at your weight loss goals. GET LEAN's ingredients squash your hunger, rid your body of fat-storing cortisol, and supercharge your metabolism to burn off its fat stores. GET LEAN's unique blend of lesser known, but highly effective ingredients like Carralluma Fimbriata, Evodiamine, and Ashwagandha sets it heads and shoulders above the multitude of other weight loss supplements available in the market today.

story:
Wall-It is a super cool, innovative and effective product that will help you perfect your surroundings.

Express your creativity by making your belongings more accessible, decorative and easier to find than ever with Wall-It.

Wall-It was designed to allow the use of ANY vertical surface to organize objects lying around in a neat, accessible and conspicuous environment.

The idea for Wall-It came from spider webs. How cool would it be if you could attach objects onto any surface through simple contact? Now you can with Wall-It!  

Currently, you are limited to placing objects on horizontal surfaces while vertical surfaces are accessible all around you. Imagine how much more available space will be at your disposition thanks to Wall-It!

Technology:

Wall-It is a polymer pad with built-in micro suction cups that enable it to adhere to any surface.

Be the first to order and set a new trend. Match and blend colors with your interior design. Let your imagination guide you and find your own usage.

Advantages:

·  Flexible, light, & portable.

·  Easy to install and uninstall, clean.

·  Futuristic design and available in multiple colors suiting your interior design.

·  Built to last, infinitely reusable, can be cleaned with water.


Stretch Goals:

Currently, we are offering Wall-It in 2 colors: Blue and Transparent.
Wider choices of colors to match your interior design and have fun with will be offered as each of the goals beneath are reached:

Next Goal to Reach - $10,000:


Next Goal to Reach - $15,000:


Next Goal to Reach - $20,000:


Next Goal to Reach - $25,000:


Reached stretch goals are shared by all supporters, including those that claimed Wall-It before the goal was reached! 

Your help:

Thanks to your support we will be able to advance to full scale production and integrate this incredible product into your everyday life. Every donation matters to us.

As a token of our appreciation, you will be among the first to receive a Wall-It and benefit from the low Indiegogo campaign prices. So please consider backing Wall-It, and share it with your friends. Prices include shipping.

Other Ways to Help

If you like Wall-It, please consider sharing it using the share buttons (on the left side of the video) with your friends and family. This will help spread the word!

We are extremely grateful!

Production & Delivery

We are using a trusted manufacturer. We’ve already initiated the tooling for Wall-It and we expect to ship on September 30th, meaning your Wall-Its will arrive before October 30th.

Who we are:

Hi guys, we are Harry and Deborah, a married couple and Engineering graduates. Hello, I am Patrick, an experienced Engineer and Marketing Manager.Together, we developed Wall-It!

Frequently Asked Questions

Does Wall-It stick to any surface?
It sticks to any vertical surface. The smoother the surface is the better Wall-It will stick to it.

What is the maximum weight Wall-It can hold?
It depends on how smooth the surfaces in contact with Wall-It are. You can easily attach an Ipad or a Harry Potter book, and it will work perfectly.

Is Wall-It reusable?
Yes, definitely!

Does it leave the surface clean?
Yes, Wall-It leaves any surface trace-less.

Will it still work with dust or dirt on it?
When Wall-It is too dirty, wash it with clear water to restore its initial properties.

Can I choose my color?
As each goal is reached, a wider choice of colors is offered. At the end of the campaign, ALL backers will choose the colors in which they want to receive their Wall-Its from ALL the colors unlocked.

I ordered multiple Wall-Its, can I choose to receive them in several different colors?
YES, you can choose from all the colors whose goals were reached.

Where do you ship?
Prices include shipping fees to North America and Europe.




To stay in the amazing apartment in the video: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1138784

story:
The History of Grind Time Facilities

My name is Jacob Almaraz, Owner of Grind Time Facilities. Playing sports has been a major part of my life, beginning at the age of 3 and still to this very day. Playing baseball at the Professional level, has given me a good understanding of what athletes need to attain in order to be successful in life and their athletic career. In Late 2014, I took the same drive and passion I had for baseball and started Grind Time Facilities. It was anything but easy, it took a lot of physical labor from myself as well as family and friends, to make this dream happen. All of the original finances and hard work has got us this far and we are grateful for everything to this point. Now we need your help in taking Grind Time Facilities to the next level.

The Purpose and Passion

Purpose is to purchase equipment necessities in order to take all Grind Time athletes to the next level. This would allow us to get the equipment we need to make it possible to provide the best training, no matter your location. Every athlete deserves the chance to be #GTFBRANDED. It is my passion to give athletes the tools they need to be as successful as they want.  With your help and generosity, we will be able to train our athletes in ways we could only have hoped and dreamed about. These future Grind Time Athletes could be your son or daughter, allowing you to support our vision, as we have a direct impact in their life. Although there are many, advantages through our future equipment, no matter the location of the athlete we can provide some of the beast training via. video. Furthermore, there will be the added option of science and data based analysis. It’s the next best thing, other than having me there in person.

                                     

    

What We Need 

The funding amount we need to get this all done is ($15,000 + fees) and with that we would be able to purchase the equipment needed to give our athletes the training they deserve. We also have to keep in mind the 5% fee for Indiegogo and a 3% processing fee, the more funding the better for you and our athletes.

Where Funding will go

 100% of this campaigns funds will be put right back in to Grind Time Facilities, to take our current and future athletes to the next level. Reaching our goal would have a lasting impact, for years to come. Using a pie chart, showing a financial breakdown of how funds will be spent. See image below for breakdown.                                                                                                                                                                                               ​                                                                                                                                                                                        

Equipment

  • The new VertiMax V8 EX “Extended Range” is a training system designed to help athletes maximize speed and sport-specific performance. The V8 EX innovation extends off-platform training distances out to 60 feet (which is twice the range offered by the original Vertimax V-series models).

 

          VertiMax V8 EX

  • With new interactions and capabilities, our PRO system is the most advanced REHAB AND RECOVERY solution on the market. Customize every aspect of your compression therapy with our advanced TOUCHSCREEN interface.

  

         Normatec Pro

  • TRAINING RECOVERY:Produces a muscle twitch. Clears lactic acid, increases blood flow, promotes muscle relaxation and enables a faster recovery.

Compex USA Pro

Perks!

The list of awesome and unique perks we have to offer are located in the column to the right. This is a way for us to say thank you for partnering with us! There are many exciting perks but a few are, starting from custom GTF gear all the way to actual training sessions at Grind Time Facilities physical location, or anywhere else in the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

Keep the momentum going, shearing with family and friends. Another great way to help is to re-post the link on to your social medias, a great way to gain exposure for the campaign. All of this helps Grind Time Facilities get one step closer to our goal.

Saying Thank You

With your donations we could bring high quality equipment to our facilities and give the athletes in our community and around the world (Via Beast Sensor) the best possible sport specific experience; the kind that they deserve. I try very hard to make sure they get the best quality work out and training, but I can only do so much on my own. If you make any contribution, you will be helping me to help others. Thank you for helping us and considering us. From Grind Time Facilities we wish you a blessed and healthy life.

Spread the Word!

Please share on social media!

story:
My sheltie, Roxy, was attacked on Thursday night (8/1), by a rottweiler.  I was out of town with her and my other dogs, and she was rushed to the local emergency vet, bleeding from her abdomen.  She was found dragging her behind, so I anticipated broken bones / spine, but thankfully, the vet took x-rays and found everything to be soft tissue damage.  While this sounds "better," she still needed exploratory surgery to determine the amount of damage that was actually done.

I left her at the emergency vet at around 11 pm Thursday evening, and received a phone call from them around 2 am, saying that surgery had gone well.  In their surgery, they discovered that all of her abdominal muscles, pelvic floor muscles, and muscles down her one back leg were shredded.  The vet described the way the muscles looked as "ground hamburger meat" and said there was nothing to sew back together.  They closed the wounds and sutured her up, and they put in a drain for any fluid to drain.  She got an injectable antibiotic, and was sent home with Tramadol and Metacam for pain.  The vet said they weren't able to tell what the long-term extent of the damage was, due to the fact that vascular (blood vessel) damage could not be determined at the time, and that we just had to wait and see.  They said if she had a lot of tissue dying off due to severe vascular damage, she would need another surgery later on.

She went home at 8 am later that morning (Friday, 8/2), with the advice to keep her on puppy pads and make sure her wounds stayed clean.  Someone local ran out to get puppy pads, and she was given her meds.  



^ Roxy in her crate after coming home from the emergency vet 



^ Roxy all groggy 

She doesn't look all that bad in the photos, since most of the damage was to her belly area, but she was really out of it.  I wish I had taken a picture of her belly initially, looking back, just to show progression, because her belly was a dark purple, super bruised and angry looking.

She wasn't really wanting to eat or drink, and she didn't pee or poo.  I called the emergency vet, they said not to worry, she would in time.

On Saturday (8/3), I discovered she had another wound on her backside, above her rear, that was oozing.  I called the emergency vet that had treated her, and asked what I should do, and whether she should come in.  From what I could tell, the actual opening of the wound was small (half dime size), but it felt like there was a larger air pocket, and I didn't want complications to arise.  I called the emergency vet and they commented that because she had had the shot of antibiotics, that would work for 2 weeks and the wound wouldn't get infected, so there was no need to bring her in. 

They said to keep the wound clean, so later that night, myself and another person trimmed the fur around her wound the best we could.  We both felt the wound was larger than what we could see, but the vet said not to worry, and to tell my vet when I saw them at home.

Sunday (8/4), Roxy took her first steps, and I believe she peed and pood for the first time since the incident!  She hobbled around like a baby deer, with her hips jutted way out to the side, and her butt really low to the ground, but she WALKED!  It was only a few steps, but this was amazing, considering the emergency vet wasn't sure whether or not she would ever get up again.

Monday night (8/5), I got home.  I placed Roxy in my yard to go potty, and she walked around some more!  She also peed and poo'd again.  



^ her belly on Monday evening, you can see the drain on the left side.  This is actually an improvement in that a lot of the swelling and bruising had gone down since the incident

Tuesday morning (8/6), Roxy had an appointment with my regular vet, Dr. Jenn at Beecher Veterinary.  I explained the situation to the vet there (and actually, they knew about it, as the emergency vet had called them, and then Beecher had called me, to offer support).  Dr. Jenn wanted to first see the secondary wound that I had found, and wasn't thrilled about the way the emergency vet had brushed it off.  She had clippers there, and was able to clip down the fur around the wound and remove the dead skin that had formed the air pocket that I had told the emergency vet about.  Well, the wound that the emergency vet had brushed off was actually a half-dollar-coin+ sized injury, with a lot of tissue that needed to be debrided.

^ before debriding



^ after some debriding (removing some dead tissue)

We set an appointment to come back to the vet on Thursday (8/8) for a re-check and more debridement.  Dr. Jenn also sent me home with chlorhexidine (a disinfectant solution to wipe Roxy down with), an ointment for her wounds, and clavamox (an additional, more broad-spectrum antibiotic).



^ Roxy resting at home that evening

Roxy also had her drain removed at that vet appointment, though due to her still significant amount of drainage, the hole was not closed, so drainage could continue.

Dr. Jenn also advised that I should clipper her entire back end, so as to expose any other injuries she might have.  Also, this would prevent the drainage fluid from being trapped next to her skin (by her fur) and would allow her less irritation and to be kept cleaner.

Dr. Jenn advised that I seriously consider hyperbaric oxygen therapy at a vet out in Aurora, as this would speed healing and likely improve her overall prognosis.  She gave me enough info on the vet that I was able to call, and set up an appointment / consult for Friday morning.



^ Roxy after her first shave session -- you can see additional wounds above her hip


^ Roxy finally sleeping

On Thursday (8/8), I returned to Beecher Veterinary with Roxy, where Dr. Jenn again debrided her wounds and re-checked Roxy.  She initially suggested that we schedule a surgery the following week, to repair her belly even further.  She wanted to wait a bit (hence mentioning the following week), due to the inflammation that was still present in her belly, and the edema in her injured leg.  She said that due to her current state, the tissue would not hold in stitches, so we had to wait for some additional healing before we could move forward.  I told her how we had an appointment / consult scheduled for Roxy the following day at VCA Aurora (for the hyperbaric oxygen therapy),  and she said that we would wait and see what happened with that, before we move forward with anything reconstructive.

Friday (today - 8/9), I went to VCA Aurora with Roxy, about an hour from home.  I met with Dr. Abel in the surgery department.  We talked about Roxy, her options, and he also highly recommended the hyperbaric oxygen treatment, given her condition.  He said that this would allow oxygen to get to areas that are having difficulty with that due to injury / lack of blood flow, which would speed healing.  I signed the paperwork and Roxy is currently there, getting her first two hyperbaric oxygen therapy treatments.

^ VCA Aurora -- where Dr. Jenn referred me



^ Sign at VCA Aurora about hyperbaric oxygen therapy that they offer



^ Roxy waiting at VCA Aurora.  Had to shave higher up, and finally had to shave her tail, as she kept tucking it under and getting it all icky with her drainage (which is still continuing full force)



^ Roxy chilling at VCA Aurora after Dr. Abel examined her



^ can see her major wound and many of the smaller puncture wounds here

^ two of the other bigger puncture wounds, black due to dead tissue that the vet says will slough off 



^ Dr. Abel says this looks great!  And that I'm doing a good job with keeping it clean and medicated / ointment-ed

So, this is where we are right now.  I will go pick up Roxy later tonight from the vet once her two hyperbaric oxygen therapy treatments are complete, and then more will be scheduled for this upcoming week.

This is where you come in.  I love my dogs to death, and I would do anything for them, but I am not rich.  This is one of several unexpected large expenses recently, and I am almost out of credit card to keep charging it on.  I run a chinchilla and small animal rescue, and that is what pays my bills -- as you may imagine, it isn't making me rich, but it allows me to help animals and be around them all the time.  I want to give Roxy the best treatment she can, and I want to continue with everything she needs, which vets say may or may not include reconstructive surgery on her belly (to close up the wounds), range of motion therapy / physical therapy, and more.  We are currently at $1,800 with the deposit I put down at VCA Aurora today (deposit was $566.63, which is expected to be about half), and are looking at a minimum of $2500 or so, to complete the hyperbaric oxygen treatments.  Hopefully, this will eliminate the need for the reconstructive surgery, though of course, she will still need daily meds and treatment.  



^ vet bill from the emergency vet in Ohio



^ vet bill from Beecher Veterinary (home vet)



^ treatment plan and estimate at VCA Aurora



^ deposit paid at VCA Aurora

Roxy is the happiest dog I have ever known.  She has never met a stranger, and even through all of this, she occasionally will wag her tail.  All I want is the chance for her to get back to a normal life, where she can run, play, and return to the happy-go-lucky dog that I know.  

happy Roxy!

I appreciate anything you can give, every little bit helps, and I know she does as well.  Thanks so much for reading.

^ Roxy all groggy She doesn't look all that bad in the photos, since most of the damage was to her belly area, but she was really out of it.  I wish I had taken a picture of her belly initially, looking back, just to show progression, because her belly was a dark purple, super bruised and angry looking.She wasn't really wanting to eat or drink, and she didn't pee or poo.  I called the emergency vet, they said not to worry, she would in time.On Saturday (8/3), I discovered she had another wound on her backside, above her rear, that was oozing.  I called the emergency vet that had treated her, and asked what I should do, and whether she should come in.  From what I could tell, the actual opening of the wound was small (half dime size), but it felt like there was a larger air pocket, and I didn't want complications to arise.  I called the emergency vet and they commented that because she had had the shot of antibiotics, that would work for 2 weeks and the wound wouldn't get infected, so there was no need to bring her in. They said to keep the wound clean, so later that night, myself and another person trimmed the fur around her wound the best we could.  We both felt the wound was larger than what we could see, but the vet said not to worry, and to tell my vet when I saw them at home.Sunday (8/4), Roxy took her first steps, and I believe she peed and pood for the first time since the incident!  She hobbled around like a baby deer, with her hips jutted way out to the side, and her butt really low to the ground, but she WALKED!  It was only a few steps, but this was amazing, considering the emergency vet wasn't sure whether or not she would ever get up again.Monday night (8/5), I got home.  I placed Roxy in my yard to go potty, and she walked around some more!  She also peed and poo'd again.  
^ her belly on Monday evening, you can see the drain on the left side.  This is actually an improvement in that a lot of the swelling and bruising had gone down since the incidentTuesday morning (8/6), Roxy had an appointment with my regular vet, Dr. Jenn at Beecher Veterinary.  I explained the situation to the vet there (and actually, they knew about it, as the emergency vet had called them, and then Beecher had called me, to offer support).  Dr. Jenn wanted to first see the secondary wound that I had found, and wasn't thrilled about the way the emergency vet had brushed it off.  She had clippers there, and was able to clip down the fur around the wound and remove the dead skin that had formed the air pocket that I had told the emergency vet about.  Well, the wound that the emergency vet had brushed off was actually a half-dollar-coin+ sized injury, with a lot of tissue that needed to be debrided.^ before debriding
^ after some debriding (removing some dead tissue)We set an appointment to come back to the vet on Thursday (8/8) for a re-check and more debridement.  Dr. Jenn also sent me home with chlorhexidine (a disinfectant solution to wipe Roxy down with), an ointment for her wounds, and clavamox (an additional, more broad-spectrum antibiotic).
^ Roxy resting at home that eveningRoxy also had her drain removed at that vet appointment, though due to her still significant amount of drainage, the hole was not closed, so drainage could continue.Dr. Jenn also advised that I should clipper her entire back end, so as to expose any other injuries she might have.  Also, this would prevent the drainage fluid from being trapped next to her skin (by her fur) and would allow her less irritation and to be kept cleaner.Dr. Jenn advised that I seriously consider hyperbaric oxygen therapy at a vet out in Aurora, as this would speed healing and likely improve her overall prognosis.  She gave me enough info on the vet that I was able to call, and set up an appointment / consult for Friday morning.
^ Roxy after her first shave session -- you can see additional wounds above her hip
^ Roxy finally sleepingOn Thursday (8/8), I returned to Beecher Veterinary with Roxy, where Dr. Jenn again debrided her wounds and re-checked Roxy.  She initially suggested that we schedule a surgery the following week, to repair her belly even further.  She wanted to wait a bit (hence mentioning the following week), due to the inflammation that was still present in her belly, and the edema in her injured leg.  She said that due to her current state, the tissue would not hold in stitches, so we had to wait for some additional healing before we could move forward.  I told her how we had an appointment / consult scheduled for Roxy the following day at VCA Aurora (for the hyperbaric oxygen therapy),  and she said that we would wait and see what happened with that, before we move forward with anything reconstructive.Friday (today - 8/9), I went to VCA Aurora with Roxy, about an hour from home.  I met with Dr. Abel in the surgery department.  We talked about Roxy, her options, and he also highly recommended the hyperbaric oxygen treatment, given her condition.  He said that this would allow oxygen to get to areas that are having difficulty with that due to injury / lack of blood flow, which would speed healing.  I signed the paperwork and Roxy is currently there, getting her first two hyperbaric oxygen therapy treatments.^ VCA Aurora -- where Dr. Jenn referred me

^ Sign at VCA Aurora about hyperbaric oxygen therapy that they offer
^ Roxy waiting at VCA Aurora.  Had to shave higher up, and finally had to shave her tail, as she kept tucking it under and getting it all icky with her drainage (which is still continuing full force)
^ Roxy chilling at VCA Aurora after Dr. Abel examined her
^ can see her major wound and many of the smaller puncture wounds here^ two of the other bigger puncture wounds, black due to dead tissue that the vet says will slough off 
^ Dr. Abel says this looks great!  And that I'm doing a good job with keeping it clean and medicated / ointment-edSo, this is where we are right now.  I will go pick up Roxy later tonight from the vet once her two hyperbaric oxygen therapy treatments are complete, and then more will be scheduled for this upcoming week.This is where you come in.  I love my dogs to death, and I would do anything for them, but I am not rich.  This is one of several unexpected large expenses recently, and I am almost out of credit card to keep charging it on.  I run a chinchilla and small animal rescue, and that is what pays my bills -- as you may imagine, it isn't making me rich, but it allows me to help animals and be around them all the time.  I want to give Roxy the best treatment she can, and I want to continue with everything she needs, which vets say may or may not include reconstructive surgery on her belly (to close up the wounds), range of motion therapy / physical therapy, and more.  We are currently at $1,800 with the deposit I put down at VCA Aurora today (deposit was $566.63, which is expected to be about half), and are looking at a minimum of $2500 or so, to complete the hyperbaric oxygen treatments.  Hopefully, this will eliminate the need for the reconstructive surgery, though of course, she will still need daily meds and treatment.  
^ vet bill from the emergency vet in Ohio
^ vet bill from Beecher Veterinary (home vet)
^ treatment plan and estimate at VCA Aurora
^ deposit paid at VCA AuroraRoxy is the happiest dog I have ever known.  She has never met a stranger, and even through all of this, she occasionally will wag her tail.  All I want is the chance for her to get back to a normal life, where she can run, play, and return to the happy-go-lucky dog that I know.  

happy Roxy!I appreciate anything you can give, every little bit helps, and I know she does as well.  Thanks so much for reading.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
