story:
Dog-Eh Supplements

Our supplements are born from a place of love for dogs and their health while making it easy and accessible for their human family.​

Our human-grade dog supplements are made in a Canadian manufacturing facility. Not only are our ingredients thoughtfully sourced, but each ingredient is also tested to ensure quality from start to finish. But all of this means nothing if the ingredients break down sitting on a store shelf or in your home. All of our supplements are packaged in an aluminum foil-lined stand-up pouch that stops natural lights from breaking down the ingredients which helps to maintain maximum benefits for your dog. Each package is resealable for ease of use and to maintain maximum freshness.

The Company

During a global pandemic when many businesses were closing their doors, Dog-Eh was born. Inspired by their love for dogs and fueled by their passion to serve the dog community, our co-founders saw a need for limited ingredient, human-grade dog supplements. Dog-Eh is a fun, modern, Canadian brand that puts your dog’s health as the central focus for everything we do.​

The co-founders' previous experience in government regulations, sales, dog sports, and business combine to form a truly strong and well-rounded Canadian business union. They created Dog-Eh to make a difference in dogs’ lives with simple, healthy products that are safe and easy to use.​

With only a company logo and some creative posts, Dog-Eh dove headfirst into social media in late 2020 and began to develop a following.  Mystery & intrigue marketing were harnessed to build their social media in anticipation of their product launch on Indiegogo.

 

Joint Support

Veterinary Health Product (VHP) Notification Number (NN) NN.T8H6

Our Joint Support can promote healthy joint movement and cartilage maintenance to keep your dog active longer. This can be particularly important for large breed and sport dogs. Our Joint Support is particularly beneficial for senior and geriatric dogs increasing their mobility and everyday comfort.

Our blend of green-lipped mussels, red algae, and turmeric provide these benefits and more:​

  • Helps with joint movement
  • Aids in cartilage maintenance
  • Reduces joint pain
  • Reduces inflammation​

The above benefits are in addition to the many vitamins and minerals within our human-grade, limited ingredient, no fillers dog supplement. As when adding anything new to your dog's diet, it's recommended to consult with your veterinarian first. Slowly integrate this into your dog's diet by adding a little more to their food each day until you reach the recommended daily feeding instructions on the back of the package.​

Metabolism Support

Veterinary Health Product (VHP) Notification Number (NN) NN.H8H8

Maintaining a dog's healthy metabolism is an important part of allowing their bodies to maximize the extraction of nutrients from their diet.​

Our blend of kelp, wheatgrass, and coconut oil provides these benefits and more:​

  • Aids digestion
  • Helps regulate thyroid, pituitary, and adrenal glands
  • Aids in supporting bowel and muscle health
  • Promotes healthy muscle tissue and cleanses the blood
  • Can help soothe upset stomachs, boost energy, improve circulation, and alleviate skin conditions
  • Contains ketones that aid in supporting brain function​

The above benefits are in addition to the many antioxidants and over 60 different vitamins and minerals within our human-grade, limited ingredient, no fillers dog supplement. As when adding anything new to your dog's diet, it's recommended to consult with your veterinarian first. Slowly integrate this into your dog's diet by adding a little more to their food each day until you reach the suggested serving size.

Skin & Coat Plus

Veterinary Health Product (VHP) Notification Number (NN) NN.B0U1

Dog allergies are a growing issue and finding relief day to day can be hard. Our Skin & Coat Plus contains a blend of bee pollen, turmeric, and coconut oil to provide these benefits and more:​

  • May reduce your dog's allergy symptoms and allergic reactions
  • Boosts metabolism
  • Supports digestion and gastrointestinal tract of your dog
  • May improve blood flow to the nervous system which can help reduce stress and anxiety
  • Reduces inflammation
  • Helps protect the lining of blood vessels and contributes to liver stimulation to aid in the breakdown of dietary fats
  • Contains antibiotic, antibacterial, and antifungal properties​

Allergies are a serious issue and should always be discussed with your veterinarian. This supplement should never be used as a treatment during emergency situations such as anaphylaxis. Our skin & coat plus doesn't negate the need to keep your dog away from and/or to stop ingesting their allergen. This human-grade, limited ingredient, no fillers dog supplement was created to assist in mild to moderate environmental allergies. Slowly integrate this into your dog's diet by adding a little more to their food each day until you reach the suggested serving size.

The Founders

Amanda Wattie

An accomplished and highly decorated athlete, Amanda has trained with and been coached by figure skating Olympic medalists and dog agility World Champions. She has translated her vast competitive figure skating experience into dog agility, having placed top three on local, regional, and national levels.​

Amanda recognizes the importance of proper nutrition in a dog's sport career as well as with their overall health and longevity as everyday family members. She gives her own dogs supplements and sees the results first-hand in their health and performance. Amanda’s passion for the health and performance of her animals is a huge part of what drives our product development.

​

Left to Right: Hershey (Husky Border Collie cross), Winnie (a Border Collie), Amanda, and Joey the Muppet (a Shih Tzu Poodle cross).

Frank Fuchs​

Frank is a former government employee from a family of animal lovers, having many different pets in the house while growing up.  His current furry companion is Remington, a Husky Pyrenees cross.​

His unique expertise in legal and regulatory fields along with his postgraduate studies in international management help facilitate daily business functions. Frank's post-secondary focus on marketing and virtual teams will provide additional expertise and guidance as he and Amanda run Dog-Eh from two different provinces.

Left to Right: Remi and Frank

Dog-Eh Cares About the Environment

Our packages are produced by an industry-leading manufacturer of eco-friendly packaging. They've worked to reduce their waste by 75% and the size of the packaging is optimized to create as little waste as possible.​

By using stand-up pouches for our packaging we're reducing the raw materials and energy needed in our package manufacturing when compared to plastic or glass containers. Stand-up pouches also weigh significantly less meaning less fuel consumption during transportation and they take up less room so fewer vehicles are needed to transport our supplements. Glass and some plastic containers are also more likely to break, which saves potential product waste. From a safety standpoint, we would never want to put your dog at risk of being near broken glass if our packaging took a tumble.

Where the Money Goes

Our goal is our minimum amount needed for the first run of products. Any additional funds will be used for inventory so we can help as many dogs as possible.

Perk Tiers

Virtual High Five $5

  • Just want to support us? Buy a virtual high five or donate an amount of your choosing by clicking "back it" at the top of this campaign

Basic Swag Pack $32 CAD (Regularly $50)

  • Your choice of a metal water bottle or travel mug
  • Baseball hat

Single Bag of Supplements $37 CAD (Regularly up to $47)

  • Your choice of a 250g single bag of supplements

Adventure Pack $42 CAD (Regularly $65)

  • Plastic frisbee
  • Dog shaped travel poop bag dispenser
  • Collapsible dog bowl with carabiner
  • Lightweight drawstring backpack with zippered pocket 
  • Your choice of a metal water bottle or travel mug

Basic 3 Pack $97 CAD (Regularly over $140)

  • Plastic frisbee
  • Dog shaped travel poop bag dispenser
  • Your choice of three 250g bags of supplements (note: maximum choice of 2 bags of joint supplements)

Ultimate 3 Pack $127 CAD (Regularly over $175)

  • Plastic frisbee
  • Dog shaped travel poop bag dispenser
  • Collapsible dog bowl with carabiner
  • Lightweight drawstring backpack with zippered pocket 
  • Your choice of a metal water bottle or travel mug
  • Your choice of three 250g bags of supplements (note: maximum choice of 2 bags of joint supplements)

6 Pack $175 CAD (Regularly over $246)

  • Your choice of six 250g bags of supplements (note: maximum choice of 3 bags of joint supplements)

Bonus Individual Perks

Contribute over $100 before February 28th

  • Receive an invite to a virtual group meeting with the founders and other backers for an open Q&A style call. You might even get to meet the founders' dogs

Contribute over $500 by the end of the campaign

  • Receive a personal invitation to a one on one call with the founders (approximately 15mins in length)

Bonus Group Perks

50% of our goal raised

  • A surprise celebrity video message will be posted here and on our social media

100% of our goal raised

  • Everyone gets a Dog-Eh magnet included with their perk tier

150% of our goal raised

  • Everyone gets a dachshund pen included with their perk tier

200% of our goal raised

  • A surprise celebrity video message will be posted here and on our social media

Risks & Timeline

Our Indiegogo campaign is a fixed goal. This means if we do not hit our goal then you receive your money back.

We're committed to all our backers to ensure your perks are delivered to you within 6 months of our campaign closing. This gives us time to have the packaging and supplements manufactured. We realize shipping times are sometimes delayed due to Covid-19 related factors and have tried to accommodate for this.

Dog-Eh's committed to keeping you updated about our progress and providing you with a tracking number for your perk once it's been shipped.

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you haven't yet contributed, are thinking about it or have already ordered your perk, we encourage you to spread the word about our Indiegogo campaign and follow us on social media

story:
Short Summary

We bring you pure perfume oils that almost all perfumes, Eau de toilette and colognes have but without the extra alcohol solvents you don't need. Why? (read below)

  • Its super long lasting as it contains pure perfume oil concentrate
  • No added alcohol solvents means the fragrance doesn't evaporate fast
  • You don't have to pay more for what you don't need and you don't waste spraying in the air
  • You can easily carry it everywhere, on holidays & on the airplane 
  • It is an awesome self treat &  gift (one less gift to worry about for Christmas) 
  • We specialize on unisex perfumes so all of them are used and love by men & women alike.

The Differences

The actual carrier of the perfume (scent) comes in an oil form known as the perfume oil and the solvent additive is used to increase the volume of the perfume and sometimes to change the texture for example. This is not necessarily needed, so that's why we offer our customers 100% pure perfume oils at Scents Garden!

(little perfume oil added to the alcohol solvent in mainstream fragrances)

It's super Long lasting
With the Scents Garden Perfume oils, you no longer have to worry about the fragrance going away before you hit lunch time! There are zero alcohol solvents in our fragrances, which means that the alcohol does not evaporate very fast, taking much of the scent with it. 
 
 
Instead, you moisturize your skin with the Scents Garden essential oil based fragrances, and smell fantastic all day, everyday!
 

Don't waste a drop!

Do you know how much fragrance and money you waste when you spray all of that perfumed solvent on your self? isn't it better to not waste a drop and use moisturizing perfume oils as your fragrance instead? They all come with a roller ball or a stick to apply so you don't waste a single drop spraying all over!

 

Easy to carry & Travel friendly

We all want to smell nice all day, on a night out and on a holiday, but who would like to carry a huge bottle in a bag around all day? exactly - nobody. 

Scents Garden perfumes oils come in many carriable sizes, as well as luxury crystal bottle sizes too, so you can choose the most convenient size for you (or get both versions)!

This little pocket size bottle could last for many months:

 

An awesome Collection/gift box

Weather you are treating your self or a friend or family (say for Christmas maybe?), this might just be THE perfect thing to get for them. I mean, when was the last time you got someone a luxurious oil based perfume? talk about unique!

 

The Team

Charlene - The heart & nose of the company

After getting a Masters degree in the London College of Fashion & with almost a decade in Fashion, she has brought her creativity with her to Scents Garden. She is also considering having a snake or a tarantula as a pet - eek.

Toofan - The coolest CEO ever (I would like to claim)

As for me, I started out my career in the digital marketing & SaaS space and have been fortunate to work for some of the best companies in the field. In my earlier days, I was in charge of online marketing campaigns for Dior, little did I know that I would be on my own journey chasing the big fish in the Perfume industry!

Honorable mentions - Sandra my Co-Founder AKA the hardest working one, Ali, Monica, Sonia & Darya.

The Mission

Our mission is to have Scents Garden perfume oils to be used all around the world. In the last 1.5 years of hard work, we have gained the trust & love of many customers from all over Europe, Americas, Africa, Asia and Australia and we want to continue reaching out to more people going forward!

The second mission is that we plan to be a charitable organization and we started this plan early on so we don't get distracted when we are much bigger. Our goal this year is to provide 1000 women and children with personal hygiene and sanitary packs to help with their self esteem and personal hygiene, and we are looking at water sanitation for the needy next.  More than 10% of the money made from this campaign will go towards our target this year.


Got your back for Christmas!

Since Christmas is only weeks away, you can have one less gift to worry about by ordering the Scents Garden Gift pack or Crystal bottles now and have them delivered for the special occasion.

We have packs for those who love all kinds of perfumes. If you know which pack would work best from, sweet, fresh, spicy or musky - great! if not, you can choose our best sellers if you don't want to go wrong.

 

 

Funding

We are very pleased to be profitable for a while now and can support all the perks purchased here, although we need to reach 100% in order to process your order, otherwise your money will be refunded automatically. We made this campaign a fixed goal to make it more exciting, based on our friends & colleagues consultations.

10% of all funds here will go to charity (mostly sanitary packs, any extra money will go towards clean water for the needy). We will make it clear where this part of the money goes after the campaign, and keep you posted via pix and videos on the charity given.

The business side of the money goes to the growth of the business, branding & marketing so more people will know about this amazing change in the perfume industry.

(The 12 ml crystal bottle)

The Franchising/ wholesale Perk

Apart from being very strong online, we also plan to expand offline and one of our key strategies is franchising. If you enjoy working in a pleasant aromatic environment all day and make awesome amount of money, this is for you. 

If you have a salon, spa or any business with customers that could appreciate such valuable products, this perk is for you!

(The 3 ml Crystal bottle)

Other ways you could help

You can also share this message on your social media, you can use the social sharing buttons above.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Frequently asked Questions

 

Are these Fragrances for men or women?

We specialize in unisex fragrances so all of them are unisex, loved by men and women.

What are perfume oils?

Almost all perfumes have a oil base that is the carrier of the fragrance, they are then diluted with alcohol solvents. We give you the pure essence of the perfume, which has many benefits mentioned above.

What is Oudh?

Oudh  is "derived from the tropical agar tree, which is thought to originate in Assam in India. When the tree is infected by a mould known as Phialophora parasitica it reacts by producing a dense, dark and fragrant resin to protect itself. It is the resin-embedded heartwood of the tree that is the source of oud. The trees are grown throughout south-east Asia, India and Bangladesh and agarwood is said to be the most expensive timber in the world - indeed, one of the most expensive of all natural raw ingredients." source: encyclopedia, GQ magazine

Do all perfume oils have oudh?

Not at all, only the ones mentioned that they do, have it.

What are the notes in the perfumes listed?

Golden Scent: Vanilla (strong), Musky (mild), sweet (mild) - its top notes, includes the gentleness of Damascene rose and the fine citrus accords of grapefruit, harmoniously mixed with balsamic scents. Its heart notes include warm and sweet vanilla and honeysuckle added with musky and slightly fruity scents. Lastly, the balsamic, floral, ambery and musky base notes are the reason why this is our all time best selling perfume.

Lotus Flower: Peach (mild), Apple (strong) and Musk (mild) our second all time best seller is simply amazing.

Amber Kalimaat: spicy top notes of nagarmotha, nutmeg and saffron with a blend of oriental, woody, floral and spicy accords.  The Cinnamon blends well with the Sandalwood, cedarwood, patchouli, gurjan and guaiac wood with jasmine.  The base notes of vanilla and tonka bean gives the fragrance a unique musky & spicy/sweet feeling.

Fresh Hail:  First impressions: fresh (strong) with an amazing citrus (mild) blend. With spicy ginger, woody, frankincense, and moss notes at its base and a touch of jasmine, cedarwood and grapefruit as a middle note, its no wonder a best seller.

White Musk: floral (rosey: strong) and lightly spicy and fruity notes. Damascena rose, carnation accords spice things up a little, while its base notes, rich in rose, sandalwood & musk (strong) give you the warm feeling. the ambery, woody and musky is what makes it just the perfect best selling white musk.

Sacred Oudh: Woody & Spicy with luxurious sweet musky notes.

Rose Oudh: Rose & Saffron, cloves, cinnamon, cedar & cyprol, vanilla, patchouli, sandalwood

Dehnal Oudh Shoyukhi: Swett Floral notes, Leather notes, dark notes, smoky agarwood, dehn al oudh
story_txt:
Short Summary
We bring you pure perfume oils that almost all perfumes, Eau de toilette and colognes have but without the extra alcohol solvents you don't need. Why? (read below)


Its super long lasting as it contains pure perfume oil concentrate
No added alcohol solvents means the fragrance doesn't evaporate fast
You don't have to pay more for what you don't need and you don't waste spraying in the air
You can easily carry it everywhere, on holidays & on the airplane 
It is an awesome self treat &  gift (one less gift to worry about for Christmas) 
We specialize on unisex perfumes so all of them are used and love by men & women alike.

The Differences
The actual carrier of the perfume (scent) comes in an oil form known as the perfume oil and the solvent additive is used to increase the volume of the perfume and sometimes to change the texture for example. This is not necessarily needed, so that's why we offer our customers 100% pure perfume oils at Scents Garden!


(little perfume oil added to the alcohol solvent in mainstream fragrances)

It's super Long lasting
With the Scents Garden Perfume oils, you no longer have to worry about the fragrance going away before you hit lunch time! There are zero alcohol solvents in our fragrances, which means that the alcohol does not evaporate very fast, taking much of the scent with it. 
 

 
Instead, you moisturize your skin with the Scents Garden essential oil based fragrances, and smell fantastic all day, everyday!
 

Don't waste a drop!
Do you know how much fragrance and money you waste when you spray all of that perfumed solvent on your self? isn't it better to not waste a drop and use moisturizing perfume oils as your fragrance instead? They all come with a roller ball or a stick to apply so you don't waste a single drop spraying all over!


 

Easy to carry & Travel friendly
We all want to smell nice all day, on a night out and on a holiday, but who would like to carry a huge bottle in a bag around all day? exactly - nobody. 
Scents Garden perfumes oils come in many carriable sizes, as well as luxury crystal bottle sizes too, so you can choose the most convenient size for you (or get both versions)!
This little pocket size bottle could last for many months:


 
An awesome Collection/gift box
Weather you are treating your self or a friend or family (say for Christmas maybe?), this might just be THE perfect thing to get for them. I mean, when was the last time you got someone a luxurious oil based perfume? talk about unique!

 
The Team

story:
Fitness is the key for healthy Life

Many million people are on a diet at any time. Yet expert say obesity become a disturbing global public health crisis. A third of world populations is overweight or obese. Researchers state that 2.2 billion people or 30% of the earth's 7.5 billion population were overweight.

It is estimated that householders are spending on an average more than $2,000 on gym memberships, sports equipments and other fitness products each year!

Unfortunately, many do not get the full benefits of their investments because of not being able to go to gym or exercise as they wish due to the busy modern fast life style.

If you have an affordable home training system, not only will you save your money but also save your time travelling to and from gym because you can exercise at home and at any time you wish!

That is specifically what Feelgood LifeFit has been desgined for. Our desire is to see as many people as possible to have a Fit and Healthy Life and Feel Great!

Feelgood LifeFit allows you to perform exercises at home or office whenever you want.

Anywhere, Anytime and for Everyone!

 

6 Benefits of Feelgood LifeFit

  • Enhance your posture.
  • Get that nice flat belly we like to have.
  • Build stronger and a fit good looking body.
  • Exercise in normal clothing at home or at office. No need to dress up.
  • Just a little time consistently is all you need.
  • Easy and beneficial ton-up before your daily routine.

That is why Feelgood LifeFit fits into your busy life style!

 

Immediate effect on your daily life by being able to use it for:

  • Short Walk
  • Short Jog
  • Brisk Run
  • Nice Vibration
  • Core Muscle Exercise

 

 

How does it works?

  • Vibration mode : Strength and tone in just 5 minutes workout.
  • Strengthen abdominal and back muscles with the training straps and twister bar.
  • Easy to switch over from one mode to another such as walk, jog, run and back to vibration.
  • Exercise in the privacy of your own home in your normal clothing at any time and for everyone.
  • When not in use, easy to store and frees up space in your house hold or office.

 

Vibration mode with straps strength and tone your muscle.

In vibration mode, strengthen abdominal and back muscles with the training straps.

In vibration mode, use twister bar to strengthen upper body.

Easy to switch over from one mode to another such as walk, jog, run and back to vibration.

Easy to use and store out of the way.

Easy to switch over from one mode to another or from running to vibration training.

 

How does Feelgood LifeFit fits into your life style? 

Gyms are affective highly recommended but it can take a lot of your time out of your day.Many people sign up for membership but difficult to maintain the regular exercise routine. Weather disruption, tiredness from daily activities.

In this modern life we are living in, it is difficult to find the extra time to go to the nearest gym because of a fast life style, family responsibility and work schedule.

 

That is why Feelgood LifeFit can make:

  • Fitness time at home or at work at anytime.
  • Just a little time to take up on your exercise daily.
  • Varieties of fitness training.
  • Easy to use and store out of the way.
  • Affordability it will save many hundreds of dollars.

 

Features of Feelgood LifeFit

  • Use it as treadmill for your gentle walk, jog and running at a number of different speeds.
  • Vibrating platform with 9 programs and up to 99 speeds.
  • Standing with feet side by side equals walking, feet apart equals jogging and standing further apart equals fast running.
  • Exercise with Adjustable Exercise Straps for an added intense workout.
  • Exercise with Twister Bar for flexing and improving posture fitness.
  • Platinum limited model comes with air purifier negative ion generator which gives you clean air during your exercise time.

 

Use it as treadmill for your gentle walk, jog and running at a number of different speeds.

Standing with feet side by side equals walking, feet apart equals jogging and standing further apart equals fast running.

Exercise with Adjustable Exercise Straps for an added intense workout.

Exercise with Twister Bar for flexing and improving posture fitness.

 

It's affordable and save your money!

Based on advertised retail information, a vibrating platform retails at $799. A good quality standard treadmill retails from $1,199.

Our Feelgood LifeFit, 2 in 1 Hybrid Home Fitness System, is a great saving compare to buying two different home exercise machines which take more space and create an inconvenience to you.

Feelgood LifeFit, 2 in 1 Hybrid Home Fitness System is:

  • Saving Your Money
  • Saving Your Space
  • Saving  Your Time
  • Less Hassle and Easy to Operate

 

Easy to open and Easy to store.

Feelgood LifeFit is light and easy to store our of the way when not in use.  It takes up no space.

 

Feelgood LifeFit enhances your fitness and saves your money!

People spend an average of $65/per month on gym memberships or $780 over a year.Busy lifestyle makes difficult to take advantage of all the benefits that a professional gym can offer. Feelgood LifeFit will fit in your busy lifestyle and create the ideal exercising regime at home and or office as you wish. A little exercise and continuously doing that is the key.

No Gym, No Travel, Exercise any time and Feel Good!

We at Feelgood LifeFit wish for many people as possible to be able to have a Good, Fit, and Healthy Life and that is why we have developed Feelgood LifeFit 2 in 1 Home Gym.

 

We need your help!

After 2 years of researches and development, we now have a working model of Feelgood LifeFit 2 in 1 Hybrid HomeGym ready to go for production. To cover initial production cost, we need a minimum number of orders. With your help, we can start to talk about our initial production quantities and will be able for us to keep the price affordable for everyone. We deeply appreciate your contribution in making the first production run happen. In return, we would like to offer a discount of more than 50% of the retail price to our supporters.

story:
Hi IndieGoGo,

When our bodies get hot, they do their best to cool us off through perspiration/sweat. But sweat doesn’t really feel good, and the odor that comes afterward can just be awful.

On top of that, most fabrics don’t handle sweat very well (cotton), some make the smell worse (polyesters), and some even stain and/or are bad for the environment (fabrics with silver nanoparticles). But here at ToadSkins, we’ve taken care of that by developing technologies that combat odor causing bacteria, and help your body get rid of sweat faster than ever with natural minerals. These technologies also combine to cool your body by up to 10 degrees. All this, and comfort that’s never been seen in any other type of advanced underwear period.

So, instead of wishing you were dryer and odor free, not to mention the embarrassment, you can wear ToadSkins and you won't have to worry about it. You won’t be as sticky, you’ll be cooler, and others won’t be smelling that awful odor coming from your body and your clothes.

 

 

 

 

TOADSKINS TECHNOLOGY TO THE RESCUE

The ToadSkins brand incorporates cooling, moisture management, and anti-microbial technologies, with a side benefit of an SPF protection factor of 35+.

Our cooling technology uses the natural properties within jade minerals to cool you off up to 10° fahrenheit. Our fabrics are designed & woven in such a way that they soak up more sweat, disperse and evaporate it faster than anything else available.

​

And our anti-bacterial technology is second to none! It handles a wide range of positive and negatively charged bacteria and fungi to calm the stink down (*see disclaimer below). The technology used is natural in origin, doesn’t harm the environment, and is designed to last. Unlike other brands that use silver and other discredited materials or spray on methods.

 

ToadSkins are constructed to support what needs to be supported, with great comfort and style. No ride up, great waistband construction to avoid rollover, and a nice plush backing against your skin, beautiful and tagless. Good old American quality.

 

COMMON PROBLEMS

After exercising, you can usually take off your sweaty and smelly underwear, shower, and your fine again. But what about those hot days that start from the beginning of your day? What if you’re on a road trip, on a long flight, camping, or whatever other situation where you don’t have the luxury of being able to shower and change into fresh underwear like you normally would?

What about fit and comfort? Poor construction, wedgies, ride up, material that stretches and won’t fit right anymore. I guarantee you that the people who design the cheaper big brand underwear don’t wear them, so why would you? Even if you wear higher end underwear, you really owe it to yourself to give ToadSkins a try.

 

 

THIRD PARTY TESTED

The Association of Textile, Apparel & Materials Professionals (AATCC) who conduct many standardized tests for the textile industry has tested our fabrics against four other performing fabrics in the areas of moisture absorption, moisture transport, and moisture drying time. In all cases, ToadSkins fabrics had better times and percentages hands down.

Additionally, our Crew-V Tees have easily passed the ISO (International Organization for Standardization) standards for thermal stability in excess of 400°. It means that you can wear our Crew-Vs under protective wear like the kind that police and firemen use.

BOXERS & THE CREW-V T-SHIRT

This is why ToadSkins exists! We set out to make the best underwear possible, and here they are. What you see here is the best comfort you can buy in underwear that works incredibly well to optimize your freshness and performance.

The ToadSkins Crew-V is exactly where technology and comfort meet. Our Crew-V shirts have the same technology that's built into our boxers but with a much softer than cotton fabric composition. They aren't suffocating like a normal crew type t-shirt and not droopy like a V-neck. You've got to feel this soft but durable tee.

The ToadSkins Kool towel is made up of the same technology that’s in our boxers. It’s an additional way to cool other body parts (neck, face, head etc.) during hot days or intense workouts. Lowering specific points of the body like the back of your neck, groin, and armpits can make a difference to your overall core body temperature ($17.99 retail value)

You have to check out the side by side video below of how awesome our materials work.

 

 

PERKS

Here are the Perks we’ve put together.

Every funded amount of $100.00 US dollars or more will receive a ToadSkins Kool Towel for FREE!! If you are signing up for a $100 and up Perk, you're automatically covered. If you are signing up for multiple pledges that add up to $100 or more, make sure you use the same account and notify us directly so that we make sure to send you your ToadSkins Kool Towel.

SHIPPING

We've got great news. Even though it's spring time here in the USA, we'll be shipping in time for the hot summer months ahead. Be ready and order your ToadSkins today!

Domestic Shipping - FREE shipping to US locations (except AK & HI).
International Shipping - Everywhere Else ($30-$35)

We're using the USPS Priority & DHL International shipping which includes insurance and a tracking number that will be sent out to your email when a shipping label is generated. This way you can track the shipping progress after your reward is ready to be shipped.

International Shipping - We are shipping everywhere else at rates of $30 or $35, depending on how many items are in your order. 

Any duties, taxes and VAT are not included in the shipping amount we provide and may be added in accordance with your local regulations.

 

SIZING

Here are our size charts in inches and centimeters. It should look pretty standard according to your normal shirt and pants sizes. You'll be able to pick your size(s) when the campaign ends.

 

TIMELINE

We're having lots of fun creating this project and it's surreal what this could mean for the future of ToadSkins, and honestly the industry.

Please share our project, like us on Facebook, follow us on Instagram, and repost anything you feel that will help us with this campaign. As you receive your ToadSkins, please share your Toad wear with the world using the hashtag #toadskins

Lastly, I want to thank YOU and everyone involved with this project. This is one of the funnest rides I've ever been on, I hope you'll hop on and enjoy it with us. Together we can make the world cooler, fresher, and less sweatier!
story_txt:
Hi IndieGoGo,When our bodies get hot, they do their best to cool us off through perspiration/sweat. But sweat doesn’t really feel good, and the odor that comes afterward can just be awful.On top of that, most fabrics don’t handle sweat very well (cotton), some make the smell worse (polyesters), and some even stain and/or are bad for the environment (fabrics with silver nanoparticles). But here at ToadSkins, we’ve taken care of that by developing technologies that combat odor causing bacteria, and help your body get rid of sweat faster than ever with natural minerals. These technologies also combine to cool your body by up to 10 degrees. All this, and comfort that’s never been seen in any other type of advanced underwear period.So, instead of wishing you were dryer and odor free, not to mention the embarrassment, you can wear ToadSkins and you won't have to worry about it. You won’t be as sticky, you’ll be cooler, and others won’t be smelling that awful odor coming from your body and your clothes.    TOADSKINS TECHNOLOGY TO THE RESCUEThe ToadSkins brand incorporates cooling, moisture management, and anti-microbial technologies, with a side benefit of an SPF protection factor of 35+.Our cooling technology uses the natural properties within jade minerals to cool you off up to 10° fahrenheit. Our fabrics are designed & woven in such a way that they soak up more sweat, disperse and evaporate it faster than anything else available. ​And our anti-bacterial technology is second to none! It handles a wide range of positive and negatively charged bacteria and fungi to calm the stink down (*see disclaimer below). The technology used is natural in origin, doesn’t harm the environment, and is designed to last. Unlike other brands that use silver and other discredited materials or spray on methods. ToadSkins are constructed to support what needs to be supported, with great comfort and style. No ride up, great waistband construction to avoid rollover, and a nice plush backing against your skin, beautiful and tagless. Good old American quality. COMMON PROBLEMSAfter exercising, you can usually take off your sweaty and smelly underwear, shower, and your fine again. But what about those hot days that start from the beginning of your day? What if you’re on a road trip, on a long flight, camping, or whatever other situation where you don’t have the luxury of being able to shower and change into fresh underwear like you normally would?What about fit and comfort? Poor construction, wedgies, ride up, material that stretches and won’t fit right anymore. I guarantee you that the people who design the cheaper big brand underwear don’t wear them, so why would you? Even if you wear higher end underwear, you really owe it to yourself to give ToadSkins a try.  THIRD PARTY TESTEDThe Association of Textile, Apparel & Materials Professionals (AATCC) who conduct many standardized tests for the textile industry has tested our fabrics against four other performing fabrics in the areas of moisture absorption, moisture transport, and moisture drying time. In all cases, ToadSkins fabrics had better times and percentages hands down.Additionally, our Crew-V Tees have easily passed the ISO (International Organization for Standardization) standards for thermal stability in excess of 400°. It means that you can wear our Crew-Vs under protective wear like the kind that police and firemen use.BOXERS & THE CREW-V T-SHIRTThis is why ToadSkins exists! We set out to make the best underwear possible, and here they are. What you see here is the best comfort you can buy in underwear that works incredibly well to optimize your freshness and performance.The ToadSkins Crew-V is exactly where technology and comfort meet. Our Crew-V shirts have the same technology that's built into our boxers but with a much softer than cotton fabric composition. They aren't suffocating like a normal crew type t-shirt and not droopy like a V-neck. You've got to feel this soft but durable tee.The ToadSkins Kool towel is made up of the same technology that’s in our boxers. It’s an additional way to cool other body parts (neck, face, head etc.) during hot days or intense workouts. Lowering specific points of the body like the back of your neck, groin, and armpits can make a difference to your overall core body temperature ($17.99 retail value)You have to check out the side by side video below of how awesome our materials work.

 
 PERKSHere are the Perks we’ve put together.Every funded amount of $100.00 US dollars or more will receive a ToadSkins Kool Towel for FREE!! If you are signing up for a $100 and up Perk, you're automatically covered. If you are signing up for multiple pledges that add up to $100 or more, make sure you use the same account and notify us directly so that we make sure to send you your ToadSkins Kool Towel.SHIPPINGWe've got great news. Even though it's spring time here in the USA, we'll be shipping in time for the hot summer months ahead. Be ready and order your ToadSkins today!Domestic Shipping - FREE shipping to US locations (except AK & HI).International Shipping - Everywhere Else ($30-$35)We're using the USPS Priority & DHL International shipping which includes insurance and a tracking number that will be sent out to your email when a shipping label is generated. This way you can track the shipping progress after your reward is ready to be shipped.International Shipping - We are shipping everywhere else at rates of $30 or $35, depending on how many items are in your order. Any duties, taxes and VAT are not included in the shipping amount we provide and may be added in accordance with your local regulations. SIZINGHere are our size charts in inches and centimeters. It should look pretty standard according to your normal shirt and pants sizes. You'll be able to pick your size(s) when the campaign ends. TIMELINEWe're having lots of fun creating this project and it's surreal what this could mean for the future of ToadSkins, and honestly the industry.Please share our project, like us on Facebook, follow us on Instagram, and repost anything you feel that will help us with this campaign. As you receive your ToadSkins, please share your Toad wear with the world using the hashtag #toadskinsLastly, I want to thank YOU and everyone involved with this project. This is one of the funnest rides I've ever been on, I hope you'll hop on and enjoy it with us. Together we can make the world cooler, fresher, and less sweatier!

story:
Trivum is the world's most versatile duffel bag that can expand or contract from 30L (small) to 60L (heavy duty) and fit anything you need.

PACKABLE, 30, 45, 60 LITERS

 

THE "TRANSFORMER" OF BAGS

 

LIGHT, MEDIUM, HEAVY-DUTY DUFFEL

 

Trivium is the perfect duffel as it can be regulated to fit whatever it is you need. No load is too small or too big for Trivium to handle as it easily becomes larger or smaller in order to fit more or less. 

SPORTS / GYM / FITNESS / RECREATION / EVERYDAY

 

30 / 45 / 60L

 

The speed and usability of Trivium is unlike any other duffel ever before. It unpacks, expands, or collapses in mere seconds. The transition is ultra-quick and perfectly integrated into the design.

EASY TO UNPACK

 

LIGHTNING FAST CINCH SYSTEM

 

Space is a luxury nowadays and Trivium can help you SAVE A LOT of it as it's three different sized bags in one! Plus, it's extremely light, making it perfect to carry around. 

WEIGHS ONLY 1.3 POUNDS!

 

SAVE MASSIVE STORAGE SPACE

 

Trivium expands to provided you with instant space in those unexpected needed times. No need to change your bag or carry things by hand, just expand Trivium and you're good to go!

MORE SPACE, OR LESS SPACE, WHENEVER YOU CHOOSE

 



One duffle with three sizes:

Small:  30 liters --> 12" x 12" x 16"
Medium: 45 liters --> 12" x 12" x 24"
Large: 60 liters --> 12" x 12" x 32"

Extras: 1 exterior zip pocket 
Weight: 1.3 Pounds
Material: 600D Polyester and ABS Hardware


 packed / 30L / 45L / 60L

30 LITER CONFIGURATION

45 LITER CONFIGURATION

60 LITER CONFIGURATION

HIGH QUALITY BUCKLES

DRAWSTRING CORD POCKET

high quality 600D polyester

As with every new product it's always extremely important to test it during the development process. Although our team did some internal testing, we passed some of our prototypes out to our friends in order to get external feedback.

This is what they had to say:

 

Enjoy our great IGG deals and SAVE BIG. As you can use Trivium as a light, medium, and heavy duty bag, you're essentially getting three bags for the price of one! 

 

In the development process we created and thoroughly tested over 15 different prototypes to make sure everything is spot on.  We're more than confident we will be able to execute this product perfectly and in a timely manner so that all our our pledgers receive the best possible product. The funds raised through Indiegogo will go towards purchasing materials and fulfilling factory MOQ's during our production run.

 

What is the size of Trivium?

Trivium’s three sizes are 30, 45, and 60 liters.

 

How much weight can Trivium hold?

Trivium can hold up to 100 pounds.

 

Does the name Trivium mean anything?

In ancient Latin, Trivium means “The Place Where Three Roads Meet.” This makes Trivium a sweet name for a duffel where “Three Sizes Meet” ;)

 

Is there anything out there like this?

 

Trivium is the world's first Packable + 3-in-1 Duffel aimed at the sports market. Certain aspects of the design have been licensed, however the overall design is unique and proprietary to Trivium.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Know Exactly where to stand with
SafeDistance!

 

Most other distancing devices on the market use either Ultra-wideband (UWB) or Bluetooth radios. Designed for use in factory settings, they need at least 2 of the same devices to work and offer low accuracy at a high cost. SafeDistance is different. We use high speed, precisely timed laser light for better accuracy and have engineered the cost out of the design. Also, since it's light based and completely eye-safe, it's perfect for everyone to use and does not require other devices to function.

 

Why?

Since the beginning of this pandemic we have all been practicing better hygiene, wearing masks and keeping our distance from others in public. This has all been designed to keep the virus in check so that it would not overwhelm our hospitals. It helped to limit the spread of the coronavirus initially but now it appears like it's set to make a comeback this fall as we see the case numbers surging all over the world. Despite this, some people have started to become more relaxed at keeping their distance and others don't even bother wearing masks. The virus has not changed of course, and is still just as contagious as before.
At this time COVID-19 is being spread mainly by asymptomatic young adults. Catching the virus can be fatal even for healthy people and may have long term impacts on your health. It is not the flu.

 
"
complications associated with COVID-19 can include Blood clots in the veins and arteries of the lungs, heart, legs or brain Multisystem Inflammatory Syndrome in Children (MIS-C)
www.cdc.gov

A vaccine for the coronavirus is still in development and may not be available until sometime next year. The only protection methods proven to be effective are to wear a mask and physically distance yourself from others in public. While wearing a mask is more to protect others from you; the distancing is actually more beneficial to you so that you don't catch it.

 

"
Spread happens when an infected person coughs, sneezes, or talks, and droplets from their mouth or nose are launched into the air and land in the mouths or noses of people nearby. The droplets can also be inhaled into the lungs. Recent studies indicate that people who are infected but do not have symptoms likely also play a role in the spread of COVID-19. 
www.cdc.gov

 

We had seen too many places with either no distancing markers in place or having them placed way too close for comfort. So we came up with the idea for SafeDistance to help ensure that everyone could maintain their proper recommended physical distance per the CDC guidelines.

SafeDistance was designed to be as small and light as possible so that you could carry it with you at all times. It's extremely simple to use - just press the button as you point and it will blink to let you know if you are standing far enough. Like a traffic light, the RED means you are too close (under 1m) and Green means you are okay (over 2m). Yellow is somewhere in between.

 

 

We have been working diligently on SafeDistance for the last two months and have been successful in bringing it to a production ready state. We have also been certified by Arrow Electronics. Your help is needed now to allow us to go to mass production.

Join us to help make SafeDistance a reality. With your pledge we can make it generally available at a low cost so that everyone can benefit from this practical new tool to help fight the coronavirus.

Thank you!
Dinesh

SafeDist.me

 

 

tiny What?

'tinyLiDAR' was the name of a very small maker friendly laser distance sensor we made a few years back. It was based on a low power LiDAR sensor chip originally designed to be used in smart phones. tinyLiDAR turned out to be very popular among robotics clubs, DIY’ers and even some OEMs for quickly adding accurate distance sensing to their microcontroller systems.

SafeDistance has been designed to be totally self-contained so there’s no need for an external micro to run it.

Specs

Dimensions: 2.1 x 1.5 x 0.4inches
Approx Weight: 0.5oz (15g) including battery

 

Why LiDAR?

** Most Bluetooth based physical distancing implementations rely on translating the received signal strength indication (RSSI) into distance. Unfortunately, "human body shadowing effects" can have a dramatic influence on the path loss at 2.4GHz. When adding this uncertainty to the non-uniform radiation patterns of common PIFA/chip antennas and the additional de-tuning caused by close human body proximity, the reported distances can vary considerably no matter how much averaging is done to the RSSI. UWB is less affected by changes in RSSI but its main drawbacks are higher cost of implementation and power consumption.
Considering these shortcomings coupled with the fact that you would need others to carry the same device to make this system work, we opted for a more reliable technology – i.e. LiDAR.

The LiDAR sensor inside of SafeDistance uses a very low power eye-safe, IR LASER to accurately measure the distance to the target. It’s a field proven technology and is currently in use in millions of smartphones around the world today. See below for details of this Time-of-Flight technology.

 

Timeline

Risks and Challenges

At this point, we do not anticipate any issues with shipping product according to the timeline show above, assuming we are able to meet the funding goal and there are no unusual delays in receiving the funding. We will be in discussions with several different levels of contract manufacturers based on the response rate achieved from this campaign. As with any electronic product, we maybe impacted by component shortages in the electronics industry. We will work diligently to rectify any such situation and inform backers of any delays.

PRESS DOWNLOADS

 

Spread the word of our campaign and earn commission. Sign up as an affiliate via the URL below to generate a unique link to share with your friends. You'll get commission on every pledge made through your link.

https://https://tinylidar-safedistance.kickbooster.me/boost

story:
Introduction:

As parents, we will do everything in our power to keep our children safe. But we also want our kids to stay kids even when they have to go through major stresses of today's world, like COVID-19 or any other similar dangers. 

We know that it can be a real challenge to get kids to wear protective wear, but all parents will agree that adding fun to the equation would make this difficult task a little more enjoyable for our kiddos.    

Our face shields, KiddoGuards, while being an effective safety option, are fun, comfortable, adaptable to all head sizes, and can be worn with glasses.

KiddoGuard is not just another Coronavirus product.  It was designed and developed as a solution for other potential future threats. Scientists worldwide agree on the fact that we might have to protect our children more often than we anticipate in the coming years . They are connecting the dots on culture, disease and the environment to discover the patterns that could cause global health crises.  Other future pandemics could be just around the corner. (we highly recommend that you read the November 2020 special issue of National Geographic "A World Gone Viral").
We do not pretend that our face shield will be the only product necessary to protect our kiddos at all times. But what we do know is that KiddoGuard can be an effective option for their safety while they are engaged in their favorite occupation, play with their friends!

KiddoGuards are manufactured in France. Developed by a father inspired by the need to protect his own children and the children admitted to a nearby children’s hospital.
He converted and upgraded the equipment already-existing in his factory to create these face shields for children. 
KiddoGuard has since become an overnight success in France and across Western Europe, with more and more parents and elementary Schools purchasing them (for their students to wear during recess). This enthusiasm is behind our desire to make KiddoGuard available to our children as well here in the United States.   

 

What makes KiddoGuard better:

KiddoGuard provides a protective barrier for the facial area and associated mucous membranes (eyes, nose, mouth). It contributes to a better protection from viruses transmitted through droplets.

Here are its characteristics:

  • Protection against splashes and direct fluid streams
  • Easily adjusted around the contours of every kids' forehead
  • One size fits all
  • Works for kids wearing eyeglasses
  • Exceptionally light (less than 20g), practical and comfortable
  • Offers ventilation that limits fogging
  • Reusable and easily washable (with a glass or plastic cleaner or soap & water)
  • Ecological (made of recyclable transparent PET of about 200 microns)
  • Other shields available worldwide use printed appliques with toxic inks. Our inks are placed directly on each visor and is above all non-toxic (conforms to NF EN 71-3 Norms)
  • Temperature resistant from -4°F to 131°F (-20°C to +55°C)
  • Although our face shields are meant to be used for fun during your kiddo's social events, you should direct your children to use them first for their primary purpose, as protective devices

What we are trying to accomplish

Our goals:
Current maximum productivity (in France) is approximately 20,000 face shields monthly,  ready to be scaled up easily.  We are the exclusive distributor of KiddoGuards for the United States. Your trust will allow us to invest in a manufacturing facility in Texas, allowing us to both lower our prices and reduce delivery times, while also creating local job opportunities.

As one of our backers, you will enjoy an exclusive discount of between 15% to 35% on your purchase!

                                                         
                                                                   Our manufacturing facility  
 

    KiddoGuard offers a large variety of designs:

    Tell your friends!

    Share our campaign page. 

    Spread the word to all the parents, grandparents, caregivers, family & friends in your life.
    If you know any teachers, schools, organisations, kids activity centers who encourage safe play, let them know about KiddoGuard. If you want to surprise your favorite teacher, we can ship to her/him directly at their school. Simply send us an email with the name of this teacher and the address of the school.

    Questions / Help? Email us at inquiries@ag-imports.com
story_txt:
Introduction:
As parents, we will do everything in our power to keep our children safe. But we also want our kids to stay kids even when they have to go through major stresses of today's world, like COVID-19 or any other similar dangers. 
We know that it can be a real challenge to get kids to wear protective wear, but all parents will agree that adding fun to the equation would make this difficult task a little more enjoyable for our kiddos.    
Our face shields, KiddoGuards, while being an effective safety option, are fun, comfortable, adaptable to all head sizes, and can be worn with glasses.
KiddoGuard is not just another Coronavirus product.  It was designed and developed as a solution for other potential future threats. Scientists worldwide agree on the fact that we might have to protect our children more often than we anticipate in the coming years . They are connecting the dots on culture, disease and the environment to discover the patterns that could cause global health crises.  Other future pandemics could be just around the corner. (we highly recommend that you read the November 2020 special issue of National Geographic "A World Gone Viral").We do not pretend that our face shield will be the only product necessary to protect our kiddos at all times. But what we do know is that KiddoGuard can be an effective option for their safety while they are engaged in their favorite occupation, play with their friends!
KiddoGuards are manufactured in France. Developed by a father inspired by the need to protect his own children and the children admitted to a nearby children’s hospital.He converted and upgraded the equipment already-existing in his factory to create these face shields for children. KiddoGuard has since become an overnight success in France and across Western Europe, with more and more parents and elementary Schools purchasing them (for their students to wear during recess). This enthusiasm is behind our desire to make KiddoGuard available to our children as well here in the United States.   


 
What makes KiddoGuard better:
KiddoGuard provides a protective barrier for the facial area and associated mucous membranes (eyes, nose, mouth). It contributes to a better protection from viruses transmitted through droplets.
Here are its characteristics:

Protection against splashes and direct fluid streams
Easily adjusted around the contours of every kids' forehead
One size fits all
Works for kids wearing eyeglasses
Exceptionally light (less than 20g), practical and comfortable
Offers ventilation that limits fogging
Reusable and easily washable (with a glass or plastic cleaner or soap & water)
Ecological (made of recyclable transparent PET of about 200 microns)
Other shields available worldwide use printed appliques with toxic inks. Our inks are placed directly on each visor and is above all non-toxic (conforms to NF EN 71-3 Norms)
Temperature resistant from -4°F to 131°F (-20°C to +55°C)
Although our face shields are meant to be used for fun during your kiddo's social events, you should direct your children to use them first for their primary purpose, as protective devices


What we are trying to accomplish
Our goals:Current maximum productivity (in France) is approximately 20,000 face shields monthly,  ready to be scaled up easily.  We are the exclusive distributor of KiddoGuards for the United States. Your trust will allow us to invest in a manufacturing facility in Texas, allowing us to both lower our prices and reduce delivery times, while also creating local job opportunities.
As one of our backers, you will enjoy an exclusive discount of between 15% to 35% on your purchase!
                                                         


                                                                   Our manufacturing facility  
 



KiddoGuard offers a large variety of designs:

Tell your friends!
Share our campaign page. 
Spread the word to all the parents, grandparents, caregivers, family & friends in your life.If you know any teachers, schools, organisations, kids activity centers who encourage safe play, let them know about KiddoGuard. If you want to surprise your favorite teacher, we can ship to her/him directly at their school. Simply send us an email with the name of this teacher and the address of the school.
Questions / Help? Email us at inquiries@ag-imports.com

story:
WELCOME FRIENDS!

We are Orleans CrossFit. We are the newest fitness facility in Orleans Ontario and we are growing fast. We all know with growth comes opportunity and right now we have an amazing opportunity to expand our community and provide additional services to all our members!

We have incredibly high ambitions and want to provide the absolute best service within the fitness industry. We know it takes an entire community to make all of this happen which is another reason we started this campaign. We need your help! 

We are inviting you to help us hit our milestones and change the fitness industry in the Orleans area!

 

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?

We have been presented an opportunity to expand our current location. This opportunity will allow Orleans CrossFit to double its square footage! If this campaign reaches both milestones (explained below) then we can successfully execute our plan to not only double our square footage but also provide addition services and competition grade equipment.

 

EXPANSION MILESTONE

The level of success from this marketing campaign will determine the end result of our expansion. Renovations and fitness equipment can be extremely expensive so we decided to create two milestones. 

 

MILESTONE #1 - IMPROVE CURRENT FACILITY - $60,000

Milestone #1 will allow us to invest more capital into our existing facility. We would add the following upon reaching this milestone:

  • New schedule which extends our current hours of operation

  • Additional classes offered (i.e. mobility, yoga, weightlifting, spinning, seniors, etc.)

  • New equipment (i.e. additional rowers, bikes, bars, weights and much more)

  • Onsite fitness, health and well-being care

 

MILESTONE #2 - DOUBLE OUR FLOOR SPACE - $100,000

Milestone #2 will allow us to double the square footage of our current facility. In addition to doubling our square footage, we would add the following upon reaching this milestone: 

  • Provide all items included in Milestone #1

  • BUST A HOLE IN THE WALL!

  • Turf flooring for indoor dry-land training 

  • Additional new equipment to fit-up the new space

  • Possibility for additional onsite fitness, health and well-being care

 

PARTICIPATION OPPORTUNITIES

Listed below are the different participation opportunities we are offering. 

1. Punch Pass

The Orleans CrossFit punch pass provides a member to choose from any 10 classes to participate in during a six (6) month time period. 

  • More than 15% OFF regular pricing

 

2. One (1) Month Unlimited

Our one (1) month unlimited membership provides our members with unlimited access to all our classes as well as any open gym hours available for one (1) month. 

  • Nearly 20% OFF regular pricing

 

3. One (1) Year Unlimited

Our one (1) year unlimited membership provides our members with unlimited access to all our classes as well as any open gym hours available for three hundred sixty-five (365) days.

  • More than 25% OFF regular pricing

 

4. "Life-time" Membership

The Orleans CrossFit "life-time" membership provides a significant discount to a very limited number of members. This membership provides our members with unlimited access to all our classes as well as any open gym hours available for life!

  • Nearly 50% OFF regular pricing

  • Some conditions do apply, including but not limited to, the amount paid upfront covers your annual membership fees for five (5) years, thereafter your membership fees will be paid regularly (bi-weekly) at a discounted rate of 50% off the posted unlimited membership rate. Before making this purchase, please speak with one of the owners. 

 

5. Donations/Contributions

For anyone who cannot make their way into the gym due to other restrictions we welcome any and all donations/contributions. Donations are greatly appreciated. To show our gratitude toward these individuals Orleans CrossFit will have a plaque created and mounted proudly at the gym listing all our generous participants!

 

Please note, that our estimated "delivery date" (meaning, the estimated date in which you can exercise your membership option) is March 2020. We have March 2020 in our timeline because it is (if we hit Milestone #2) how long it will take to have the expansion outfitted with equipment and looking amazing for all members (current and new) to experience. 

We truly appreciate your patience in this exciting time at Orleans CrossFit. We want to be 100% ready before you start your fitness journey with us!

 

THE IMPACT

We know how valuable your time is, how important a healthy lifestyle is and how hard it is to be/stay consistent with that lifestyle. In hitting our milestones, you’ll find it much easier to achieve your goals with all the extra classes, business hours and space to workout!

In hitting our milestones, we can GUARANTEE an expansion and tons of excitement moving forward at Orleans CrossFit! We are ready to take Orleans CrossFit to the next level, and with your help this will no longer be a dream, it will become our reality!

Here's a glance at our draft new schedule:

 

OUR DESIGN

Here is a draft 3D rendering which demonstrates the overall impact of doubling our floor space.

 

ATHLETE LOUNGE

Our newly expanded facility is designed for athletes, professionals, students, friends and family members who need to study, get work done or simply hang out. We're building an open space concept lounge for you to meet and make new friends.

 

TRAINING FOR COMPETITIVE ATHLETES

Orleans CrossFit has always been an excellent fitness facility for competitive athletes to train and be coached. Our daily programming is recognized by many and proven to be successful. All members at Orleans CrossFit are provided with our OC Compete programming which outlines additional strength and conditioning our competitive athletes can take advantage of, for no extra cost. Upon the successful completion of either one of our milestones, Orleans CrossFit will be even more equipped to provide our competitive athletes the tools and resources they need to succeed. 

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Can’t contribute? No problem at all.

All we ask is that you like and share our campaign with EVERYONE! You never know who might be interested in starting their fitness journey!

story:
You dye your hair to get rid of signs of aging. You invest in facial creams to lock in moisture and reduce wrinkles.

But what about your hands?

How do you keep your hands from giving away your age? Up until now, there have been few if any, effective anti-aging hand treatments. But we’re changing that with our Hands On device.  We came up with the idea for Hands On because we love technology and we’re passionate about creating products that fight aging. By fusing advanced technology with pure passion, we’ve developed a dynamic device that reduces the signs of aging quickly and effectively. But we’ve gone beyond turning back the hands of time. The Hands-On device also massages your skin while red light technology activates our specially formulated hand lotion. The result is a customized hand massage and better-looking hands.

Whether you want to relieve tension or actively reverse the signs of aging, Hands On is the device for you. 

 

 

Rejuvenates Skin

Through sonic technology and our anti-aging hand cream, your skin is rejuvenated from the inside out. Our product penetrates well beneath the surface leaving behind nothing but a soft, supple appearance. 

 

 

Stimulates Collagen and Elastin Production

Collagen makes up 80% of the inner layer of our skin. It is also responsible for the skin’s strength and firmness. Poor or reduced collagen production can contribute to premature aging. Elastin is another important feature of youthful looking skin. It is responsible for your skin’s ability to bounce back from stress. Hands On stimulates the production of both collagen and elastin to create younger looking skin. It does this through mechanical vibration.  Our hand cream supports this production and contributes to a healthy glow. 

 

 

Reduces Redness and Dryness 

Red, dried out skin looks tired and aged. Hands On applies the perfect amount of warmth to soothe dry skin. In combination with our hand cream, you’ll experience nourished and youthful looking hands quickly.


Reduces Pigmentation and Impurities 

Skin pigmentation is often one of the first signs of aging, showing up on your hands and arms. Our high energy focused device penetrates these ‘age spots’ minimizing their visibility. It also attacks impurities by making it possible for a greater amount of active ingredients to penetrate the skin.

 

Improves Skin’s Natural Regenerative Capabilities

By exposing your skin to low-frequency sonic waves, it’s easier to heal and transform every layer. This facilitates an effortless penetration of active ingredients—like those found in our hand cream. As a result, your skin is better able to regenerate and heal itself quickly. 

 

Improves lymphatic flow and cell metabolism through massage 

Heat and sonic frequencies stimulate the flow of your lymphatic system, and the lymphatic system is responsible for the health and vitality of your skin and internal organs. In combination with the massage feature, Hands On can improve cell metabolism which translates into gorgeous skin for you! Within just a few applications you can enjoy discernibly more beautiful skin and complexion.  

Increase in the elasticity of the skin’s surface 

The elasticity of your skin is critical to keeping it looking young and attractive. When you use our device, it penetrates the top layer of your skin and increases the elasticity. Enjoy a smoother, healthier appearance with the help of Hands On.

 

 

Works as A Pain Preventative

The combination of heat and high-powered airflow generators can also prevent pain associated with arthritis, gout, and rheumatism. Relax and redefine your skin’s appearance with Hands On. 

Improved Circulation

Airflow generators work to stimulate circulation to the hands. Experience rapid results and younger, healthier looking hands, thanks to this built in massage feature.

 

 

Illuminated OLED Display 

We use an OLED (Organic Light Emitting Diode) Display making it easy to adjust your settings no matter when you use Hands On. 

Eight High Powered Airflow Generators Provide a Luxurious Massage

Our airflow generators are designed to gently massage your hands. This stimulates lymph flow and blood circulation. The result is a relaxing experience from start to finish. 

High Intensity Red Light that Deeply Penetrates the Skin 

Our high intensity red light technology penetrates well beyond the surface of your skin for longer-lasting results. 

Low Frequency Sonic Waves

We use low frequency sonic waves that push through thousands of vibrations per minute. This causes cavitation to occur in the top layers of your skin. As this happens, active ingredients from our hand cream are better able to nourish your skin. Along the way, the formation of new collagen is also stimulated. The heat then stimulates your metabolism and rejuvenates your skin. And all this thanks to low frequency ultrasonic waves.

 

 

Tobias Hämmerli is the inventor of Hands On. Together with our team, we have successfully created a prototype that is ready to be brought to the market on a commercial level. Unfortunately, up and until now we’ve been using 3D printing technology which is expensive and simply not equipped to handle mass production. That’s where we need your help! To bring this incredible anti-aging device to the masses we are on the hunt for funding. Proven to produce noticeably younger looking hands and a more beautiful complexion within a few applications, it needs to be on the market! And with your help, it can be! 

 

 

Market Potential for Private Use

We’ve crunched the numbers and done the market research - there currently is no private usage treatment for aging hands beyond hand creams. With Hands On, however, individuals can enjoy anti-aging treatments right in their own home. The potential for growth covers a wide range of demographics including adults who want to fight off aging. With this campaign, we hope to reach this audience. 

Market Potential for Commercial Use

Nail studios and salons can particularly benefit from investing in Hands On. In addition to nail treatments, salon owners can upsell customers with a single Hands On session for as little as $15 per 15 minutes. With retail costs for Hands On at approximately $600, salon owners can enjoy a return on investment in as little as 10 hours of treatments sold. Now it’s your turn. Would you like to be apart of the Hands On revolution? Any pledge amount can get us one step closer to our goal. Not ready to pledge but still want to see us reach our goal? Then why not share our campaign with your social circle? We’d be grateful if you would. Whether you hit the share button or pledge to our success, we thank you for stopping by. Here’s to younger, more attractive looking hands thanks, to Hands On!

story:
the healthi.er story

Hello Indiegogo! You're probably wondering what healthi.er is and why you should fund it. Good questions.

In a nutshell, healthi.er is my project to create a new healthcare toolkit that should help make managing medical conditions just a little bit easier for patients and their families. 

I've learned that managing a disease, especially a serious one, is a lot more complicated than just trying to get better. There are endless appointments, multi-person medical teams, long medication lists, and countless notes, rules, and symptoms you need to keep track of. There's not yet an easy way to do this for patients or caregivers. healthi.er aims to change that by bringing all your notes, appointments, and other health information together, along with your family's and your doctors', so everything is where you need it, when you need it.

where you come in

I believe in this project, but I need your help to build it. I work in technology and am experienced in sales in marketing, so I can get healthi.er off the ground, but I need help getting it actually built. I plan to use all funds from Indiegogo for the development of healthi.er, so we can get it into the hands of people who need it.

Whether you personally have the need for healthi.er, your loved one does, or you just think the project is an interesting idea, I'd love your support.

risks & challenges

I have a lot of passion for brining healthi.er to everyone who needs it, but as with any new product, there will be challenges along the way. 

There is always a struggle to find the right balance between meeting deadlines and building the right product. We are likely to run into development delays along the way, but I have tried to build that into the timeline.

other ways you can help

If you're not ready to contribute but are interested in the project, you can still help out!

  • Please use this form to add your email
  • Help get the word out using the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you!

story:
Project F3 (Fitness for Fun) is a New, Revolutionary way of interaction between the Fitness Activities and the World of Videogames through all kind of Devices.

Nowadays thanks to the Hardware implemented in daily used devices such as Smartphones, Smartwatches and Smartbands with the help of a Sports Tracker App we are able to extract Sportsperson’ s own Physical Parameters during their Workout.

F3 is not an App, it is not even a Game Engine.

F3 is what it is commonly said an “Engine Plugin” that is elaborating this extracted data and convert it in our Digital Character’ s parameters (Skills and appearance ).

Thanks to this, the Sportsperson will become himself the Main hero of his favorite Videogames, thanks to his/her Performances, on any kind of game device, from Mobile to Consoles and PC.

Our Target is to create a Software Platform compatible with a wide range of Videogame Engines like the Unreal Engine and Unity development tools and also to collaborate with other Big Companies held Game Engines to help integrate our Software into their Products.

This graphic below shows how a Runner’s Body Parameters can be converted in a Role Playing Game Character Skills

That could be integrated in almost every other kind of games depending by the Fitness activity chosen. A workout activity at the gym will fits best to be integrated in a Fighting Game Style, our Digital character will become stronger, also changing in the appearance the more our Player will grow up his Physical skills.

At the same time the Videogame itself will become our new Personal Trainer.

Let’ s think about a Military First Person Shooter Game that is going to train us as Marines, Giving tips and advices based on our (settable ) level of Experience and Various Challenges will Unlock new Weapons, Gadgets and so on

Thanks to our Product integration and diffusion of it, we hope to create a new category of Videogamer, adding to the normal fun also the Health factor

How about “Vsports” Marathon/tournaments at both open air and in front of the screen?

We are a Small experienced Team, but none of us has ever reached that celebrity status that would better guarantee our success to your eyes at the moment.

What we can say is that F3 team is fully committed to its Vision, but more than this we are absolutely passionate and excited about what we are creating and what we hope to realize thanks to your Support.

F3 Business model is focused on monetization thanks to future Partnership and from selling our platform to developers, so there’ s not going to be any expenses to the final customers, that’ s why we decided, at least for now, not to include any kind of Perks for your donations.

Instead, to thank you for – what we hope – will be your support we decided to spend every single cent we are going to eventually receive, focusing no other than the development of the F3 Platform with no other targets and possible distractions.

We are going to use the received Money for hiring new stuff as experienced developers, Professional Sports Trainers, Office rental fees and new Equipment that without your contributions would be impossible for our wallets.

Our Team will keep you update on the status of the Project

Please feel free to contact us, here or on the Social Networks, we will be happy to answer any questions and solve any doubt about our Vision

Thank you!
