story: N/A

Short Summary

We started to develop idea of the versatile shoes in 2013. It begins just as prototyping hobby result, but some works ago we decided that it could be somethitg more... like a new cultural fenomenum.

We - are a two architects: Sam Bolotnik and Ruslan Antonenko. Age 28/29. Born in Karaganda, Kazakhstan. Now starting our campaign from city Krasnoyarsk, Russia.

During the campaign and later we will answer your questions.

Ask it here in comments, by e-mail or direct in Instagram.

Our Instagram account:  @olooo.skates

Watch latest news and updates there!

 

What We Need & What You Get

Goal of this campaign is fixed. And it's rather serious - 370000$. That's all because we supposed to do really useful, safe and comfortable device. For this aims we'll  need support of professional shoes/skates developers with design of upper part of boots, we'll also need more tests of a final product - it would be nearly 100 crushed pairs or more to make every next better.

The good news is - the price of Olooo in this campaign is 15-25% lower than it will be after official release (planned on March 2019). Cause we don't have any marketing spends here.
Another good news: our backers will get Olooo sneakers at least 3-4 weeks earlier than official release.

The Impact

We like to imagine how people skateing in Olooo... They leave the house, switch to skating mode and go to the store, office, school, university, cinema, cafe, club ... on the way using the bus, taxi, metro, going up/down on the escalator, passing through turnstiles. And all of this with one pair of shoes! Do not need these long re-training every time and a heavy backpack.
Imagine how much people can change their lifestyle with Olooo! Without exaggeration...

 

Risks & Challenges

Our main risk is the desire to launch sales as quickly as possible and to fail to conduct enough tests. Understanding this will prevent such impulses and prevent the model from entering into final production before it is really ready.

Technical risks of being flimsy in skate mode and being stiff in walking mode are solvded on early  prototyping stage:

Flexible in walking mode.

Stiff and stable in skating mode

Some technical details can be improved during the campaign or later. As a sample - we plan to strengthen the connection of the 1st and 2nd wheels after a new series of tests. All changes will not have a serious impact on functionality or design.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you find our project interesting and promissing but don't actualy need it, please, make some noise about our campaign! Any repost or share will be usefull!

You are also can use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Adjustable Memory Foam Comfort Mattress

First to market - $50,000 in advance orders gets our patent pending design advertised on line
  • We will use the funds to digitally market our need product on line and compete with Casper 
  • With every mattress sold, we will give away one free patent pending adjustable memory foam pillow. That's a $100 value for free!

We have over 50 years in the sleep industry and currently hold 2 patents for sleep products with 4 more pending including our new adjustable mattress and pillow.

story:
Organic skincare, made in Italy

It is very important to take care of what we eat and only choose the best high quality, organic ingredients for our diet. But what we put on our skin is equally important as ingredients are absorbed and enter the bloodstream.

Stress, lack of sleep, excessive anxiety does show on your skin, and does not contribute to your general health: detox and relaxation can help you reenergize and start the day with a good mood. Can the natural perfume of an organic skincare product do that? Taking care of your self with amazing products can really help your general wellbeing.We would like you to take care of your skin and take that moment for yourself when you receive our box, as a real treat.

Our boxes only include certified eco-friendly, organic products, that contain NO PEGs, parabens, petrolatum, paraffin, SLSs, SLES, silicones or artificial colours. We really like products that contain ingredients from biodynamic organic agriculture, that follow organic standards and farming techniques that respect the earth, supporting its natural processes. They are also nickel tested, to protect consumers from allergies and intolerances, and they are cruelty-free.

The most important part is what they DO contain: the highest quality ingredients, and that is something you will feel immediately on your skin. 

Our boxes are:

  • Sent Bimonthly. We choose to send a bimonthly subscription (1 box every 2 months) to avoid overwhelming you with too many products a month. Shipping fewer parcels also reduce the carbon footprint and make it less expensive to ship worldwide. 
  • Essentials. Our face skincare box contains every time a complete routine for your skin. We would like to make sure you have got the essential products for your skin. That is why we always include: face cream, face mask, face cleaner, of different brands but always of huge value, plus of course accessories, oils, scrubs, balms, serums etc.
  • Minimal. Every box will have lots of surprises and lots of sample size products to test over the months. But we promise to never fill your drawers of products that you won't ever need or won't be able to use. 

The challenge for green skincare is to create the best eco-conscious sustainable products in a convenient, comfortable format. Lots of research is needed to get the best products formulated just the right way, to be effective, high quality and a pleasure to use every day. These are the kind of products we like to include in our selection.

Kleverpark

As an Italian expat, over time I realized that the wonderful Mediterranean made in Italy skincare is not very well known abroad and I think certified organic Italian skincare deserves a lot more attention.  The quality of the products and the ingredients used are very often way superior to the ingredients of organic products from internationally recognized brands.

I founded a little company in the Netherlands to change that perception. With our subscription boxes, we would like to source Italian products and give a chance to skincare lovers everywhere to discover many little gems.

The box is called Kleverpark, which is an amazing area where we are based, a fairytale little town, very close to the splendors of the city of Amsterdam. Living here allows us to see Italian products from another point of view, and to love them even more. 

Our project

  • We are ready to start selling our lovely boxes, all the background work of research and network has been done already. We plan to start selling the memberships to finance the logistics of the subscription model. 
  • While we will always try to keep prices accessible, the membership prices will increase next year. If you subscribe now, you also get to lock in your founder membership price for life, so even when we will increase the prices, you will be able to continue to renew your membership at the current rate. 

Two memberships boxes

We offer two levels of memberships, one with masks exclusively, and one with a complete facial routine. All from the most amazing organic Italian brands. 

  • Masks subscription box. Sent every 2 months, contains 7 sheet masks or single-use masks.
  • Face skincare subscription box. Sent every 2 months, it contains  7-8 full-size products, and some extra sample size products. Everything you need to upgrade your natural routine. 

Who are the products for? We will send products for normal to sensitive skin, dry or oily, and the products will follow the seasons and provide what you need most (more nourishment in winter, sunscreen products in summer, and so on).

Every box will follow a theme, to inspire you to take care of yourself and stop every day for a second from your busy daily routine, smell the amazing scents changing with the season. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our idea and love Italian products, please share this page!

Follow our journey on Instagram @kleverparkbox

Thank you!

Other Ways You Can Help
If you like our idea and love Italian products, please share this page!
Follow our journey on Instagram @kleverparkbox
Thank you!

story:
MEET THE 8 PLATE

The 8 Plate is unlike any scale, measuring cup, or smart phone app. Each section of the plate is mathematically designed so precisely close to the average human bite that the plate design specifications are recognized by the United States Patent and Trademark Office. Our patent is currently pending. If you have tried your best to control your weight with little success, try eating all of your meals from the plate we originally marketed to the bariatric industry to be used by pre- and post-gastric bypass patients and others being treated for obesity related issues. The reason doctors closely regulate food intake for the obese is because portion control works.

WHAT IF DISCIPLINE ONLY MEANT EATING OUT OF A CERTAIN CONTAINER?

We know you are motivated, but this motivation dwindles quickly when pursuing your weight loss goal requires so many time consuming steps, rules and rituals. How many of us have time to clean the blender or food processor each morning that we decide to make a healthy fruit and veggie juice or smoothie? How many of us cringe at the cost of organic produce? We carry our phones everywhere, but searching for nutrition details can be both tedious and depressing. The 8 Plate only needs to be accessible and clean! Users can break ANY meal down to approximately eight bites, and have room for each food group and dessert. The 8 Plate literally trains you to eat only what you need, when you need it.

SIMPLICITY RULES!

Weight loss, by definition, is really quite simple. It is the result of decreased energy intake (what we call calorie consumption) or increased energy expenditure (what we call exercise). If a healthy individual eats less than she/he expends, she/he will lose weight. So why is battling the bulge so difficult? It's because we focus on what we eat to soon in our journey. Eat what you like, just use the 8 Plate to help you eat less of it.  Many personal trainers and nutritionists would have you believe that weight loss is only for those that can afford to eat expensive organic foods and fresh fruits and vegetables everyday. We reject this class of reasoning.

THE 8 PLATE IS PRACTICAL

A weight loss product should work for the stay-at-home mom, the busy executive, the student, men, women, children, poor people, and wealthy individuals alike. Weight loss can benefit from, but will never be found in a membership, meeting, pill, powder, shake, or piece of exercise equipment. Most of us fail with many things in life because we believe the simple way to accomplish things must somehow be ineffective. 

Our founder and CEO tells all new designers and engineers that the sales of simple bedpans pay as many college tuitions, mortgages, and car notes as the sales of the more complex flushing toilet.

EASY AS 1-2-3

*SCARY NOTE: We often eat four to nine times more than we should in a single sitting!

1. Prepare or purchase your meal or snack

2. Fill all eight sections of The 8 Plate. Resist piling foods. 

3. Enjoy your meal with a tall glass of water, tea, coffee, or zero calorie beverage of your choice. (Drinking with meals aids in the digestion process, and helps you to feel full.)

Legal: The 8 Plate was designed to be used by patients under the direct care of licensed physicians. Please consult your health care provider before assuming any new diet or exercise program.

WHAT WE NEED

Lawyer fees, USPTO fees, and other legal fees have been taken care of. We also managed to get prototypes for testing, marketing, and design purposes. We are now at the stage where generous friends are essential to our continued success. Your contribution will help us to create the mass production molds, and help us realize our first full production run.

WHAT YOU GET  ★   PERKS 

Our whole business model is premised on simplicity, so our perks are few. For a contribution of 80% of the planned retail price, or $8 USD, you will get one first run 8 Plate. 

For your contribution of $1 we genuinely thank you and appreciate your support. In fact, we will personally thank you on our Instagram and Twitter pages, so that the world may know that you were an integral part of our vision of a healthier world.

THE TRANSPARENCY ( or WHAT IF?) SECTION

What happens to The 8 Plate if we do not meet our funding goal? Although funding goal failures are a reality on crowdfunding platforms, we are actively spreading our message to industries that welcome new ideas. With that said, we are confident that we will make the first run a reality, and initial shipments of The 8 Plate should begin in late March 2016.

story:
The AirCommander Respirator  Story

The AirCommander - "Let's Stop doing without"!

  • Lightweight, Comfortable, Convenient
  • Won't fog glasses
  • Patent Pending

The AirCommander components assemble and disassemble quickly making loading fresh filters or cleaning easy and convenient

The AirCommander is large enough to filter out contaminants yet small enough fit conveniently into toolboxes or tool belts.

Replaceable filters are a fraction of the cost of traditional masks.

The AirCommander mouthpiece is soft, comfortable and Dishwasher safe!

Laboratory Tested.  Meet N95 standards for commercial applications.

Replaceable filters are a fraction of the cost of traditional masks.

In the Future, the AirCommander can come in several different shapes and colors. This allows the device to become a marketing tool as well as a piece Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

Lanyard is included so that AirCommander can be worn around the neck. A Breakaway feature allow it to come apart easily for safety.

The T-Shirt that comes with most of the rewards is 100% cotton with the AirCommander logo screen printed on the left chest area. This T-Shirt will only enhance your awesomeness!!


In the future, we believe that there are opportunities for companies to watermark their logos on the front of the filter or print their company name on the frame.

The AirCommander comes with a nose clip to ensure that the air you breathe is 100% filtered.  Most people find that the clip is unnecessary since when the AirCommander is placed in your mouth, you instinctively start breathing through the respirator.

Beards and facial hair are not a problem for the AirCommander.  Facial hair and “wisdom wrinkles” are a problem for traditional masks.

More comfortable than a traditional face mask. No need to be concerned with hyperventilation or skin irritation.

The AirCommander is easy to use. This makes it easy to talk, eat and drink.

The AirCommander was selected as a finalist product Pitchtank with Kevin Harrington (original cast member of Shark Tank).  Presented in front of a live audience at the Performing Arts Center, Appleton Wisconsin. May 2015


Stop “Doing without” and start using the AirCommander Respirator!

Laboratory Tested.  Meet N95 standards for commercial applications.

In the Future, the AirCommander can come in several different shapes and colors. This allows the device to become a marketing tool as well as a piece Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).





Lanyard is included so that AirCommander can be worn around the neck. A Breakaway feature allow it to come apart easily for safety.


The T-Shirt that comes with most of the rewards is 100% cotton with the AirCommander logo screen printed on the left chest area. This T-Shirt will only enhance your awesomeness!!




In the future, we believe that there are opportunities for companies to watermark their logos on the front of the filter or print their company name on the frame.


The AirCommander comes with a nose clip to ensure that the air you breathe is 100% filtered.  Most people find that the clip is unnecessary since when the AirCommander is placed in your mouth, you instinctively start breathing through the respirator.




Beards and facial hair are not a problem for the AirCommander.  Facial hair and “wisdom wrinkles” are a problem for traditional masks.

More comfortable than a traditional face mask. No need to be concerned with hyperventilation or skin irritation.
The AirCommander is easy to use. This makes it easy to talk, eat and drink.
